anya-e0104n:11_1: Saṃvaṇṇanāvasena anantarasamādhikathāya āsannapaccakkhataṃ dīpento “ayaṃ samādhibhāvanā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:11_2: “Abhiññā sampādetuṃ yogo kātabbo”ti vatvā tattha payojanavisese dassetuṃ “evañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:11_5: tathāpi pañca lokiyābhiññā yathāvuttasamādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃsabhāvena pākaṭā paññātāti tāsaṃyeva vasena yogino adhigatānisaṃsatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:11_8: tathā ca “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato “sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:13_2: iddhiṃ vikubbanañcāti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:13_5: ālokakasiṇañca odātakasiṇantogadhaṃ katvā “odātakasiṇapariyantesū”ti vuttaṃ kasiṇānulomādicittaparidamanavidhino adhippetattā,
anya-e0104n:13_7: Aṭṭha aṭṭhāti yathāvuttesu kasiṇesu ekekasmiṃ aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo.
anya-e0104n:13_16: Cittaṃ paridametabbaṃ yadicchakaṃ yatthicchakaṃ jhānānaṃ samāpajjanādisukhatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:14_1: Jhānaṃ samāpajjatīti kiṃ catubbidhampi jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n:14_7: Yadā hi kasiṇānulomameva ābhujitvā tattha tattha kasiṇe jhānāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n:14_10: Yadā pana aṅgasaṅkantiṃ ābhujitvā jhānāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n:14_12: Iminā nayena kasiṇānulomaārammaṇasaṅkantiādīnampi aññamaññaṃ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:15_0: Tathevāti “paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpī”ti etassa upasaṃhārattho tathā- saddo.
anya-e0104n:17_3: Tato ākiñcaññāyatananti tato pathavīkasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n:17_4: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ amanasikaritvā taṃ laṅghitvā yathāvuttaākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassa abhāve pavattitaṃ
anya-e0104n:17_7: Atha vā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu kassaci ukkamanaṃ idha kasiṇukkantikaṃ nāmāti āha “kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:17_9: ukkamanassa ca sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ kasiṇa”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna taṃ pakāraṃ saha nissayena sesakasiṇesu atidisanto “evaṃ āpokasiṇādi…pe…
anya-e0104n:19_0: Lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti lohitakasiṇaṃ āvajjento abhimukhaṃ katvā tassa ugghāṭanena upaṭṭhite
anya-e0104n:19_1: kasiṇugghāṭimākāse amanasikārena ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattha pubbe pavattaviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n:20_3: Yaṃ pana aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantivacane “nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatana”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:20_6: Nippariyāyato pana yathā aṅgasaṅkanti rūpajjhānesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n:20_8: Tassa tasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇantare pavatti ārammaṇasaṅkanti.
anya-e0104n:20_9: Tenāha “sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n:21_0: Yathā pana “sabbakasiṇesū”ti iminā ākāsaviññāṇakasiṇānampi saṅgaho hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ idha aṭṭhannaṃyeva kasiṇānaṃ adhigatattā,
anya-e0104n:21_1: evaṃ sabbampi arūpajjhānaṃ “ekaṃ jhāna”nti na sakkā vattuṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena cittaparidamanassa icchitattā.
anya-e0104n:21_2: Tasmā āruppajjhānānaṃ vasena aṅgārammaṇasaṅkanti pariyāyena vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:21_12: ārammaṇassa ca ekajjhaṃ aññathā viseso hoti,
anya-e0104n:21_14: So pana viseso heṭṭhimānaṃ tesaṃ aṅgārammaṇānaṃ samatikkamanavasena hotīti vuttaṃ “ekantarikavasena aṅgānañca ārammaṇānañca saṅkamana”nti.
anya-e0104n:21_16: “idaṃ pathavīkasiṇa”ntiādinā ārammaṇesu ca vavatthāpitesu ekajjhaṃ tesaṃ vavatthāpane na koci viseso atthīti aṭṭhakathāsu ayaṃ vidhi nābhato.
anya-e0104n:21_18: anulomapaṭilomakkamena ca ekantarikabhāvena labbhamānampi jhānādīnaṃ ukkamanaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0104n:21_19: tehi nayehi vināpi cittaparidamanaṃ ijjhatīti papañcaparihāratthaṃ vā te aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:22_7: Kasiṇaparikammampi bhāroti dosavivajjanādividhinā kasiṇamaṇḍale paṭipatti yāva uggahanimittuppatti kasiṇaparikammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:22_13: Na hi bhāvanāya vināva nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0104n:22_14: Keci upacārasamādhiṃ labhitvā appanāsamādhiṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0104n:22_18: añño abhiññānanti āha “paridamitacittassāpi iddhivikubbanaṃ nāma bhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n:22_19: Khippaṃ nisanti nisāmanaṃ jhānacakkhunā pathavīkasiṇādijhānārammaṇassa dassanaṃ etassāti khippanisanti,
anya-e0104n:22_23: Yathā paṭipakkhavijayāya yodhājīvā nimmalameva asitomarādiṃ gahetvā vicaranti,
anya-e0104n:22_24: evaṃ bhikkhunāpi kilesavijayāya nimmalāva jhānābhiññā vaḷañjitabbāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:23_1: Taṃ hi khippanisantibhāvatopi garutaraṃ accāyikakiccasādhanavasena vidhātabbato durabhisambhavatarattā.
anya-e0104n:23_2: Taṃ pana rakkhitattheranidassaneneva siddhampi tato garutarena aṅgāravassaparittāṇena vibhāvetuṃ “giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya…pe…
anya-e0104n:23_5: samudde ca yāva yojanā mahatī dīpapūjā.
anya-e0104n:23_6: Pathaviṃ māpetvāti mārena pavattitaṃ aṅgāravassaṃ phuliṅgamattenapi yāva manusse na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n:24_9: Tasmāti yasmā pubbahetusampannasseva yathāvuttaṃ bhāvanānukkamaṃ vinā abhiññāyo ijjhanti,
anya-e0104n:24_16: mayhampi sijjhatī”ti kattukamyatāchandaṃ sīsaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā,
anya-e0104n:24_17: chandaṃ vā uppādetvā taṃ bhāvanāya mukhaṃ katvā jhānassa samāpajjanavasena.
anya-e0104n:24_19: “Āvajjanādivasībhāvavasenā”ti idaṃ aṭṭhasupi samāpattīsu sātisayaṃ vasībhāvāpādanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:24_23: Pubbahetusampannassa hi yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā abhiññā nibbattetabbā,
anya-e0104n:24_26: “Catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasinā”ti vacanato arūpasamāpattiyo vināpi abhiññā ijjhantīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:25_4: “Catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti vatvā “so”ti vuttattā āha “adhigatacatutthajjhāno yogī”ti.
anya-e0104n:25_6: saddo heṭṭhājhānattayādhigamapaṭipāṭisiddhassa catutthajjhānasamādhānassa nidassanatthoti āha “evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanameta”nti,
anya-e0104n:25_13: Yadipi “eva”nti idaṃ āgamanasamādhinā saddhiṃ catutthajjhānasamādhānaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n:25_14: Satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato padhānanti āha “catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite”ti.
anya-e0104n:25_16: Sabbapaccanīkadhammūpakkilesaparisuddhāya hi paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:25_19: satisīsena pana tattha desanā katāti āha “upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe”ti.
anya-e0104n:25_20: Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha “parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte,
anya-e0104n:26_6: evaṃ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti āha “anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese”ti.
anya-e0104n:26_12: cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena vasavattitaṃ upagateti attho.
anya-e0104n:26_13: Vase vattamānaṃ hi cittaṃ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:26_14: suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudunti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:27_5: Ekadhammampīti ekampi sabhāvadhammaṃ na samanupassāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:27_8: sabbaññutaññāṇena olokentopi aññaṃ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi.
anya-e0104n:28_1: āneñjappatta”nti ca vuttanti āha “etesu parisuddhatādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite,
anya-e0104n:28_5: mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā “ṭhite”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:28_7: evaṃ phalenāpi kāraṇaṃ niddharīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjappatti.
anya-e0104n:28_9: paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavantī saddhādibalānaṃ ānubhāvena hotīti “saddhādīhi pariggahitattā
anya-e0104n:28_10: āneñjappatte”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “saddhāpariggahitaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:28_11: Tattha saddhāpariggahitanti evaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvappattaṃ etaṃ cittaṃ ekaṃsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
anya-e0104n:28_12: dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṃ yathāvuttasaddhābalena
anya-e0104n:28_14: Assaddhiyenāti tappaṭipakkhena assaddhiyena hetunā na iñjati na calati na kampati,
anya-e0104n:28_20: kusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamānāya satiyā upatthambhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:28_22: Paññāpariggahitanti tassā eva bhāvanāya upakārānupakāradhammānaṃ pajānanalakkhaṇāya paññāya upatthambhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:28_24: Obhāsabhūtena hi yathāvuttasamādhānasaṃvaddhitena ñāṇena saṃkilesapakkhaṃ yāthāvato passanto tato utrasanto ottappanto taṃ adhibhavati,
anya-e0104n:29_8: samāhitassa vā cittassa imāni aṅgānīti “samāhite”ti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā ṭhitiāneñjappattiyo visuṃ gahetvā imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
anya-e0104n:30_2: tathāpi na tathā tehi dūrībhūtā apetā vā yathā catutthajjhānato,
anya-e0104n:30_3: cetaso malīnabhāvasaṅkhātauppilābhogakarehi nīvaraṇādīhi suṭṭhu vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhi,
anya-e0104n:30_8: Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ “aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā
anya-e0104n:30_15: kathaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā idha vigacchantīti?
anya-e0104n:30_16: “Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalānaṃ paṭipakkhā”ti sallekhapaṭipattivasena evaṃ vuttaṃ jhānassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvadassanato.
anya-e0104n:30_17: Ye panettha “icchāvacarānaṃ abhijjhādīna”nti imehi padehi kopaapaccayakaāmarāgabyāpādādayo gahitāti adhippāyena
anya-e0104n:30_19: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ tathā pāṭhasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:30_20: Jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkā ca nīvaraṇā ceva tadekaṭṭhā ca tesaṃ dūrībhāvaṃ vatvā puna abhāvavigamacodanāya ayujjamānattā.
anya-e0104n:30_25: idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā sukhumāyeva te gahitā,
anya-e0104n:30_29: Avassaṃ ce tamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ adhigatajjhānānampi kesañci icchāvacarānaṃ pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n:31_1: Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti ito paraṃ kattabbassa abhāvavasena abhinīhārakkhamabhāvanāya paripuṇṇattā.
anya-e0104n:31_2: Paṇītabhāvūpagamenāti tato eva padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya uttamaṭṭhena,
anya-e0104n:31_4: Ubhayañcetaṃ ṭhitiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ paripuṇṇāya bhāvanāya paṇītabhāvappattiyā “ṭhite”ti.
anya-e0104n:33_5: Pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva jhānamaggā idha nekkhammaṃ.
anya-e0104n:33_7: Paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyanti yasmā paṭipakkhaṃ harati apaneti,
anya-e0104n:35_3: Sā dasavidhāti sabbā iddhiyo ānetvā atthuddhāravasena idhādhippetaṃ iddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:35_4: Bahubhāvādikassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhahanaṃ etissā atthīti adhiṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:35_5: Vividhaṃ rūpanimmānasaṅkhātaṃ kubbanaṃ etissā atthīti vikubbanā.
anya-e0104n:35_7: Ñāṇassa vipphāro vegāyitattaṃ etissā atthīti ñāṇavipphārā.
anya-e0104n:35_9: Yato kutoci kammavipākato jātā iddhi kammavipākajā.
anya-e0104n:35_12: itarā yadā tadā puññassa vipaccanakāleti evaṃ vā imāsaṃ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:36_3: Tena aggahitaparicchedaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbassa anekabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna paricchedato dassetuṃ “sataṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:36_4: Āvajjatīti parikammasaṅkhātena ābhogena ābhujati bhāvirūpe tena parikammamanasikārena manasi karoti.
anya-e0104n:36_5: Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti tathā parikammaṃ katvā abhiññāñāṇena yathādhippete bahuke adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n:36_6: adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva bahubhāvāpattito bahubhāvāpādakaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ pavattento ca tathā adhiṭṭhātīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:38_1: Imamhā kāyāti paccakkhabhāvena “imamhā”ti vuttā bhikkhussa karajakāyā.
anya-e0104n:38_6: Abhiññāñāṇassa hi yathā manomayo kāyo nipphajjati,
anya-e0104n:38_13: iddhimatā ca ekantasadise imasmiṃ nimmāne supākaṭo manasā nibbattitabhāvoti yathā sātisayo manomayavohāro,
anya-e0104n:38_14: na tathā aññāsu adhiṭṭhānavikubbaniddhīsu samaññantaravantāsūti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:39_1: Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vāti arahattamaggañāṇuppattito pubbe vā vipassanākkhaṇe,
anya-e0104n:39_2: tatopi vā pubbe antimabhavikassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya.
anya-e0104n:39_6: samantato ca ālokakaraṇasamatthatā viya tasseva ñāṇassa ānubhāvena nibbatto sabbaso pahātabbapahānabhāvetabbabhāvanāpāripūrisaṅkhāto viseso.
anya-e0104n:39_9: Āraddhavipassanassa hi yathāvuttavipassanāya pavattikkhaṇe tato pubbe,
anya-e0104n:39_10: pacchā ca pakiṇṇakasammasanavāre niccasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhati.
anya-e0104n:39_13: vitthārakathāya pana vibhūtataro hotīti āha “vitthārena kathetabba”nti.
anya-e0104n:42_5: Samathānubhāvanibbatto visesoti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne samādhitejena nibbatto nīvaraṇavikkhambhanavitakkādisamatikkamasaññāvedayitanirodhaparissayasahanādiko viseso.
anya-e0104n:43_5: Khippanisantibhāvassa ukkaṃsagatattā thero tasmiṃ paharante eva samāpattiṃ samāpajjīti āha “paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesī”ti.
anya-e0104n:43_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “nisinno hoti aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:43_7: Ime pana therā samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṃ tena pahāro dinnoti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:44_0: Sañjīvattheranti kakusandhassa bhagavato dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ mahātheraṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n:44_1: So hi āyasmā araññādīsu yattha katthaci nisinno appakasireneva nirodhaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n:44_2: tasmā ekadivasaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nirodhaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0104n:44_7: Ayamassāti assa āyasmato sañjīvattherassa yo nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ aggiparissayābhāvo,
anya-e0104n:45_2: Kālaparicchedavasenāti “ettake kāle gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti samāpattito pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena.
anya-e0104n:45_3: Bhītā viraviṃsūti rattandhakāre rūpadassanena “pisāco uṭṭhahatī”ti maññamānā.
anya-e0104n:45_4: Ettakehi nāma bhaṇḍakehi ajjhotthaṭo nibbikāro “aho mahānubhāvo,
anya-e0104n:47_1: Rājānaṃ mettāya pharīti odissakamettāsamāpattiyā rājānaṃ phusi.
anya-e0104n:48_10: Ayanti ayaṃ paṭikkūlādivatthūsu apaṭikkūlasaññīvihārādikā khīṇāsavānaṃ aggamaggādhigamasiddhā cittissariyatā.
anya-e0104n:49_0: Aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātuso paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṃ vā gūthādike dhātumanasikāraṃ karontoti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:49_2: dhammasabhāvacintanāya ca na paṭikkūlasaññī hutvā iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
anya-e0104n:49_5: Tattha rūpadhammajātaṃ aniccanti ādiattho iti- saddo,
anya-e0104n:49_6: tasmā aniccadukkhānattavipariṇāmadhammoti manasikāraṃ vā karontoti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:49_7: Paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesūti iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni vatthūni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vadati.
anya-e0104n:49_9: Yaṃ vā sattānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā apaṭikkūlato upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:49_10: yañca apaṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā paṭikkūlato upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:50_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena “cakkhū”ti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena,
anya-e0104n:50_5: Chaḷaṅgupekkhanti iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanalakkhaṇaṃ chasu dvāresu pavattiyā
anya-e0104n:51_5: Kusalakammena nibbattitvāpi akusalavipākānubhāvena sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā vinipātikānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:51_7: Vipassanāpi ukkaṃsagatā ubbegapītisahitā ākāse laṅghāpanamattāpi hotīti vuttaṃ “vipassanaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n:52_3: Cakkavattī hi cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā attano bhavanato abbhuggantvā ākāseneva sineruṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ anusaṃyāyatīti.
anya-e0104n:53_0: Cakkavattiādīnaṃ puññiddhiyā vitthāriyamānāya atipapañco hotīti puññavato iddhiṃ lakkhaṇato dassentena
anya-e0104n:53_1: “paripākaṃ gate puññasambhāre ijjhanakaviseso”ti vatvāpi jotikādīnaṃ puññiddhiṃ ekadesena dassetuṃ “ettha
anya-e0104n:53_4: Tassa kira gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi na paññāyati.
anya-e0104n:53_5: Ekasītāmatteti ettha sītā nāma kasanavasena naṅgalassa gatamaggo.
anya-e0104n:54_1: Vijjaṃ parijapitvāti gandhārīvijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ katūpacāraṃ parivattetvā mantapaṭhanakkamena paṭhitvā.
anya-e0104n:55_5: Ettha cāti “tattha tattha sammāpayogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti imissā dasamāya iddhiyā niddesepi.
anya-e0104n:56_0: “Ekopi hutvā bahudhāva hotī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā eva gahitattā āha “adhiṭṭhānā iddhiyeva āgatā”ti.
anya-e0104n:57_12: Iddhividhābhimukhaṃ pesetīti nipphādetabbassa iddhividhassa abhimukhabhāvena pavatteti.
anya-e0104n:57_15: iddhividhābhimukhapesanañca tatheva iddhividhassa pavattanato abhininnāmanaṃ idha parikammacittassa iddhividhe
anya-e0104n:57_17: Idha paccanubhavanaphusanā sacchikiriyāpattipariyāyā evāti dassento “pāpuṇātīti attho”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:58_2: So hissa paṭiyogī “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
anya-e0104n:58_4: So ca kho bahubhāvaṃ nimminitvā ṭhitassa antarāva ekabhāvūpagamo.
anya-e0104n:58_5: Yathākālaparicchedaṃ pana saraseneva ekabhāvūpagamo idha nādhippeto aniddhinimmānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:58_6: Tampi pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena siddhattā iddhānubhāvoyevāti keci.
anya-e0104n:58_11: saddo vakkhamānaṃ ekabhāvaṃ upādāya “sampiṇḍanattho”ti vatvā “so hī”tiādi sabbaṃ yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:58_13: Tattha bahūnaṃ santiketi attanā nimmitānaṃ bahūnaṃ samīpe,
anya-e0104n:59_15: Iddhivesārajjāyāti iddhiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena vigatasaṃkilesatāya suṭṭhu visāradabhāvāya.
anya-e0104n:59_16: Catutthajjhānaṃ tāva iddhiyā bhūmi hotu tattha patiṭṭhāya nipphādetabbato,
anya-e0104n:59_18: Tattha tīṇi jhānāni sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbānīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:59_20: paṭhamadutiyesu pītipharaṇena sukhapharaṇena ca hetubhūtenāti yathārahavasena yojanā.
anya-e0104n:59_21: Pharaṇaṃ cettha jhānassa subhāvitabhāvena sātisayānaṃ pītisukhānaṃ vasena jhānappaccayādinā sahajātanāmakāyassa paribrūhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:59_23: Tenāha bhagavā “pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:59_27: Tesu hi jhānesu sātisayāya lahutāya sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ santānavasena pavattento yogī taṃ samokkanto viya hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:59_29: Jhānasampayuttā hi lahutā vināpi iddhiyā ākāsaṃ laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:60_0: Iminā pariyāyenāti tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ samāpajjanena sukhalahubhāvappattanāmarūpakāyassa sati cittaparidamane
anya-e0104n:60_1: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ sukheneva iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti iminā pariyāyena.
anya-e0104n:60_2: Pakatibhūmiyā hi adhiṭṭhānabhūtā sambhārabhūmiyo pākārassa nemippadeso viyāti.
anya-e0104n:61_4: Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0104n:61_10: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0104n:61_18: pajjitabbā ca iddhi pajjanakaraṇena pādena samānādhikaraṇā hotīti paṭhamena atthena “iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:61_19: Tathā iddhikiriyākaraṇena sādhetabbāva vuddhisaṅkhātā iddhi pajjanakiriyākaraṇena pajjitabbāti dvinnaṃ
anya-e0104n:61_20: karaṇānaṃ na asamānādhikaraṇatā sambhavatīti dutiyenatthena “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti ca na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:61_22: dutiyena sāmivacanasamāso na yujjatīti paṭhamenatthena iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo,
anya-e0104n:61_23: dutiyenatthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādoti samāso yutto,
anya-e0104n:62_2: Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena eva pana sahajātachandassāpi adhikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:62_3: Atha vā “chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0104n:62_5: ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipatisamādhi chandasamādhīti adhipati-
anya-e0104n:62_7: Adhipatisaddatthadassanavasena pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “chandahetuko chandādhiko vā samādhī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:62_11: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n:62_16: Yo pana “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti evaṃ samāsayojanāvasena pādassa upāyatthataṃ gahetvā iddhipādattho vutto,
anya-e0104n:62_17: so paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ kattukaraṇiddhibhāvaṃ “chandiddhipādo”tiādinā vā abhidhamme āgatattā chandādīhi
anya-e0104n:63_1: Tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesanaṃ vīriyādhipati samādhi vīriyasamādhīti.
anya-e0104n:63_3: Dve eva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi,
anya-e0104n:63_7: na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti.
anya-e0104n:63_8: Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0104n:63_10: tathā visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n:63_12: tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:64_2: Teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnameva iddhipādatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:64_3: Pañhāpucchake ca “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādināva uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto.
anya-e0104n:65_1: Chandādīni aṭṭhāti chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti evaṃ chandādīni aṭṭha.
anya-e0104n:65_2: Kāmaṃ cettha catūsupi ṭhānesu samādhi samādhi eva,
anya-e0104n:65_3: tathāpi iddhiṃ uppādetukāmatāchandasahitova samādhi iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0104n:65_6: Tasmā chandādisahitā ete cattāro ca samādhī,
anya-e0104n:65_7: chandādayo ca cattāroti aṭṭha pajjati iddhi etehi pāpuṇīyati,
anya-e0104n:65_8: sayaṃ vā pajjanti iddhipaṭilābhāya sampajjantīti padānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:65_11: taṃ yadipi chandādayo samādhisahitāva iddhiṃ nipphādenti,
anya-e0104n:66_20: Tathā hissa dūre ṭhitampi ārammaṇaṃ paṭibaddhameva.
anya-e0104n:66_29: Tato eva nānattakilesehi nānāsabhāvehi kilesehi na iñjati.
anya-e0104n:67_1: Imassa cittassa āneñjanattho siddho eva āneñjappattiyā pakāsanavasena dassitattā.
anya-e0104n:67_2: Puna vuttoti iddhiyā bhūmipādapadadassanappasaṅgena “imāni mūlāni nāmā”ti mūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna vutto.
anya-e0104n:67_6: paṭisambhidānaye ca dassite tattha sammoho na hoti,
anya-e0104n:68_1: Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti “kathaṃ panāyaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti ettha pubbe attanā vuttapadaṃ uddharati adhiṭṭhānavidhiṃ
anya-e0104n:68_3: Ettha anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyāti keci,
anya-e0104n:68_8: Parikammaṃ katvāti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacaracittena “sataṃ homī”tiādinā cintanamevettha parikammakaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:68_18: Parikammacittānīti ettha ekekassa parikammacittassa satārammaṇatā daṭṭhabbā “sataṃ homī”ti pavattanato.
anya-e0104n:68_22: Taṃ adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ appanācittamivāti ivaggahaṇaṃ abhiññācittassa jhānacittassa paṭhamuppattisadisabhāvato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:69_1: Yadi evaṃ “āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātī”ti paṭisambhidāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:69_3: Āvajjatīti “bahukaṃ āvajjatī”ti idaṃ pāṭhapadaṃ parikammavaseneva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:69_8: Na hi tassa tādiso ānubhāvo atthīti.
anya-e0104n:69_9: Tasmāti yasmā appanāppattassa abhiññāñāṇasseva vasena adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0104n:70_1: atha kho ayametassatthassa attano kāyena sacchikatattā kāyasakkhīti sakkhidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:71_6: yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyassuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:71_8: guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutitāya aṅgīrasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ passāti.
anya-e0104n:72_4: Abhabbo nāma na hoti vāsadhurasseva padhānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:73_1: bhāvinaṃ vā bhikkhubhāvaṃ upādāya yathā “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti.
anya-e0104n:73_5: Tathā hi yoniso ummujjanto “attabhāvassa panāyaṃ doso”ti asubhasaññaṃ,
anya-e0104n:73_6: aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena
anya-e0104n:73_7: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaṭipāṭiyā vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi.
anya-e0104n:74_1: na ca pana reṇu vuccati “rajo”ti. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:74_6: Paṇḍitā viharanti teti te pajahanakā paṇḍitā hutvā viharanti.
anya-e0104n:74_7: Vītarajassa sabbaso pahīnarāgādirajassa buddhassa bhagavato sāsane.
anya-e0104n:76_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti. ;
anya-e0104n:77_0: Chaḷabhiññāgahaṇena gahitāya chaḷabhiññāya vibhāvitepi ariyamagge anuttarabhāvasāmaññena phalanibbānehi
anya-e0104n:78_0: Pattassa pidahanākārena hatthaṃ ṭhapento “hatthaṃ pidahī”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n:79_1: Sahassadhā hi attānaṃ ekacitteneva nimminantopi sahassavāraṃ nimminanto viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:79_2: Asatipi kiriyābyāvuttiyaṃ tadatthasiddhitoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sahassakkhattu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:80_11: Yattakā hi visesā vaṇṇādivasena tesu icchitā,
anya-e0104n:80_13: Te pana tathā bahudhā bhinnākārepi vaṇṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekameva adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n:80_15: yathā ekāva cetanā nānāvisesavantaṃ attabhāvaṃ nibbatteti,
anya-e0104n:80_20: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ bahubhāvanimmāne “abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānanayo vutto,
anya-e0104n:81_0: Iti avisesaṃ atidesena dassetvā visesaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:81_6: Evaṃ akarontoti “eko homī”ti antarā adhiṭṭhānaṃ akaronto.
anya-e0104n:81_7: “Yathāparicchinnakālavasenā”ti iminā “sataṃ homī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānaṃ karontena kālaparicchedavaseneva kātabbanti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:81_9: Ettha ca parikammādhiṭṭhānacittānaṃ iddhimā vaṇṇavasena sayameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:82_2: saddena sambandho na yujjati upayogavacanena vuttattā,
anya-e0104n:82_9: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paṭisambhidāyanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “idameva hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:82_10: Kāmaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ hotī”tiādinā āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n:82_19: Paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi attā vā paro vā yathā dissatīti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:83_2: Kena katapubbanti tattha kāyasakkhiṃ pucchitvā “satthā tāva kāyasakkhī”ti dassentena “bhagavatā”ti vatvā
anya-e0104n:83_6: Ākāsagatesu heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimavimānesu uparūparivimānaṃ byavadhāyakesu byūhiyamānesu taggataṃ ākāsaṃ byūḷhaṃ
anya-e0104n:84_3: Nayaṃ deti yassa nayassa anusārena vācanāmaggaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e0104n:86_0: Sinerupabbataṃ nibbijjhitvāti taṃ parisāya dissamānarūpaṃyeva katvā nibbijjhitvā.
anya-e0104n:88_0: Passatha tāva apaṇṇakapaṭipadāya phalanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā satthu anupubbikathānayena saggasukhena palobhetvā,
anya-e0104n:93_1: Bako brahmā yathā antaradhāyituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0104n:93_3: brahmagaṇassa ca anāpāthabhāvagamanena antarahito hutvā “samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo
anya-e0104n:93_4: vā natthibhāvo vā na sakkā jānitu”nti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa vacanokāso mā hotūti “bhavevāha”nti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e0104n:94_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave saṃsāre jātijarādibhedaṃ bhayaṃ disvā eva.
anya-e0104n:94_1: Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavādiṃ tividhampi sattabhavaṃ,
anya-e0104n:94_2: vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānampi pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhave eva disvā.
anya-e0104n:94_3: Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ na gahesiṃ.
anya-e0104n:94_4: Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagacchiṃ,
anya-e0104n:95_1: Alaggamānoti vinivijjhitvā gamanena kuṭṭādīsu katthaci na laggamāno.
anya-e0104n:96_0: Yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṃ katvāti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yattha katthaci kasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhātabbo.
anya-e0104n:96_5: udakādīsu pathavīnimmāne pathavīkasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ na ekantato icchitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:96_6: Etanti etaṃ tirokuṭṭādigamanapāṭihāriyakaraṇe ākāsakasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ avassaṃ vattabbaṃ anucchavikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:96_7: Evañca katvā “ākāsakasiṇavasena paṭicchannānaṃ vivaṭakaraṇa”ntiādivacanaṃ viya pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi
anya-e0104n:96_8: hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādibhāvo “ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ icchatī”tiādinā yaṃ
anya-e0104n:97_0: “Doso natthī”ti dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddhaṃ viya daḷhīkaraṇaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyena vatvā tena payojanābhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n:97_2: Adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyevāti sacepi kiñci antarā upaṭṭhitaṃ pabbatādi siyā,
anya-e0104n:98_2: Tatrāti tasmiṃ pathaviyā udakabhāvādhiṭṭhāne ayaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattivibhāvinī pāḷi.
anya-e0104n:98_3: Parato “tatrāyaṃ pāḷī”ti āgataṭṭhānesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:99_1: Adhiṭṭhānakāle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:100_1: Viparītanti yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā akkamanto na saṃsīdati,
anya-e0104n:101_3: asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo ḍetuṃ na sakkotīti pāḷiyaṃ “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti pakkhī-
anya-e0104n:101_4: saddena visesetvā sakuṇo vuttoti “pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:102_3: Ayañca iddhimā na pathaviyā āsanne ākāse gacchati.
anya-e0104n:103_2: Nanu samāhitamevassa cittanti iddhimato pāṭihāriyavasena pavattamānassa cittaṃ accantaṃ samāhitameva hoti,
anya-e0104n:103_5: Pubbe hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pathaviṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati,
anya-e0104n:103_9: Tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbanti yathā tattha kuṭṭādi “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena ākāso hoti,
anya-e0104n:103_10: evaṃ idhāpi pabbatarukkhādiṃ adhiṭṭhānena ākāsaṃ katvā gantabbanti attho.
anya-e0104n:103_11: Atha vā tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye vuttanayenevāti “sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassā”tiādinā tattha vuttanayena.
anya-e0104n:103_12: Etena “purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānameveta”nti
anya-e0104n:103_13: nāgādīhi kayiramāno vibandho gamanantarāyaṃ na karotīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:104_0: Okāseti janavivitte yuttaṭṭhāne. Pākaṭo hoti ākāsacārī ayaṃ samaṇoti.
anya-e0104n:105_2: tato paraṃ pana anukkamena pathaviyā ussitabhāvena tato katipayayojanūnatā siyā,
anya-e0104n:105_3: appakaṃ adhikaṃ vā ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:105_4: Tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇenāti yadā yasmiṃ dīpe majjhe tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:105_5: tadā tato purimasmiṃ atthaṃ gacchantā pacchime udentā hutvā ālokakaraṇena.
anya-e0104n:105_11: Parimajjatīti hatthaṃ ito cito ca sañcārento ghaṃseti.
anya-e0104n:105_16: Tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriyādīsu viya imasmiṃ nāma kasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti na ettha koci niyamo atthīti attho.
anya-e0104n:105_17: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ kiñci samāpattiṃ aparāmasitvā “idha so iddhimā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:106_2: Attano aṇumahantabhāvāpādane upādinnakassa hāpanaṃ viya vaḍḍhanampi labbhateva.
anya-e0104n:106_3: Yathā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandadamaneti evaṃ pavattaṃ sahavatthunā theravādaṃ āharitvā
anya-e0104n:106_8: “Tadā mahantaṃ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti idaṃ yathādhikatatthadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:108_0: Olokesi buddhāciṇṇavasena “atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti.
anya-e0104n:109_0: Taṃ divasanti yadā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tāvatiṃsabhavanābhimukho gacchati,
anya-e0104n:109_2: Āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsūti yattha so nisinno bhojanakiccaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n:109_3: taṃ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ sittaṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ bhojanūpakaraṇūpanayanādinā sajjayiṃsu paṭiyādesuṃ.
anya-e0104n:111_2: puthulato ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṃsabhavanassa ārakkhāya nāgehi, garuḷehi,
anya-e0104n:112_0: Attabhāvaṃ vijahitvāti manussarūpaṃ antaradhāpetvā. Bādhatīti khedamattaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0104n:113_2: Pācīnena ca pacchimena cāti nāgassa tathānipannattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:114_0: Ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyānīti tadā therena katapāṭihāriyāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:115_0: Anubandhīti “na sakkā evaṃmahiddhikassa imassa samaṇassa paṭipaharitu”nti bhayena palāyantaṃ anubandhi.
anya-e0104n:116_2: Ayamevāti yā upādinnakaṃ nissāya anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhi, ayameva.
anya-e0104n:116_3: Ettha edise hatthavaḍḍhanādipāṭihāriye yutti yuttarūpā cittato,
anya-e0104n:116_5: Atha vā upādinnanti sakalameva indriyabaddhaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0104n:116_6: Evampi tassa tathā vaḍḍhi na yujjati evāti vuttanayeneva vaḍḍhi veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:116_8: anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ viya pavattamānampi atthato asambhinnameva.
anya-e0104n:116_9: Tattha yathā āḷhakamatte khīre anekāḷhake udake āsitte yadipi khīraṃ sabbena sambhinnaṃ sabbatthakameva lambamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:116_12: evamevaṃ yadipi upādinnaṃ anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ viya pavattati,
anya-e0104n:117_1: Evaṃ katvāti vuttākārena hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā te vā āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite katvā.
anya-e0104n:117_5: Tathūpamametanti yathā udakapuṇṇāsu nānāpātīsu bahūhi nānācandamaṇḍalesu dissamānesu na tena candamaṇḍalassa gamanādiuparodho,
anya-e0104n:117_8: bahūnañca iddhimantānaṃ tattha iddhipayogassa yathicchitaṃ samijjhanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:118_1: Paricchedaṃ katvāti abhividhivasena pana paricchedaṃ katvā,
anya-e0104n:118_3: Tathā hesa brahmaloke attano kāyena vasaṃ vatteti.
anya-e0104n:119_0: Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti ettha yasmā na brahmalokasseva gamanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
anya-e0104n:119_4: tasmā “sace brahmalokaṃ gantukāmā hotī”ti vatvāpi itarampi dassetuṃ “santikepi dūre adhiṭṭhātī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:119_7: tena vuttāvasesassa adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā nipphādetabbassa sabbassāpi saṅgaho,
anya-e0104n:122_1: Citte uppanne santike akāsīti tathā cittuppattisamanantarameva pathaviṃ,
anya-e0104n:123_2: Ekapattapūramattamakāsīti yathā te pamāṇato sarūpeneva antopattapariyāpannā honti,
anya-e0104n:124_0: Kākavaliyavatthusmiñca “bhagavā thokaṃ bahuṃ akāsī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:124_1: Taṃ pana vatthuṃ saṅkhepatova dassetuṃ “mahākassapatthero kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:125_1: Saññaṃ adāsīti yathā te yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ sappiṃ passanti,
anya-e0104n:126_2: Saddaṃ suṇātīti dibbāya sotadhātuyā brahmuno saddaṃ suṇāti.
anya-e0104n:126_3: Cittaṃ pajānātīti cetopariyañāṇena brahmuno cittaṃ pajānāti.
anya-e0104n:126_6: kathaṃ vā pariṇāmananti āha “pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā kāye āropetī”ti.
anya-e0104n:126_7: Kathaṃ pana kāye āropetīti āha “kāyānugatikaṃ karotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:126_13: dissamānena kāyena gantukāmatāya vasena cittaṃ pariṇāmento yogī pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ
anya-e0104n:126_14: cittaṃ kāyo viya dandhagamanaṃ hotū”ti parikammaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:126_15: Tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ hi sandhāya “pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:126_16: Parikammaṃ pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto taṃ cittaṃ kāye āropeti,
anya-e0104n:127_3: Kathaṃ pana iddhicittena saha sukhasaññāya sambhavoti āha “sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttā saññā”ti.
anya-e0104n:127_5: Tenevāha “upekkhā hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttā”ti ekantagarukehi nīvaraṇehi,
anya-e0104n:127_6: oḷārikehi anupasantasabhāvehi ca vitakkādīhi vippayogo cittacetasikānaṃ lahubhāvassa kāraṇanti dassento āha “sāyeva…pe…
anya-e0104n:127_10: Gantukāmatā eva ettha pamāṇanti ettha etasmiṃ dissamānena kāyena gamane yaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantukāmo,
anya-e0104n:127_11: taṃ uddissa gantukāmatāvasena pavattaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni eva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:127_14: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “sati hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:128_0: Kāyaṃ gahetvāti karajakāyaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena parikammacittena gahetvā.
anya-e0104n:128_1: Citte āropetīti “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti pādakajjhānacitte āropeti taggatikaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:128_6: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti?
anya-e0104n:128_8: Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0104n:128_9: Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā garuvuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattati.
anya-e0104n:128_10: “Idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
anya-e0104n:128_11: tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:128_12: evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ
anya-e0104n:128_13: viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
anya-e0104n:128_14: evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:129_0: Evañca katvā “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
anya-e0104n:129_1: pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā”ti idampi upamāvacanaṃ nippariyāyeneva samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:129_7: aññaṃ ekadhammampī”ti hi ettha aññagahaṇena rūpadhammā gahitā alahuparivattitāya.
anya-e0104n:129_14: Na hi iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaṃ aññathattaṃ kātuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n:130_3: Pasādo nāma natthīti imināva bhāvajīvitindriyānampi abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:130_5: Aññampīti bhagavatā kariyamānato aññampi kiriyaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:130_8: “sace pana nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hotī”tiādi yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:130_10: Taṃ tathā tathā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa te te vaṇṇavayādivisesā parikammānurūpaṃ ijjhantīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:130_11: Idha pana yathādhiṭṭhite nimmitarūpe sace sāvako “ime visesā hontū”ti icchati,
anya-e0104n:130_13: buddhānaṃ pana ijjhatīti ayamattho dassitoti na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n:131_0: Idāni yāni tāni “yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetī”ti pāḷiyā atthadassanavasena vibhattāni “dūrepi
anya-e0104n:131_2: tattha sikhāppattaṃ kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:131_6: “cittaṃ pajānātī”ti ettha yadetaṃ cittajānananti evaṃ dibbacakkhusotacetopariyañāṇakattukaṃ dassanasavanajānanakiriyaṃ parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:131_13: tena ayamevettha kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyesu ukkaṭṭhataranti dīpeti. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:131_15: ayaṃ nu kho nimmito”ti ekaccassa brahmuno āsaṅkuppādanato.
anya-e0104n:131_16: Yadaggena cetaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ visesato manomayanti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:131_19: Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha sesāni gahitānīti āha “sesaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:132_1: Idaṃ nānākaraṇanti kāmamimāpi dve iddhiyo adhiṭṭhānavaseneva ijjhanti,
anya-e0104n:132_2: tathāpi idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ imāsaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n:132_3: Pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvāti attano pakatirūpaṃ vijahitvā apanetvā,
anya-e0104n:132_8: Hatthimpi dassetīti attānampi hatthiṃ katvā dasseti,
anya-e0104n:132_10: Etadatthameva hi idha “hatthivaṇṇaṃ vā dassetī”ti avatvā “hatthimpi dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:132_11: Yaṃ pana keci bahiddhā hatthiādidassanavacanaṃ “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā”ti vacanena vikubbaniddhibhāvena virujjhatīti vadanti,
anya-e0104n:132_13: Pakativaṇṇavijahanaṃ nāma attano pakatirūpassa aññesaṃ adassanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:132_15: Evaṃ sati attānaṃ adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiṃ dassento “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā hatthiṃ dassetī”ti vuccamāne ko ettha virodho,
anya-e0104n:132_16: attanā pana hatthivaṇṇo hutvā bahiddhāpi hatthiṃ dassante vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0104n:132_18: Evañca katvā vikubbaniddhibhāvena ca na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n:133_3: Hatthimpītiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṃ samuccayattho pi-
anya-e0104n:133_5: Tena “hatthimpi dassetī”tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n:134_0: Iddhimato attano kumārakākārena paresaṃ dassanaṃ kumārakavaṇṇanimmānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:134_1: na ettha kiñci apubbaṃ pathavīādivatthu nipphādīyatīti kasiṇaniyamena payojanābhāvato “pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:134_2: Satipi vā vatthunipphādane yathārahaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇādivaseneva ijjhatīti evampettha kasiṇaniyamena payojanaṃ nattheva.
anya-e0104n:134_3: Kumārakavaṇṇañhi dassentena nīlavaṇṇaṃ vā dassetabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n:134_5: Tathā sati nīlādikasiṇāni samāpajjitabbānīti āpannova kasiṇaniyamo.
anya-e0104n:134_7: Evamadhiṭṭhite yadeke pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādi bhāvoti evaṃ pavattena kasiṇaniddesena
anya-e0104n:134_12: Nāgādivaṇṇesupi ayaṃ nayo byāpī evāti yadeke “nāgādinimmāne na yujjati viyā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0104n:135_5: na “kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā”tiādi viya ajjhattameva kumārakavaṇṇādīnaṃ dassanavasenāti.
anya-e0104n:136_2: Vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ kāyo susiro hotū”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna “pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā”ti imaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāramāha.
anya-e0104n:136_3: Aññaṃ kāyanti yaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ nimminitukāmo, taṃ.
anya-e0104n:141_2: Abhiññāpāḷiyā hi niddesamukhena abhiññānaṃ nibbattanavidhi vidhīyati.
anya-e0104n:141_8: Na hi paṭipajjantā imināva kamena paṭipajjanti.
anya-e0104n:141_16: Idāni taṃ dibbasadisataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “devānaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:141_24: Upakkilesadosarahitaṃ hi kammaṃ tiṇādidosarahitaṃ viya sassaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:142_5: dūrepi sukhumassapi ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthatāya ca taṃsadisā eva.
anya-e0104n:142_6: Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattāti dibbavihārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena paṭiladdhattā,
anya-e0104n:142_10: Dibbavihārasannissitattāti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena ukkaṃsagataṃ pādakajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ dibbavihāraṃ sannissāya pavattattā,
anya-e0104n:142_11: dibbavihārapariyāpannaṃ vā attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ sannissitattāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:142_14: Santesupi aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādīsu dhātuatthesu attasuññatāsandassanatthā satthu dhātudesanāti āha “nijjīvaṭṭhena cā”ti.
anya-e0104n:143_3: dibbavidūrādivisayaggahaṇasaṅkhātena attano kiccavisesena atikkantaṃ mānusikaṃ etāyāti atikkantamānusikā.
anya-e0104n:143_9: Te pana visesato devānaṃ kathā saddā hontīti āha “devānaṃ sadde”ti.
anya-e0104n:143_15: Nippadesapariyādānaṃ ṭhānabhedaggahaṇamukhena saviññāṇakādibhedabhinnassa saddassa anavasesena saṅgaṇhanato.
anya-e0104n:144_6: Tiyojanamatthakepi kira kesarasīhassa sīhanādasaddo suyyati. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:144_8: Ettha ca yathā oḷārikasaddāvajjanaṃ yāvadeva sukhumasaddāvajjanūpāyadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:145_0: Evaṃ āsannasaddaggahaṇānusārena dūradūratarasaddaggahaṇampi samijjhatīti dassetuṃ “puratthimāya disāyā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n:145_2: Tattha saddanimittanti ñāṇuppattihetubhāvato saddo eva saddanimittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:145_3: yo vā yathāvutto upādāyupādāya labbhamāno saddānaṃ oḷārikasukhumākāro,
anya-e0104n:145_6: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi kātabba”nti,
anya-e0104n:145_9: Saddanimittassa apaccuppannasabhāvattā “saddova saddanimitta”nti ayameva pakkho ñāyāgatoti keci,
anya-e0104n:145_10: taṃ na oḷārikasukhumānaṃ saddānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇena ñāṇena nīlapītādivaṇṇānaṃ viya tattheva gahetabbato.
anya-e0104n:145_13: Te saddāti ye sabboḷārikato pabhuti āvajjantassa anukkamena sukhumasukhumā saddā āvajjitā, te.
anya-e0104n:145_15: Parikammasamādhicittassāti dibbasotadhātuyā uppādanatthaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa saddaṃ
anya-e0104n:145_17: Pubbepi ñāṇena parimadditattā ativiya pākaṭā hontīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:146_0: Tesu saddesūti ye parikammassa visayadassanatthaṃ bahū saddā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:146_2: Aññataranti yatthassa parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto,
anya-e0104n:146_6: Patito hotīti dibbasotadhātu antogadhā hoti appanācittassa uppattito pabhuti dibbasotañāṇalābhī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:146_7: na dānissa tadatthaṃ bhāvanābhiyogo icchitabboti attho.
anya-e0104n:146_11: Kinti kittakanti āha “etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmīti ekaṅgulamattaṃ paricchinditvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:146_12: Pādakajjhānassa hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū”ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n:146_13: samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:146_14: So samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tattha gate sadde āvajjati,
anya-e0104n:146_15: subhāvitabhāvanattā tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ ārabbha uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri,
anya-e0104n:146_19: Tato eva hi pādakajjhānārammaṇena phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragatepi sadde suṇātiyevāti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n:147_0: Evaṃ suṇantovāti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasīkatābhiñño hutvā yathāvajjite sadde suṇanto eva.
anya-e0104n:147_1: Pāṭiyekkanti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi te sadde paccekaṃ vatthubhedena vavatthapetukāmatāya sati.
anya-e0104n:150_7: yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā.
anya-e0104n:150_11: Tassā pana paññattiyā saviññāṇakasantāne niruḷhattā nicchandarāgāpi sattātveva vuccanti,
anya-e0104n:150_16: Itarepi saṃsāre saṃsārino taṃsabhāvānātivattanato puggalātveva vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:150_17: Taṃtaṃsattanikāyassa vā tattha tattha upapattiyā pūraṇato,
anya-e0104n:151_2: Yasmā “etaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavasena ijjhatī”ti taṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:151_4: tasmā tena cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇena bhikkhunāti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0104n:151_9: tañhi nissāya dāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:151_10: Hadayavatthu pana imaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya pavattatīti.
anya-e0104n:151_11: Kathaṃ pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena arūpaṃ cittaṃ pariyesatīti āha “yadā hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:151_12: Kathaṃ pana somanassasahagatādicittavuttiyā kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti?
anya-e0104n:151_13: Ko vā evamāha “kammajameva taṃ lohita”nti catusantatirūpassāpi tattha labbhamānattā.
anya-e0104n:151_19: Yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utukammāhārasamuṭṭhānarūpehi anuvattīyanti,
anya-e0104n:151_22: Pasādakodhavelāsu cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva ca tadatthassa nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:152_0: Pariyesantenāti paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānato ñāṇaṃ pesetvā gavesantena.
anya-e0104n:152_1: Cetopariyañāṇañhi uppādetukāmena yoginā heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0104n:152_2: abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa lābhī samāno ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ
anya-e0104n:152_3: nissāya pavattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena “idāni imassa cittaṃ somanassasahagata”nti vā “domanassasahagata”nti
anya-e0104n:152_4: vā “upekkhāsahagata”nti vā nayaggāhavasenapi vavatthapetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “imassa
anya-e0104n:152_6: Kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:152_7: Tassevaṃ dibbacakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā paṭipajjantassa idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatīti
anya-e0104n:152_16: Tattha yaṃ antena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:152_19: taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā pavattati rūpaṃ viya ca dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:152_21: Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:152_22: Evamadhigatassa pana cetopariyañāṇassa thāmagamanavidhānampi adhigamanavidhānasadisamevāti taṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā tena…pe…
anya-e0104n:153_7: Puthujjanavasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0104n:153_13: Ekaccañhi cittaṃ ñatvā parikammena vinā tadaññaṃ cittaṃ jānanto “cittā cittaṃ saṅkamanto”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n:153_19: Na kato abhiññānuyogasaṅkhāto abhiniveso etenāti akatābhiniveso, tassa,
anya-e0104n:154_1: Evaṃ avibhāgena vuttaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “catubhūmakaṃ kusalābyākataṃ cittaṃ vītarāga”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:154_2: Tañhi yonisomanasikārappaccayataṃhetukatāhi rāgena sampayogāsaṅkābhāvato “vītarāga”nti vattabbataṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n:154_4: taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatāva yuttāti vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:154_8: Ye pana “paṭipakkhabhāve asatipi sampayogābhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccaabyākatānaṃ viyā”ti sesākusalacittānampi vītarāgataṃ paṭijānanti,
anya-e0104n:154_9: te sandhāyāha “keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:155_1: tadaññākusalacittesu viya lobhadosehi amissitassa mohasseva sabbhāvatoti attho.
anya-e0104n:155_3: dutiyanaye pana saheva mohenāti samohanti evaṃ uttarapurimapadāvadhāraṇato dvīsu nayesu bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:155_4: Attanā sampayuttaṃ thinamiddhaṃ anuvattanavasena gataṃ pavattaṃ thinamiddhānugataṃ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ saṃkhittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:155_8: yattha vā uddhaccaṃ paccayavisesena thāmajātaṃ hutvā pavattati.
anya-e0104n:155_12: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
anya-e0104n:155_14: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ.
anya-e0104n:155_17: Tato eva natthi etassa uttaranti anuttaraṃ.
anya-e0104n:155_26: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatasarāgādibhedavasena ceva tesaṃ antarabhedavasena ca sabbappakārampi.
anya-e0104n:158_3: taṃ nissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ paṭicca uppajjanato “pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:158_4: tadatthāyā”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto pubbenivāsaṃ tāva dassetvā tattha satiñāṇāni dassetuṃ “pubbenivāso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:158_5: Tattha “pubbe”ti idaṃ padaṃ “ekampi jāti”ntiādivacanato atītabhavavisayaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “atītajātīsū”ti nivāsa-
anya-e0104n:158_9: tathābhūtā ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā tattha uppajjitvā vigatāva hontīti āha “nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā
anya-e0104n:158_12: saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni avisesena vattuṃ “nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā”ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ “gocaranivāsenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:158_13: Gocarabhūtāpi hi gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anubhūtā nivutthā nāma hontīti.
anya-e0104n:158_14: Te pana duvidhā saparaviññāṇagocaratāyāti ubhayepi te dassetuṃ “attano”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:159_0: Tattha “attano viññāṇena viññātā”ti vatvā “paricchinnā”ti vacanaṃ ye te gocaranivāsena nivutthadhammā,
anya-e0104n:159_2: atha kho yathā pubbe jātināmagottavaṇṇaliṅgāhārādivisesehi paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahitā,
anya-e0104n:159_3: tathevetaṃ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:159_6: atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpi vāti attho.
anya-e0104n:159_7: Idhāpi “paricchinnā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “paresampi vā viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā”ti.
anya-e0104n:159_8: Tassa ca gahaṇe payojanaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:159_9: Te ca kho yasmā abhītāsu eva jātīsu aññehi viññātā paricchinnā,
anya-e0104n:159_12: tesaṃ tadā vattamānasantānānusārena tesampi atīte pavatti ñāyatīti sikhāppattaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n:159_17: Chinnavaṭumakā pana sabbeva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutā.
anya-e0104n:159_18: Tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma tesaṃ paṭipattiyā anussaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:159_19: sā pana paṭipatti saṅkhepato chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti tāni idha paraviññāṇaviññātaggahaṇena gahitāni,
anya-e0104n:159_22: Na hi atīte buddhā bhagavanto evaṃ vipassiṃsu,
anya-e0104n:159_25: evaṃ veneyye vinesunti ettha sabbadā aññesaṃ ñāṇassa gati atthīti.
anya-e0104n:160_6: “Nivāsa”nti antogadhabhedasāmaññavacanametanti te bhede byāpanicchāvasena saṅgahetvā dassento “tattha tattha nivutthasantāna”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:160_10: Sā ca kho cutito paṭṭhāya uppaṭipāṭivasena.
anya-e0104n:160_15: Ṭhapetvā aggasāvakamahāsāvake itare satthu sāvakā pakatisāvakā.
anya-e0104n:161_0: Yasmā titthiyānaṃ brahmajālādīsu cattālīsāya eva saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n:161_1: tasmā “na tato para”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadanto “dubbalapaññattā”tiādimāha,
anya-e0104n:161_3: Balavapaññattāti ettha nāmarūpaparicchedādiyeva paññāya balavakāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:161_7: dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti kālavasena evaṃparimāṇo yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ mahāsāvakaaggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ
anya-e0104n:161_9: Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhāgo,
anya-e0104n:161_10: evaṃ sante buddhānampi visayaparicchedatā āpannāti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:161_12: tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi visaye paricchedo nāma natthi.
anya-e0104n:161_15: Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede kāraṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya
anya-e0104n:161_17: kuto tannibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:161_18: Atīte ettakāni kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānīti evaṃ kālaparicchedo nāma natthi,
anya-e0104n:162_0: Evaṃ channaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇato ānubhāvavisesato,
anya-e0104n:162_3: parassa vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā paṭisandhiyā eva gahaṇavasena.
anya-e0104n:162_6: Pakatisāvakā cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamantīti ayamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena “balavapaññattā”ti hetunā vibhāvetabbo,
anya-e0104n:163_0: Taṃ taṃ pākaṭamevāti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike gehe cakkhumato purisassa
anya-e0104n:163_2: siyā pana tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā.
anya-e0104n:163_3: Nattheva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā,
anya-e0104n:163_4: atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa supahīnattā.
anya-e0104n:163_5: Peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṅkhipitvāti yathā peyyālapāḷiṃ paṭhantā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:163_6: pañcamaṃ jhāna”nti ādipariyosānameva gaṇhantā saṅkhipitvā sajjhāyanti,
anya-e0104n:163_10: yasmiṃ bhave yaṃ yaṃ jānituṃ icchanti,
anya-e0104n:163_11: tattha tattheva ñātuṃ icchite eva ñāṇena okkamantā.
anya-e0104n:163_13: Satadhā bhinnassa vāḷassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanavasena katavālavedhaparicayassa.
anya-e0104n:164_0: Khajjupanakappabhāsadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti ñāṇassa ativiya appānubhāvatāya khajjotobhāsasamaṃ hutvā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:164_4: Osadhitārakappabhāti ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyatīti osadhi,
anya-e0104n:164_5: osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhā.
anya-e0104n:165_1: Kunnadīnaṃ atikkamanāya ekeneva rukkhadaṇḍena katasaṅkamo daṇḍakasetu. Catūhi,
anya-e0104n:165_2: pañcahi vā janehi gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyo phalake attharitvā āṇiyo koṭṭetvā katasaṅkamo jaṅghasetu.
anya-e0104n:165_3: Jaṅghasatthassa gamanayoggo saṅkamo jaṅghasetu jaṅghamaggo viya.
anya-e0104n:165_4: Sakaṭassa gamanayoggo saṅkamo sakaṭasetu sakaṭamaggo viya.
anya-e0104n:165_6: Bahūhi vīsāya vā tiṃsāya vā sakaṭehi ekajjhaṃ gantabbamaggo mahāsakaṭamaggo.
anya-e0104n:166_0: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāreti “cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti cittasīsena sāvakassa niddiṭṭhasamādhibhāvanādhikāre.
anya-e0104n:167_1: Tasmāti yasmā sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0104n:167_4: Heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi kāyacittānaṃ sampīnanāya “cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:167_8: Tato āsanapaññāpananti tato nisajjāya purimakaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ āvajjitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:167_10: Bhojanakālotiādīsu kālasīsena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle katakiccamāha.
anya-e0104n:168_2: Pādakajjhānañhi satthakassa viya nisānasilā satipaññānampi nisitabhāvāvahaṃ.
anya-e0104n:168_7: Purimabhaveti imassa bhavassa anantare purimasmiṃ bhave.
anya-e0104n:168_9: Tañca kho paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā nāmaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:168_10: Paṭhamaṃ nāmaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā rūpanti apare.
anya-e0104n:169_0: “Aññaṃ uppanna”nti idaṃ aññasmā kammabhavā añño upapattibhavo uppannoti katvā vuttaṃ addhāpaccuppannantarabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:173_3: sākhāpalāsā viya tena sambandhaṃ imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:173_5: kammārasālā viya pādakajjhānanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:173_6: Kaṭṭhaphālakopamāpi “yathā nāma balavā puriso odanapacanādiatthaṃ mahantaṃ dāruṃ phālento tassa tacapheggumattaphālane
anya-e0104n:173_7: pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahantaṃ dāruṃ phāletuṃ asakkonto dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n:174_0: Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ nāma na hoti atītāsu jātīsu nivutthadhammārammaṇattābhāvā.
anya-e0104n:174_1: Tanti pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhi pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa parikammabhāvena
anya-e0104n:174_3: Taṃ rūpāvacaraṃ sandhāya na yujjatīti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ atītaṃsañāṇaṃ ce,
anya-e0104n:174_4: rūpāvacaraṃ adhippetaṃ na yujjati parikammasamādhiñāṇassa kāmāvacarabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:174_5: Na hi anantaracuticittassa orato pavattikkhandhe ārabbha rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:174_10: Idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmāti kāmaṃ anantarassa bhavassa cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ dassitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:174_11: taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ñāṇasāmaññassa jotitabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:174_12: Yatheva hi tato nāmarūpato pabhuti sabbe atītā khandhā,
anya-e0104n:174_15: Tenāha “tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaratī”ti.
anya-e0104n:175_2: So hi ekakammanibbatto ādānanikkhepaparicchinno antogadhadhammappabhedo khandhappabandho idha jātīti adhippeto.
anya-e0104n:175_12: sabbāneva sahattanā”ti ca ādīsu kālassāpi khayo vuccati,
anya-e0104n:176_0: Tejosaṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti evaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmānukkamena saṃvaṭṭesu vattabbesu tathā avatvā
anya-e0104n:177_0: Saṃvaṭṭatīti vinassati. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesūti attho.
anya-e0104n:178_1: taṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “buddhakhettaṃ nāma tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:178_2: Yattake ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva pathavī vijambhati,
anya-e0104n:178_3: taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakhettaṃ nāmāti āha “jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyanta”nti.
anya-e0104n:178_4: Ānubhāvo vattatīti idha iddhimā cetovasippatto āṇākhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā
anya-e0104n:178_5: attano atthāya parittaṃ katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hoti.
anya-e0104n:178_6: Atha vā tattha ekacakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākhette sabbasattānaṃ abhisambhuṇātveva
anya-e0104n:178_8: Yaṃ visayakhettaṃ sandhāya ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:178_9: attano rūpadassanañca paṭijānantena bhagavatā “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:179_3: Pupphaphalūpajīviniyo ca devatā brahmaloke nibbattantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:180_3: “Paṭiladdhajjhānavasenā”ti vatvā jhānappaṭilābhassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:180_5: Te kira disvā manussā tattha tattha ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi saṃvegajātā,
anya-e0104n:180_6: sambhamappattā ca hutvā tesaṃ āsanne ṭhāne sannipatanti.
anya-e0104n:181_2: Devānaṃ kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇaparicayena vāyokasiṇe jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti.
anya-e0104n:181_3: Tena vuttaṃ “vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:182_4: evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokaṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0104n:182_5: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca hutvā pavattati.
anya-e0104n:182_7: Gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū aciravatī mahīti imā pañca mahānadiyo.
anya-e0104n:185_1: Yāya āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu ābandhattā sampiṇḍatā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:185_3: Yathā cidanti yathā ca idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ.
anya-e0104n:185_4: Evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānipīti vipattimahāmeghuppattito paṭṭhāya idha vuttaṃ sabbaṃ kappavuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:186_3: Sayampi saṅkhāragataṃ samānaṃ indhanābhāvato chārikampi asesetvā niḍḍahitvā vūpasamatīti āha “sappi…pe…
anya-e0104n:187_1: Dīghassa addhunoti saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappasaṅkhātassa dīghassa kālassa accayena.
anya-e0104n:187_4: Ghanaṃ karotīti visarituṃ adatvā piṇḍitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:187_9: Vivaraṃ detīti yathā ghanaṃ karoti sampiṇḍeti,
anya-e0104n:187_11: Parikkhayamānanti pubbe yāva brahmalokā ekoghabhūtena vātena parisosiyamānatāya parikkhayaṃ gacchantaṃ.
anya-e0104n:187_15: Cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsabhavanānaṃ pana patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānāni pathavīsambandhatāya na tāva pātubhavanti.
anya-e0104n:188_0: Rundhantīti yathā heṭṭhā na bhassati, evaṃ nirodhenti.
anya-e0104n:189_2: aṭṭhannaṃ vā kappānaṃ ādimhi nibbattāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:189_5: “Te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā”ti idaṃ upacārajjhānapuññassa mahānubhāvatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:190_0: Haṭṭhatuṭṭhāti ativiya haṭṭhā uppilāvitacittā. Nāmaṃ karontīti tathā voharanti.
anya-e0104n:192_2: Teneva nayenāti “ekacce vaṇṇavanto hontī”tiādinā vuttena nayeneva.
anya-e0104n:193_1: Yo yo raso etassāti yaṃyaṃraso, odano,
anya-e0104n:193_6: padālatā ca paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khuddaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi rasameva brūhentā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:193_9: Odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāvena nissandaṃ vissajjento passāvaṃ,
anya-e0104n:193_10: kasaṭañca uppādetīti āha “tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:193_11: Purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na samito,
anya-e0104n:193_13: Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi,
anya-e0104n:193_14: tadā tadupanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu sañjāyiṃsu.
anya-e0104n:194_0: Alasajātikassāti sajjukameva taṇḍulaṃ aggahetvā paradivasassatthāya gahaṇena alasapakatikassa.
anya-e0104n:196_0: Ayameva bhagavā paṭibalo paggahaniggahaṃ kātunti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:198_4: Tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo udake pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva,
anya-e0104n:198_5: tasmā pathavīsandhārudakena saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci.
anya-e0104n:198_6: Apare “pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakakkhandhañca udakasandhārakaṃ vāyukkhandhañca anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha
anya-e0104n:198_14: Heṭṭhā “ābhassare āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n:199_0: Idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyanti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ kappassa ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:200_1: Thūlaraje apagate eva pathavīnissitaṃ saṇharajaṃ apagacchatīti vuttaṃ “tato saṇharaja”nti.
anya-e0104n:200_3: “Visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe”ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ samuṭṭhāpetabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:201_0: Cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampīti mahāpathaviyā viparivattaneneva viparivattitaṃ cakkavāḷapabbatampi
anya-e0104n:201_4: Aññamaññanti ekissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷahimavantasineruṃ aññissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷādīhīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ samāgamavasena ghaṭṭetvā.
anya-e0104n:201_6: taṃsandhārakavātanti sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:202_2: santānanirodho pana hetuvirahito natthi yathā taṃ sattakāyesūti.
anya-e0104n:202_3: Bhājanalokassāpi sahetukena vināsena bhavitabbanti hetuṃ pucchati “kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:202_4: Itaro yathā tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ puññabalena paṭhamaṃ loko vivaṭṭati,
anya-e0104n:202_5: evaṃ tesaṃ pāpabalena saṃvaṭṭatīti dassento “akusalamūlakāraṇā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:202_6: Yathā hi rāgadosamohānaṃ adhikabhāvena yathākkamaṃ rogantarakappo,
anya-e0104n:202_8: dubbhikkhantarakappoti ime tividhā antarakappā vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi asaṅkhyeyyakappe jāyanti,
anya-e0104n:202_9: evamete yathāvuttā tayo saṃvaṭṭā rāgādīnaṃ adhikabhāveneva hontīti dassento “akusalamūlesu hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:202_11: Dose ussannatare adhikataradosena viya tikkhatarena khārudakena vināso yuttoti vuttaṃ “dose ussannatare udakena vinassatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:202_13: apākaṭasattusadisassa rāgassa khārudakasadisatā ca yuttāti adhippāyena “dose ussannatare agginā,
anya-e0104n:202_14: rāge ussannatare udakenā”ti kecivādassa adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:202_15: Rāgo sattānaṃ bahulaṃ pavattatīti rāgavasena bahuso lokavināso.
anya-e0104n:203_1: Evaṃ pasaṅgena saṃvaṭṭādike pakāsetvā idāni yathādhikataṃ nesaṃ anussaraṇākāraṃ dassetuṃ “pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:204_0: “Amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe”ti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappassa ādito pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:204_1: Tatthāpi hi imassa katipayaṃ kālaṃ bhavādīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ upalabbhatīti.
anya-e0104n:204_2: Saṃvaṭṭakappe vā vaṭṭamānesu bhavādīsu imassa upapatti ahosi,
anya-e0104n:204_4: Atha vā amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappeti ettha vā-
anya-e0104n:204_6: tena ca aniyamatthena itarāsaṅkhyeyyānampi saṅgaho siddho hoti.
anya-e0104n:204_7: Bhave vātiādīsu kāmādibhave vā aṇḍajādiyoniyā vā devādi gatiyā vā nānattakāyanānattasaññīādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā khattiyādi sattanikāye vā.
anya-e0104n:206_0: “Amutrāsi”ntiādinā sabbaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathā atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:206_4: Anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇanti ettha ārohantassāti paṭilomato ñāṇena pubbenivāsaṃ ārohantassa.
anya-e0104n:209_7: Dibbacakkhuñāṇeneva sattānaṃ cuti ca upapatti ca ñāyatīti āha “dibbacakkhuñāṇatthanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:209_21: “Dibbasadisattā”ti ca hīnūpamādassanaṃ devatānaṃ dibbacakkhutopi imassa mahānubhāvattā.
anya-e0104n:209_22: Tena dibbacakkhulābhāya yogino parikammakaraṇaṃ tappaṭipakkhābhibhavassa atthato tassa vijayicchā nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:209_23: dibbacakkhulābhī ca iddhimā devatānaṃ vacanaggahaṇakkhamanadhammadānavasena mahāmoggallānattherādayo viya dānaggahaṇalakkhaṇe,
anya-e0104n:209_24: vohāre ca pavatteyyāti evaṃ vihāravijayicchāvohārajutigatisaṅkhātānaṃ atthānaṃ vasena imassa abhiññāñāṇassa dibbacakkhubhāvasiddhito.
anya-e0104n:209_25: Saddavidū ca tesu eva atthesu divu-
anya-e0104n:209_26: saddaṃ icchantīti vuttaṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabba”nti.
anya-e0104n:210_2: Yathā maṃsacakkhu viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati,
anya-e0104n:210_4: Idaṃ pana sayameva tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti āha “cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhū”ti.
anya-e0104n:210_6: Ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti parato upapattiyā adassanato etthevāyaṃ satto ucchinno,
anya-e0104n:210_11: Evaṃ hi jayaddisajātakādīhi avirodho siddho hoti.
anya-e0104n:211_2: Tadaññassa pana dibbatirohitātisukhumādibhedassa rūpassa dassanato atikkantamānusakaṃ.
anya-e0104n:211_3: Evarūpañca manussūpacāraṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:211_4: Evaṃ visayamukhena dassetvā idāni visayīmukhena dassetuṃ “mānusakaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:212_1: Daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā khaṇassa atiittaratāya atisukhumatāya kesañci rūpassa.
anya-e0104n:212_4: na ca āvajjanaparikammehi vinā mahaggatassa pavatti atthi,
anya-e0104n:212_5: nāpi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n:212_7: Tasmā “cutūpapātakkhaṇe rūpaṃ dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā”ti suvuttametaṃ.
anya-e0104n:212_11: Sattagahaṇassa vā kāraṇabhāvato vohāravasena vuttantipi keci.
anya-e0104n:213_0: Mohūpanissayaṃ nāma kammaṃ nihīnaṃ nihīnaphalaṃ hotīti āha “mohanissandayuttattā”ti.
anya-e0104n:213_2: ahīḷite anohīḷite anoññāte anavaññāte cittīkateti attho.
anya-e0104n:213_5: Sā panāyaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā yathākkamaṃ kammassa adosadosūpanissayatāya hotīti āha “adosanissandayuttattā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:213_8: Alobhajjhāsayā sattā vadaññū vigatamaccherā alobhūpanissayena kammunā subhagā samiddhā hontīti āha “alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane”ti.
anya-e0104n:213_10: Lobhajjhāsayā sattā luddhā maccharino lobhūpanissayena kammunā duggatā durupetā hontīti āha “lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne”ti.
anya-e0104n:214_1: Yathā kataṃ hi kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:214_4: Purimehīti vā “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:215_0: Iminā pana padenāti “yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti iminā vākyena.
anya-e0104n:215_3: So ca dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī nerayike ca satte paccakkhato disvā ṭhito.
anya-e0104n:215_4: Evaṃ manasi karotīti tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa ñātukāmatāvasena pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n:215_7: Evaṃ pana parikammaṃ katvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:215_9: pañca vā javanāni javantītiādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n:215_10: “Visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthī”ti idaṃ pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena vinā yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:215_12: aññathā yathākammūpagañāṇassa mahaggatabhāvo eva na siyā.
anya-e0104n:215_15: Ākaṅkhamāno hi dibbacakkhulābhī aññagatikesupi evaṃ paṭipajjatiyeva.
anya-e0104n:215_18: Taṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:216_0: Yathā cimassāti yathā ca imassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n:216_5: nerayikādike satte disvā tehi pubbe āyūhitaṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyādikaṃ kammaṃ tādisena samādānena,
anya-e0104n:216_6: tajjena ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti,
anya-e0104n:216_7: evaṃ yassa yassa sattassa samanantarā anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo taṃ taṃ odissa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tena tena atīte,
anya-e0104n:216_8: etarahi vā āyūhitaṃ tassa nibbattakaṃ kammaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇena disvā tena nibbattetabbaṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo tādisena samādānena,
anya-e0104n:216_9: tajjena ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti.
anya-e0104n:216_12: Yasmā etaṃ dvayaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇe satiyeva sijjhati, nāsati.
anya-e0104n:217_1: kāyato vā uppannaṃ kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhaṃ caritaṃ kāyaduccaritanti evaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:217_6: asatissa antarupacchede vipākārahabhāvassa avigacchanato so tena sahitoyevāti vattabboti āha “samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā”ti.
anya-e0104n:217_8: ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca nissitakānaṃ atthakāmā hutvā garahakā upavādakā na hontīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:217_13: Guṇāti panettha jhānādivisesā uttarimanussadhammā adhippetāti sīlaparidhaṃsanaṃ visuṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:217_22: “Ariyo”ti pana ajānato aduṭṭhacittasseva tattha ariyaguṇābhāvaṃ pavedentassa guṇaparidhaṃsanaṃ na hotīti tassa ariyūpavādo natthīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:218_6: Itaropi saccābhisamayo sāsane patiṭṭhāti āha “sotāpanno aha”nti.
anya-e0104n:218_7: Thero taṃ karuṇāyamāno “khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito”ti attānaṃ āvikāsi.
anya-e0104n:219_0: Sace navakatarā honti tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū.
anya-e0104n:221_4: hetuatthaṃ vā antogadhaṃ katvā micchādiṭṭhivasena pare kammesu samādāpakā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā.
anya-e0104n:221_11: Taṃ vācaṃ appahāyātiādīsu ariyūpavādaṃ sandhāya “puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmī”ti vadanto vācaṃ pajahati nāma,
anya-e0104n:221_12: “puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma,
anya-e0104n:221_13: “puna evarūpiṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti pajahanto diṭṭhiṃ pajahati nāma,
anya-e0104n:221_17: evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito,
anya-e0104n:222_4: bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”nti evamādīsu viya idha kāya-
anya-e0104n:222_6: Avītarāgassa maraṇato paraṃ nāma bhavantarūpādānamevāti āha “paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattikkhandhaggahaṇe”ti.
anya-e0104n:222_8: tassa upacchedeneva kāyo bhijjatīti āha “kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā”ti.
anya-e0104n:224_6: sobhanaṃ vā caritaṃ anavajjattā”tiādinā “kāyaduccaritenā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena.
anya-e0104n:226_2: Sabbākārenāti “cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena bhūmipādapadamūlasampādanenā”ti iminā sabbappakārena.
anya-e0104n:226_5: Tattha upacārajjhānaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā ārammaṇañca vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:226_9: Na hi akataparikammassa abhiññāvasena appanā ijjhati.
anya-e0104n:226_12: Na parikammanissayanti parikammassa taṃ kasiṇārammaṇaṃ apassayo na hoti.
anya-e0104n:227_0: Antoyeva rūpagataṃ passitabbaṃ na bahiddhā vikkhepāpattihetubhāvato.
anya-e0104n:227_1: Parikammassa vāro atikkamatīti idha parikammaṃ nāma yathāvuttakasiṇārammaṇaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:227_4: kasiṇāloko ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā na hoti.
anya-e0104n:227_8: parikammamatikkantassa kasiṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ na hotīti rūpagataṃ na dissati,
anya-e0104n:227_10: Evaṃ anukkamenāti punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tato vuṭṭhāya abhiṇhaṃ ālokassa pharaṇavasena āloko thāmagato hoti ciraṭṭhāyī.
anya-e0104n:227_11: Tathā ca sati tattha sucirampi rūpagataṃ passateva.
anya-e0104n:228_0: Svāyamattho tiṇukkūpamāya vibhāvetabboti dassento āha “rattiṃ tiṇukkāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:228_2: Thāmagatālokassa yathāparicchedena ṭhānanti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:229_4: Rūpadassanasamatthanti rūpaṃ sabhāvato vibhāvanasamatthaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:229_6: Tāni hi ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi na yāthāvato taṃ vibhāvetvā pavattanti āvajjanasampaṭicchanacittāni viya.
anya-e0104n:230_3: Appamattena bhavitabbanti “dibbacakkhu mayā adhigata”nti santosaṃ anāpajjitvā vipassanānuyogavasena vā
anya-e0104n:231_1: na tassa uppattikkamoti taṃ dassetuṃ “tatrāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:234_4: Saccesu viya ariyasaccāni khandhesu upādānakkhandhā antogadhā.
anya-e0104n:234_9: nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ sayambhuñāṇena avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi pavedesi vāti sātisayena pañcakkhandhāvabodhena
anya-e0104n:235_1: Yathā hi sinerussa parivāraṭṭhānāni yāni taṃsiddhiyā siddhāni mekhalaṭṭhānāni paribhaṇḍānīti vuccanti,
anya-e0104n:235_2: evaṃ imānipi dibbacakkhusiddhiyā siddhāni tassa paribhaṇḍānīti vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:235_3: Idhāgatānīti ettha idhāti yathādassitāni suttapadāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:235_4: Tato aññesu pana sāmaññaphalādīsu manomayañāṇampi visuṃ abhiññāñāṇabhāvena āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n:236_7: Na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yuttanti.
anya-e0104n:236_10: nanu vuttaṃ “na hi tikesu abhiññāñāṇāni pavattantī”ti?
anya-e0104n:236_13: nanu vuttaṃ “na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yutta”nti?
anya-e0104n:237_1: Asatipi vatthubhede bhūmikālasantānabhedavasena bhinnesu sattasu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0104n:237_3: Iddhividhañāṇassa maggārammaṇatāya abhāvato idha maggārammaṇatiko na labbhati.
anya-e0104n:238_0: Tadeva cittanti yadeva kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane vuttaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ, tadeva.
anya-e0104n:238_1: Rāmagāme cetiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu sattasu cetiyesu dhātuyo iddhiyā āharitvā rājagahe bhūmigharamaṇḍape kataṃ mahādhātunidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:238_2: “Ime gandhā”tiādinā paccuppanne gandhādike gahetvāpi asussanādivisesayuttaṃ anāgatameva nesaṃ rūpaṃ adhiṭṭhānacittassa
anya-e0104n:238_6: taṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa anāgataṃ dadhivaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:240_0: 415. Saddo ca paritto sabbassa rūpassa kāmāvacarabhāvato. Vijjamānamevāti vattamānaṃyeva.
anya-e0104n:241_3: Yāva arahato netabbanti “sakadāgāmī anāgāmino cittaṃ na jānāti,
anya-e0104n:241_7: Aññopi ca uparimo anāgāmiādi heṭṭhimassa sakadāgāmiādikassa cittaṃ jānātīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:242_1: anāgatassa ca parassa cittassa jānanaṃ sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:242_2: paccuppannassa pana na sambhavatīti adhippāyena pucchati “kathaṃ paccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:242_4: taṃdassanatthaṃ paccuppannaṃ tāva vibhajitvā dassento “paccuppannaṃ nāma tividha”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:242_8: Etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbāti etthantare pavattā rūpasantativārā ekadvesantativārā nāmāti veditabbāti attho.
anya-e0104n:242_9: Ālokaṭṭhānato ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa pageva tattha nisinnassa viya yāva rūpagataṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:242_14: ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti “ekadvesantativārā”ti ekaggahaṇampi kataṃ,
anya-e0104n:243_0: Tīre akkantaudakalekhā nāma kālussiyaṃ gatā tīrasamīpe udakarāji.
anya-e0104n:243_1: Yāva na vippasīdatīti kālussiyavigamena yāva vippasannā na hoti.
anya-e0104n:243_2: Keci pana “atinte tīre allapādena akkante yāva pāde udakalekhā na vippasīdati,
anya-e0104n:244_1: Ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ etarahīti vattabbaṃ addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n:244_6: Ubhayametaṃ paccuppannanti addhāpaccuppannaṃ hontaṃ etaṃ ubhayaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:244_8: Tañhi tasmiṃ paccuppanne chandarāgavasena paṭibaddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:244_10: Tathābhūto ca vatthupariññāya abhāvato tesu paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhīyati.
anya-e0104n:244_11: Ettha ca dvādasāyatanānaṃ “etaṃ paccuppanna”nti āgatattā tattha pavatto chandarāgo addhāpaccuppannārammaṇo,
anya-e0104n:244_12: na khaṇapaccuppannārammaṇoti viññāyatīti dassento “yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte…pe…
anya-e0104n:244_15: tattha tattha vipassatī”ti etthāpi vipassanācittaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ,
anya-e0104n:244_18: “Khaṇapaccuppannaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgata”nti na vuttaṃ tassa vasena ārammaṇakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anāgatattā.
anya-e0104n:245_1: Ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti iddhicittassa uppattisamakālameva paracittassapi uppattisambhavatoti yuttidassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:245_3: Taṃ pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:245_4: Maggaphalavīthito aññattha aniṭṭhe ṭhāne āvajjanajavanānaṃ nānārammaṇabhāvappattidosatoti yuttivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:246_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hotīti āha “santatipaccuppannaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:247_0: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanātiādi javanavārassa addhāpaccuppannabhāvadīpanamukhena iddhicittassa pavattiākāradīpanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:247_3: te pana cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ na icchantīti “ṭhitikkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatī”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:247_4: Tathā ye “iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0104n:247_5: tesaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatī”ti vacanaṃ na sameti.
anya-e0104n:247_6: Na hi tasmiṃ khaṇadvaye uppajjamānaṃ paracittena saha ekakkhaṇe uppajjati nāmāti.
anya-e0104n:247_9: Yañca vuttaṃ “parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite”ti,
anya-e0104n:247_10: ettha ca mahājano atthato pare anekapuggalāti “paresaṃ cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti āvajjanappavatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0104n:247_12: tathāpi tassa ekapuggalasseva vā cittarāsiṃ āvajjitvā ekassa paṭivijjhanaṃ ayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:247_14: tasmā tehi “mahājanassa citte āvajjite”tiādi na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:248_0: Yaṃ pana te vadanti “yasmā iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:248_2: cetopariyañāṇalābhī parassa cittaṃ ñātukāmo pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya atītādivibhāgaṃ akatvā cittasāmaññena “imassa cittaṃ jānāmi,
anya-e0104n:248_3: imassa cittaṃ jānāmī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sāmaññeneva cittaṃ āvajjitvā tiṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:248_4: catunnaṃ vā parikammānaṃ anantarā cetopariyañāṇena paracittaṃ paṭivijjhati vibhāveti rūpaṃ viya dibbacakkhunā.
anya-e0104n:248_5: Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthānaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthānaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:248_6: Tattha dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayavatthurūpassa sattassa abhimukhībhūtassa cittasāmaññena cittaṃ āvajjayamānaṃ
anya-e0104n:248_7: āvajjanaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ vijjamānaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āvajjeti.
anya-e0104n:248_8: Parikammāni ca taṃ taṃ vijjamānaṃ cittaṃ cittasāmaññeneva ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittajānanaparikammāni hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0104n:248_9: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ pana vijjamānaṃ cittaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventaṃ tena saha ekakkhaṇe eva uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:249_0: Tattha yasmā santānassa santānaggahaṇato ekattavasena āvajjanādīni “citta”ntveva pavattāni.
anya-e0104n:249_3: Tasmā samānākārappavattito na aniṭṭhe maggaphalavīthito aññasmiṃ ṭhāne nānārammaṇatā āvajjanajavanānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:249_4: Paccuppannārammaṇañca parikammaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa āsevanapaccayena paccayoti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:249_7: addhāpaccuppanne ca “paccuppanna”nti idha vuccamāne atītānāgatānañca paccuppannatā āpajjeyya.
anya-e0104n:249_8: Tathā ca sati “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n:249_11: Purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantara …pe…
anya-e0104n:249_12: anulomaṃ gotrabhussā”tiādi vacanato na addhāsantatipaccuppannesveva ca anantarātītā cattāro khandhā atītāti viññāyanti.
anya-e0104n:249_13: Na ca abhidhammamātikāyaṃ āgatassa paccuppannapadassa addhāsantatipaccuppannapadatthatā katthaci pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0104n:249_14: Tasmā tehi iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittuppattiyā cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:249_18: taṃ jānāmī”ti vā ābhogaṃ katvā pādakajjhānasamāpajjanādīni karoti,
anya-e0104n:249_20: cetopariyañāṇañca atītānāgatārammaṇāneva honti āvajjaneneva vibhāgassa katattā.
anya-e0104n:250_0: Ye pana “iddhimā parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo āvajjeti,
anya-e0104n:250_1: āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha nirujjhati.
anya-e0104n:250_6: tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:250_7: na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni honti addhānavasena paccuppannārammaṇattā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ nissāya “āvajjanajavanānaṃ
anya-e0104n:250_9: āvajjitesu āvajjanajavanānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ anāgatapaccuppannātītārammaṇabhāvepi nānārammaṇatā na siyā.
anya-e0104n:250_10: Tena catupañcacittakkhaṇānāgate āvajjite anāgatārammaṇaparikammānantaraṃ khaṇapaccuppannārammaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ siddha”nti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:250_11: Tesaṃ vādo “anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n:250_12: paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imesaṃ pañhānaṃ anuddhaṭattā,
anya-e0104n:250_13: gaṇanāya ca “āsevane tīṇī”ti vuttattā na sijjhati.
anya-e0104n:250_15: Etassa ca vādassa nissayabhāvo āvajjanajavanānaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaniruddhārammaṇatāvacanassa na sijjhati,
anya-e0104n:250_17: pavattissati cā”ti visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇe āvajjanassa anāgataggahaṇābhāvaṃ,
anya-e0104n:250_18: tadabhāvā javanānampi vattamānaggahaṇābhāvañca sandhāyeva tassa vuttattā.
anya-e0104n:250_19: Tadā hi bhavaṅgacalanānantaraṃ abhimukhībhūtameva cittaṃ ārabbha āvajjanā pavattatīti jānanacittassapi
anya-e0104n:250_21: rāsiekadesāvajjanapaṭivedhe sampattasampattāvajjanajānane ca aniṭṭhe ṭhāne āvajjanajavanānaṃ nānārammaṇabhāvadosāpattiyā
anya-e0104n:250_22: ca yaṃ vuttaṃ “khaṇapaccuppannaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti,
anya-e0104n:250_24: kālavasena ca addhāsantatipaccuppannārammaṇattā nānārammaṇatābhāvaṃ disvā āvajjanajavanānaṃ vattamānataṃ niruddhārammaṇabhāvo vuttoti.
anya-e0104n:250_26: Tasmiṃ hi sati “āvajjanā kusalāna”ntiādīsu (paṭṭhā 1.1.417) viya aññapadasaṅgahitassa anantarapaccayavidhānato
anya-e0104n:250_27: “paccuppannārammaṇaāvajjanā atītārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n:251_2: anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅgesu “atītā khandhā
anya-e0104n:251_3: iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n:251_4: anāgatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n:251_5: uppannattike ca “anuppannā khandhā uppādino khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n:251_6: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa
anya-e0104n:251_7: dhammassā”ti etassa vibhaṅge “paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
