anya-e0104n:251_8: uppannattike ca “uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ettakasseva
anya-e0104n:251_9: vuttattā paccuppanne citte cetopariyañāṇaṃ nappavattatīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:251_11: purimesu viya itaresu ca cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ siyāti?
anya-e0104n:251_13: nayadassanavasena pana taṃ saṃkhittanti aññāya pāḷiyā viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:252_2: paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassā”ti etesaṃ hi vibhaṅgesu “cetopariyañāṇena atītārammaṇapaccuppannacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0104n:252_3: atītārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n:252_5: anāgatārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n:252_7: paccuppannārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti vuttāti.
anya-e0104n:253_1: Tesanti tesu dvīsu ñāṇesūti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:253_3: Tenāha “aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhappaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānātī”ti.
anya-e0104n:253_5: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ maggārammaṇanti āha “maggasampayuttacittārammaṇattā pana pariyāyato maggārammaṇanti vutta”nti.
anya-e0104n:253_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “atīte buddhā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu,
anya-e0104n:253_12: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyiṃsūti chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇavasena maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇatopi appamāṇārammaṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:253_13: Tattha maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇāni tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena maggaphalesu ñāṇesu pavattanti.
anya-e0104n:253_14: Nibbānapaccavekkhaṇañca nibbānārammaṇesu appamāṇadhammesu ñāṇesūti maggādipaccavekkhaṇāni pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n:253_16: “Appamāṇā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”icceva hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:253_18: Tasmā pubbenivāsañāṇena eva maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇakicce vuccamānepi nibbānapaccavekkhaṇatā na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:254_1: na cetopariyayathākammūpagañāṇāpekkhāti tesaṃ catukkhandhārammaṇabhāvassa asādhakoti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n:254_2: aññattha “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro ca cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n:254_3: “savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n:254_4: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vuttattā cetopariyañāṇāpekkhāpi bahuvacananiddesoti imassa atthassa siddhito.
anya-e0104n:254_5: Evampi yathākammūpagañāṇassa “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro cā”tiādīsu avuttattā catukkhandhārammaṇatā na sijjhatīti? Na,
anya-e0104n:254_7: Yathākammūpagañāṇena hi kammasaṃsaṭṭhā cattāro khandhā kammamukhena gayhati.
anya-e0104n:254_12: tasmā “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro cā”tiādike vibhāgakaraṇe taṃ na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:254_16: Na hi taṃ kusalākusalavibhāgaṃ viya savitakkādivibhāgaṃ kammaṃ vibhāvetuṃ asamatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:255_0: “Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmagottānussaraṇakāle na vattabbārammaṇa”nti ettakameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:255_3: Ayamettha amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyassāyaṃ attano mati.
anya-e0104n:257_3: “Ajjhattārammaṇañceva bahiddhārammaṇañcā”ti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:257_6: Na hi ajjhattabahiddhā nāma visuṃ ekaṃ atthi,
anya-e0104n:257_8: Yadi evaṃ tiko eva na pūrati padadvayāsaṅgahitassa tatiyassa atthantarassa abhāvato, na,
anya-e0104n:257_10: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “te eva tippakārepi dhamme”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:257_11: Te eva ajjhattādivasena tividhepi dhammeti attho.
anya-e0104n:257_12: Ettha hi “te eva dhamme”ti avatvā “tippakāre”ti vacanaṃ pakārabhedanibandhanā ayaṃ tikadesanāti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:257_13: Yathā hi kusalattikādīnaṃ desanā yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ jātisampayogappahānasikkhābhūmiārammaṇappabhedaniyamakālādibhedanibandhanā,
anya-e0104n:257_17: Pañceva hi khandhā sasantatipariyāpannataṃ upādāya “ajjhattā”ti vuttā,
anya-e0104n:257_20: Tenāha “anindriyabaddharūpañca nibbānañca ṭhapetvā sabbe dhammā siyā ajjhattā,
anya-e0104n:257_24: pakārantarassa ca anāmaṭṭhattā tatiyo rāsi natthīti?
anya-e0104n:257_26: Yadipi hi paṭhamapadena asaṅgahitasaṅgaṇhanavasena dutiyapadassa pavattattā sabbepi sabhāvadhammā padadvayeneva pariggahitā,
anya-e0104n:257_27: tehi pana visuṃ visuṃ gahitadhamme ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena tatiyapadaṃ vuttanti attheva tatiyo rāsi.
anya-e0104n:257_29: bhinnavatthuke pana dhamme adhiṭṭhānabhedaṃ amuñcitvā ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ na sambhavatīti kālena ajjhattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:263_2: Paññā bhāvetabbā samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:263_4: gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vā “samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsattha”nti evaṃ ativiya saṅkhepena bhāsitattā
anya-e0104n:263_5: ayaṃ sā paññāti sabhāvato viññātumpi tāva na sukarā.
anya-e0104n:263_6: Bhāvanāvidhānassa pana adassitattā pageva bhāvetuṃ na sukarāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:264_1: Kenaṭṭhena paññāti kena atthena paññāti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:264_2: “paññā”ti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0104n:264_5: āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbāti āha “kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0104n:264_7: Kasmā panettha saṃkilesavodānapucchā na gahitāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n:264_9: Asati ca tasmiṃ kuto vodānapucchāti tadubhayaṃ na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:264_10: Lokiyāya pana tāni bhāvanāvidhāne eva antogadhānīti katvā visuṃ na gahitāni maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiantogadhattā,
anya-e0104n:264_11: samādhibhāvanāyaṃ vā vuttanayānusārena veditabbānīti na gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:264_12: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti āha “paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṃso”ti.
anya-e0104n:265_4: Pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:265_7: vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0104n:265_8: Taṃdassanena ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ “paññā bahuvidhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:265_13: Na sādheyyāti vipassanābhāvanāya saddhiṃ maggabhāvanā idha adhippetattho.
anya-e0104n:265_16: Anavasesato hi paññāpabhede vissajjiyamāne “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādiko sabbo ñāṇavatthu vibhaṅge,
anya-e0104n:265_17: suttantesu ca tattha tattha āgato paññāpabhedo.
anya-e0104n:265_18: Sakalopi vā abhidhammanayo āharitvā vissajjetabbo bhaveyya,
anya-e0104n:265_19: tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ idha paññābhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0104n:265_22: sopi yathārahaṃ saddhiṃ phalāphalabhedena vibhajitvā vissajjetabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n:265_23: So ca pana vissajjiyamāno aññadatthu vikkhepāya saṃvatteyya,
anya-e0104n:265_28: tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhapaññā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭisedheti.
anya-e0104n:266_7: tena “lohitakaṃ odātaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādike saññāya gahetabbākāre saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:266_8: Sañjānanamattamevāti ettha sañjānanaṃ nāma “nīlaṃ pīta”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe vijjamānaṃ vā avijjamānaṃ vā saññānimittaṃ katvā jānanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:266_11: saddena kadācipi imissā te visesā natthevāti avadhāreti.
anya-e0104n:266_13: Tattha viññāṇakiccampi kātuṃ asakkontī saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti “lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti”cceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:266_15: Ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati,
anya-e0104n:266_16: atha kho tattha aññañca visesaṃ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:266_19: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato
anya-e0104n:266_21: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti.
anya-e0104n:266_22: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhanti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:266_28: Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvañca pāpeti.
anya-e0104n:267_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:267_9: Te pakāreti indajālājātipupphādippakāre ceva chekādippakāre ca.
anya-e0104n:268_1: Saññā vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇassa gahaṇato dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttā.
anya-e0104n:268_3: Viññāṇaṃ ārammaṇe ekaccavisesagahaṇasamatthatāya gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:268_4: Paññā ārammaṇe anavasesavisesāvabodhato heraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:268_5: “Nānappakārato jānana”nti iminā ñeyyadhammā paccekaṃ nānappakārāti tesaṃ yāthāvato avabodho paññāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:268_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:269_1: Na tattha ekaṃsena hotīti tasmiṃ cittuppāde paññā ekantena na hoti.
anya-e0104n:269_5: Yathā hi sukhaṃ pītiyā na niyamato aviyuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:269_6: evaṃ saññāviññāṇāni paññāya na niyamato aviyuttāti.
anya-e0104n:269_7: Yathā pana pīti sukhena niyamato aviyuttā,
anya-e0104n:269_9: Tasmā evaṃ avinibbhuttesu imesu tīsu dhammesu tesaṃ vinibbhogo dukkaroti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ kahāpaṇadassanaṃ nidassitanti.
anya-e0104n:269_12: nānātelassa vā ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā mathitassa “idaṃ asukāya nadiyā udakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:269_13: idaṃ asukatela”nti niddhāretvā sarūpato dassanaṃ dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0104n:269_14: kimaṅgaṃ pana arūpadhammesūti dassento “yaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:270_5: Tadubhayassa ca yāthāvato paṭivijjhanalakkhaṇā paññāti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
anya-e0104n:270_6: Ghaṭapaṭādipaṭicchādakassa bāhirandhakārassa dīpālokādi viya yathāvuttadhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa viddhaṃsanarasā.
anya-e0104n:270_7: Uppajjamāno eva hi paññāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento evaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:270_8: tato eva dhammasabhāvesu asammuyhanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:270_9: Kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti evampi asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:270_10: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā “samādhi tassā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:270_11: Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti suttapadaṃ nibandhanabhāvena āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n:272_2: na tenassā koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidhā”ti.
anya-e0104n:272_6: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā.
anya-e0104n:272_10: Attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā,
anya-e0104n:272_11: ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi natthi etissā āsavāti anāsavā. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:272_17: sayampi vā bhavati uppajjati na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhāvanti bhūmi cāti dassanabhūmi,
anya-e0104n:272_19: Sesamaggattayaṃ pana yasmā paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṃyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:272_21: tasmā bhāvanā ca yathāvuttenatthena bhūmi cāti bhāvanābhūmi.
anya-e0104n:272_29: upāye tassa tassa atthassa nibbattikāraṇe kosallaṃ upāyakosallanti visuṃ visuṃ kosallapadaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:273_3: Samudāyesu pavattā samaññā tadekadesesupi vattatīti āha “maggasampayuttā”ti,
anya-e0104n:273_4: paccekampi vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ maggasamaññāti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:274_0: Dhammanānattābhāvepi padatthanānattamattena dukkaravacanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “atthato panesā lokiyalokuttarāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:274_2: atthato lokiyalokuttarāva paññāti āha “eseva nayo”ti. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:274_5: tathā dutiyādijjhānikāni cāti evaṃ soḷasasu maggacittesu.
anya-e0104n:274_6: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā mahaggatapaññā na gahitā.
anya-e0104n:275_1: Attano cintāvasenāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva.
anya-e0104n:275_3: Yathā tathā vāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā vā asutvā vā sayameva bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa.
anya-e0104n:276_2: kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvānanti vā kammāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:276_10: Tāni panetāni ekacce paṇḍitā bodhisattasadisā manussānaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ ākaṅkhantā neva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti,
anya-e0104n:276_13: Atha kho attano dhammatāya cintāya karonti,
anya-e0104n:276_14: paññavantehi attano dhammatāya cintāya katānipi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisāneva honti.
anya-e0104n:277_4: Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:277_6: saddena aniyamatthena dukkhānattalakkhaṇānipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ nānantariyakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:277_11: Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n:277_13: Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ kammāyatanādīnaṃ apaccanīkadassanena anulomanato,
anya-e0104n:277_17: Sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni khamati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti.
anya-e0104n:277_22: Te ca kammāyatanādayo dhammā etāya nijjhāyamānā nijjhānaṃ khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhanti.
anya-e0104n:277_23: Parato asutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ asutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
anya-e0104n:277_24: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0104n:277_28: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā disvāpi parassa kathayamānassa
anya-e0104n:277_29: vacanaṃ sutvāpi ācariyasantike uggahetvāpi paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:278_2: Sā lokuttaravipassanāti yā nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattā appamāṇārammaṇā paññā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:278_4: Sā hi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādiṃ agaṇhantīpi vipassanākiccapāripūriyā,
anya-e0104n:278_5: nibbānassa vā tathalakkhaṇaṃ visesato passatīti vipassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:278_7: maggassa pana āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā na vipassanāvohāraṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n:279_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ anatthahāniatthuppattilakkhaṇe āye kosallaṃ kusalatā nipuṇatā.
anya-e0104n:280_0: Taṃ pana ekantikaṃ āyakosallaṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “ime dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:280_1: Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattipahānesu,
anya-e0104n:281_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ atthahānianatthuppattilakkhaṇe apāye kosallaṃ kusalatā apāyakosallaṃ.
anya-e0104n:281_3: Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppajjananirujjhanesu,
anya-e0104n:281_10: Paññavā eva hi “mayhaṃ evaṃ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:281_14: so evaṃ ñatvā anuppanne akusale na uppādeti,
anya-e0104n:282_2: Taṅkhaṇappavattanti accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pavattaṃ.
anya-e0104n:283_2: Ubhayaṃ gahetvāti “ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā”ti ubhayaṃ anupubbato pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n:283_4: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti ekappahāreneva sabbepi pañcakkhandhe avibhāgena pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n:283_5: Ayaṃ pana tikkhavipassakassa mahāpuññassa bhikkhuno vipassanābhiniveso.
anya-e0104n:284_2: tappaṭicchādakasammohavidhaṃsanavasena ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:284_5: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hi catusaccaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ nāma,
anya-e0104n:285_0: “Atthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇānī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivaseneva vivarituṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:285_1: Tattha atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti yaṃ atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:285_4: Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0104n:285_7: Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ atthādīnaṃ paccayuppannatādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:286_2: “Yaṃ kiñci paccayasambhūta”nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:286_6: kiriyā cāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:286_9: Tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetuṃ “pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā detī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:286_12: maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo attho.
anya-e0104n:286_15: itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti evaṃ tividho hoti.
anya-e0104n:287_0: “Yo koci phalanibbattako hetū”ti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni samudayādīni gahitāni,
anya-e0104n:287_3: abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalanti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca dhammā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:287_6: itaraṃ nibbattakoti evaṃ tividho hetu veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:287_7: Ettha ca kiriyānaṃ avipākatāya dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n:287_8: Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvopi na vattabbo? Na,
anya-e0104n:287_10: Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
anya-e0104n:287_12: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n:287_15: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvassābhāvato dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n:287_17: ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti etaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale,
anya-e0104n:287_18: vipākakiriyādhamme ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:288_0: Ayameva hi atthoti yvāyaṃ atthadhammānaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanavasena attho vutto,
anya-e0104n:289_4: tassa tassa atthassa bodhane paṭiniyatasambandho saddavohāroti attho.
anya-e0104n:289_11: Na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n:289_13: evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:289_17: Tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:290_0: Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0104n:290_2: na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:290_3: “Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca vacanasaddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0104n:290_4: Evaṃ pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ vuttanti āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:290_5: Yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃtaṃsaddavibhāvakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:290_7: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho.
anya-e0104n:290_8: “Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassā”ti ca “paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassā”ti na nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:290_9: Tañhi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayahetubhāvato
anya-e0104n:290_10: niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti pabhedagatampi hotīti.
anya-e0104n:291_5: kusalakiriyābhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā “sabbattha ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:291_8: kiccādikassa ca vasena “idaṃ ñāṇaṃ idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ iminā nāma kiccenā”ti jānanaṃ. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:292_1: Pabhedaṃ gacchantīti anekabhedabhinnesu ārammaṇesu tesaṃ yāthāvato taṃtaṃpabhedāvabodhanasamatthataṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0104n:293_0: Mahāsāvakānañca asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti sāmaññavidhinā dassitamatthaṃ apavādena nivattetuṃ ānandatthera-
anya-e0104n:294_3: sātisayaṃ vā adhigamaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:294_4: Sekkhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
anya-e0104n:294_5: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
anya-e0104n:294_7: Atthadhammādīnaṃ anavasesasaṅgaṇhanato buddhavacanavisayā eva pariyattiādayo dassitā.
anya-e0104n:294_10: parito sabbaso ñātuṃ icchā paripucchāti āha “pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā”ti,
anya-e0104n:294_12: adhippāyato ca duviññeyyaṭṭhānaṃ vitthārato sanniṭṭhānakathāti attho.
anya-e0104n:294_23: tato ca yāva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyuttoti attho.
anya-e0104n:296_3: Ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalādīni sabbabuddhaguṇesu sakiccato pākaṭatarānīti vuttaṃ “dasa balāni viyā”ti,
anya-e0104n:296_4: aññe vā sabbaññutaññāṇādayopi sabbe bhagavato guṇavisesā asekkhaphalavimokkhantikā eva.
anya-e0104n:298_4: Kasmā panete evaṃ bahudhammā bhūmibhāvena gayhanti,
anya-e0104n:298_5: nanu khandhādīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhi hotīti? Na,
anya-e0104n:298_7: aññathā sabbasādhāraṇo anuggaho na kato siyā.
anya-e0104n:298_8: Tividhā hi sattā rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti.
anya-e0104n:298_10: tadatthaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ catudhā vibhattattā.
anya-e0104n:298_16: saṃkhittarucī majjhimarucī vitthārarucīti ca tividhā sattā,
anya-e0104n:298_17: tesampi atthāya yathākkamaṃ khandhādiggahaṇaṃ katanti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:298_18: Indriyaggahaṇaṃ pana kāmaṃ ete dhammā issarā viya sahajātadhammesu issariyaṃ ādhipaccaṃ pavattenti,
anya-e0104n:298_20: na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo “suññā ete avasavattino”ti anattalakkhaṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:298_21: Taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ,
anya-e0104n:298_26: cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā hoti, nāsatīti.
anya-e0104n:298_28: Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādikā imā pañca visuddhiyo
anya-e0104n:299_7: tasmā atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ rāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “rūpameva khandho rūpakkhandho”ti samānādhikaraṇasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:299_8: “Tīhi khandhehi iṇaṃ dassāmā”tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe pana khandha-
anya-e0104n:299_11: Na hi ekassa niccassa sato nibbānassa atītādivibhāgo atthīti.
anya-e0104n:299_15: Kasmā panete khandhā pañceva vuttā iminā eva ca kamenāti?
anya-e0104n:299_19: kammahetutañca cintetvā vedanāsaññā saṅkhārakkhandhato nīharitvā visuṃ khandhabhāvena desitā.
anya-e0104n:301_5: saddena ca gahitena aniyamatthatāya atippasaṅge āpanne taṃ ruppanasaddo nivatteti,
anya-e0104n:301_12: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n:301_20: Virodhipaccayasannipāte yo attano santāne bhinne bhijjamānasseva visadisuppattihetubhāvo,
anya-e0104n:301_22: Imasmiṃ pakkhe rūpayati vikāraṃ āpādetīti rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:301_25: Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpadhammesu rūpasamaññāya pasaṅgo eva natthi saṅghaṭṭanābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:301_27: Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti rāsaṭṭhaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vadati.
anya-e0104n:302_0: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādāyarūpanti bhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n:303_1: sabhāvadhammānaṃ pana lakkhaṇādivibhāvanāti katvā vuttaṃ “lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānī”ti.
anya-e0104n:303_3: Avacanañca tassa tassatthassa paccayatoti ettha pakārantarena vibhāvitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:303_5: Āposaṅgahitāya tejonupālitāya vāyovitthambhitāya eva pathavīdhātuyā pavatti,
anya-e0104n:304_4: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:304_12: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārammaṇādibhāve niruḷhattā dassane eva cakkhu-
anya-e0104n:304_13: saddo pavattati padumādīsu paṅkajādisaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:304_14: Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:304_23: tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā niruttinayena.
anya-e0104n:304_24: Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n:304_25: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n:304_26: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
anya-e0104n:304_27: Kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo vutto.
anya-e0104n:304_29: rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti saviggahamiva dassetīti attho.
anya-e0104n:304_30: Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:304_33: sakehi vā paccayehi sappīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho.
anya-e0104n:304_37: paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:305_6: Copanakāyabhāvato kāyo ca so adhippāyaviññāpanato viññatti cāti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0104n:305_8: adhippāyaviññāpanato ca vacī ca sā viññatti cāti vacīviññatti.
anya-e0104n:306_0: Kamato pana sabbesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṃ bhūtarūpāni uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n:306_1: Itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca ādito uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n:306_2: Tesaṃ visayīnaṃ ime visayāti dassetuṃ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n:306_4: bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:306_5: Svāyaṃ attabhāvo imehi “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:306_6: “Iminā jīvatī”ti vohāraṃ labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ tato jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:306_7: Tassa imaṃ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṃ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṃ hadayavatthu.
anya-e0104n:306_8: Tassa imāsaṃ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṃ viññattidvayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:306_13: Sabbo cāyaṃ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṃ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:307_1: Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhāni upādārūpāni lakkhaṇādito niddisituṃ “tattha rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:307_5: rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvo catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo,
anya-e0104n:307_7: Yasmā paccayantarasahito eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati,
anya-e0104n:307_10: na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṃ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṃ kusalākusalanti.
anya-e0104n:307_11: Abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ abhighāto viyāti katvā.
anya-e0104n:307_14: Tenāha “yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti,
anya-e0104n:307_15: “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati vā”ti ca ādi.
anya-e0104n:307_17: rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ arahatīti dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto.
anya-e0104n:307_21: Tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti
anya-e0104n:308_4: asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:308_5: Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
anya-e0104n:308_6: uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto
anya-e0104n:308_7: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti,
anya-e0104n:308_8: “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando’ti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
anya-e0104n:309_5: Ettha ca taṃtaṃattabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṃ cakkhulakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n:309_6: “Evarūpaṃ nāma me cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena dutiyanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:309_7: Satipi pana pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:309_9: ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:310_4: Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa bhinnattā.
anya-e0104n:310_5: Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ kathaṃ nesaṃ visesoti?
anya-e0104n:310_7: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
anya-e0104n:310_9: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti.
anya-e0104n:310_10: Na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato.
anya-e0104n:310_17: kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayoti.
anya-e0104n:311_2: Tesu hi vasudhammo evaṃ vadati “cakkhumhi tejo adhikaṃ,
anya-e0104n:311_7: Cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo cakkhū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:311_11: idaṃ pana “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ samānānanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā.
anya-e0104n:311_12: Tejādīnaṃ hi paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ,
anya-e0104n:311_13: tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n:311_14: Tasmā catunnampi bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:311_22: vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti tesaṃ laddhi.
anya-e0104n:311_23: Tejādīnaṃ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:311_24: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena,
anya-e0104n:311_28: pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:312_3: āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti imesaṃ visesayuttānaṃ dassanato “rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti paṭhamavādī āhāti.
anya-e0104n:312_6: Atha vā rūpādivisesaguṇehi tejaākāsapathavīāpavāyūhi cakkhādīni katānīti vadantassa kaṇādassa vādaṃ uddharitvā
anya-e0104n:312_8: Āsave upalabbhamānopi gandho pathaviyā āposaṃyuttāya kappāsato visadisāyāti na kappāsagandhassa adhikabhāvāpattīti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n:312_10: Āsave hi udakasaṃyuttā pathavī udakena abhibhūtā,
anya-e0104n:312_11: na kappāsapathavīti tassa eva gandhena adhikena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:312_12: Uṇhodakasaṃyutto ca aggi upalabbhanīyo mahantoti katvā tassa phasso viya vaṇṇopi pabhassaro upalabbheyyāti
anya-e0104n:312_13: uṇhodake vaṇṇato agginā anabhisambandhassa sītodakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha.
anya-e0104n:312_16: Tannivattanena “tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ nivattitanti evaṃ paramparāya
anya-e0104n:312_17: ubhayābhāvo visesaparikappanapahānassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “tasmā pahāyeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:312_19: ko pana vādo nānākalāpe cakkhādayo bhūtavisesābhāvepīti dassetuṃ rūparasādinidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:313_1: kiṃ pana cakkhādivisesassa kāraṇanti taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ aññamaññassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:313_2: Ekampi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvabhavappatthanānipphannaṃ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇanti ca kammavisesoti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:313_3: Na hi taṃ yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo,
anya-e0104n:313_5: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n:313_6: vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:313_7: Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammunā nibbattitaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n:313_8: Na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.
anya-e0104n:314_3: Gandharasānaṃ nissayā ghānajivhānaṃ nissaye allīyantīti te nissayavasena allīnā.
anya-e0104n:314_10: cittajo saddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0104n:314_11: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi.
anya-e0104n:314_14: attano visayipadesassa eva gahetabbato gandho viya.
anya-e0104n:314_18: nanu dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyantīti?
anya-e0104n:314_20: Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭe gahaṇavisesato ākāravisesānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:314_22: evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte,
anya-e0104n:314_24: majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte nicchayaggahaṇānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ visesato lahukaṃ suto “cirena suto”ti adhimāno hoti.
anya-e0104n:314_27: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
anya-e0104n:314_30: bhājanādicalanassa ca ayokanto viya ayocalanassa paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:315_1: Pubbe lakkhaṇādinā vibhāvitampi cakkhuṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādito vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhu cetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:315_2: Tattha cakkhu sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Ca-
anya-e0104n:315_7: Snehamiva satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ tannissiteheva
anya-e0104n:315_8: āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaṃ parivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:315_10: Pamāṇato ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:315_11: Cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthubhāvaṃ nissayabhāvato āvajjanasampaṭicchanādīnaṃ tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ dvārabhāvaṃ samavasaraṭṭhānato.
anya-e0104n:315_13: tatthāpi paccekaṃ anekakalāpagatabhāvato anekampi samānaṃ sāmaññaniddesena āvajjanāya ekattā,
anya-e0104n:315_14: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva ca kiccakarattā ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:316_0: Manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, atha vā manūti macco.
anya-e0104n:318_4: upādinnakajjhāsayatāya kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasiṅgālo viya passitabboti dassento “vammi…pe…
anya-e0104n:318_6: Visamajjhāsayatā ca cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:318_7: cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:318_9: Sabbopi ca yathāvutto papañco sotādīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:320_5: Tato eva “itthī”ti taṃsahitaṃ santānaṃ pakāsentaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti.
anya-e0104n:320_20: Imāni ca itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena uppajjamānānipi yebhuyyena itthindriyasahite eva
anya-e0104n:320_21: santāne taṃtadākārāni hutvā uppajjantīti itthindriyaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇanti katvā vuttaṃ “itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ
anya-e0104n:320_23: Itthiliṅgādīsu eva ca kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:321_0: Yasmā pana bhāvadasakepi rūpānaṃ itthindriyaṃ na janakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:321_5: āhāro viya vā kalāpantararūpānañca “indriyaatthiavigatapaccayo”ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:321_12: Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekasmiṃ santāne saha na pavattati “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:321_15: tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassāpi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:321_18: byāpakamevā”ti vatvā yadi evaṃ kāyappasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkaṃ nivattento “na ca kāyappasādenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:321_20: yadipi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya kāyappasādena aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati,
anya-e0104n:321_21: tena pana bhinnanissayattā ṭhitokāse ṭhitantipi vattabbataṃ nāpajjatīti ayameva cettha nippariyāyakathā.
anya-e0104n:321_22: “Rūparasādayo viyā”ti etena samānanissayesupi nāma saṅkaro natthi lakkhaṇabhedato,
anya-e0104n:322_5: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinopi kammajarūpassa pavattihetubhāvena taṃ anupālakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:322_7: Na hi kammajānaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ arahati āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya.
anya-e0104n:322_13: Attanā anupālanavasena yāpetabbāni pavattetabbāni bhūtāni etassa padaṭṭhānanti yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:322_17: Asati anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyya.
anya-e0104n:322_18: Yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhitihetumantarena ṭhiti na hoti,
anya-e0104n:322_21: atha kasmā sabbakālaṃ na ṭhapetīti āha “na bhaṅgato”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:323_1: Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthūti kathametaṃ viññātabbanti? Āgamato,
anya-e0104n:323_3: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
anya-e0104n:323_4: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādi āgamo.
anya-e0104n:323_12: Nissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā “atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu,
anya-e0104n:323_15: tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi na tadanuguṇā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n:323_17: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyunti ekarasā desanā na bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n:323_18: Ekarasañca desanaṃ desetuṃ idha satthu ajjhāsayo.
anya-e0104n:324_3: ojāya ca indriyabaddhato bahipi pavattidassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati,
anya-e0104n:324_4: itthipurisindriyānampi tadubhayarahitepi santāne dhātudvayadassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati,
anya-e0104n:324_5: jīvitindriyassāpi aññakiccaṃ vijjatīti na taṃnissayatā yujjati evāti pārisesato hadayavatthu,
anya-e0104n:324_7: Sakkā hi vattuṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave rūpapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato.
anya-e0104n:324_12: Nanu ca indriyanissayatāyapi sādhanato viruddho hetu āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n:324_14: Diṭṭhaṃ hetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa viya dhātudvayassa vatthuno mandatikkhādiananuvidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:324_15: Tathā hissa pāḷiyaṃ indriyapaccayatā na vuttā.
anya-e0104n:324_25: Aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayassa khijjanato tatthetamavaṭṭhitanti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:324_27: Nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupatiṭṭhatīti ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:325_1: Abhikkamo ādi yesaṃ te abhikkamādī. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:325_3: Tesaṃ abhikkamādīnaṃ pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā abhikkamādippavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0104n:325_6: tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso kāyaviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “abhikkamādi…pe…
anya-e0104n:326_7: Yadi evaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo na yujjati.
anya-e0104n:326_10: nāyaṃ doso catunnaṃ vikāro catūsu ekassāpi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:326_11: Vāyodhātuadhikatāya ca kalāpassa “vāyodhātuyā”ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n:326_17: Na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:326_20: Tassa ca taggahaṇānantaraṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti adhippāyaggahaṇato.
anya-e0104n:326_21: Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu “idamesa kāreti maññe”ti adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:326_23: Tasmā phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa ñāpakoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:326_24: Ñāpako ca hetu ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ gahito eva ñāpeti,
anya-e0104n:326_25: na vijjamānatāmattenāti vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ vikāraggahaṇampi anumānato viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:328_0: Na sattāmattato atthe, te aññātā pakāsakā”ti.
anya-e0104n:329_3: atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:329_5: Kiṃ sabbāva vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karontīti?
anya-e0104n:329_7: Sattamajavanasambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purimajavanasambhūtā vāyodhātuyo upathambhakapaccaye labhitvā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajarūpaṃ, na itarā.
anya-e0104n:329_8: Itarā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ karontiyo tassā upakārāya honti.
anya-e0104n:329_9: Desantaruppatti eva calananti nimitte ca kattubhāvo samāropitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:329_13: Cittajarūpe pana calante taṃsambandhatāya utukammāhārajarūpampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0104n:329_17: tathā calayitumasakkuṇantiyopi thambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā paṭhamajavanādisambhūtāpi vāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitā evāti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:329_21: Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakavacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0104n:330_0: Kāyavipphandanassa hetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārabhāvato pariyāyena viññatti kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:330_2: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttāti kāyavipphandanena karaṇabhūtena adhippāyassa viññāpanahetubhāvato kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:330_8: Dutiyanaye pana yathāvuttena kāyena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0104n:331_2: Tassa pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0104n:331_4: Tassā yaṃ upādinnasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññitaṃ kiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n:331_5: tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso vacīviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “vacībhe…pe…
anya-e0104n:332_0: Idāni “kassa pana ākāravikāro”tiādi kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:332_4: Idha ca thambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato “sattamajavanasambhūtā”tiādinayo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n:332_14: Yathā hi ussāpetvā baddhagosīsādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā
anya-e0104n:332_16: evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānavaṇṇasadde gahetvā tadanantarapavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā
anya-e0104n:333_5: Ayaṃ hi ākāsadhātu taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantī viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:333_7: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati,
anya-e0104n:333_11: Vijjamānepi hi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo,
anya-e0104n:333_13: Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito.
anya-e0104n:333_19: “Yāya paricchinnesū”tiādinā ākāsadhātuyā taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ kalāpantarehi asaṅkarakāraṇataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:334_10: Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhātakammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n:334_11: Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:335_0: Lahutādīnaṃ aññamaññāvijahanena duviññeyyanānattatā vuttāti taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehi taṃnānattappakāsanatthaṃ “evaṃ santepī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:335_3: Dvidhā vuttopi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:335_13: Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhānāhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbanti keci,
anya-e0104n:335_16: tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvova siyā.
anya-e0104n:335_17: Kasmā pana kammajarūpesu lahutādayo na hontīti?
anya-e0104n:336_2: yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayo,
anya-e0104n:336_3: tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ācayo lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ācayalakkhaṇo.
anya-e0104n:336_9: Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti.
anya-e0104n:336_10: Tathā so “ime rūpadhammā”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti āha “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
anya-e0104n:336_11: Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā “uparicayo upacayo”ti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:337_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhajja vuttāti āha “ākāranānattato”ti,
anya-e0104n:337_4: Veneyyavasena vibhajjakathane kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0104n:337_9: Tattha yo āyatanānanti yo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ rūpāyatanānaṃ ādicayattā “ācayo”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n:337_12: Yo pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo,
anya-e0104n:337_14: Atha vā yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo paṭhamabhāvena upalakkhito uppādo,
anya-e0104n:337_15: so pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo,
anya-e0104n:338_0: Tattha evaṃ kiṃ kathitanti “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo”tiādinā niddesena kiṃ atthajātaṃ kathitaṃ hoti?
anya-e0104n:338_2: Ācayupacayasantatiyo hi nibbattibhāvena ācayo evāti āyatanehi ācayādīnaṃ pakāsitattā tehi ācayo kathito.
anya-e0104n:338_3: Āyatanānaṃ ācayādivacaneneva ācayasabhāvāni uppādadhammāni āyatanānīti ācayena taṃpakatikaṃ āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:339_4: na ca tadā dhammo sabhāvaṃ vijahati nāma.
anya-e0104n:339_7: “Arūpadhammāna”nti idaṃ tesaṃ jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:340_2: rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya yena bhaṅgena na niccanti aniccaṃ,
anya-e0104n:340_4: Sā pana yasmā ṭhitippattaṃ rūpaṃ vināsabhāvena saṃsīdantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “saṃsīdanarasā”ti.
anya-e0104n:340_5: Yasmā ca sā rūpadhammānaṃ bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati,
anya-e0104n:341_1: Ojālakkhaṇoti ettha aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upathambhabalakaro bhūtanissito eko viseso ojā.
anya-e0104n:341_5: Idaṃ pana savatthukaṃ ojaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:341_6: Bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e0104n:341_9: Tato eva ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanena imassa kāyassa upathambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n:342_1: Balarūpantiādīsu imasmiṃ kāye balaṃ nāma atthi,
anya-e0104n:342_5: tehipi catūhi mahābhūtehi vinā abhāvato upādāyarūpehi bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:342_8: middhaṃ rūpameva na hoti nīvaraṇesu desitattā.
anya-e0104n:342_14: taṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ “na rūpa”nti? Taṃ na,
anya-e0104n:342_16: Na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:342_17: tasmā middhassa duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ.
anya-e0104n:342_18: Sakkā hi vattuṃ “yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:342_19: tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ middhaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:343_5: Appahātabbañca rūpaṃ “katame dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā?
anya-e0104n:343_10: Ime dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n:343_14: taṃ pajahathā”tiādīsu viya kāmacchandādīnaṃ tathā pahānassa anadhippetattā.
anya-e0104n:343_20: niddāhetubhāvato pana taṃ “niddā”ti vibhattaṃ yathā itthiliṅgādi.
anya-e0104n:343_21: Evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti?
anya-e0104n:343_24: Sā ca natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyati,
anya-e0104n:344_0: Niddā ca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana…pe…
anya-e0104n:344_5: Sakkā paccetuṃ “sakkharakathalikampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tiādi viya appasiddhatāya rūpabhāvassa.
anya-e0104n:344_6: Siddhe hi tassa rūpabhāve sambhavato yathālābhapaccayo yujjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n:344_7: Itopi na rūpaṃ middhaṃ āruppesu uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n:344_8: Vuttampi cetaṃ “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti imassa vibhaṅge
anya-e0104n:344_9: “āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti vitthāro.
anya-e0104n:344_10: Tasmā “na middhaṃ rūpa”nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:345_3: So ca atthato rūpadhammānaṃ vikārāvatthāṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu eva siyāti vuttaṃ “rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāgahaṇena gahitamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:345_5: Upādāvatthāya ca aññā jāti nāma nattheva.
anya-e0104n:345_6: Sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekacciyasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā pavattiākāravisesoti āha “sambhavarūpaṃ āpodhātuggahaṇena gahitamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:345_7: Kāyabalaṃ nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:345_10: Kasmā pana nesaṃ ayathākkamato paṭikkhepo katoti?
anya-e0104n:345_13: Tadanusārena paṭilomanayena itaresampi abhāvo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:346_2: So ca kho pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevāti anūnatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:347_6: sahetukapaṭiyogibhāvato hetunā saha na uppajjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n:347_8: Dhammanānattābhāvepi hi saddatthanānattena veneyyavasena dukantaradesanā hotīti dukapadavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:347_16: Ādisaddena saṃyojanīyaṃ oghanīyaṃ yoganīyaṃ nīvaraṇīyaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ acetasikaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n:347_17: narūpāvacaraṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ naapariyāpannaṃ aniyataṃ aniyyānikaṃ aniccanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:348_2: Taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā,
anya-e0104n:348_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttanayena ajjhattameva ajjhattikaṃ yathā venayikoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattika”nti.
anya-e0104n:348_17: rūpassa upacayo”tiādinā aggahetvā attano sabhāveneva kakkhaḷattādinā ñāṇena paricchijja gahetabbato.
anya-e0104n:348_20: Sotādīnampi cakkhuno viya pasannasabhāvattā eva yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇapaccayatāti dassento āha “cakkhādi…pe…
anya-e0104n:348_23: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ādhipateyyaṃ tesaṃ paṭumandabhāvānuvattanato,
anya-e0104n:348_27: Kammanibbattañhi “mametaṃ phalaṃ”nti kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti apaṭikkhepato.
anya-e0104n:349_11: Tassa rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “saha nidassanena sanidassana”nti.
anya-e0104n:349_12: Dhammabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,
anya-e0104n:349_13: so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
anya-e0104n:349_14: Evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. Yo sayaṃ,
anya-e0104n:349_23: Kammato jātanti ettha yaṃ ekantakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhindriyāni,
anya-e0104n:349_25: yañca navavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ navavidhameva rūpanti evaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhampi kammato uppajjanato kammajaṃ.
anya-e0104n:349_26: Yañhi jātañca yañca jāyati yañca jāyissati,
anya-e0104n:349_32: lahutādittayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ pañcadasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ cittajaṃ.
anya-e0104n:349_35: āhārasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ āhārajaṃ.
anya-e0104n:349_36: Ettha saddaṃ pakkhipitvā terasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ utujaṃ.
anya-e0104n:350_4: Yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ adakkhi yaṃ passati yaṃ dakkhissati yaṃ passeyya,
anya-e0104n:350_5: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma diṭṭhasabhāvānātivattanato yathā duddhanti.
anya-e0104n:350_9: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattayanti gandho raso phoṭṭhabbanti etaṃ tayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:351_10: Na hi sītaṃ nāma koci guṇo atthi,
anya-e0104n:351_14: Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhitānaṃ chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti,
anya-e0104n:351_21: anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya uttarameva.
anya-e0104n:351_25: ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ sītatā upalabbheyya,
anya-e0104n:351_30: Te vattabbā “dravabhāvopi phusīyatīti āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:356_0: Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ rūpādisattavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n:356_2: Avadhāraṇena rūpāyatanādīnampi manoviññāṇaviññeyyatte niyamābhāvato na viññātarūpatāti saṅkarābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:357_0: Nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāmāti yadettha aṭṭhavīsatividhe rūpe “nipphanna”nti vuttaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:357_4: rūpaguṇayogato vā yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīlaṃ vatthanti.
anya-e0104n:357_5: Svāyaṃ rūpasaddo ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi pavattatīti aparena rūpasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “rūparūpa”nti yathā tilatelaṃ,
anya-e0104n:358_3: Tattha hadayarūpaṃ vatthu eva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:358_5: Yathā hi cakkhādīni sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pavattiyā dvāraṃ honti,
anya-e0104n:358_14: Sesaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato neva vatthu na ca dvāraṃ.
anya-e0104n:359_2: Nanu ca ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti natthīti?
anya-e0104n:359_5: Na hi rūpuppatti rūpajanakato aññaṃ paccayaṃ apekkhati.
anya-e0104n:359_10: Cittato ca ututo ca jātanti kālena cittato,
anya-e0104n:359_11: kālena ututoti evaṃ cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:360_0: Vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti hi evaṃ pavattamahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānassa saddassa viññattiyā vināpi uppatti icchitabbā.
anya-e0104n:360_1: Na hi viññatti “kāyavācāya viññattī”ti vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:360_4: na sotaviññeyyo cā”ti viruddhamevetanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0104n:360_5: Apare pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā tassa adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇenti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0104n:360_6: “Jivhātālucalanādikaṃ vitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte,
anya-e0104n:360_7: paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti.
anya-e0104n:361_0: Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana nakutocijātanti kutocipi paccayato na jātaṃ,
anya-e0104n:361_1: nāpi sayameva jātaṃ paccayehi vinā sayameva jātassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:361_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ na jāyatīti?
anya-e0104n:361_4: Uppattimantānaṃ hi rūpāyatanādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjanti,
anya-e0104n:361_7: Siyā panetaṃ “jātiādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjantī”ti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
anya-e0104n:362_1: Asati uppāde kuto jarāmaraṇanti mattaggahaṇena jarāmaraṇassa uppādābhāvampi.
anya-e0104n:362_2: Yadi evaṃ jātiyā kutoci jātatāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:362_3: Tattha kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattāti ye te cittādayo rūpāyatanādīnaṃ rūpānaṃ janakapaccayā,
anya-e0104n:362_4: tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ yo so paccayabhāvūpalakkhaṇīyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo,
anya-e0104n:362_5: tadā jāyamānānaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya veneyyapuggalavasena
anya-e0104n:362_6: jātiyā kutoci paccayato jātattaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ yathā taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatādi viññattiādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n:362_9: tesaṃ paccayabhāvūpagamanakkhaṇe upalabbhamānā rūpādayo tato pure,
anya-e0104n:362_10: pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā tato uppajjantīti viññāyanti,
anya-e0104n:362_12: Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyato jātiyā kutoci jātatā siddhā,
anya-e0104n:362_15: Yadi hi dhammo viya upalabbheyya jāti,
anya-e0104n:363_0: Tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ “ayaṃ jāti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhavo,
anya-e0104n:363_1: sayañca na kutoci jāyati yathā taṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakatī”ti,
anya-e0104n:363_2: taṃ nesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento satthā “upacayo santatī”ti dvidhā bhinditvā kutoci paccayato jātañca katvā desesi,
anya-e0104n:363_3: na pana jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe adassanato.
anya-e0104n:363_5: Yasmā paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripākabhaṅgatāya tesu santesu honti,
anya-e0104n:363_9: tasmā taṃ jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya “jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti pariyāyena suttesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:363_10: Yo panettha kāmabhavādīsu kammādinā paccayena yonivibhāgato paṭisandhiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:363_12: so parato paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissatīti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:366_1: Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānadīpakena padadvayena vedayitassa bahubhedataṃ dassento vuccamānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ ulliṅgeti.
anya-e0104n:366_4: pubbe vā rūpakkhandhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ adhikārato ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:366_5: Ekato katvāti atītādibhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ buddhiyā ekato katvā.
anya-e0104n:366_8: “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”nti ca ādinā saññuppādavasena jānanaṃ gahaṇaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:366_12: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā.
anya-e0104n:366_13: Minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya yena sañjānanākāravisiṭṭhena ākārena visayaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n:366_14: taṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhisaṅkhātaṃ vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:366_15: Itare vedanākkhandhādayo suviññeyyā hontīti viññāṇena ekuppādādibhāvato,
anya-e0104n:367_0: Attanā “vijānanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:367_3: Dhammasabhāvā vinimutto koci kattā nāma natthīti tasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vijānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:368_2: Sā panāyaṃ jāti kāmaṃ anekavidhā nānappakārā,
anya-e0104n:368_8: Ārogyaṭṭhenāpi hi kusalaṃ vuccati “kacci nu bhoto kusala”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0104n:369_0: Saddatthato pana kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kammeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n:369_4: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
anya-e0104n:369_6: Yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti,
anya-e0104n:369_7: evamidaṃ uppannānuppannavasena ubhayabhāgagataṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati,
anya-e0104n:369_9: Kucchitānaṃ vā sāvajjadhammānaṃ salanato saṃvaraṇato kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n:369_11: appavattibhāvāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā saṃvutā pihitā honti.
anya-e0104n:369_12: Kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati kampeti apanetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n:369_13: Kucchitānaṃ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā,
anya-e0104n:369_15: Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatā,
anya-e0104n:369_17: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni,
anya-e0104n:369_21: adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa rūpārūpappabandhassa sampati,
anya-e0104n:369_22: āyatiñca anudahanena vināsanato kuṃ siyantīti kusā, rāgādayo,
anya-e0104n:369_23: te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n:369_24: Payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindantīti.
anya-e0104n:370_2: Na kusalanti hi kusalapaṭikkhepena akusalapadassa avayavabhedena atthe vuccamāne yathā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ na arogaṃ,
anya-e0104n:370_11: taṃ akusalaṃ nāmāti ayampi attho dassito hoti.
anya-e0104n:370_12: Ettha ca yasmā kusalaṃ akusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0104n:370_14: tasmā akusalaṃ pana kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti vuttaṃ “kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n:371_5: Eteneva arogasarogādibhāvena ca avuttatā vaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:371_6: Ettha ca “kusalaṃ akusala”nti ca vatvā “abyākata”nti vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttatā viññāyati,
anya-e0104n:371_9: atha kho tadubhayavinimuttasabhāvatāya tesaṃ dhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:372_1: Bhūmibhedatoti bhavanti ettha dhammāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:372_3: Avatthāpi hi avatthāvantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati,
anya-e0104n:372_9: Kāmāvacaranti ettha vatthukāmo kilesakāmoti dve kāmā.
anya-e0104n:372_10: Tesu vatthukāmo visesato pañca kāmaguṇā kāmīyantīti,
anya-e0104n:372_12: Te dvepi sahitā hutvā yattha avacaranti,
anya-e0104n:372_16: Idaṃ yebhuyyena tattha avacarati pavattatīti kāmāvacaraṃ ekassa avacarasaddassa lopaṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n:373_0: Somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedatoti ettha somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā,
anya-e0104n:373_8: somanassena uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:373_15: Yassa hi catusampatticakkasamāyogādivasena yonisova ābhogo hoti,
anya-e0104n:373_16: kusalameva ca mayā kattabbanti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:373_17: akusalappavattito ca nivattetvā kusalakaraṇe eva pariṇāmitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:373_19: tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhādisampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:374_4: anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjaṭṭhānāni sikkhāpetīti evamādikaṃ paññāsaṃvattaniyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n:374_5: tassa kammūpanissayavasena kusalacittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:374_6: Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa upapattiṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:374_7: Vuttañhetaṃ “tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, dandho,
anya-e0104n:374_10: atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesabhāgī hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:374_11: Tathā paññādasakapattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:374_16: Attano vā parassa vā samussāhajanitaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkharaṇaṃ saṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n:374_18: Tena pana saha saṅkhārena pavattatīti sasaṅkhāraṃ.
anya-e0104n:374_20: Vippayogoti cettha ñāṇassa abhāvo appavattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:374_23: Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
anya-e0104n:374_24: Atha vā iṭṭhe ca aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā,
anya-e0104n:375_0: Evaṃ aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni uddisitvā idāni tesaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yadā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:375_3: Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti ettha aññaggahaṇena saddhābahulatā,
anya-e0104n:375_9: saddena na kevalaṃ “atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādīnaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:375_12: Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya sampayogassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n:375_13: Asaṃsīdantoti silokamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāyaṃ saṃsīdaṃ saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanto,
anya-e0104n:376_0: Dānādīnīti dānaṃ sīlaṃ yāva diṭṭhijukammanti imāni dānādīni dasa puññāni,
anya-e0104n:376_1: dānādīnīti vā dānasīlabhāvanāmayāni itaresampi sattannaṃ etthevantogadhattā.
anya-e0104n:376_9: Sadisampi hi “tadevā”ti voharīyati yathā “sā eva tittirī,
anya-e0104n:376_11: Imasmiñhi attheti līnassa cittassa ussāhanapayogasaṅkhāte atthe.
anya-e0104n:376_13: Pubbapayogassāti puññakiriyāyaṃ saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittapayogassa,
anya-e0104n:376_14: pubbaggahaṇañcettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so saṅkhāro hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:376_16: “Atthi dinna”ntiādi nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā asambhavadassanatthaṃ bāla- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:376_19: Somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:377_1: Tayidaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacaraṃ kusalacittaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ
anya-e0104n:377_2: vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena
anya-e0104n:377_4: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni cattāri yadā tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ uppādenti,
anya-e0104n:377_8: Ahetukaṃ pana paṭisandhiṃ tihetukāni na uppādenteva,
anya-e0104n:377_11: Tihetukā pana paṭisandhi duhetukehi na hotiyeva.
anya-e0104n:377_13: Aññena pana kammunā “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato
anya-e0104n:377_15: Imasmiṃ ca pakkhe balavatā paccayena uppannaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ,
anya-e0104n:377_17: Ye pana āgamanato ca vipākassa asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhāvaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0104n:377_20: Evaṃ tidhā phalaṃ dadantañcetaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ upapattiṃ,
anya-e0104n:377_22: Nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hi yaṃ devabhogasampattisadisaṃ bhogajātaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:377_24: Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhaṃ phalaṃ atthīti.
anya-e0104n:378_5: Yathā vā taṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhadhā bhijjati,
anya-e0104n:378_7: idaṃ pana tato aññathā vāti vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti.
anya-e0104n:378_17: katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “seyyathida”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:378_20: Tayidaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā vuttanayena pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ ālambitvā yathārahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:378_21: hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ panetaṃ yathākkamaṃ brahmapārisajjādīsu soḷasasupi brahmalokesu upapattinipphādakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:379_3: Arūpānaṃ vā yo ārammaṇādikato sampayuttadhammehi yogo yogabhedo,
anya-e0104n:379_11: ākiñcaññāyatananti imāni ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ uppajjitvā catūsu arūpībrahmalokesu paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyīni.
anya-e0104n:379_16: Catumaggasampayogatoti sotāpattimaggo yāva arahattamaggoti imehi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogato.
anya-e0104n:379_17: Catubbidhampi cetaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā nibbānaṃ ālambitvā suññato vimokkho,
anya-e0104n:380_1: Kāmāvacaramevāti ettha nikāyantariyā rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ kāmāvacaraggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:380_2: Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ pavattivipākaṃ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti dassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:380_10: Ettha hi kāmataṇhāvisayatā “kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ” vuttā yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā “rūpārūpāvacarabhāvassa”.
anya-e0104n:380_14: evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā.
anya-e0104n:381_0: Pariyāpannāti ca paricchedakārikāya taṇhāya paricchijja āpannā,
anya-e0104n:381_6: Nayidamevaṃ avīciādiekaādasokāsaninnatāya kañci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya
anya-e0104n:381_8: Nikkhepakaṇḍepi “etthāvacarā”ti vacanaṃ avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:383_0: Somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedatoti somanassupekkhābhedato diṭṭhigatabhedato saṅkhārabhedatoti paccekaṃ bhedasaddo yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:383_6: na ettha gantabbavatthu tathā sabhāvanti diṭṭhigataṃ.
anya-e0104n:384_2: Tāya hi vipallatthacittā sattā “etāvako jīvavisayo yāva indriyagocaro”ti paralokaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi
anya-e0104n:384_3: kāmesu ādīnavo”ti yathā tathā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjanti. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:384_8: tena te mātaripi mithunaṃ carantī”tiādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ saggamokkhamaggoti evamādikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:385_9: Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotīti evamādike micchāgāhe saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:385_12: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kurūrena.
anya-e0104n:385_19: saddena parasantakassa vā ayathādhippetatāya yaṃ laddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:386_6: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti,
anya-e0104n:386_8: Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0104n:386_10: taṃ mandameva hotīti katvā tathāvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:387_4: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kīdise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
anya-e0104n:387_7: Aññesu akusalacittesu labbhamānampi uddhaccaṃ visesato ettheva balavaṃ,
anya-e0104n:387_8: tato eva sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva uddhaccena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasampayutta”nti.
anya-e0104n:387_9: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ idha sarūpato uddhaccaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n:388_0: Tayidaṃ dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n:388_1: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena yathārahaṃ pāṇātipātādikammapathavasena ceva kammavasena
anya-e0104n:389_0: Tattha ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ sesaṃ ekādasavidhampi catūsupi apāyesu paṭisandhiṃ deti,
anya-e0104n:389_3: kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sabbadubbalaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ paṭisandhiṃ deti,
anya-e0104n:389_4: adhimokkhasabbhāvato tato balavantampi uddhaccasahagataṃ na detīti?
anya-e0104n:389_6: Idaṃ hi paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ apāyesu dadeyya,
anya-e0104n:390_1: puthujjanassa uppajjamānaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanappahātabbasahāyasabbhāvato ubhayavipākampi deti,
anya-e0104n:390_9: paṭṭhāne bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vattabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n:390_13: evampi tasmiṃ tike tassa navattabbatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n:390_16: Cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatānaṃ dvādasannaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā vibhajitvā dassetabbassa niyogato kassaci cittuppādassa abhāvā,
anya-e0104n:390_17: yathā uppannattike atītādīnaṃ navattabbatā na vuttā,
anya-e0104n:390_19: Atha vā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyassāpi tassa puthujjane vattamānassa bhāvanāya pahātabbasabhāvasāmaññato,
anya-e0104n:390_20: sāvajjato ca bhāvanāya pahātabbapariyāyo vijjatīti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgadoso.
anya-e0104n:390_21: Nippariyāyena ca na bhāvanāya pahātabbanti tassa vasena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvopi na vutto.
anya-e0104n:390_23: na kocipi bhāvo anuppādadhammataṃ tassa āpāditoti ekantena bhāvanāya pahātabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:390_24: Atha vā apāyagamanīyabhāvāpekkhaṃ dassanappahātabbavacananti tadabhāvato taṃ vibhajanaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0104n:391_3: Aññathā rūpanibbānānampi abyākatabhāvato taṃ catubbidhanti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:391_7: Vipākassa hi sahetukatā sahetukakammavasena sijjhamānāpi sampayuttahetuvaseneva vuccati,
anya-e0104n:391_9: Kasmā pana sahetukassa ahetuko vipāko hotīti?
anya-e0104n:391_11: Kiñca ārammaṇābhinipātamattesu pañcasu viññāṇesu yathā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:391_12: evaṃ mandataramandakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti hetūnaṃ uppattiyā asambhavatopi nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:392_0: Manoviññāṇato uppajjanavisiṭṭhamananakiccānaṃ abhāvato manomattā dhātu manodhātu.
anya-e0104n:393_0: Cakkhusannissitaṃ hutvā rūpassa vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:393_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena rūpārammaṇaṃ aññaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n:393_5: Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā,
anya-e0104n:393_8: Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā,
anya-e0104n:393_11: ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti “ārammaṇena vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatī”ti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:393_12: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:394_2: rūpaṃ pana anekameva saṃhatanti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:394_3: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:394_6: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti,
anya-e0104n:394_9: Yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa paccayo hotīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:394_10: taṃnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā arūpabhāvato,
anya-e0104n:394_11: atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
anya-e0104n:394_12: Itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:394_13: Svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”ti ekavacanena niddeso kato.
anya-e0104n:395_0: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā,
anya-e0104n:395_1: tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:395_4: tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya yaṃ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa
anya-e0104n:395_6: Tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhivasena ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
anya-e0104n:395_7: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
anya-e0104n:395_11: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti
anya-e0104n:396_0: Yaṃ pana “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:396_2: Tampi yādisaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:396_6: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇārammaṇā,
anya-e0104n:396_11: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n:396_12: na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti?
anya-e0104n:396_13: Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ asamatthānaṃ sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato.
anya-e0104n:396_14: Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0104n:396_15: tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā.
anya-e0104n:397_2: evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti.
anya-e0104n:397_3: Na hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci visesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:397_4: Tenāha bhagavā “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
anya-e0104n:397_5: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gayhatīti vuttaṃ “rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:397_6: Attano anantaraṃ uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ samanantaravigatā arūpadhammā pavattiokāsadānena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi
anya-e0104n:397_7: upakārakā nissayārammaṇadhammā viya āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya kiriyamanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:398_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādigahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantī gaṇhantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā”ti.
anya-e0104n:399_1: tato vā katipayānaṃ vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato,
anya-e0104n:399_5: “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekanteneva hadayavatthusannissayatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:399_7: Tassā bhedoti tassā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā “duvidhā”ti vuttāya duvidhatāsaṅkhāto bhedo.
anya-e0104n:399_10: Pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne cāti ettha pañcadvāre sampaṭicchanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ antarāḷaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:399_14: paṭisandhiāvajjanānaṃ tadārammaṇāvajjanānaṃ javanāvajjanānaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānañca antarāḷaṃ bhavaṅgassa,
anya-e0104n:399_15: tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṃ javanapaṭisandhīnaṃ vā antarāḷaṃ cutiyā ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:400_0: Chasūti ettha pubbe vuttanayeneva vibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:400_1: Kāyassa nissayabhūtānaṃ nātiiṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbabhūtānaṃ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsassa balavabhāvato kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:401_2: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya somanassādibhedatoti yathā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:401_8: Tathā hi kusalaṃ kammadvāravasena pavattati, na idaṃ,
anya-e0104n:401_10: Uppattidvāravasena pana imassāpi attheva pavattibhedo pañcadvāramanodvāresu mahāvipākānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pavattisambhavato.
anya-e0104n:401_15: ekaccapavattiākārato ca visadisataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:402_1: Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n:402_2: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ āgamanavasena.
anya-e0104n:402_3: Ekaccānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n:402_6: Tesaṃ hi vasena kusalato vipākassa visesābhāvo.
anya-e0104n:402_7: Nirussāhanti ettha ussāho nāma anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānasantāne vipākuppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhāto byāpāro,
anya-e0104n:402_9: Kusalesu pana abhiññāvasapavattesupi atthevāti taṃ saussāhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:403_1: alobhādīnampi ekantaanavajjasabhāvānaṃ kāraṇassa tabbidhuratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvoti āha “akusalavipākaṃ ahetukamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:403_3: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasabbhāvato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā,
anya-e0104n:403_6: aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo atthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekamevāti “sattavidha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:403_7: Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:403_8: na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n:404_1: Upekkhā hīnāti ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato upekkhāpi samānā hīnā eva dukkhasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n:404_6: Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti.
anya-e0104n:404_7: Upekkhābhāvo cassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalassa purisassa tena kariyamānabādhāya upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:405_7: Tasmā yathā “mātaraṃ payirupāsatī”ti vutte attano mātaranti avuttampi siddhamevetaṃ,
anya-e0104n:405_8: evaṃ idhāpīti attano kusalaṃ viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:405_11: Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale labbhanti,
anya-e0104n:405_21: Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ vipākaṃ deti.
anya-e0104n:405_22: Kammanimittārammaṇatā ca rūpāvacaravipākassa vuttāti na taṃ aññaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0104n:405_24: Jhānassa ānisaṃsabhūtañca dānādīnaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve paccayalābho viyāti.
anya-e0104n:406_1: kusalassa ca attheva bhedoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:407_3: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyaṃ aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā “dvidhā pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:407_7: catubbidhameva lokuttaravipākanti sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena chattiṃsavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:408_3: Hotu tāva sekkhānaṃ uppajjamānaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato saphalaṃ,
anya-e0104n:408_14: kusalākusalaṃ viya kiñci vipākaṃ anuppādetvā kiriyāmattameva hutvā pavattanakaviññāṇanti attho.
anya-e0104n:408_15: Kasmā panetaṃ vipākaṃ na uppādetīti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n:408_17: taṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattaṃ anāsevanatāya dubbalabhāvato abījasāmatthiyaṃ viya pupphaṃ aphalameva hoti.
anya-e0104n:408_18: Yaṃ pana ucchinnabhavamūlāyaṃ santatiyaṃ pavattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:408_19: taṃ samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ viya phaladāyi na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:408_20: Aññassa asambhavato kiriyahetunā nāma alobhādināva bhavitabbanti āha “alobhādikiriyahetuvirahita”nti.
anya-e0104n:409_1: Ayaṃ pana manoviññāṇato uppannāpi visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvena manomattā dhātūti manodhātu.
anya-e0104n:409_2: Tathā hesā manoviññāṇassa paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0104n:409_8: Apubbārammaṇā sakideva pavattamānā sabbathā visayarasaṃ anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
anya-e0104n:410_2: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasāti pañcadvāre santīraṇena gahitārammaṇaṃ vavatthapentī viya pavattanato voṭṭhabbanarasā,
anya-e0104n:410_4: Tathābhāvena pañcadvāramanodvāresu yathākkamaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:410_5: Voṭṭhabbanakāle santīraṇakiccānaṃ tissannaṃ ahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ āvajjanakāle yassa kassaci
anya-e0104n:410_6: bhavaṅgassāti imesaṃ aññatarāpagamo etissā āsannakāraṇanti āha “ahetuka…pe…
anya-e0104n:411_6: Aññānipi hi dvādasa somanassasahagatāni parittakusalākusalakiriyacittāni yathārahaṃ puthujjanādīnaṃ hasituppādakāni vijjanti,
anya-e0104n:411_7: idaṃ pana cittaṃ vicāraṇapaññāvirahitaṃ parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānaṃ somanassamattaṃ uppādentaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:411_9: taṃ atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n:411_10: kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato vicāretabbanti eke.
anya-e0104n:411_11: Tattha hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n:411_12: anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho.
anya-e0104n:411_13: Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:411_15: aññathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya.
anya-e0104n:411_16: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti.
anya-e0104n:412_0: Ayamettha visesoti ayaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ uppattiyā vipākuppādanasamatthatā,
anya-e0104n:412_1: arahataṃ uppattiyā tadabhāvoti ubhayesaṃ santāne uppattisamupalakkhito ettha kusalakiriyaviññāṇesu viseso.
anya-e0104n:412_2: Evañca katvā paccayavekallena avipākassāpi kusalākusalassa kiriyabhāvappasaṅgo nivattito hoti.
anya-e0104n:412_3: Parato kusalato visesoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n:413_1: Sabbānipi kusalākusalabyākatāni ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:413_2: Paṭisandhiviññāṇādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nāma bhavantarapaṭisandhādinā ākārena pavatti eva.
anya-e0104n:413_3: Tabbinimuttañca cittassa aññaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti āha “cuddasahi ākārehi pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:414_1: Katūpacitaṃ hi kammaṃ avasesapaccayasamavāye vipākaṃ dentaṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ vissajjantaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:414_2: Devamanussesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca.
anya-e0104n:414_3: Kammakammanimittagatinimittānanti ettha kammaṃ nāma katūpacitaṃ kāmāvacarakusalakammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:415_0: Evaṃ tāvetthāti ettha viññāṇakkhandhaniddese evaṃ saṅkhepato sarūpadassanamatteneva ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:416_0: Taṃ tanti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhiviññāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:416_2: Tassa tassevāti yassa yassa kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:416_16: tathā hidaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgabhāvena pavattanato “bhavaṅga”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:417_2: Mātukucchigatakāle viya hi bahinikkhantakālepi na tāva indriyāni sakiccakāni honti,
anya-e0104n:417_3: anukkamena pana visadabhāvaṃ pattakāle eva sakiccakāni honti.
anya-e0104n:417_6: Tameva yogyadesāvaṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ paṭicca ghaṭṭanā paccayaṃ laddhā.
anya-e0104n:417_8: yena byāpārādivisesapaccayantarasahite cakkhussa visaye vikāruppattivisadisuppattivisayassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvena anuggaho,
anya-e0104n:417_13: tathā dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyā visadisassa kāraṇabhāvūpagamananti attho.
anya-e0104n:417_14: Tañhi cittasantānassa purimāvatthāya bhinnāvatthāhetutāya calanaṃ viyāti “calana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:417_15: Visayavisayībhāvasiddhāya dhammatāya ārammaṇassa abhimukhībhāvena pasādassa tāva ghaṭṭanā hotu,
anya-e0104n:417_16: aññasannissitassa pana bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ kathaṃ hotīti?
anya-e0104n:417_18: Bheritale ṭhapitāsu sakkharāsu ekissā sakkharāya ghaṭitāya tadaññasakkharāyaṃ ṭhitamakkhikā calanaṃ cettha udāharaṇanti.
anya-e0104n:417_19: Tadeva rūpanti tadeva bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhūtaṃ āpāthagataṃ rūpāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:417_20: Bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viyāti bhavaṅgasantānaṃ vicchindantī viya.
anya-e0104n:417_21: Tadārammaṇuppattiyā parato bhavaṅgassa uppajjanato visayaggahaṇaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0104n:417_22: dassanādīsu vattabbesu tāni avatvā manodvārāvajjanassa gahaṇaṃ uddese dvinnaṃ āvajjanānaṃ āvajjanasāmaññena
anya-e0104n:418_2: tesaṃ “sampaṭicchanāya cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādinā tattha tattha pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0104n:419_0: “Sace mahantaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ javanapariyosānāya cittappavattiyā vuccamānattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:419_2: tañca uppajjitvā dviticittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā āpāthagamanavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:421_1: Ito aññaṃ manodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ uppajjanakacittaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ evakāraggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:421_5: Yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayanti yaṃ yaṃ javanaṃ rūpāvacarajavanādivasena gotrabhuanantaraṃ uppattiyā laddhapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:422_7: Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukakammanibbattaṃ mahaggatānuttarajavanaṃ anubandhati ajanakattā,
anya-e0104n:422_9: Yathā gehato bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako janakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:422_12: Tatthāpi na sabbasmā javanā sabbaṃ javanena tadārammaṇassa niyametabbato,
anya-e0104n:422_17: tathā parittakusalākusalaupekkhāsahagatakiriyajavanānaṃ aññatarānantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aññataraṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n:422_21: Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti,
anya-e0104n:422_23: Taṃ pana paṭisandhidāyinā kammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato visadisampi nibbattetīti.
anya-e0104n:422_27: Tañhi attano ukkaṭṭhatarassa tadārammaṇassa paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0104n:422_28: Yo yo paccayo laddho hotīti yathāvuttesu iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu yo yo tadārammaṇassa uppattiyā paccayo samaveto hoti.
anya-e0104n:423_0: Dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vāti vacanasiliṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ “aṭṭha vā dasa vā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n:423_4: mūlabhavaṅgādibhavaṅgasāmaññasabbhāvato ca bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa
anya-e0104n:423_5: ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti tadārammaṇanti vuccati ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “kāmāvacaraṃ,
anya-e0104n:423_7: Ettha ca keci “paṭṭhāne ‘kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī’ti vipākadhammadhammānaṃ
