anya-e0104n:423_8: eva anantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vutta”nti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ na icchanti.
anya-e0104n:423_9: Vipphāravantaṃ hi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati,
anya-e0104n:423_10: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttikiriyajavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi.
anya-e0104n:423_11: Tayidaṃ labbhamānassāpi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati,
anya-e0104n:423_12: yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto.
anya-e0104n:423_16: gati ca visadisīti nāvāya nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:424_0: Bhavaṅgamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ bhavapariyosānassa idha na adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n:424_8: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacittāni viya ekūnavīsatividhameva hoti atthato bhedābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:425_7: Ettha etesu vuttanayena saṃsaramānesu sattesu yo pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti sammāpaṭipattimanvāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:425_8: Tassa arahato niruddhameva hoti cittaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:428_3: Taṃ pana atthato vedanā evāti āha “vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:428_4: Atha vā vedayitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti kappanāsiddhaṃ bhedaṃ nissāya aññapadatthasamāsavasenāpi vedanāva
anya-e0104n:428_6: Vedayati vedayatīti byāpanicchāvasena vacanaṃ vedanāya savisaye abhiṇhappavattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:428_7: Sabhāvadhammato añño kattā natthīti dassanatthaṃ kattuniddeso.
anya-e0104n:429_0: “Kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā”ti idaṃ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:429_4: Na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:429_10: Sabhāvabhedatoti sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṃ bhedaṃ aggahetvā kevalaṃ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.
anya-e0104n:430_14: dukkhañca vibhajitvā vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti,
anya-e0104n:430_18: Yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti,
anya-e0104n:431_1: sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:431_3: Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā ayokūṭena paharantassa picupiṇḍaṃ atikkamitvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n:431_6: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ hoti. Aniṭṭhe,
anya-e0104n:431_14: yathārahaṃ cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena somanassasahagatāni hontīti āha “somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta”nti.
anya-e0104n:432_0: Avasesapañcapaññāsāyāti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya.
anya-e0104n:432_1: Tattha kusalākusalavipākāni iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikappakāni sukhadukkhasampayuttāni bhavituṃ yuttānipi dvinnaṃ
anya-e0104n:432_2: picupiṇḍānaṃ viya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ ghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa mandabhāvato cakkhādisannissitāni
anya-e0104n:432_9: Kammavasena vā vipākānubhavanassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu adukkhamasukhabhāvo yutto.
anya-e0104n:432_10: Sati ca vipākabhūtāya upekkhāya sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāve kammārammaṇavasena kusalavipākāya iṭṭhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:432_12: Avasiṭṭhāni pana sattatiṃsa viññāṇāni cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena upekkhāsampayuttāni hontīti
anya-e0104n:432_13: evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya viññāṇehi upekkhāya sampayuttatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:433_1: anubhavanañca sabbavedanānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti taṃ paṭiniyatena ārammaṇena niyametvā dassento āha
anya-e0104n:433_6: Idantu nibbikappakaṃ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha “sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasa”nti.
anya-e0104n:433_16: so eva assādo tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti kāyikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:435_1: parikappato vā iṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:435_3: yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā iṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa saṃbhuñjanarasaṃ,
anya-e0104n:435_5: “Passaddhipadaṭṭhāna”nti idaṃ “passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī”ti suttapadaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:436_1: Domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṃ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.
anya-e0104n:437_1: ārammaṇassa majjhattaṃ vā vedayitaṃ anubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n:437_3: “Santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ anavajjāya nirāmisāya upekkhāya vasena veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:441_1: tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:441_2: Saññāya pana īdisaṃ natthīti āha “na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:442_1: Atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito vuttā,
anya-e0104n:442_4: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n:442_5: Tathā hi sā abhiññāṇena sañjānanato paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:442_7: Tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:442_15: nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya saññāya samānaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:442_21: Eteneva samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:445_5: Tattha saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā attano phalaṃ saṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:446_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato niyatā.
anya-e0104n:446_1: Sarūpena āgatāti evaṃ piṭṭhivattake akatvā pāḷiyā sarūpeneva āgatā.
anya-e0104n:447_5: Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā viya honti.
anya-e0104n:447_12: saṅghaṭṭanarasādiko ca hotīti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā tassa sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:447_13: Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:447_14: Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppatti,
anya-e0104n:447_16: rukkhasākhagge duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa bhīrukapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:447_17: pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ disvā ūrukhambhoti evamādīsu paribyattā hoti.
anya-e0104n:448_4: Yathā rūpasaddā cakkhusotāni anallīyamānā eva “phusita”ntiādinā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:448_9: vatthārammaṇasannipātena vā sampajjatīti saṅghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso vutto.
anya-e0104n:448_10: Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇissa pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā,
anya-e0104n:448_11: evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:448_12: “Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgativasena gahetabbattā āha “tikasannipātasaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:448_13: Tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpo samannāhāro tajjāsamannāhāro.
anya-e0104n:448_15: āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ visayassa parikkhatatā abhisaṅkhatatā,
anya-e0104n:448_17: Yathā niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatā,
anya-e0104n:448_20: Vedanā ca dukkhasallādisabhāvāti vuttaṃ “vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo”ti.
anya-e0104n:449_5: Āyūhanarasāya cetanāya pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathāsakaṃ kiccappasutā hontīti sā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:449_6: Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati.
anya-e0104n:449_9: Sā hi sayaṃ ādarabhūtā sampayuttadhamme ādarayatīti.
anya-e0104n:450_3: Vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ, ussāho,
anya-e0104n:450_6: Upatthambhanaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:450_18: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya vicaranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
anya-e0104n:450_20: pāripūri”nti evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni,
anya-e0104n:451_1: Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro,
anya-e0104n:451_2: tañca nesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:451_3: Tampi cassa atthato jīvanamevāti āha “jīvanamattameva vā ta”nti.
anya-e0104n:452_6: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n:453_1: Saddahanti etāyāti saddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:453_2: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati puggalo saddahatīti vohāro hoti.
anya-e0104n:453_7: puggalasseva vā pasādanaṃ anāvilabhāvakaraṇaṃ raso etissāti pasādanarasā.
anya-e0104n:454_1: Saranti tāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:454_2: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo saratīti vohāro hoti.
anya-e0104n:454_3: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ saraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:454_7: Aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti visayābhimukhabhāvo, sati.
anya-e0104n:454_9: sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:455_5: Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti.
anya-e0104n:455_6: Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti.
anya-e0104n:455_14: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hiriottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā,
anya-e0104n:455_20: sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī”ti suttapadaṃ attādhipati,
anya-e0104n:455_22: so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā”ti ca suttapadāni āharitvā vattabbāni.
anya-e0104n:456_1: Yasmā lobhapaṭipakkho alobhoti ye dhammā tena sampayuttā,
anya-e0104n:456_2: taṃsamaṅgino vā sattā tena na lubbhanti,
anya-e0104n:456_4: atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca hoti,
anya-e0104n:456_6: Eseva nayoti “na dussanti tenā”tiādinā kārakattayayojanaṃ atidisati.
anya-e0104n:458_7: Sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtāti sabbesaṃ catubhūmakakusaladhammānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena patiṭṭhābhūtā,
anya-e0104n:458_9: Yadi hi tesaṃ kusalabhāvo kusalamūlapaṭibaddho siyā,
anya-e0104n:458_10: evaṃ sati taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na siyā.
anya-e0104n:458_11: Na hi te tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti,
anya-e0104n:458_13: Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0104n:458_16: Tathā sati ahetukacittānaṃ abyākatabhāvo eva na siyā,
anya-e0104n:459_3: so ca kho vedanādikkhandhattayavasenāti āha “kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti.
anya-e0104n:459_4: Tenevāha “tattha katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti?
anya-e0104n:459_8: tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:459_11: uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:460_2: tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:461_3: Thaddhabhāvanimmaddanato eva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:461_4: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:462_10: Suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti yathā suvaṇṇavisuddhi apagatakāḷakā alaṅkāravikativiniyogakkhamā,
anya-e0104n:463_6: na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
anya-e0104n:464_6: asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya”nti evaṃ vuttā tadākārappavattā akusalā khandhā,
anya-e0104n:464_8: Ettha ca cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva passaddhaṃ, lahu, mudu,
anya-e0104n:465_4: “chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādīsu vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:465_6: Cetasikassa ca dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ālambanassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
anya-e0104n:465_11: tadaggena sampayuttānampi hotiyeva ekārammaṇatāya tena tesaṃ.
anya-e0104n:465_12: Tenevāha “ārammaṇaggahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo”ti.
anya-e0104n:465_13: Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchandoti vuccati yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0104n:466_3: Yathā tathā vā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu,
anya-e0104n:466_5: saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n:466_6: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato ttamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:466_10: Dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa “karissāmi na karissāmī”ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā asaṃsappanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:467_3: Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato,
anya-e0104n:467_4: tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti.
anya-e0104n:467_6: Visadisamananti vīthijavanaṃ manaṃ karotīti manasikārasāmaññena vīthijavanapaṭipādake dasseti.
anya-e0104n:468_0: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇo vutto.
anya-e0104n:468_2: manasikārassa pana saṃyojanavasena ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n:468_4: jotetīti tathājotitaṃ taṃ viññāṇakkhandhe otāretvā dassetuṃ “vīthipaṭipādako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:469_1: Tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā,
anya-e0104n:469_3: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsinabhāvato “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:469_5: Udāsinabhāvena pavattamānāpi hesā sampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti,
anya-e0104n:469_6: yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu appamatte pavatteti.
anya-e0104n:469_15: idaṃ atirekatarakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto,
anya-e0104n:470_3: Upekkhāti yaṃ upekkhaṃ mettāya saddhiṃ parikappenti,
anya-e0104n:471_3: Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena kāyaduccaritādito eva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:471_4: Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
anya-e0104n:472_5: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n:473_0: Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti ettha kathaṃ karuṇāmuditāupekkhāsahagate sambhavantīti?
anya-e0104n:473_2: Appanāppattā eva hi karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagatā na honti,
anya-e0104n:473_3: tato aññattha pana upekkhāsahagatāpi hontīti ācariyā.
anya-e0104n:474_2: nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ samucchindanapaṭippassambhanavasenāti mahaggatacittuppādesu viratīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha “ṭhapetvā viratittaya”nti.
anya-e0104n:474_5: Yadi eva rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha “arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n:475_1: Maggaviññāṇeti catubbidhepi maggaviññāṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:475_4: “Vuttanayenā”ti vuttaṃ kiṃ avisesenāti codanāyane taṃ dassento “karuṇāmuditāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:475_6: karuṇāmuditānañca sattārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ tattha sambhavo.
anya-e0104n:475_7: Maggadhammesu ca pādakādiniyamena kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā,
anya-e0104n:475_8: na pana virativiraho kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchindanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti niyataviratitā.
anya-e0104n:476_1: Na hiriyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:476_3: “Ahirikka”nti vattabbe ekassa kakārassa lopaṃ katvā “ahirika”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:476_14: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti,
anya-e0104n:476_15: salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hotīti evaṃ vuttappaṭipakkhavasena vitthāro veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:477_5: Ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:478_4: Yathā ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labbhati,
anya-e0104n:480_1: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:481_2: na mānādīti thinamiddhassa aniyatatā ca ettha dutiyacitte paṭhamākusalato viseso.
anya-e0104n:482_4: Yasmā tato eva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti,
anya-e0104n:482_16: Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto.
anya-e0104n:482_21: tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:483_3: Paṭṭhāne hi “saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”ti ettha catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena,
anya-e0104n:483_4: tikkhattuṃ paṭighena ca māno vicikicchā bhavarāgoti tayopete sakadāgāmino saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi dasavidhā
anya-e0104n:483_5: yojanāti dassitāya dasavidhāya yojanāya “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana”nti
anya-e0104n:483_6: vatvā “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti tathā “mānasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
anya-e0104n:483_7: avijjāsaṃyojana”nti (paṭṭhā 3.4.1) vatvā “bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti ca evamāgatāhi
anya-e0104n:483_12: Evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā,
anya-e0104n:483_15: Evañca saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā,
anya-e0104n:483_21: Omānassāpi attānaṃ avaṃ katvā gahaṇampi sampaggahaṇavasenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:483_25: Taṃ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ketuṃ kāmetīti ketukamyaṃ, cittaṃ.
anya-e0104n:483_28: “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattīti so diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ ekacittuppāde na pavattati,
anya-e0104n:485_7: parassa ca upabhogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabboti sabbena sabbaṃ aggahetabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:487_1: Maccharayogena “maccharī”ti pavattamānaṃ maccharisaddaṃ gahetvā āha “maccharabhāvo macchariya”nti.
anya-e0104n:487_2: Niruttinayena pana mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu,
anya-e0104n:487_4: Taṃ macchariyaṃ vuccamānāni lakkhaṇādīni pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:488_2: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ,
anya-e0104n:488_7: taṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ pana cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha “kukata”nti gahetvā “tassa bhāvo kukkucca”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:488_9: Yathāpavattassa katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa duccaritasucaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ vippaṭisāro.
anya-e0104n:488_11: Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti,
anya-e0104n:488_13: Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:488_14: Atha vā katākatākusalakusalānusocane āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hotīti.
anya-e0104n:489_0: Aniyatesu issādīsu thinamiddhasambhavova cāti ca-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:490_2: “Nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viyā”ti hi evaṃ vuttacittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho
anya-e0104n:490_6: na sabbathā vicikicchāya cikicchābhāvatoti tadatthamattaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:490_10: Uddhaccañhi attanā gahitākāre eva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanavasena pavattati.
anya-e0104n:490_11: Vicikicchā pana yadipi rūpādīsu ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:490_14: aññaṃ nu kho”ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n:490_16: Anekaṃsassa ārammaṇe nānāsabhāvassa gahaṇākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti anekaṃsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n:491_2: Nanu ca paññattiārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā”ti.
anya-e0104n:491_3: Viratiyopi vipākesu na santīti etthāpi nanu kesuci vipākesu viratiyopi santīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevāti hi vutta”nti,
anya-e0104n:491_4: tena lokiyavipākesu viratiyo na santīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:492_0: Tesanti rūpāvacarādivipākaviññāṇānaṃ. Janetabbajanakasambandhe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:493_5: samānā”ti vatvā tato labbhamānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “manoviññāṇadhātudvaye panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:493_6: Vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti “vīriyantaṃ bala”nti katvā.
anya-e0104n:494_0: Samucchedaviratīhi eva arahantānaṃ viramanakiccassa niṭṭhitattā kiriyacittesu viratiyo na santīti āha “ṭhapetvā viratiyo”ti.
anya-e0104n:494_2: mahaggatesu pana tādisopi natthīti āha “sabbākārenapī”ti, dhammato,
anya-e0104n:498_1: Bhagavatā pana evaṃ khandhā vitthāritāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:498_2: Tasmā imāyapi pāḷiyā vasena khandhānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:498_3: Yaṃ kiñcīti ettha yanti sāmaññena aniyamadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:498_6: santike vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ sabbaṃ byāpetvā gaṇhātīti āha “anavasesapariyādāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:498_7: Evaṃ pana aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ aticca pavattanato atippasaṅgassa
anya-e0104n:498_8: niyamanatthaṃ rūpanti vuttanti dassento “rūpanti atippasaṅganiyamana”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:498_12: saddañca ekaṃ padanti gahetvā aniyamekatthadīpanato “padadvayenāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:499_2: saddo vattatīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādisuttavasena viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:499_3: Tathā hi bhaddekarattasuttepi “atītaṃ nānvāgameyyā”tiādinā addhāvaseneva atītādibhāvo vutto. “Tayome,
anya-e0104n:499_6: Atīto addhā anāgato addhā paccuppanno addhā”ti pana paramatthato paricchijjamāno addhā niruttipathasuttavasena khaṇaparicchinno vutto.
anya-e0104n:499_14: Tadaññasuttesu pana yebhuyyena cutipaṭisandhiparicchinno atītādiko addhā vuttoti so eva idhāpi “addhāvasenā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n:500_3: uṇhaṃ vā sarīre sannipatitaṃ santānavasena pavattamānaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ ekākāraṃ,
anya-e0104n:500_4: taṃ eko utūti vuccatīti sabhāgautuno anekattā eka-
anya-e0104n:500_20: Evaṃ utuādīnaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgatāsambhavato taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgo vutto,
anya-e0104n:500_21: kammassa pana ekabhavanibbattakassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā natthīti taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena
anya-e0104n:500_27: balavatā kusalena purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhavatīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānampi attheva visabhāgatāti tesampi santativasena atītādivibhāgo sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:500_28: so pana na sabbakālikoti na gahito.
anya-e0104n:501_0: Taṃtaṃsamayanti ekamuhuttādiko so so samayo etassāti taṃtaṃsamayaṃ, rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:502_0: Tato pubbeti tato khaṇattayassa pariyāpattito pubbe.
anya-e0104n:502_13: yasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0104n:502_17: pacchā atīta”nti vacanaṃ addhādīsu viya bhedābhāvato nippariyāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:502_18: Addhādivasena hi aññeva dhammā atītā aññe anāgatā aññe paccuppannā labbhanti,
anya-e0104n:502_24: addhāpaccuppannādi viya kenaci pariyāyena atītamanāgatanti ca vattabbatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:503_1: Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ajjhattikabāhirabhedaṃ sandhāya “vuttanayo evā”ti vatvā tena aparitussamānena yadipi tattha
anya-e0104n:503_5: Tathā hi ajjhattikasaddo saparasantānikesu cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu bāhirasaddo viya pavattati,
anya-e0104n:503_6: ajjhattasaddo pana tassa tassa sattassa sasantānikesveva cakkhurūpādīsu tato aññesu bahiddhāsaddo viya pavattati.
anya-e0104n:504_9: Yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe,
anya-e0104n:504_10: evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭhe eva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:506_0: Tattha manāpānipi kānici hatthirūpādīni akusalakammanibbattāni santi,
anya-e0104n:506_1: na pana tāni tesaṃyeva hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0104n:506_2: Tassa tasseva hi sattassa attanā katena kusalena nibbattaṃ sukhassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:506_4: Tasmā kammajānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā kammakārakasattassa vasena yojanārahā siyā.
anya-e0104n:506_5: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n:506_6: na ca vuttaṃ “akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n:506_7: tena akusalakammajampi sobhanaṃ parasattānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ atthīti anuññātaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0104n:507_3: tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:507_4: tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hoti.
anya-e0104n:507_5: Kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa ca iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabbo.
anya-e0104n:507_6: Hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:507_8: Iṭṭhārammaṇena pana vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0104n:507_9: vipākaṃ pana na sakkā vañcetunti vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0104n:507_11: taṃ rūpādibhāvasāmaññato kāmaguṇasadisatāya taṃsadisesu tabbohārena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:507_13: Kāmaguṇavisabhāgā vā rūpādayo “kāmaguṇā”ti vuttā asive sivoti vohāro viya,
anya-e0104n:507_14: sabbāni vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni rūpādīni taṇhāvatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā eva.
anya-e0104n:507_16: Atisayena pana kamanīyattā suttesu kāmaguṇāti iṭṭharūpādīni vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:508_0: Vuttanayamevāti abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha “okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā”ti.
anya-e0104n:508_1: Tattha kittakato paṭṭhāya rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma,
anya-e0104n:508_3: Pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasa hatthā savanūpacāro nāma,
anya-e0104n:508_6: Tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti,
anya-e0104n:508_7: santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti,
anya-e0104n:508_9: Oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti,
anya-e0104n:508_12: “Upādāyupādāyā”ti pana vuttattā attano rūpaṃ santike nāma,
anya-e0104n:509_6: dassitaṃ hotī”ti iminā rūpakhandhasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:509_7: Tenevāha “na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:510_0: 498. Rāsibhāvūpagamanena vedanākkhandhādayoti dassitā hontīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:511_1: khaṇādivasena cāti ettha addhāsamayavasena atītādivibhāgassa avacanaṃ sukhādivasena bhinnāya atītādibhāvavacanato.
anya-e0104n:511_6: tena vedanāsamudāyo addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvena vattabbataṃ arahati samudāyassa tehi paricchinditabbattā,
anya-e0104n:511_7: vedanekadesā pana gayhamānā santatikhaṇehi paricchedaṃ arahanti tathā paricchinditvā gahetabbato.
anya-e0104n:511_8: Ekasantatiyaṃ pana sukhādīsu anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0104n:511_10: avicchedena taduppādakekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n:511_11: lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ arahantīti santatikhaṇavaseneva paricchedo vutto.
anya-e0104n:512_1: Sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ “sāvajjakiriyahetuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:512_16: Vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā,
anya-e0104n:512_17: saussāhā eva ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre “savipākato” icceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:512_21: abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato.
anya-e0104n:512_23: Tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati,
anya-e0104n:512_32: Kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato nirussāhā vipākā.
anya-e0104n:513_7: Santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti “yathāyoga”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:513_8: Pākaṭatoti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:514_2: ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:516_3: sukhumā”ti ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti,
anya-e0104n:516_5: Jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:516_6: Evaṃ sukhādayopīti ettha akusalā vedanā jātivasena oḷārikā,
anya-e0104n:516_9: samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:516_10: “Na parāmasitabbo”ti etena jātiādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā.
anya-e0104n:516_16: evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo sabbatthā”ti atidisati.
anya-e0104n:517_0: Idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:517_8: tato asaṅkhārikāti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:518_3: Bhāvanāmayāpīti bhāvanāmayāya bhedanena dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:518_4: Bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā”ti.
anya-e0104n:519_0: Sabbo cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha “okāsavasena cāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:519_4: Yathānurūpanti yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati,
anya-e0104n:519_6: Vatthuvasenāti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vedanā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:519_8: Hīnavatthukāti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya oḷārikā.
anya-e0104n:520_6: dūravipariyāyena santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati,
anya-e0104n:520_8: Santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca “sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā”ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:520_10: Sabbavāresūti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu.
anya-e0104n:523_10: Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti dvīhi ākārehi ñāṇena passitabbato.
anya-e0104n:524_2: dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ pahānakkamo.
anya-e0104n:524_6: anupubbapaṇītā bhūmiyo anupubbena vavatthitāti ayaṃ bhūmikkamo.
anya-e0104n:524_10: Uppattiādivavatthānahetukatāya hi “paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotī”tiādikā desanāpi samānā uppattiādikamabhāveneva vuttā.
anya-e0104n:524_11: Yathāvuttavavatthānābhāvena pana anekesaṃ vacanānaṃ sahapavattiyā asambhavato yena kenaci pubbāpariyena
anya-e0104n:524_12: desetabbatāya tena tena adhippāyena desanāmattasseva kamo desanākkamo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:524_17: Sati hi sabbesaṃ pahātabbatāya pahānakkamena nesaṃ desanā siyā.
anya-e0104n:525_0: Abhedenāti rūpādīnaṃ bhedaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā ekajjhaṃ piṇḍaggahaṇena.
anya-e0104n:525_2: Samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanenāti rūpato arūpaṃ vivecento rūpārūpasamūhe ghanavinibbhujjanadassanena.
anya-e0104n:525_3: Cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūtanti ekadesena samudāyabhūtaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n:525_6: ayaṃ vedanākkhandhoti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ vedanaṃ desesīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:525_10: Saññāya gahitākāre visaye abhisaṅkhārappavattīti āha “saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake”ti.
anya-e0104n:526_1: Rūpakkhandhe “sāsavaṃ upādāniya”nti vacanaṃ anāsavānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabbhāvato rūpakkhandhassa taṃsabhāvatānivattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:527_0: Anāsavāva khandhesu vuttāti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva- saddo,
anya-e0104n:527_2: Idha pana visuddhimagge sabbepete khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi.
anya-e0104n:528_2: Sabhāgasabhāvena hi saṅgayhamānā sabbasaṅkhatā pañcakkhandhā honti.
anya-e0104n:528_4: Tesu saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ āyūhanarasāya cetanāya balavanti sā “saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:528_5: Aññe ca ruppanādivisesalakkhaṇarahitā phassādayo saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0104n:528_6: phusanādayo pana sabhāvā visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyā na hontīti dhammasabhāvaññunā tathāgatena phassakkhandhādayo na vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:528_9: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti,
anya-e0104n:528_10: sabbe te ime eva pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya paṭicca,
anya-e0104n:528_11: etesaṃ vā aññatara”nti evamādisuttānañca vasena attattaniyagāhassa etapparamatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:528_12: Etena ca vakkhamānasuttavasena ca khandhe eva nissāya parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā ca diṭṭhi uppajjati
anya-e0104n:528_16: “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādi vacanato aññesañca khandhasaddavacanīyānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ sabbhāvato
anya-e0104n:529_3: Rāgādisampayuttassa vipariṇāmādidukkhassa itthipurisādiākāragāhikā taṃtaṃsaṅkappamūlabhūtā saññā samuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:529_6: Cittassa aṅgabhūtā cetasikāti viññāṇaṃ gilānūpamaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:529_7: Kuṭṭharogavato siniyhanaṃ tassa bhiyyobhāvāya viya bālassa puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena pavatti vedanādukkhāvahā asappāyasevanasadisī.
anya-e0104n:530_3: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti āsīvisūpame vadhakāti vuttā,
anya-e0104n:530_9: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:530_13: “so aniccaṃ rūpaṃ ‘aniccaṃ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā yamakasutte aniccādikāti.
anya-e0104n:530_14: Yadipi “idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:530_15: bāhullena pana upādānakkhandhānaṃ tadantogadhānaṃ daṭṭhabbatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:531_0: Pheṇapiṇḍo viyātiādīsu rūpādīnaṃ evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādisadisatā daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0104n:531_3: chiddāvachiddo anekasandhisaṅghaṭito bahūnaṃ pāṇakānaṃ āvāso anupubbūpacito sabbāvatthanipātī avassaṃbhedī,
anya-e0104n:531_4: evaṃ rūpampi niccasārādivirahato nissāraṃ pheggu viya,
anya-e0104n:531_6: niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:531_8: bahuchiddaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ anekakimikulāvāsaṃ kalalādivasena anupubbūpacitaṃ kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsupi avatthāsu vinassati,
anya-e0104n:532_7: udakajallikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca jāyati,
anya-e0104n:532_12: Yathā hi udakatale bindunipātajanito vāto udakajallikasaṅkhātaṃ udakalasikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā pubbuḷaṃ nāma karoti,
anya-e0104n:532_13: evaṃ vatthumhi ārammaṇāpāthagamanajanito phasso anupacchinnaṃ kilesajallaṃ sahakārīpaccayabhāvena saṅkaḍḍhitvā vedanaṃ nāma karoti.
anya-e0104n:532_15: ārammaṇassādanabhūtehi ca nibbattaṃ vaṭṭagataṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:533_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n:533_3: Yathā ca marīcikā vipphandamānā sañjātūmivegā viya khāyantī mahājanaṃ vippalambeti,
anya-e0104n:533_4: evaṃ saññāpi “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādinā ārammaṇe pavattamānā sabhāvamatte aṭṭhatvā “subhaṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0104n:534_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n:534_5: Na hi taṃ niccādivasena gahetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n:534_10: te pana sabbe samodhānetvā saṅkhārakkhandhoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:535_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā kiñci atthaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n:535_2: ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā amaṇiādimeva maṇiādirūpena dassentī mahājanaṃ vañceti,
anya-e0104n:536_0: Pañcapi upādānakkhandhā asubhādisabhāvā eva saṃkilesāsucivatthubhāvāditoti asubhādito daṭṭhabbā eva,
anya-e0104n:536_1: tathāpi katthaci koci viseso sukhaggahaṇīyo hotīti āha “visesato cā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:536_2: Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhānā catuvipallāsappahānakarāti tesaṃ gocarabhāvena rūpakkhandhādīsu asubhādibhāvena daṭṭhabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:537_4: Te hi āyatimpi khandhehi na bādhīyantīti.
anya-e0104n:538_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānātīti “āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti vacanato ajjhattikarūpe chandarāgaṃ pajahanto
anya-e0104n:538_1: tassa samudayabhūte kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti attho.
anya-e0104n:538_3: Ajjhattikarūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto tassa paccayabhūtaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhātīti ñātapariññā.
anya-e0104n:538_4: Tassa ca udayabbayānupassī hotīti tīraṇapariññā ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:538_5: Evaṃ pariññattaye sijjhante ime vipallāsādayo vidhamīyanti evāti āha “asubhe subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:538_9: Na upādiyati na gaṇhati na uppādeti.
anya-e0104n:539_0: “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti vuttattā “vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā paccayabhūte phassāhārepi chandarāgaṃ
anya-e0104n:539_2: Vedanāya dukkhato dassanena tattha sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:539_3: Sukhatthameva bhavapatthanā hotīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahanto bhavoghaṃ uttarati.
anya-e0104n:539_6: sabbavedanaṃ dukkhato passanto attano parena apubbaṃ dukkhaṃ uppāditaṃ,
anya-e0104n:539_8: tato “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādi āghātavatthuppahānato byāpādakāyaganthaṃ bhindati.
anya-e0104n:539_9: “Sukhabahule sugatibhave suddhī”ti aggahetvā gosīlagovatādīhi suddhiṃ parāmasanto sukhapatthanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n:539_10: parāmasatīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahantopi sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
anya-e0104n:540_1: saññā pana taṃsampayuttāti saññāsaṅkhāre anattato passanto manosañcetanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0104n:540_5: Saññāsaṅkhāre anattāti passanto attadiṭṭhimūlakattā sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ viya sabbadiṭṭhiyopi vidhamatīti dassento “diṭṭhoghaṃ uttarati…pe…
anya-e0104n:541_0: Viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto aniccānupassanāmukhena tissopi anupassanā ussukkanto tīhipi pariññāhi viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti.
anya-e0104n:541_1: Visesato panettha anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:541_2: Tattha niccaggāhabāhullato avijjāya viññāṇe ghanagahaṇaṃ hotīti ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā taṃ aniccato passanto avijjoghaṃ uttarati.
anya-e0104n:541_3: Tato eva avijjāyogena visaṃyutto avijjāsavena anāsavo ca hoti.
anya-e0104n:541_4: Mohabaleneva sīlabbataparāmasanaṃ hotīti taṃ pajahanto “sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ bhindati.
anya-e0104n:542_11: assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n:543_0: Vacanato yathā viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyati,
anya-e0104n:543_1: evaṃ taṃ aniccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyatīti.
anya-e0104n:551_5: byañjanaṃ cakkhatī”ti rasasāyanattho atthīti tassa vasena atthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n:551_8: rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”nti vacanato cakkhu rūpaṃ assādeti.
anya-e0104n:551_9: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve yo “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:551_11: tattheva niruḷhattā cakkhumhi eva cakkhusaddo pavattati gavādīsu gosaddādi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:552_4: Nettassa ca vadantassa viya samavisamavibhāvanameva ācikkhananti katvā āha “vibhāveti cāti attho”ti,
anya-e0104n:552_5: anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatā ca cakkhati-
anya-e0104n:552_8: uddarūpaṃ viya ca vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayati rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n:552_12: Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:552_15: Udāharīyatīti vuccatīti atthe vacanasaddo eva gahito siyā,
anya-e0104n:553_0: Sūcayatīti attano vatthuṃ apākaṭaṃ gandhavasena “idaṃ sugandhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:553_4: ambādī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:553_5: Rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitahetumhi āhārarase ninnatāya jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā niruttilakkhaṇena.
anya-e0104n:553_6: Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti visesena kāyo vutto anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n:553_7: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesatarasāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n:553_8: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
anya-e0104n:553_10: kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti vuttāti tesaṃ uppattiṭṭhānanti attho.
anya-e0104n:554_1: mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti attho.
anya-e0104n:554_3: taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paricchedavasena jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:554_4: Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti ye visesalakkhaṇena āyatanasaddaparā vattabbā,
anya-e0104n:554_5: te cakkhādayo tathā vuttāti tato aññe manogocarabhūtā dhammā sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva ekāyatanabhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:554_6: Yathā hi oḷārikavatthārammaṇamananasaṅkhātehi visayavisayībhāvehi purimāni pākaṭāni,
anya-e0104n:554_7: tathā apākaṭā ca aññe manogocarā na attano sabhāvaṃ na dhārentīti imassa atthassa dīpanattho dhammasaddo.
anya-e0104n:554_9: Yathā hi rūpādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīhi asādhāraṇato eva yathāsakaṃ sabhāvato viññāyanti,
anya-e0104n:555_5: Imasmiṃ ca atthe āyatanti etthāti āyatanānīti adhikaraṇattho āyatanasaddo,
anya-e0104n:555_8: Te hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇesu ayanti gacchanti pavattantīti āyā.
anya-e0104n:555_9: Vitthārentīti pubbe anuppannattā līnāni apākaṭāni pubbantato uddhaṃ pattharenti pākaṭāni karonti,
anya-e0104n:555_13: Āyatanaṃ āyatananti āmeḍitavacanaṃ assā samaññāya cakkhādīsu niruḷhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:556_1: Evaṃ avayavabhedavasena āyatanasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyatopi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:557_2: Yattha suvaṇṇaratanādīni nivutthāni viya ākiṇṇāni tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:557_4: evaṃ cittacetasikā cakkhādīsūti te tesaṃ ākaroti dassento āha “cakkhādīsu ca…pe… ākaro”ti.
anya-e0104n:557_5: Tannissitattāti ettha mano manoviññāṇādīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ nissayapaccayo na hotīti tassa tesaṃ dvārabhāvo nissayabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:557_6: Ahutvā eva paccayasāmaggivasena uppajjantāpi cittacetasikā aneke ekajjhaṃ tattha labbhamānā samosaṭā
anya-e0104n:557_8: Na hi dhammānaṃ anāgataddhe vijjamānatālesopi atthi.
anya-e0104n:557_10: Tattheva uppattitoti tesu cakkhādīsu eva uppattito.
anya-e0104n:557_11: Uppattiyā paccayabhūte cakkhādike uppattiṭṭhānaṃ viya katvā upacāravasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:557_12: Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ nippariyāyato uppattideso nāma atthi.
anya-e0104n:557_15: Na hi paccayabhāvamantarena rūpadhammānampi ādhārādheyyabhāvo atthi.
anya-e0104n:558_3: Dhammāyatanapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahubhāvato yebhuyyena ca te bahū eva hutvā kiccakarāti “dhammā ca te āyatanañcā”ti bahuvacananiddeso.
anya-e0104n:559_0: 513. Tathā tathā lakkhitabbato lakkhīyati etenāti vā lakkhaṇaṃ, sabhāvo.
anya-e0104n:560_2: Tattha dvādasāyatanavinimuttassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvā adhikabhāvato codanā natthi,
anya-e0104n:560_3: salakkhaṇadhāraṇaṃ pana sabbesaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti ūnacodanā sambhavatīti taṃ dassento āha “cakkhādayopi hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:560_6: na aññatthāti āvajjanassāpi kāraṇabhūtanti katvā vuttaṃ “bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto…pe…
anya-e0104n:560_9: Satipi asādhāraṇabhāve cakkhādīnaṃ dvārabhāvena gahitattā dhammāyatanena aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:561_2: Yebhuyyena hi cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n:561_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:561_4: Tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
anya-e0104n:561_11: visayībhāvena ca ajjhattikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ dasseti,
anya-e0104n:561_12: tesupi paṭhamaṃ desetabbesu pākaṭattā paṭhamataraṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ desitanti.
anya-e0104n:562_0: Tato ghānāyatanādīnīti ettha bahupakārattābhāvena cakkhusotehi purimataraṃ adesetabbāni,
anya-e0104n:562_1: saha vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ekena kamena desetabbānīti ghānādikkamena desitānīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:562_2: Aññathāpi hi desitesu na na sakkā codetuṃ,
anya-e0104n:562_3: na ca sakkā bodhetabbāni na desetunti.
anya-e0104n:562_4: Paccuppannārammaṇattā vā cakkhādīni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni ārammaṇato supākaṭānīti,
anya-e0104n:562_15: Ghānajivhāsupi ghānaṃ sīghataravuttīti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ purato ṭhapitamattassapi bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti.
anya-e0104n:562_23: Taṃtaṃgocarattā tassa tassa anantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:563_6: bāhirānañca paccayānaṃ bhedena cakkhāyatanaṃ bhinnaṃ visadisaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n:563_17: tasmā pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena aṭṭha lokuttaracittāni cattālīsaṃ hontīti tāni ekāsītiyā lokiyacittesu
anya-e0104n:563_29: Sabhāvanānattabhedatoti sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti evamādiko sabhāvabhedo.
anya-e0104n:564_1: “Anāgamanato aniggamanato”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:564_2: Pubbantāparantesu avijjamānasarūpattā udayato pubbe kutoci nāgacchanti,
anya-e0104n:564_3: vayato ca uddhaṃ na katthaci gacchanti,
anya-e0104n:564_8: tattha byāpāraṃ dassento āha “na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:564_10: Ubhayampi pana īhā ca hoti byāpāro cāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:564_17: channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0104n:564_18: Annapānasahitanti gahite suññagāme yaṃ yadeva bhājanaṃ parāmasīyati,
anya-e0104n:564_20: evaṃ dhuvādibhāvena gahitāni yoniso upaparikkhiyamānāni rittakāneva etāni dissantīti.
anya-e0104n:564_22: Cakkhādidvāresu abhijjhādomanassuppādakabhāvena rūpādīni cakkhādīnaṃ abhighātakānīti vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:567_4: cakkhu asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇakāraṇenāyaṃ niddeso yathā bherisaddo,
anya-e0104n:568_0: Vidahatīti evaṃ evañca tayā pavattitabbanti viniyuñjamānaṃ viya uppādetīti attho.
anya-e0104n:568_1: Vidahatīti ca dhātvattho eva visiṭṭho upasaggena dīpīyatīti vināpi upasaggena dhātūti esa saddo tamatthaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:568_2: Kattukammabhāvakaraṇādhikaraṇesu ca dhātusaddasiddhi hotīti pañcāpi te atthā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:568_8: Yathāsambhavanti ettha keci “lokiyalokuttarāsu dhātūsu yo yo attho sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:568_13: Kāmaṃ pañcapi atthā cakkhādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ icchitabbā,
anya-e0104n:568_14: tathāpi cakkhādīsu yassa yassa dhammassa yadā kattuvacanicchā,
anya-e0104n:569_1: Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyoti etthāpi dhātīti dhātūti padasiddhi veditabbā dhāraṇattho dhā-
anya-e0104n:569_3: Kattuatthopi cāyaṃ purimena asadiso vidhānadhāraṇatthānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n:569_4: Nissattasabhāvamattadhāraṇañca dhātusaddassa padhāno atthoti visuṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n:569_5: Dhātuyo viya dhātuyoti ettha sīhasaddo viya kesarimhi niruḷhā purise selāvayavesu niruḷho dhātusaddo cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:569_10: Atha vā ñāṇena ñātabbo sabhāvo aviparīto dhātusaddena vuccamāno ñāṇañeyyo,
anya-e0104n:569_13: visabhāgalakkhaṇāvayavesu rasādīsu niruḷho dhātusaddo tādisesu aññāvayavesu cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:569_14: Rasādīsu viya vā cakkhādīsupi niruḷho eva.
anya-e0104n:569_15: “Nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacana”nti etena nijjīvamattapadatthe dhātusaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:569_18: so chadhāturo channaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ nijjīvamattānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ samudāyamatto,
anya-e0104n:569_19: na ettha jīvo vā puriso vā atthīti attho.
anya-e0104n:570_1: Cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idhekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento āha “hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:570_10: ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dvārabhūtamanovasena vā.
anya-e0104n:570_11: Dvārabhūtamanopi hi suttesu manodhātūti vuccatīti tassā vā manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:571_1: Sabbāsaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ ābhādhātuādīnaṃ pañcatiṃsāya dhātūnaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n:571_2: Aparamatthasabhāvassa paramatthasabhāvesu na kadāci antogadhatā atthīti āha “sabhāvato vijjamānāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:572_0: Candābhāsūriyābhādikā vaṇṇanibhā evāti āha “rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātū”ti.
anya-e0104n:572_1: Rūpādipaṭibaddhāti rāgavatthubhāvena gahetabbākāro subhanimittanti katvā “rūpādayo evā”ti avatvā paṭibaddhavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:572_2: Asatipi rāgavatthubhāve kusalavipākārammaṇaṃ subhadhātūti dutiyo vikappo vutto.
anya-e0104n:572_5: Tadaññaviññāṇanirodho viya hi viññāṇadhātumanodhātūnaṃ nirodho samāpattibalasiddhoti katvā dhātudvayaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:573_3: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye etasmiṃ avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinne okāse.
anya-e0104n:573_4: Ogāḷhā hutvā adhobhāge ca okāse carantīti etthāvacarā.
anya-e0104n:573_5: Aññattha carantāpi yathāvutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannāti ettha pariyāpannā.
anya-e0104n:574_3: pabbajjato ca paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggādhigamā pavattā sabbepi anavajjadhammā.
anya-e0104n:575_2: “Nātihīḷitā nātisambhāvitā majjhimā”ti khandhaniddese āgatā hīnadukato eva nīharitvā majjhimā dhātu vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:576_1: tathāpi viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tassa purecārikapacchācārikattā manodhātu gahitāva hotīti āha “viññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n:576_4: tāsu ca ekekissā nānappakāratāya nānādhātūnaṃ vasena anekadhātu nānādhātu loko vuttoti āha “aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:577_3: Tattha na cakkhādīnaṃ kevalena dhātusaddena sambandho adhippeto vijānanasabhāvassa pabhedavacanato.
anya-e0104n:577_4: Viññāṇadhātusaddena ca sambandhe kariyamāne dve manogahaṇāni na kātabbāni.
anya-e0104n:577_10: Tassa viññāṇassa yebhuyyena attavādino tassa ekamekassa attassa advayataṃ,
anya-e0104n:577_11: niccattañca pavedentīti anekatāniccatāpakāsanaṃ tesaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhananāya hoti.
anya-e0104n:577_15: Abhidhamme vā suttantabhājanīye vuttā dhātudesanā atisaṅkhepadesanā,
anya-e0104n:579_5: Vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati vedanādīnaṃ abhinditvā gahaṇato.
anya-e0104n:581_1: Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā āsevanapaccayenāpi paccayo hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0104n:581_9: yā ca sampayogānantarabhāvādīnaṃ abhāvena ārammaṇakaraṇe yogyā.
anya-e0104n:581_11: manodvārikā pana vipākāpi tadārammaṇabhūtā ekaccaṃ dhammadhātuṃ ārabbha pavattatīti.
anya-e0104n:581_12: Atha vā “ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ abhiññādvayaṃ
anya-e0104n:581_14: lokuttaramanoviññāṇadhātuyā pana ekaccā dhammadhātu ārammaṇapaccayoti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n:581_15: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ yathāvuttapaccayadhammato atirekepi paccayadhamme dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:583_5: Ubhayattha ca saṅkhatā dhātuyo sabhāvavivittā anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n:583_6: Pubbanto vā sabhāvadhammassa udayo tato pubbe avijjamānattā.
anya-e0104n:583_8: Tasmā pubbantāparantavivittatoti pākābhāvato viddhaṃsābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:584_0: Bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudātu saddassa viya viññāṇassa nissayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:584_4: So hi acakkabaṇdhopi taṃsadisatāya cakkayaṭṭhītveva vuccati,
anya-e0104n:584_8: nijjīvānaṃ saddādīnaṃ viya nijjīvānaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ samāyoge nijjīvānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattīti kāraṇaphalānaṃ dhātumattataṃ,
anya-e0104n:585_0: Purecarānucarā viyāti nijjīvassa kassaci keci nijjīvā purecarānucarā viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:585_1: Manodhātuyeva vā attano khaṇaṃ anativattantī attano khaṇa anativattantānaṃyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ avijjamānāyapi
anya-e0104n:586_0: Channañhi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anekānantarapaccayābhāvato ekajjhaṃ uppattiabhāvo viya aññamaññānantarapaccayatābhāvato anantaruppattipi natthi.
anya-e0104n:586_4: tasmā dassanādianantaraṃ savanādīnaṃ abhāvo viya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ na dassanādīni,
anya-e0104n:586_8: dassanādīnaṃ anantarañca savanādīni na uppajjantīti yuttametaṃ.
anya-e0104n:586_10: pana santīramaṇassa ca abhinnavisayatāya dassanādianantaraṃ na manāviññāṇadātu hotīti ayuttanti?
anya-e0104n:586_12: Yadi ca dassanādianantaraṃ kāci viññāṇadhātu uppajjeyya,
anya-e0104n:586_15: tato ca dassanādikiccavidhuraṃ cintanaṃ manananti manodvārappavattānaṃ mananakiccāpariccāgo viya dassanaviññāṇadhātuyā dassanakiccāpariccāgo āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:586_16: Tathā tadanantarassāti sabbāyapi dassanaviññāṇabhāvato ca viññāṇakāyā na bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n:587_5: Yathā hi manaso nibbisesāvatthā mananamattatāya manodhātu,
anya-e0104n:587_6: evaṃ dassanassa nibbisesāvatthā dassanamattatāya dassanadhātu siyā.
anya-e0104n:587_7: Tañca cakkhūviññāṇaṃ rūpavisayanti saddādivisayābhogābhāvato savanaviññāṇādīnaṃ asambhavo.
anya-e0104n:587_8: Tato ca rūpārammaṇapasutameva viññāṇaṃ siyā manoviññāṇānaṃ viya dassanaviññāṇādīnaṃ samānavatthubhāvappasaṅgato,
anya-e0104n:587_13: na cassā upekkhāya viya adukkhamasukhatā adassanādiamananatā,
anya-e0104n:587_15: Mano hi hadayavatthumhi vattamāno aññavatthusannissitānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayaṃ dassetvā nivattamāno aggi viya usumamatte mananamatte ṭhatvā nivattati,
anya-e0104n:587_16: aññavatthusannissitaviññāṇanirodhe ca uṭṭhahanto aggi viya usumamatte uṭṭhahati.
anya-e0104n:587_17: Paccayānurūpapavattikāni ca mananamattāni manoviññāṇadhātuyā antāni honti.
anya-e0104n:587_20: Tasmā abhinipātappaccayapaṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsabalena bhavaṅgalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ calanāvatthaṃ hutvā nivattamānaṃ
anya-e0104n:588_0: Dassanādipi abhinipātamattaṃ dutiyaṃ khaṇaṃ anativattamānaṃ attānuguṇaṃ cintanāmananasamaññāvirahato
anya-e0104n:588_1: dassanādiabhinipātavisesavicittaṃ cittabhāvādinā samānaṃ cintanādimananamattaṃ aññavatthusmiṃ nibbatteti,
anya-e0104n:588_2: tasmā vatthukiccehi taṃ manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāpi manodhātu manodvāranikkhamapavesabhūtā ārammaṇantare
anya-e0104n:588_5: Sā panāyaṃ satipi viññāṇabhāve manaso sambhūya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato dhātubhāvasāmaññena manomattā dhātu manodhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:589_1: saddalopaṃ katvā viññāṇaṭṭhayogato manomattaṃ viññāṇanti manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahopi cassā yujjati eva.
anya-e0104n:589_2: Aññaviññāṇehi pana dvārārammaṇehi ca visesanatthaṃ “manodhātū”ti vuttāti.
anya-e0104n:589_4: Dhātuvisesanatthe ca manoviññāṇaggahaṇe viññāṇavisesanaṃ dvārabhūtamanodassanamevāti dvārasamaññārahattā na manodhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:590_2: Āturā viyāti tena āturibhūtā puggalā viya.
anya-e0104n:590_5: Saññā hi asubhādikampi subhādito sajjānantī āsaṃ,
anya-e0104n:590_12: Padumaṃ viya dissamānaṃ khuracakkaṃ viya rūpampi itthiādibhāvena dissamānaṃ nānāvidhupaddavaṃ janeti.
anya-e0104n:591_1: tena yathā araññamakkaṭo kenaci anivārito gahitaṃ ekaṃ rukkhasākhaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n:591_2: tampi muñcitvā aññanti katthaci anavaṭṭhito paribbhamati,
anya-e0104n:591_3: evaṃ gahitaṃ ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ,
anya-e0104n:591_5: ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatā ca makkaṭasamānatāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:596_4: Tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti cakkhundriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:596_25: ñātānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane aññātāvibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:597_5: Asammasanupagānampi atthibhāvato daṭṭhabbatā idha na gahitā.
anya-e0104n:598_3: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate maraṇanti amataṃ,
anya-e0104n:598_5: “Evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato”ti etena pubbabhāgavasenetaṃ indriyaṃ evaṃ voharīyatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:598_9: so aññātāvibhāvo pariniṭṭhitakiccajānanakhīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūto hutvā uppattito “khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:599_3: kiṃ vā liṅgīyatīti? Indaṃ, indo vā.
anya-e0104n:599_13: te ca dve atthā kamme eva yojetabbā,
anya-e0104n:599_19: “So taṃ nimittaṃ āsevatī”tiādīsu gocarakaraṇampi āsevanā vuttāti āha “kānici gocarāsevanāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:599_20: Tattha sabbesaṃ gocarikātabbattepi “kānicī”ti vacanaṃ avipassitabbānaṃ bahulaṃ manasikaraṇena anāsevanīyattā.
anya-e0104n:599_22: “Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato”tiādīsu bhāvanā āsevanāti vuttāti bhāvetabbāni saddhādīni sandhāyāha “kānici bhāvanāsevanāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:600_2: attano attano paccayavasena pavattamāne taṃsahitasantāne aññākārena appavattamānehi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyabhāve ādhipaccaṃ.
anya-e0104n:600_3: Imasmiṃ ca atthe indanti parimissariyaṃ karonticceva indriyāni.
anya-e0104n:600_4: Cakkhādīsu dassitena nayena aññesañca jīvitādīnaṃ tadanuvattīsu ādhipaccaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:601_1: tasmā tassa saṅkhārakkhandhakathāyaṃ vibhāvitāni lakkhaṇādīni tesañca veditabbānīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:601_2: Sesāni tattha khandhaniddese lakkhaṇādīhi arūpeneva āgatāni.
anya-e0104n:602_3: Aññesampi indriyānaṃ attabhāvapariyāpannatāya satipi attabhāvapaññāpanāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīnaṃ sātisayā
anya-e0104n:602_5: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ itthipurisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyadesanākkamo vuttoti idhāpi “tato jīvitindriya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:602_8: taṃ purimapacchimānaṃ ajjhāttikabāhirānaṃ anupālakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ tesa majjhe vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:602_12: tāva dukkhabhūtānaṃ etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivattīti ñāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:602_13: tena ca cakkhādīnaṃ dukkhānubandhatāya pariññeyyataṃ ñāpeti.
anya-e0104n:602_16: Tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattāti bhāvanāmaggasampayuttaṃ aññindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:603_6: na evaṃ sesānaṃ koci bhedo atthīti tesaṃ abhedoti bhedābhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n:603_9: yathā desitesu bāvīsatiyā indriyesu bhedābhedassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n:604_1: Cakkhundriyādīnaṃ satipi purejātādipaccayabhāve indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbameva kiccaṃ kiccanti vuttaṃ tassa anaññasādhāraṇattā,
anya-e0104n:604_6: Atha vā tikkhamandādisaṅkhātassa ca attākārassa ca anuvattāpanaṃ tikkha…pe…
anya-e0104n:604_8: Visuṃ attākāraggahaṇena cettha rūpāvabhāsanādikassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:604_9: Cakkhundriyassa hi rūpābhihananayogyatāsaṅkhāte rūpāvabhāsanasāmatthiye asati na kadācipi cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0104n:604_13: Taṃsampayuttānipi hi indriyāni tabbaseneva hutvā attano attano indriyakiccaṃ sādhenti cetasikabhāvato,
anya-e0104n:604_16: Sabbattha ca indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbanti adhikāro anuvattatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:604_18: anupatthambhane ca tappaccayānaṃ tappavattane nimittabhāvo anuvidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:605_0: Chādetvā pharitvā uppajjamānā sukhadukkhavedanā sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā ajjottharitvā sayameva pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0104n:605_1: sahajātadhammā ca tassā vasena sukhadukkhabāvappatā viya hontīti āha “yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpana”nti.
anya-e0104n:605_11: Katasabbakiccassa aññātāvindriyaṃ aññassa kātabbassa abhāvā amatābhimukhameva tabbhāvapaccayo ca hoti,
anya-e0104n:606_7: phale cāti aññesampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ kasmā na labbhati?
anya-e0104n:606_8: Paccayādhīnavuttikā hi paccayuppannāti siyā phalahetudhammesu anuvattanānuvattanīyatāti?
anya-e0104n:606_13: tassā visesanissayo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”ti tāni tāva ādhipaccattaṃ upādāya “cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…manindriya”ntiādito vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:606_14: Svāyaṃ attabhāvo imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti samaññaṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:606_16: ayaṃ so dhammo tesaṃ ṭhitihetūti dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:606_17: Svāyaṃ sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ vedanāpañcakaṃ.
anya-e0104n:606_20: visuddhippattā niṭṭhitakiccāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni tīṇi vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:607_0: Atha vā pavattinivattīnaṃ nissarādidassanattampi etāniyeva vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:607_1: Pavattiyā hi visesato mūlanissayabhūtāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni.
anya-e0104n:607_3: Tassa uppatti itthipurisindriyehi visabhāgavatthusarāganimittehi yebhuyyena sattakāyassa abhinibbatti.
anya-e0104n:607_5: sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti mātā ca utunī hoti,
anya-e0104n:607_15: Evaṃ pavattiyā nissayasamuppādaṭṭhitisambhogadassanattaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ yāva upekkhindriyanti cuddasindriyāni desitāni.
anya-e0104n:607_18: Vivaṭṭasannissitena hi nibbattitāni saddhādīni pañcindriyāni nivattiyā nissayo.
anya-e0104n:607_19: Uppādo anaññātaññassāmītindriyena tassa nivattivasena paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n:610_1: Ariyasaddena visesanaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ saccasaddena uddhiṭṭhānipi ariyasaccāni evāti dassento “saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti āda.
anya-e0104n:610_4: Ariyasaccesu vā vicāritesu itarānipi atthato vicāritāneva hontīti vipassanāya ca bhūmibhūtāni,
anya-e0104n:610_5: ariyasaccānevāti ca katvā “saccānī”ti uddharitvāpi “cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:611_2: Sakalañhi sāsanaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthi pavattinivattitadubhayahetusandassanavasena pavattanato.
anya-e0104n:612_8: Ettha ca pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhassa saraseneva āvibhavanākāro,
anya-e0104n:612_9: itare yathākkamaṃ samudayamagganirodhadassanehi āvibhavanākārāti ayaṃ catunnampi viseso.
anya-e0104n:612_10: Tatratrābhinandanavasena byāpitvā ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇaṃ dukkhassa nibbattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ ākārassa byāpanatthattā.
anya-e0104n:612_15: “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho.
anya-e0104n:612_21: sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ sabbasaṅkhatehi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggabhāvatoti nissaranaṃ.
anya-e0104n:613_6: kilesadukkhasantāpavūpasamane ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n:613_7: Visesato vā ālambanādhipatibhūtā maggadhammā honti “maggādhipatino”ti vacanatoti so tesaṃ ākāro ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n:613_13: So cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:614_0: 530. Kucchitaṃ khaṃ dukkhaṃ, gārayhaṃ hutvā asāranti attho.
anya-e0104n:615_1: saddassa ca payoge saṃyogatthassa anupalabbhanato, saṃ-
anya-e0104n:615_2: saddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanato “saṃyogaṃ dīpetī”ti āha anvayato,
anya-e0104n:615_4: Uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aya-
anya-e0104n:615_5: saddo gatiatthe siddho hetusaddoviya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n:615_9: Ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi upasaggasaddā sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:616_0: “Abhāvo ettha rodhassāti nirodho”ti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivittabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:616_1: Samadhigate tasmiṃ tadadhigamato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya nivattiyā adhigatattāti.
anya-e0104n:616_2: Etasmiñca atthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti nirodho icceva padasamāso.
anya-e0104n:616_7: na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ nirodhasaddaṃ nivattetvā anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:616_8: Etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalūpacāraṃ katvā nirodhapaccayo nirodhoti vutto.
anya-e0104n:617_1: Nanu ca sā eva dukkhanirodappattīti tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti?
anya-e0104n:617_5: Sacchi kiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānañhi aññatthābhāvepi puggalasacchikiriyādhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso katoti.
anya-e0104n:617_6: Atha vā yaṃ dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalaṃ,
anya-e0104n:618_1: Buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantīti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n:618_2: viya bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti purimakālepi āropetvā “buddhādayo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:618_3: Te hi buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti.
anya-e0104n:618_4: Tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti ettha ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti purimapade uttarapadalopo ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti attho.
anya-e0104n:618_7: tato eva ca aññehi adhigamanīrattā tāni tassa hontīti.
anya-e0104n:618_8: Ariyabhāvasiddhitopīti ettha ariyasādhakāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti pubbe viya uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:618_9: Ariyāni saccānītipīti ettha avitathabhāvena araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyāni,
anya-e0104n:618_10: ariyasamaññā vā avisaṃvādake avitathe niruḷhā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:619_4: cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanameva puggalassa santāpanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:619_6: Pavattinivattīsu saṃsāravimokkhesu pavatti hutvā gayhatīti pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:619_8: purimabhavena pacchimabhavo ghaṭito saṃyutto hutvā pavattatīti pabhāvo.
anya-e0104n:619_10: nibbattati dukkhamidaṃ punappuna”nti evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ anupacchedakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:619_14: Kiccanti ca cavanābhāvaṃ kiccamiva katvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:619_20: pavattato ca cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ hutvā gayhatīti vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:620_1: Asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ māyāti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:620_2: Udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānaṃ tucchā.
anya-e0104n:620_3: Vatthumattampi tassā na dissatīti visaṃvādikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:620_6: tena paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi gahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:620_14: atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttā jātiādikā lokapakati.
anya-e0104n:620_17: vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:621_0: Dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:621_1: nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya bādhikāti? Na,
anya-e0104n:621_5: Atha vā jātiādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:621_7: na dukkhappabhavatāti natthi taṇhāya pabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitāya bādhakabhāvapasaṅgo.
anya-e0104n:621_10: dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāranenāti attho.
anya-e0104n:622_1: na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n:622_2: tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya dukkhahetubhāvo atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacarādikusalehi vinā kāmāvacarādīhi ca taṇhāya dukkhanibbattakattā.
anya-e0104n:622_6: Tacchaniyyānabhāvattāti dvidhāpi niyāmena taccho niyyānabhāvo etassa,
anya-e0104n:622_8: na lokiyamaggassa viya vā anekantikatāya atacchoti tacchaniyyānabhāvo, maggo,
anya-e0104n:622_11: Sabbattha dvidhāpi niyāmena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo vuttoti āha “iti tacchāvipallāsā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:623_2: sambhavante vā atthe vatvā adhippetassa atthassa uddharaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ atthudvāro.
anya-e0104n:623_14: tassa pana taṃsampāpakassa ca maggassa pajānanā paṭivedho avivādakāraṇanti dvayampi “ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthi,
anya-e0104n:623_15: yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna”nti imissā gāthāya “sacca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:624_2: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti etena jātiādīnaṃ dukkhaariyasaccabhāve aviparītataṃ dasseti ekanteneva bādhakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:624_4: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti iminā dukkhaariyasaccabhāvassa jātiādīsu niyatataṃ dasseti anaññatthabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:624_6: paññāpane pana sahadhammena ñāpane attano vādassa patiṭṭhāpane samattho natthīti dassetuṃ “ahametaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:624_9: Jātiādīnaṃ anaññathatā aññassa ca tatābhūtassa abhāvoyevettha ṭhānābhāvo.
anya-e0104n:624_13: Tattha pana attabhāvapaṭilābheneva sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti,
anya-e0104n:625_1: Nibbutikāmena parijānanādīhi aññaṃ kiñci kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ natti,
anya-e0104n:625_4: Taṇhāya ādīnavadassāvīnaṃ vasena taṇhāvatthuādīnaṃ etaparamatāyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:625_7: bhavattayasaṅkhāte vā dukkhe dosadassāvīnaṃ vasena ālayādīnaṃ eteparamatāyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:626_1: “Oḷārikattā”ti idaṃ jātiādīnaṃ dukkhabhāvassa pacurajanapākaṭatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:626_6: Kāraṇe hi siddhe phalaṃ siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0104n:626_7: “Neva akataṃ āgacchatī”ti ca iminā ahetuvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n:626_11: “Sahetukena dukkhenā”ti etena dukkhadassanena janitassa saṃvegassa saṃvaḍḍhanamāha.
anya-e0104n:626_12: Dukkhassa hi sahetukabhāvasavasena balavasaṃvego jāyati yāvāyaṃ hetu,
anya-e0104n:626_14: Assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhanti saṃvegajātassa assāsaṃ janetuṃ nirodhasaccamāha.
anya-e0104n:626_15: Nibbinnasaṃsāradukkhassa hi nirodhakathā vuccamānā ativiya ativiya assāsaṃ sañjaneti.
anya-e0104n:627_1: Ye te jātiādayo dhammā bhagavatā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:627_9: dukkhaggahaṇena vā byādhi ettha hitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:627_10: Paramatthato hi dhātukkhobhapaccayaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ byādhīti.
anya-e0104n:627_11: Upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “dvādasa dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:627_12: Kāmataṇhābhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā “dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca”nti aññe antogadhabhede anāmasitvā ekarūpena gahitāpi taṇhā sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā,
anya-e0104n:627_14: diṭṭhivirahitā kevalaṃ kāmassādabhūtā cāti tidhāva bhinditvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:627_15: “Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti maggasaccabhāvena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttāpi sabhāvato bhinnā eva te dhammāti āha “aṭṭha dhammā”ti.
anya-e0104n:631_2: So hi jāyati ettha yonigatiādivibhāgoti jātīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:631_3: jāyanti ettha sattā samānanvayāti jāti, nikāyo.
anya-e0104n:631_7: Sampātijātoti ettha jātisaddena labbhamānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanasaṅkhātaṃ jāyanatthaṃ sandhāyāha “pasūtiya”nti,
anya-e0104n:632_2: mātukucchisaṅkhāto gabbho seyyā etesanti gabbhaseyyakā, aṇḍajā,
anya-e0104n:634_3: aññāsupi vā duggatīsu pāpakammasamuṭṭhānato sukhasaṃvattaniyakammasamuṭṭhānāsu pana sugatīsu kathanti.
anya-e0104n:634_5: na hi kāci paṭisandhi dukkhavedanāsampayuttā atthi,
anya-e0104n:634_6: atha kho dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato”ti dassento “anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:634_7: Adukkhasabhāvampi pariyāyato dukkhanti vuccatīti dukkhasabhāvaṃ dukkhasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “dukkhadukkha”nti yathā rūparūpanti.
anya-e0104n:635_0: Dukkhuppattihetutoti “ahu vata me, taṃ vata nāhosī”ti cetasikadukkhuppattihetuto.
anya-e0104n:636_1: taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tebhūmakā saṅkhārā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:637_0: Dukkhadukkhanti dukkhadomassupāyāse vadati. “Jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n:639_7: nāpi haritakambalasadisamudusaddalasamotale bhūmibhāgeti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:639_15: Pūtimacchā di sabbaṃ na sadisūpammaṃ tassa vātādivasena ekaccaduggandhāpagamasabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n:639_17: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ tato bhiyyopi ekaccānaṃ tatthāvaṭṭhānasambhavato.
anya-e0104n:639_18: Attano adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitasaṅacitahatthadvayassa ukkuṭikasseva nisīdato samijjanappasāraṇādirahito.
anya-e0104n:640_5: Taruṇavaṇasadisaṃ ativiya sukhumālaṃ gabbhagataṃ sarīraṃ sītādiappakampi na sahatīti sītanarakūpapannatādi nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:641_2: yena maraṇadukkhena ca aṭṭitā vedanāppattā sattā katipayamāsamattātikkantampi pavattiṃ vissaranti,
anya-e0104n:650_3: “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti ettha “maraṇa”nti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n:651_3: Tamhi passantasseva kassaci anubhavantassa viya mahādukkhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:651_6: Tassa pana kāmaṃ iṭṭhameva ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n:651_7: piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n:651_8: piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti āha “asahantassa viyogaṃ piyavatthuka”nti.
anya-e0104n:651_11: “Avisesato”ti vatvāpi “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ parimadditasaṅkhārānaṃ ekaccānaṃ khīṇāsavānampi hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:654_3: Domanassaviseso pana hoti visayavisese pavattiākāravisesasabbhāvatoti taṃ visesaṃ lakkhaṇādito dassetuṃ “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:654_7: ñātibyasanādivisayaṃ kevalaṃ cittasanthāpabhūtaṃ anusocanaṃ sokoti anusocanapaccupaṭṭhānattepi ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n:655_3: balavasokābhibhūto maraṇampi pāpuṇātīti āha “samāvahati ca byādhijarāmaraṇabhedana”nti.
anya-e0104n:661_1: Jātiādīnampi yathārahaṃ dukkhavatthudukkhadukkhatāhi satipi dukkhabhāve kāyassa pīḷanavasena idaṃ savisesaṃ
anya-e0104n:664_8: Satthaṃ āharantīti attano sarīrassa vijjhanabhedanavasena satthaṃ upanenti.
anya-e0104n:667_1: Dosoyevāti kāyacittānaṃ āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāroti attho,
anya-e0104n:667_2: yato bhuso āyāsoti upāyāsoti vuccati yathā bhusamādānaṃ upādānanti.
anya-e0104n:667_3: Eko dhammoti cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi añño eko cetasikadhammo,
anya-e0104n:668_1: saha ca yathāpaccayaṃ domanassacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesoti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:668_2: Tattha pāko viyāti rajanādino pacitabbavatthuno pāko viya.
anya-e0104n:678_1: Icchitālābho nāma yassa kassaci attanā icchitassa vatthuno alābho.
anya-e0104n:678_3: Matthakappattaṃ pana icchitālābhaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “jātidhammānaṃ sattāna”ntiādinā niddiṭṭhanti tameva dassetuṃ “aho vatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:678_4: Icchāvāti ettha icchāsahito alābhovāti ca vadanti.
anya-e0104n:681_1: Yaṃ vuttamidhāti idha saccaniddese yaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:681_2: Avuttanti aññattha dukkhakkhandhabālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu vuttampi idha sarūpato avuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:681_3: Tañca sabbaṃ ime upādānakkhandhe vinā na labbhatīti tattha khandhasannissayameva dukkhaṃ khandhe vibādhatīti dassetuṃ “indanamiva pāvako”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:681_9: evaṃ khandhā jātiādidukkhassa vatthūti dassetuṃ “lakkhamivā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:681_10: Yebhuyyena loke vibādhakā vibādhetabbādhīnā na honti,
anya-e0104n:681_11: ime pana vibādhetabbādhīnā evāti dassetuṃ “tiṇalatādīnī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:681_12: Kāmaṃ anādimati saṃsāre ādi nāma kassaci natthi,
anya-e0104n:681_13: ekabhavaparicchinnassa pana khandhasantānassa vasena vuttaṃ “ādidukkhaṃ jātī”ti.
anya-e0104n:681_16: Maraṇassa antike āsanne jātaṃ dukkhaṃ māraṇantikadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:684_7: rañjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu apaccakkhāya vuttiyā nandīrāgasahagatā.
anya-e0104n:684_8: Tāya ca sattā tattha tattha bhavādike kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi nandanti,
anya-e0104n:684_15: Kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ taṇhābhāveneva ekabhāvaggahaṇena ekattaṃ upanetvā kassacipi sattassa
anya-e0104n:684_16: kenaci sadisatābhāvato taṃtaṃvicittabhāvajanakakammanipphādanena ativicittasabhāvā sakalassa dukkhassa
anya-e0104n:685_3: diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ abhivaḍḍhentī dosādayopi kammassa kāraṇaṃ honti,
anya-e0104n:685_5: kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti,
anya-e0104n:685_6: tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu sutte abhidhamme ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu
anya-e0104n:685_7: vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu taṇhāva samudayasaccanti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:688_3: Sati hi padhānahetunirodhe tadaññahetū niruddhāyeva hontīti byādhinimittavūpasamanena byādhivūpasamo
anya-e0104n:688_5: Na aññathāti yathāvuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:690_1: tattheva attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare,
anya-e0104n:690_2: tathā buddhānaṃ kāraṇe paṭipatti, na phale.
anya-e0104n:690_3: Yathā pana sārameyyā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā leḍḍuṃ khādanti,
anya-e0104n:691_1: Virajjati palujjati chijjati samudayo etenāti virāgo vuccati maggo.
anya-e0104n:691_2: Virajjanaṃ palujjanaṃ samucchindanaṃ virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0104n:691_5: Anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:691_13: Tattha taṃ āgammāti taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena patvā.
anya-e0104n:691_14: Taṇhā virajjatīti ariyamaggena accantavirāgavasena taṇhā virajjīyati.
anya-e0104n:692_2: saccatthadīpane pana vuttaniyāmena tato ānetvā pacchā ṭhapitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:692_3: Tathā hi pubbe vuttānipi lakkhaṇādīni punapi vuttāni.
anya-e0104n:692_4: Saṃsāradukkhato nibbinnamānasassa assāsaṃ karonto viya hotīti assāsakaraṇarasaṃ.
anya-e0104n:693_13: Tattha yathā cetopariyañāṇalābhino eva ariyā paresaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ jānanti,
anya-e0104n:693_14: tatthāpi ca arahā eva sabbesaṃ, na sabbe,
anya-e0104n:693_15: evaṃ nibbānampi sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātasammāpaṭipattibhūtena upāyena upalabbhatīti atthavacanaṃ cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:694_3: Saṃsārato saṃviggamānasā sammāpaṭipattiyā nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti sabbasamayasiddhoyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0104n:694_12: Tava matena pana nibbānasseva abhāvato vañjhabhāvo āpajjatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:694_16: Yaṃ tayā “abhāvapāpakattā”ti vadantena khandhābhāvo nibbānanti paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ na. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:694_18: Atītānāgatā hi khandhā na santīti tasmiṃ abhāve nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ nāma siyā,
anya-e0104n:694_21: atha kho vattamānānampīti tiyaddhagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvo nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:694_22: Na hi taṃ ekadesābhāvo bhavituṃ yuttanti vattamānā ce,
anya-e0104n:694_26: na santi cā”ti vippaṭisiddhametanti āha “na, tesaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:695_3: tadā tassa nissayabhūtā khandhā vattamānāti katvā tadā nibbānassa abhāvo siyā.
anya-e0104n:695_4: Tathā ca sati maggakkhaṇepi nibbānasacchikiriyāya abhāvo āpajjatīti dassento “vattamāna…pe…
anya-e0104n:695_6: Na mayaṃ sabbesaṃyeva avattamānatāya nibbānaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0104n:695_11: evaṃ sati ariyamaggassa niratthakatā āpajjati maggakkhaṇato pubbepi tadabhāvasiddhito.
anya-e0104n:695_13: Tasmā akāraṇametanti yasmā na nibbānassa anupalabbhanīyatā,
anya-e0104n:695_22: tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā”ti ca kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:696_18: Āgammāti ca sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho.
anya-e0104n:696_19: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena
anya-e0104n:696_20: vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādayo khepetīti
anya-e0104n:696_21: taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:696_23: itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ “arahattassāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:696_24: Arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā.
anya-e0104n:696_27: Tattha yathā rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti suttassa neyyatthattā.
anya-e0104n:696_28: Evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti nibbānaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti imassāpi suttassa neyyatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:696_29: Nibbānassa rāgādikkhayamattatāya bahūdosā āpajjantīti dassetuṃ “kiñca bhiyyo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:697_12: añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni,
anya-e0104n:697_20: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
anya-e0104n:697_22: antamaso dīpimigamakkaṭādīnampi suviññeyyoti oḷārikaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:697_27: Yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ pavatti na hoti,
anya-e0104n:697_28: so “ayaṃ nāmā”ti niyametabbo maggaphalañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto natthīti āha “na tādisassa khayassa abhāvato”ti.
anya-e0104n:698_1: yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā jhānabhāvanāya te vikkhambhetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaṃ upapanno,
anya-e0104n:698_2: tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā idhāgatopi kāmesu vītarāgova hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto,
anya-e0104n:698_3: yo ca paṭhamavaye eva rāgādito nibbinno te ca jhānena vikkhambhetvā pacchimavaye arahattaṃ patto,
anya-e0104n:698_4: tesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ vikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya anuppajjanato nirodhasadisatāya anuppattiyeva nirodho.
anya-e0104n:699_0: Yadi “khayo”ti vacanato yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ appavatti,
anya-e0104n:699_2: evaṃ sati “khaye ñāṇa”ntiādīsu “khayo”ti vuttattā taduppattito paṭṭhāya ca rāgādīnaṃ anuppattīti maggassāpi
anya-e0104n:700_1: evaṃ anuppannāpīti abhāvasāmaññato nirodhasadisatāya anuppatti eva nirodho anuppattinirodho.
anya-e0104n:700_4: Taṃ itarakhayato visesento “anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:700_5: Anipphannatā pana tassa khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:700_6: Anuppattinirodhakkhayakarassa hi maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ atthato tassa upanissayo viyāti vattabbataṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n:700_8: Phalūpacārena hi kāraṇaṃ voharīyati yathā “āyu ghataṃ,
anya-e0104n:701_1: “Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasa”ntiādinā paccavekkhato bhagavato appossukkabhāvāvahanato.
anya-e0104n:701_5: yena tvaṃ ariyena cakkhunā ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi,
anya-e0104n:701_6: nibbānaṃ passeyyāsī”ti vacanato ariyena cakkhunā passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:702_1: Yadi nibbānaṃ nāma sabhāvadhammo atthi sattasantānapariyāpanno ca,
anya-e0104n:702_2: atha kasmā catumahāpathe sabhā viya sabbasādhāraṇā na labbhatīti āha “maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:702_3: “Asukassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle uppanna”nti evaṃ purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṃ.
anya-e0104n:704_5: paṭighātavantatāya kalāpaso vuttiyā padesasambandho ca sabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:705_1: gamanīyato”ti etena nibbānassa ariyānaṃ paccakkhasiddhataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:705_4: Paramatthena nāvijjamānaṃ vijjamānamevāti yathāraddhamatthaṃ nigametvā tadatthasādhanaṃ āgamaṃ dassento “vuttañheta”nti- . ādimāha.
anya-e0104n:706_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti cattāripi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
anya-e0104n:706_1: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ.
anya-e0104n:706_3: sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n:706_5: abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ.
anya-e0104n:706_6: Jātabhūtakatabhāvo ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:706_8: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
anya-e0104n:706_9: tathā na saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti ca asaṅkhatanti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe
anya-e0104n:706_10: “pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena etaṃ kata”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ kenaci na katanti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n:706_12: Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:706_13: Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:707_0: Evamettha satthā paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
anya-e0104n:707_1: Pavedento ca “ahaṃ dhammissaro dhammassāmī”ti na attano āṇāmattena pavedesi,
anya-e0104n:707_2: apica kho pana padaparame anukampamāno yuttitopi pavedesi. Yathāha –
anya-e0104n:708_3: nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.
anya-e0104n:708_7: tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:709_2: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
anya-e0104n:709_3: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
anya-e0104n:709_4: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesaṃ saṃkilese samucchindanti,
anya-e0104n:709_5: tenettha sabbassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0104n:709_6: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anugamanavasenapi taṃ dassetvā nigametuṃ “yasmā ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:710_0: Ettha ca yasmā “appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā. Atthi,
anya-e0104n:710_8: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi “atthi,
anya-e0104n:710_10: ajāta”nti iminā ca suttapadena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena pakāsito,
anya-e0104n:710_11: tasmā yadipi kattha apaccakkhakārīnampi sāsane abhippasannānaṃ viññūnaṃ saṃsayo natthiyeva.
anya-e0104n:711_2: evaṃ sabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:711_9: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
anya-e0104n:711_12: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa
anya-e0104n:712_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti evamādi nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
anya-e0104n:712_4: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
anya-e0104n:712_7: tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n:712_8: Seyyathāpi sīhasaddoti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:713_2: tassa “gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti gambhīrāditā,
