anya-e0104n:915_2: So hi vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāya payogena,
anya-e0104n:915_3: aññathā vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattā eva sijjhanato nirussāho santabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0104n:915_6: Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati,
anya-e0104n:915_9: Etena tappaccayavantānaṃ avipākānampi rūpadhammānaṃ vipākānukūlaṃ pavattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:915_11: Paṭiccavāre pana “vipākā cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā āgatā.
anya-e0104n:915_12: Ettha ca yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:915_14: Na hi āruppe kāmarūpabhūmīsu viya vipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:916_1: Satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:916_5: asati pana upatthambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:916_6: Atha vā janayamānopi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhento janetīti upatthambhanabhāvo eva āhārabhāvoti “upatthambhakattenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:916_7: Keci pana “rūpāhāro attanā janitassa āhārapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n:916_10: Taṃ “āhāro rūpassa paccayo honto āhārapaccayo na hotīti viruddhameta”nti apare nānujānanti.
anya-e0104n:916_11: Rūpāhāro cettha rūpadhammānaṃ eva āhārapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:916_13: Tañca kho na kevalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānameva,
anya-e0104n:916_14: atha kho kadāci kaṭattārūpānampīti dassetuṃ “pañhāvāre panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:917_1: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n:917_8: aññātāvibhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi dhammehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatā.
anya-e0104n:917_15: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n:917_18: na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti.
anya-e0104n:917_20: kevalaṃ pana yathāsakehi eva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthiādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0104n:917_21: tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā,
anya-e0104n:917_24: Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti ettha sukhindriyadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0104n:918_1: Lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānabhūtānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanādivasena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:918_2: cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n:918_3: “Ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇe sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti vatvāpi “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti vacanena ajhānaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0104n:918_5: Yadi evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā vuttaṃ?
anya-e0104n:918_6: Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa ekantena ajhānaṅgabhāvadassanatthaṃ jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0104n:918_7: satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre vedanābhedadvayassa ekantena jhānapaccayattābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:918_9: najhānapaccayabhāvo pana natthīti sabbānipi satta jhānaṅgānīti ettha gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:919_1: Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho.
anya-e0104n:919_2: Pañhāvāre panātiādi yadipi paccayaniddese taṃsamuṭṭhānaggahaṇena so attho ñāpito eva,
anya-e0104n:919_3: pañhāvāre pana sarūpeneva gahitoti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:919_6: Paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu na labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:919_13: Evañhi atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci kassaci lābho na nivāritoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:919_14: Tena savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa sambhavo anuññāto hoti.
anya-e0104n:919_15: Tattha hi yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ saṅgahasuññatavāresu jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0104n:919_16: taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu alābho vutto.
anya-e0104n:919_17: Yathā hi sahetukacittuppādesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā,
anya-e0104n:919_19: Idha pana dubbalampi upanijjhāyanaṃ yadi kiñcimattampi atthi,
anya-e0104n:919_20: na tena upakārakatā na hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi jhānapaccayaṃ anujānantena “ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā
anya-e0104n:920_2: saha vā pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvūpagamena viya upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n:920_3: Kā pana sā pakārehi yuttatāti āha “ekavatthukaekārammaṇaekuppādekanirodhasaṅkhātenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:920_5: te sampayuttāti ettake vuccamāne avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sesamahābhūtupādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:920_7: cakkhādinissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānīti kappentassa tesaṃ sampayuttatāpatti
anya-e0104n:920_11: te sampayuttāti evampi cutiāsannānaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekuppādaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:920_13: te sampayuttāti kiṃ pana nānānirodhāpi evaṃtividhalakkhaṇā honti,
anya-e0104n:920_14: udāhu ekanirodhā evāti vicāraṇāyaṃ ekanirodhā eva evaṃlakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ “ekanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:921_0: Paṭilomato vā ekanirodhā sampayuttāti vuccamāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe nirujjhamānānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:921_1: Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ atthi ekuppādekanirodhatāti tesampi sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ ekārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:921_3: te sampayuttāti ayañca nayo ekavatthukesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n:921_7: Āruppe pana vatthuyeva natthīti kuto ekavatthukaggahaṇassa avasaro.
anya-e0104n:922_1: Aññamaññaṃ sambandhatāya yuttānampi samānānaṃ vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n:922_2: Ayañca vippayuttatā na sampayuttapaccayatāya viya aññamaññaṃ paccayapaccayuppannadhammavasena gahetabbā,
anya-e0104n:922_8: Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ vippayuttānampi vippayuttapaccayatā atthi.
anya-e0104n:922_11: pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato vatthunā,
anya-e0104n:922_14: Yadi evaṃ rūpānaṃ rūpehi kasmā vippayuttapaccayo na vuttoti?
anya-e0104n:922_15: Rūpānaṃ rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge sampayogo viya vippayogo natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n:922_19: rūpānañca tehi siyā sampayogāsaṅkāti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:922_20: Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi sampayogo natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:923_1: arūpinopi rūpīnanti ettha arūpaggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:923_2: Arūpadhammesu hi cattāro eva khandhā sahajātapurejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti.
anya-e0104n:923_3: Nibbānaṃ pana yathā arūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n:923_8: Vuttañca pañhāvāre “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:923_9: Rūpino dhammāti cetaṃ hadayavatthuno ceva cakkhādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:923_10: Rūpadhammesu hi cha vatthūniyeva arūpakkhandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayo.
anya-e0104n:923_15: Arūpakkhandhā hi cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantā viya uppajjantīti siyā tattha āsaṅkā “kiṃ nu kho ime imehi sampayuttā,
anya-e0104n:923_17: Ārammaṇadhammā pana vatthusannissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattaṃ hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkāti na te vippayuttā.
anya-e0104n:923_19: Vuttampi cetaṃ pañhāvāre “vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n:924_3: atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattitūpalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti.
anya-e0104n:924_4: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti āha “upatthambhakattenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:924_5: Idañca upatthambhakattaṃ vatthārammaṇasahajātādīnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ atthibhāvena upakārakattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:924_6: “Sattadhā mātikā nikkhittā”ti vuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:925_0: Aññattha pana tato aññathāpi āgatoti dassetuṃ “pañhāvāre panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:925_2: Purimapāṭhe pana sāvasesā desanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:925_11: sahajātato eva kusalena kusalābyākatanti kusalamūlā tayo,
anya-e0104n:925_19: sahajātapurejātapacchājātāhārindriyato akusalañca abyākatañca abyākatassā”ti evaṃ terasavidho.
anya-e0104n:925_22: Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti,
anya-e0104n:925_24: Nibbānañca nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ hutvā atthibhāvalābhena upakārakaṃ hotīti,
anya-e0104n:926_1: Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena pavattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti,
anya-e0104n:926_2: asati pana hotīti tena natthibhāvena upakārakatā natthipaccayatā.
anya-e0104n:926_3: Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tena tāni natthibhāvena upakārakāni,
anya-e0104n:926_4: anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānaṃ natthibhāvena okāsaṃ dadamānaṃ viya upakārakaṃ
anya-e0104n:927_1: Evaṃ santepi abhāvamattena upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā,
anya-e0104n:928_2: Tena na kevalaṃ natthivigatapaccayā eva dhammato avisiṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n:928_6: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso dhammāvisesepi veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:928_7: Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti
anya-e0104n:928_8: dhammassāmimhi saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya
anya-e0104n:932_2: natthivigatapaccayā cāti ime paccayā janakā eva,
anya-e0104n:932_6: Sesā janakā ca upatthambhakā cāti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:935_4: sabbā tā mohamūlikāti ca avijjāya ādīnavadassanena avijjāsamatikkamatthāya vivaṭṭābhipatthanāyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:936_1: Avijjāsampayuttattā rāgādīnaṃ rāgādiassādanakālesu avijjaṃ ārabbha uppatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:936_2: Garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ rāgadiṭṭhisampayuttāya eva avijjāya yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:936_4: tadaviyuttā ca diṭṭhīti assādanavacaneneva yathāvuttaṃ avijjaṃ garuṃ karontī diṭṭhi ca vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:936_5: Rāgādīhi ca pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato vuttehi taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārassa avijjārammaṇāditaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:936_9: vuttassa ca sabbassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:938_2: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti ettha sambhavanti evāti avadhāraṇaṃ na yujjati,
anya-e0104n:938_4: Tathā saṅkhārā evāti avadhāraṇampi na yujjati. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:938_6: Vākyassa avadhāraṇaphalattā avijjāpaccayā eva saṅkhārā sambhavantīti avadhāraṇe gayhamānepi ayaṃ doso. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:938_11: Dosamettha vattukāmo codako pucchatīti ñatvā ācariyo āha “kiṃ panetthā”ti.
anya-e0104n:938_12: Ettha avijjāya paccayantarena rahitabhāve ca sahitabhāve ca kiṃ pana vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:938_16: Aniṭṭho hi ekakāraṇavādo sabbattha sabbakālaṃ sambhavāpattito,
anya-e0104n:939_0: Yasmā ekaṃ na ekatotiādīsu tīsu pakāresu avijjamānesu pārisesena anekato anekamevāti etasmiṃ catutthe
anya-e0104n:939_1: eva pakāre vijjamāne ekahetuphaladīpane attho atthi,
anya-e0104n:939_5: Anekatopi ekaṃ phalaṃ no atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:940_1: “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ekaphaladīpananti evaṃ tattha tattha ekekahetuphaladīpanaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:941_2: phalassa ca dīpanā satthu desanāvilāsato vā veneyyapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayato vā.
anya-e0104n:941_3: Tadubhayassa panettha kāraṇaṃ tattha tattha desetabbassa atthassa padhānatā, pākaṭatā,
anya-e0104n:941_5: Desanāvilāsappattā ca buddhā bhagavanto te desetabbe atthe bahūsupi pariyāyesu labbhamānesu yathārucitaṃ gahetvā dhammaṃ desenti,
anya-e0104n:941_7: Tattha pana yena pariyāyena ye veneyyā bujjhanti,
anya-e0104n:942_8: aññapaccayasāmaññepi cakkhusamphassavasena sukhādicakkhusamphassajādīnaṃ oḷārikasukhumādisaṅkarābhāvato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n:942_9: Yathāvuttaphassassa sukhādīnaṃ aviparīto paccayabhāvo eva yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:942_10: Kāraṇaphalavisesena vā phalakāraṇavisesanicchayo hotīti ubhayatthāpi nicchayo pavatthānanti vutto.
anya-e0104n:943_1: Semhassa mandabhāvādinā ca semhaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:943_2: Ayamidha avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:943_7: upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti iminā suttena taṇhāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa vuttattāti attho.
anya-e0104n:943_8: Puna tassāpi avijjāya kāraṇanti dassanatthaṃ “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayoti ca vacanato”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:943_9: Taṇhā vā caturupādānabhūtā kāmāsavadiṭṭhāsavā ca saṅkhārassa kāraṇanti pākaṭā avijjāhetukāti suttadvayenāpi
anya-e0104n:943_11: “Assādānupassino”ti hi vacanena bhavādīnavappaṭicchādanakiccā avijjā taṇhāya kāraṇanti dassitā hoti.
anya-e0104n:943_13: tasmā puññābhisaṅkhārādike abhisaṅkharotīti avijjāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa pākaṭattā aviddasubhāvova saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvena vutto.
anya-e0104n:943_15: asādhāraṇattā ca puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇāni vatthārammaṇādīnīti puññabhavādīnavappaṭicchādikā
anya-e0104n:943_16: avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:943_21: vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādīsu bodhaneyyajjhāsayavasena dhammassa bodhanasaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:944_12: Na hi aniṭṭhavepakkaṃ kāraṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ phalati,
anya-e0104n:944_14: Yasmā panettha paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvalakkhaṇadhammānaṃ dhammatā adhippetā,
anya-e0104n:944_15: tatra cāyaṃ niyamo natthi vicittarūpattā tassāti.
anya-e0104n:945_4: Evaṃ sati “purimacittaṃ pacchimacittassa ṭhānaviruddho paccayo”ti nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:946_8: tasmā dukkhavipākāyapi avijjāya adukkhavipākānaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayattaṃ na na yujjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n:947_2: na itaresanti etassa pasaṅgassa nivāraṇatthaṃ “viruddho cāviruddho ca,
anya-e0104n:947_5: Tasmā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto “iti ayaṃ avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:948_1: Sabbattha khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇanti cutiṃ aggaṇhantoti idha cuti nāma tattha tattha bhavādīsu rūpādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n:948_2: khandhānaṃ maraṇasaññito carimo bhedoti yāthāvato ajānanto.
anya-e0104n:949_0: Sabbattha khandhānaṃ pātubhāvoti tattha tattha bhavādīsu khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti.
anya-e0104n:949_1: Navasarīrapātubhāvoti idha jiṇṇassa sarīrassa nikkhepe paralokapariyāpannassa navakāyassa uppādo.
anya-e0104n:954_0: Ayaṃ sattoti ayamattā, yo sāmī, nivāsī, kārako,
anya-e0104n:955_3: Saṅkhāre attato attaniyatoti rūpādīsu ekaccaṃ attato,
anya-e0104n:956_0: Attā jānāti vāti vikappeti kāpilādayo viya.
anya-e0104n:956_2: Kāṇādopi hi attā sabhāvena na jānāti.
anya-e0104n:956_5: So eva karoti ca kāreti cāti yo parattha sukhadukkhaṃ anubhavati,
anya-e0104n:956_14: Sabbañhetaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ kiccaṃ attano byāpāraṃ katvā diṭṭhigatiko vimuyhatīti dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:956_16: niyati eva vā saṅgati samāgamo niyatisaṅgati,
anya-e0104n:956_17: tāya bhāvesu pariṇatā manussadevavihaṅgādibhāvaṃ pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā. Niyatiyā,
anya-e0104n:956_19: bhāvasaṅkhātena sabhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti ca atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n:957_0: Etehi ca vikappanehi avijjā akusalaṃ cittaṃ katvā satte puññādīsu saṅkhāresu yattha katthaci pavattetīti
anya-e0104n:958_1: arahattamaggañāṇāvasānaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ samavisamaṃ dassetvā satte nibbānaṃ nayatīti pariṇāyakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:958_3: Dhammaṃ ñatvāti sappurisūpassayena catusaccappakāsakaṃ suttādidhammaṃ ñatvā,
anya-e0104n:958_5: Taṃjānanāyattaṃ pana sesasaccattayābhisamayaṃ samānakālampi taṃ purimakālaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:958_6: Upasanto carissatīti aggamaggādhigamena sabbaso avijjūpasamā upasanto saupādisesanibbānadhātuyaṃ ṭhito yāva anupādisesanibbānadhātupatti,
anya-e0104n:958_7: tāva sattānaṃ hitacariyāya attabhāvaṃ pavattento carissati,
anya-e0104n:960_1: Yathāvuttasaṅkhārapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ taṃ kammanibbattameva bhavituṃ arahatīti “bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni saṅgahitānī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:960_2: Dhātukathāyaṃ pana vippayuttena saṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā,
anya-e0104n:960_7: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena,
anya-e0104n:960_13: sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti vacanato sabbaviññāṇaphassavedanāpariggaho kato.
anya-e0104n:960_14: Yadi hi ettha viññāṇaphassavedanā sappadesā siyuṃ,
anya-e0104n:960_16: Tasmā tattha abhidhammabhājanīyavasena saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇādayo gahitāti adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:960_18: akusalasaṅkhāro ca vuttoti eso eva dhātukathāyaṃ gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:960_19: Bhavo pana dhātukathāyaṃ kammūpapattibhavavisesadassanatthaṃ na abhidhammabhājanīyavasena gahito,
anya-e0104n:960_20: evañca katvā tattha “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti anuddharitvā “kammabhavo”tiādinā nayena bhavo uddhaṭo.
anya-e0104n:961_1: Chahi viññāṇehīti yathāadhikatehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi viññāṇehi.
anya-e0104n:961_2: Kasmā panettha lokiyavipākaviññāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti āha “lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:961_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dhātukathāyaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu lokuttaravipākānampi gahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0104n:961_4: Taṃ yathādhammasāsanattā abhidhammadesanāya vipākattike viya anavasesavipākadhammasaṅgaṇhanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:961_5: Suttantadesanā pana yathānulomadesanāti tattha pavattinivattiyo asaṅkarato dassetabbā.
anya-e0104n:961_6: Tasmā tadatthasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā pavattikathāyaṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇāniyeva gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:962_0: Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladāne samatthaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:962_1: tathā kataṃ “upacita”nti vuccatīti vipākadānayogyameva saṅkhāraṃ gaṇhanto “upacitakammābhāve”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:962_5: Yathā panassa viññāṇassa saṅkhārapaccayatā na siddhā,
anya-e0104n:962_9: Tassa pana sādhanatthaṃ “upacitakammābhāve vipākābhāvato”ti vuttanti taṃ vivaranto “vipākañcā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:962_10: Yadi uppajjeyyāti yadi kammanirapekkho vipāko uppajjeyya.
anya-e0104n:962_11: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ brahmattaṃ upagatānaṃ ghānādiviññāṇāni mahāvipākaviññāṇānīti tassa tassa vipākassa anokāse ṭhitānampi.
anya-e0104n:963_2: na ca sabbato sabbānīti āha “katarasaṅkhārapaccayā kataraviññāṇanti ce”ti.
anya-e0104n:963_6: na ca tattha nesaṃ saṅkhārapaccayatā vibhāvitāti taṃ pavattiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:963_7: paṭisandhiyañca bhavādīsu pavattanākāravasena vitthārato dassetuṃ “kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:963_10: Mahāvipākāti pana pāṭhe manoviññāṇadhātuyoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:964_2: Yaṃ viññāṇanti “yaṃ yaṃ viññāṇa”nti evaṃ ubhayattha āmeḍitalopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:964_4: na pavattivisesoti taṃ dassento “evaṃ pavatti veditabbā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:964_5: Brahmānampi aniṭṭharūpādiāpāthagamane akusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇādīni kadāci uppajjantīti “imāni terasa…pe…
anya-e0104n:964_7: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vokāro vitthāro etthāti pañcavokāro,
anya-e0104n:964_11: Atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānehi pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro,
anya-e0104n:964_12: so eva bhavoti sabbaṃ pubbe viya.
anya-e0104n:966_7: akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n:966_10: Javanena tadārammaṇaniyame somanassasahagatānantaraṃ somanassasahagatāneva sandhāya vuttanti apare,
anya-e0104n:967_0: Yasmā pana tihetukajavanāvasāne ca kadāci ahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:967_3: tadā tattha ekameva tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti keci.
anya-e0104n:967_5: taṃ ekacittakkhaṇike tathā āsannabhede ārammaṇe nuppajjati.
anya-e0104n:967_6: Tasmā “sakiṃ vā”ti idaṃ dirattatirattādi viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:967_9: saddassa abhāvā vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattena dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti yujjati.
anya-e0104n:967_11: saddo vikappattho vuttoti sakiṃ eva ca kadāci pavattiṃ sandhāya “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:967_12: Teneva hi sammohavinodaniyaṃ sakiṃ tadārammaṇappavattiyā vicāretabbataṃ dassentena “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ
anya-e0104n:967_13: pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:968_0: Tattha cittappavattigaṇanāyanti vipākakathāyaṃ balavarūpādiārammaṇe vuttaṃ cittappavattigaṇanaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n:968_2: Tadeva hi sandhāya idhāpi vuttaṃ “abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe dve cittavārā āgatā”ti.
anya-e0104n:968_3: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantīti dvāraṃ anāmasitvā eva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:968_4: taṃ anantaraṃ parato vuttasahetukavipākaviññāṇānaṃ sadisasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātukāmatādhippāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:968_8: aniyataṃ vā dvāraṃ etesanti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0104n:969_1: tañca aniyatanti tampi gaṇhanto “aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:969_2: Teneva cettha mahāvipākānampi tadārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dvāraṃ labbhatīti tatthāpi dvāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:970_0: Ekassa sattassa pavatto rūpāvacaravipāko pathavīkasiṇādīsu yasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavatto,
anya-e0104n:970_1: tato aññasmiṃ tassa pavatti natthīti rūpāvacarānaṃ niyatārammaṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:971_1: Evaṃ pavattiyaṃ viññāṇappavattiṃ dassetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:971_4: Bhavantarena bhavantarassa sandhānaṃ idha paṭisandhīti taṃ acittakampi atthevāti katvā “kati paṭisandhiyo”ti
anya-e0104n:972_4: Keci pana ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi hontiyeva,
anya-e0104n:972_5: tasmā tādisānampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahoti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:972_7: asukāya paṭisandhiyā asukaṃ ārammaṇanti vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho.
anya-e0104n:973_1: paṭhamatatiyāruppā dveti imāsaṃ vuttāvasesānaṃ sattannaṃ paṭisandhīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n:973_2: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ nāma natthi paṭisandhiārammaṇe eva pavattanato.
anya-e0104n:974_3: Olambantīti sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā viya bhūmiyaṃ tassa citte avalambanti upatiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0104n:974_4: Tasmiṃ niruddheti tasmiṃ cuticitte niruddhamatte tassa nirodhasamanantarameva.
anya-e0104n:974_7: tañca ārabbha cittasantānassa bhavantaraninnapoṇapabbhāratā hotīti āha “anupacchinnakilesabalavināmita”nti.
anya-e0104n:974_8: Santāne hi vināmite tadekadesabhūtaṃ paṭisandhicittañca vināmitameva hoti,
anya-e0104n:974_9: na ca ekadesavināmitabhāvena vinā santānassa vināmitatā atthīti.
anya-e0104n:974_10: Sabbattha pana duggatipaṭisandhininnāya cutiyā purimajavanāni akusalāni,
anya-e0104n:974_18: yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:974_21: Arahato pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ upacchinnattā paṭippassaddhasabbabhavussukkatāya kammādinimittaṃ na upaṭṭhahati,
anya-e0104n:974_22: tato vijjamānampi kammaṃ aladdhasahāyattā paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.
anya-e0104n:975_3: Na hi so eva nirayaggivaṇṇādi tadā tassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0104n:975_8: Manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitavaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya,
anya-e0104n:975_9: dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0104n:976_0: Rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇanti akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ aniṭṭhamārammaṇamāha.
anya-e0104n:976_1: Tampi hi saṅkappanavasena rāgassāpi hetu hotīti.
anya-e0104n:976_2: Akusalavipākajanakakammasahajātānaṃ vā taṃsadisāsannacutijavanacetanāsahajātānañca rāgādīnaṃ hetubhāvo eva hīnatā.
anya-e0104n:976_3: Tañhi pacchānutāpajanakakammānamārammaṇaṃ kammavasena aniṭṭhaṃ akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n:976_4: Aññathā ca iṭṭhārammaṇe pavattassa akusalakammassa vipāko akusalakammanimittārammaṇo na bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n:976_5: Na hi akusalavipāko iṭṭhārammaṇo bhavituṃ arahatīti.
anya-e0104n:977_0: Pañcadvāre ca āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇasantatiyaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0104n:977_5: etasmiṃ tayā pavattitabbanti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppādentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannāni javanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n:977_7: Tadā ca taṃsamānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ?
anya-e0104n:977_9: Na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni honti.
anya-e0104n:977_10: “Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:977_11: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:977_12: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā hoti samādinnā.
anya-e0104n:977_13: Tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādinā sutte maraṇakāle samattāya samādinnāya micchādiṭṭhiyā,
anya-e0104n:977_17: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “sabbampi hetaṃ kusalākusaladhammapaṭivijānanādicavanapariyosānaṃ kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva hoti,
anya-e0104n:977_18: na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassapetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni paṭikkhittānī”ti.
anya-e0104n:978_0: Tattha hi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānātīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:978_1: Yesaṃ paṭivibhāvanappavattiyā sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā anveti,
anya-e0104n:978_5: tadanantarā ca upapatti manodvārikā eva hoti,
anya-e0104n:978_6: na sahajavanakavīthicittapariyāpannāti iminā adhippāyena idha pañcadvārikatadārammaṇānantarā cuti,
anya-e0104n:978_8: Tattha avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke rūpādimhi uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya “paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ
anya-e0104n:978_10: avasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke ca uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya “paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ atītārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n:978_11: bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:979_1: Kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti ettha yathā pubbe “pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti vutte kaṇhapakkhe
anya-e0104n:979_4: narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimitta”nti ca vutte kaṇhapakkhe “sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ,
anya-e0104n:979_6: devaloke vā uyyānavimānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ sugatinimitta”nti evaṃ sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:980_1: Tañca khoti yadetaṃ “anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti aniyamanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n:980_3: Kammanimittameva āpāthamāgacchati ekantato attano kammārammaṇatāya mahaggatavipākassa.
anya-e0104n:980_6: sā pana javanavīthi mahaggatavipākassa upacāro viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:980_7: Keci pana tañca vīthiṃ mahaggatāvasānaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n:981_1: Tattha saddo tāva anupādinnabhāvena sugatipariyāpannatāya gatinimittabhāvena aṭṭhakathāsu nāgatoti yuttametaṃ,
anya-e0104n:982_0: Ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyatītiādīsu pubbacetanāvasena puññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:983_1: “Etenānusārena āruppacutiyāpi anantarā paṭisandhi veditabbā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:983_2: nanu “pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassā”ti evamādike eva naye ayampi paṭisandhi avaruddhāti? Na,
anya-e0104n:983_4: Tattha hi “pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimittaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0104n:983_5: cakkhusotānaṃ vā”tiādinā tena vacanena rūpāvacaracutiyā eva anantarā paṭisandhi vuttāti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:983_6: Athāpi yathāsambhavayojanāya ayampi paṭisandhi tattheva avaruddhā,
anya-e0104n:983_8: Arūpāvacare ca uparūpari cutiyā anantarā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā paṭisandhi natthīti catutthāruppacutiyā navattabbārammaṇapaṭisandhi natthi.
anya-e0104n:983_12: atītapaccuppannārammaṇā ca kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi yojetabbāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ visuṃ uddharaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:984_1: Evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ekavidhāya kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā duvidhā duggatipaṭisandhi,
anya-e0104n:984_3: kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā dviekadvippakārānaṃ kāmarūpārūpānaṃ vasena pañcavidhā sugatipaṭisandhi,
anya-e0104n:984_5: duvidhāya āruppacutiyā paccekaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kāmāruppānaṃ vasena aṭṭhavidhā ca paṭisandhi dassitā.
anya-e0104n:984_6: Duggaticutiyā pana ekavidhāya duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā na dassitā,
anya-e0104n:985_0: Dve dve pañcātha pañcaṭṭha, dve bhavālambabhedato;
anya-e0104n:987_1: “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā”tiādinā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā dassitappakāroti
anya-e0104n:988_0: Nissayapaccayabhūtena rūpena sahapavattiyevettha viññāṇassa tena missitā,
anya-e0104n:988_2: Yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññamissitā hontīti yoniyo.
anya-e0104n:988_7: Asaññasattāvāsassa idha asambhavato “sattāvāsavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:990_2: Ādināti “missaṃ amissa”nti etasmiṃ duke ādimhi vuttena missaviññāṇena.
anya-e0104n:990_3: Omato dve vā tayo vā dasakā uppajjantīti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:990_4: Aññattha pana aneke kalāpā saha uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n:990_5: Brahmattabhāvepi hi anekagāvutappamāṇena aneke kalāpā saha uppajjantīti tiṃsato adhikāneva rūpāni honti.
anya-e0104n:990_10: imāsu na sambhavantīti evaṃ yonīnaṃ gativasena sambhavabhedo.
anya-e0104n:991_1: Bhummavajjesūti bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ pati tesaṃ manussasadisattā.
anya-e0104n:991_2: Yoniyo tisso purimikā na hontīti yonittayapaṭikkhepena pacchimā yoni anuññātāti atthato āpannameva hoti.
anya-e0104n:992_3: Kasmā pana nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti?
anya-e0104n:992_5: Tāsañhi niccāturabhāvato kāmasevā natthīti na tā aṇḍajādayo honti.
anya-e0104n:992_6: Kucchiyaṃ tāsaṃ gabbho nāvatiṭṭhati jālasabbhāvatoti keci.
anya-e0104n:992_8: pupphādīsu ca sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatāpi tāsaṃ natthevāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:993_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesūti opapātikayonikehi rūpībrahme niddhāreti.
anya-e0104n:993_3: Tena “opapātikayonikesū”ti sāmaññato vuttarāsito “rūpībrahmesū”ti visesena tadekadesaṃ niddhāreti.
anya-e0104n:993_6: jīvitachakkassa cāti catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena rūpabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:993_7: tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā taṃ samatthentā “pāḷiyañhi ‘rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n:993_11: nava dhātuyo’ti sabbasaṅgahakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:993_12: Kathāvatthumhi ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto ‘atthi tattha ghānāyatananti? Āmantā.
anya-e0104n:993_15: Na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ tattha bhāvo sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0104n:993_16: phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa gandharasasabhāvassa abhāvā.
anya-e0104n:993_17: Yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo natthīti ‘āyatanānī’ti te na vucceyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n:993_18: dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavācakoti ‘gandhadhātu rasadhātū’ti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n:993_19: dhammabhāvo ca tesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā.
anya-e0104n:993_20: Dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantiko yamake vutto ‘dhammo āyatananti?
anya-e0104n:993_22: Tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci āyatanabhāvo vattabbo.
anya-e0104n:993_23: Yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā,
anya-e0104n:993_25: Gandharasabhāve pana āyatanabhāve ca sati ‘gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:993_26: raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatana’nti idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
anya-e0104n:993_27: ‘Tayo āhārā’ti ca vacanato kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:993_30: Evañhi dhammatā na vilomitā hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:994_1: rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontīti te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti,
anya-e0104n:994_3: “tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato,
anya-e0104n:994_10: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ yathā tattheva
anya-e0104n:994_13: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa.
anya-e0104n:995_3: acakkhāyatanabhāvena ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti?
anya-e0104n:995_5: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:995_6: tena rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:995_7: Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n:995_8: tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato,
anya-e0104n:995_9: manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:996_0: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:996_1: tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:996_2: Asatipi hi tattha attano indriye rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati.
anya-e0104n:996_3: Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni,
anya-e0104n:996_6: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ vacīghoso eva na siyā.
anya-e0104n:996_8: na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0104n:996_9: phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā.
anya-e0104n:996_10: Tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n:996_11: Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:996_12: Vuttañhi “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:997_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanādvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:997_2: So ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvassa ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
anya-e0104n:997_3: Yadi tattha asatipi visayini rūpāyatanaṃ gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:997_4: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti?
anya-e0104n:997_6: Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya,
anya-e0104n:997_11: na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:997_12: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
anya-e0104n:998_0: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n:998_3: aṭṭhakathāsu tattha nesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā.
anya-e0104n:998_5: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
anya-e0104n:998_14: tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
anya-e0104n:998_15: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva.
anya-e0104n:998_17: tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:999_0: Aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesūti rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu opapātikesu,
anya-e0104n:999_6: Kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu yathāvuttāya santatiyā rūpānaṃ labbhanato vuttaṃ “tāni ca niccaṃ devesū”ti.
anya-e0104n:999_9: Cakkhu nesaṃ dasannaṃ pūraṇoti katvā cakkhudasako nāma,
anya-e0104n:999_10: asādhāraṇena vā cakkhunā lakkhito dasako cakkhudasako.
anya-e0104n:999_14: avakaṃsato tiṃsā”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “avakaṃsato panā”tiādimāha,
anya-e0104n:999_16: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:999_17: Dhammahadayavibhaṅge hi “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti,
anya-e0104n:1000_10: Sati ca aghānakūpapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparānipi dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:1000_11: Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1000_14: kassaci aparānipi navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1000_16: Ettha ca yathā “sattati ukkaṃsatotha rūpānī”ti padaṃ “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti ettha yonidvayavasena yojīyati,
anya-e0104n:1000_19: Ekayoganiddiṭṭhassāpi ekadeso sambandhaṃ labhatīti saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa
anya-e0104n:1000_20: jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1001_0: Ye pana “opapātikassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni
anya-e0104n:1001_4: Evañca katvā āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthi.
anya-e0104n:1001_7: Apare panāhu “kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantīti yāva ‘kassaci navāyatanānī’ti pāḷi opapātike sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1001_9: Tathā ca yathāvuttapāḷiyā ayamatthavaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametiyevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1001_11: Tathā hi dhammahadayavibhaṅge ‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī’tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n:1001_14: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahaṇavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1001_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanāparipuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti,
anya-e0104n:1001_16: padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ “opapātikānanti vutta”nti ca,
anya-e0104n:1001_18: saṃsedajayonivaseneva ca avakaṃsato rūpapavattiṃ dassetuṃ opapātikayoniyā itaraṃ asaṅgahetvā “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1002_1: tiṃsā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ rūpassa ukkaṃsāvakaṃsaparicchedānaṃ majjhe.
anya-e0104n:1002_2: Anurūpato vikappo veditabboti apāyesu andhassa cha cakkhudasakābhāvato,
anya-e0104n:1002_4: andhabadhirassa pana pañca cakkhusotadasakābhāvatoti evamādinā nayena veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1003_0: 631. Cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ khandhādīhi aññamaññasamānatā abhedo. Asamānatā bhedo.
anya-e0104n:1004_0: Ārammaṇatopi abhinnāti catūsu āruppesu tato tato cavitvā tattha tattheva upapajjantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1004_3: Arūpabhūmito cavitvā heṭṭhā upapatti nāma kāmabhave eva,
anya-e0104n:1004_5: Rūpabhavato pana cuto duhetukopi hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1004_8: avuttañca sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā āha “ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo”ti.
anya-e0104n:1004_9: Rūpārūpāvacarānaṃ upacārassa balavatāya tato cavitvā duggatiyaṃ upapatti natthīti “ekaccasugaticutiyā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1004_12: nānattakāyanānattasaññīsu vuttā ekacce ca vinipātikā tihetukādipaṭisandhikā,
anya-e0104n:1004_13: tesaṃ paṭisandhiṃ vinipātikabhāvena “duggatipaṭisandhī”ti gahetvā sabbasugaticutiyā ca sā paṭisandhi hoti,
anya-e0104n:1004_14: na ekaccasugaticutiyā evāti tannivattanatthaṃ ekaccaduggatiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1004_17: Atha vā duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā ekaccasugaticutiyā anantarā,
anya-e0104n:1004_19: Tattha pacchimaṃ vajjetvā purimaṃyeva gahetuṃ vuttaṃ “ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1004_20: Ahetukacutiyā sahetukapaṭisandhīti duhetukā ca tihetukā ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1004_21: Maṇḍūkadevaputtādīnaṃ viya hi ahetukacutiyā tihetukapaṭisandhipi hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1005_0: Tassa tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbanti “ekaccasugaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n:1005_6: Na hi mahaggataajjhattārammaṇāya cutiyā arūpabhūmīsu amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇā paṭisandhi atthi.
anya-e0104n:1005_7: “Catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhī”ti etassa vipariyāyo sayameva yojito.
anya-e0104n:1005_8: “Atītārammaṇāya cutiyā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhī”ti etassa ca vipariyāyo natthi eva.
anya-e0104n:1005_9: Bhedaviseso eva ca evaṃ vitthārena dassito,
anya-e0104n:1005_10: abhedaviseso pana ekekasmiṃ bhede tattha tattheva cutipaṭisandhiyojanāvasena veditabbo “pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarā…pe…
anya-e0104n:1005_13: Eteneva nayena sakkā viññātunti pañcakkhandhādīsu abhedaviseso na dassitoti.
anya-e0104n:1006_2: Etaṃ viññāṇaṃ avijjādisahakārikāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena laddhappaccayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1006_6: atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1006_8: Tato hetuṃ vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā.
anya-e0104n:1006_11: Pākaṭatā cettha tadāsannakkhandhavasena veditabbā “cavamāne upapajjamāne”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n:1006_12: Manussacutipaṭisandhikkamenāti vā manussacutito yassa kassaci paṭisandhikkamena.
anya-e0104n:1006_13: Tathā hi vakkhati “nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anāssādayamānaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1007_10: “Niruddhesu cakkhādīsū”ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1007_18: Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati,
anya-e0104n:1007_21: cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī”tiādinā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti.
anya-e0104n:1008_1: Na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n:1008_2: Hadayavatthupi tadā ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya appāvasesaṃ hotīti “taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita”nti vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1008_9: yadā tadā vā katampi paribyattaṃ hutvā anussaritaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1008_11: Laddho avaseso avijjādiko viññāṇassa paccayo etenāti laddhāvasesapaccayo, saṅkhāro.
anya-e0104n:1008_13: Kammanimittaṃ nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati, taṃ.
anya-e0104n:1008_14: Atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi hi kamme kate vipaccanakāle āgantvā kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upatiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:1008_16: So ca niraye nibbattanārahassa “aggijālavaṇṇādiko”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0104n:1008_17: Avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte.
anya-e0104n:1009_1: purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāraṃ hutvā pavattatīti āha “taṇhā nāmetī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1009_5: Khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvena pavattantīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1009_11: Santativasenāti ca vadanto “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti imañca micchāgāhaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n:1009_12: Sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1009_13: Ettha ca orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajju viya purimabhavattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ kammādiārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1009_17: yathā ca so puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibaddhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno vā anassādayamāno
anya-e0104n:1009_19: evamidampi bhavantarattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ hadayavatthusaṅkhātaṃ nissayaṃ pañcavokārabhave assādayamānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1009_20: catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇasampayuttakammeheva pavattati.
anya-e0104n:1010_3: Tadetaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāpi idhāgataṃ imasmiṃyeva bhave uppannattā.
anya-e0104n:1011_1: Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti tesaṃ ekattanānattabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n:1011_7: Honti aññatra agantvāti saddādipaccayadesaṃ anupagantvā saddādihetukā honti tato pubbe abhāvā.
anya-e0104n:1011_8: Evaṃ idampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā.
anya-e0104n:1011_9: Tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato,
anya-e0104n:1011_10: nāpi tattha hetunā vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1011_11: Atha vā honti aññatra agantvāti pubbe paccayadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā,
anya-e0104n:1012_0: Natthi ekatā ekasantānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato.
anya-e0104n:1012_2: Khaṇikāya hi padīpajālāya santānekattaṃ upādāya so evāti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:1012_8: Esa nayoti atidesena bījaṅkurādīsu sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu yathāsambhavaṃ yojanā kātabbāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1012_9: Idhāpi hi hetuhetusamuppannaviññāṇānaṃ ekantamekatte sati na manussagatito devagati sambhūtā siyā.
anya-e0104n:1012_11: tato “rattassa bījaṃ rattassa phala”ntiādikassa viya “bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0104n:1012_12: rohitasso nāma isi ahosi”ntiādikassa vohārassa lopo siyā,
anya-e0104n:1012_13: tasmā ettha santānabandhesu hetuhetusamuppannesu na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbā na gahetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1012_14: Ettha ca ekantaekatāpaṭisedhena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti,
anya-e0104n:1013_6: “Dhammamattaṃ bhavantaramupetī”ti vuttattā phalassa upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyāti anuyuñjeti.
anya-e0104n:1014_3: Etassa atthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā taṃ phalaṃ “aññassa,
anya-e0104n:1014_4: aññato”ti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa.
anya-e0104n:1014_6: Ettha ca abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammavā satto,
anya-e0104n:1014_9: Tatthuppannassa madhurassa rattakesarassa vā phalassa vā tasseva bījassa,
anya-e0104n:1014_10: tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo viya kammakārakasseva sattassa,
anya-e0104n:1014_11: taṃkammato eva ca phalassa bhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1014_17: na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva vuḍḍhasarīre uppajjanato,
anya-e0104n:1014_18: na ca yathāpayuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve abhāvato,
anya-e0104n:1015_2: Tattha vā upabhuñjake asati siddhā bhuñjakasammutīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1016_1: Tasmāti yasmā yathā khandhasantāne kusalākusalacetanuppattiyaṃ “puññaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n:1016_5: tasmā na ettha khandhavinimuttena aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.
anya-e0104n:1017_1: Evaṃ santepīti asaṅkantipātubhāve tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati,
anya-e0104n:1018_1: vipakkavipākānampi katattaṃ samānanti tesampi phalāvahatā siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āha “na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1020_2: pavattiyañca paccayabhāve vibhajja avibhāvite pavattanakasammohassa apanayanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1021_4: “Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayapaccayo na hotī”ti paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāya dassitametaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1021_6: na vā vattabbaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvakathāya avipākārahassa pasaṅgābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1021_7: Abhiññācetanāya hi avipākatā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva.
anya-e0104n:1022_4: Kathaṃ pana iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva pavattanakāni kusalavipākaviññāṇāni duggatiyaṃ pavattantīti āha “niraye mahāmoggallānattherassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1022_5: Thero hi tattha iddhiyā vassaṃ nimminitvā katipayaṃ velaṃ nirayaggiṃ vūpasametvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0104n:1024_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedoti ettha uddhaccasahagatacetanāya gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0104n:1025_2: rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha “so ca kho”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1025_3: “Tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepi aniṭṭharūpādayo natthī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1025_4: Bahulañhi tesaṃ iṭṭhā eva rūpādayo upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0104n:1026_2: tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ kātukāmo āha “ādito paṭṭhāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1026_5: saṃsedajā ca hontīti tadapekkhāya “catūsu yonīsū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1026_6: Ekattakāyaekattasaññitāsāmaññena catutthajhānabhūmikāpi asaññāruppavajjā catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti.
anya-e0104n:1028_1: Catūsu antogadhānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu paccayabhāvo yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1028_2: Aviññāṇake sattāvāse saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇe alabbhamānepi tassa saṅkhārahetukattaṃ labbhateva.
anya-e0104n:1028_3: Tathā hi tattha puññābhisaṅkhāro kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1028_4: Etasmiñca mukhamattappakāsane puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ duggatiādīsu pavattiyaṃ kusalavipākādiviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n:1028_5: paccayabhāvo bhavesu vuttanayeneva viññāyatīti na vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1030_0: 638. Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti nāmassa, rūpassa ca pabhedato.
anya-e0104n:1031_0: Tattha nāmassa tāva pabhedaṃ dassentena kāmaṃ viññāṇampi nāmameva,
anya-e0104n:1031_1: paccayapaccayuppanne pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1032_0: Ekaṃ sattāvāsanti asaññasattāvāsaṃ. Purimesu catūsu, asaññasattāvāse cāti pañcasu.
anya-e0104n:1033_4: lakkhaṇaparicchedarūpāni pana santīti tāni paramatthato aparinipphannānīti vajjento āha “rūparūpato”ti.
anya-e0104n:1033_5: Phassādike saṅkhārakkhandhabhāvena ekattaṃ netvā “tevīsati dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1034_0: Tesanti brahmakāyikādīnaṃ. Vitthārenāti catūsupi santatisīsesu rūpānaṃ asaṅkhipanena.
anya-e0104n:1035_0: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānanti ettha kiñcāpi kāmabhave opapātikā vuttā na santi,
anya-e0104n:1035_2: aṇḍajagabbhaseyyakehi pana opapātikasaṃsedajā sesā hontīti sesaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1035_3: Atha vā brahmakāyikādikehi opapātikehi vuttehi sese sandhāya “sesaopapātikāna”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:1035_5: Aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ pana nāmarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ rūpamissakaviññāṇaniddese vuttanayena sakkā dhammagaṇanato viññātunti na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1036_0: Paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututoti paṭisandhicittena saha uppannarūpesu tejodhātuto.
anya-e0104n:1036_2: Tesaṃ ajjhoharitāhārena anugate sarīre āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhaddhakanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1036_4: Avakaṃsato dve aṭṭhakāneva utucittasamuṭṭhānāni hontīti sasaddakālaṃ sandhāya “ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1036_5: Pubbeti yaṃ pubbe santatidvayādikaṃ sattakapariyosānaṃ rūpaṃ idha vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1036_6: taṃ ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu uppajjamānameva vuttanti katvā āha “pubbe…pe…
anya-e0104n:1037_2: Catuddisā vavatthāpitāti aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasīsā mūlena catūsu disāsu vavatthāpitā.
anya-e0104n:1037_3: Aññamaññaṃ āliṅgetvā ṭhitā bhinnavāhanikā viya ca.
anya-e0104n:1038_4: Kammaviññāṇapaccayā pana tadāpi ubhayaṃ hotīti sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0104n:1038_7: Pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyanti bhavaṅgādijanakakammato aññena rūpuppattikālaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1038_10: Bhavaṅgādiuppattikāle hi taṃjanakena kammunā uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1038_11: so ca vipāko kammaviññāṇapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:1038_12: Sahajātaviññāṇapaccayānapekkhampi hi pavattiyaṃ kammena pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1038_18: Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañcāti ettha nāmarūpasaddo attano ekadesena nāmasaddena nāmasaddassa sarūpo,
anya-e0104n:1038_21: nāmarūpasaddassa ṭhānaṃ itaresañca nāmarūpasaddānaṃ adassananti attho.
anya-e0104n:1039_0: Vipākato aññaṃ avipākaṃ. Yato dvidhā mataṃ, tato yuttameva idanti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1040_1: saddena akusalakiriyacittakkhaṇe viya vipākacittakkhaṇepi vipākājanakakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1040_2: Vipākacittakkhaṇe pana abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā pubbe vuttanayena ubhayañca labbhatīti tādisavipākacittakkhaṇavajjanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n:1041_1: Suttantikapariyāyatoti paṭṭhāne rūpānaṃ upanissayapaccayassa avuttattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1041_2: Suttante pana yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1041_4: so tassa upanissayo nidānaṃ hetu pabhavoti katvā “viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpa”nti rūpassa ca viññāṇūpanissayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1041_10: Tasmā vinā abhāvo eva suttantikapariyāyato upanissayabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1041_11: Nāmassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ kammārammaṇapaṭisandhiādikāle ārammaṇapaccayova hotīti vattabbameva natthīti
anya-e0104n:1041_13: Sasaṃsayassa hi rūpassetaṃ paccayo hotīti vutte nāmassa hotīti vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0104n:1042_0: Pavattassa pākaṭattā apākaṭaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā pucchati “kathaṃ paneta”ntiādinā.
anya-e0104n:1043_0: Yuttito sādhetvā suttena taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto “kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1043_2: Ettha ca “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti bhāsamānena bhagavatā yasmā upaparikkhamānānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva pavattamānaṃ dissati, na satto, na jīvo,
anya-e0104n:1043_3: tasmā kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1043_5: Atha vā nāmarūpamattatāvacanena pavattiyā dukkhasaccamattatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1043_11: nirodhassa ca upāyena vinā anadhigantabbattāti catusaccappakāsanaṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1045_0: 641. Tanti nāmarūpaṃ. Tassāti saḷāyatanassa. Tādisassevāti katekasesasseva.
anya-e0104n:1046_0: Idhāpi nāmanti khandhattayasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n:1046_3: jīvitassa ca yathāsambhavaṃ sahajātanissayapurejātaindriyādinā saḷāyatanassa pavattamānassa ekantena paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1046_4: Rūpāyatanādīnaṃ pana sahajātanissayānupālanabhāvo natthīti aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1046_6: na ca cakkhādīnaṃ viya ekappahārenevāti aniyamato paccayabhāvo.
anya-e0104n:1046_10: Chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ettha yadipi chaṭṭhāyatanasaḷāyatanasaddānaṃ saddato sarūpatā natthi,
anya-e0104n:1046_11: atthato pana saḷāyatanekadesova chaṭṭhāyatananti ekadesasarūpatā atthīti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1046_12: Atthatopi hi sarūpānaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ icchanti “vaṅko ca kuṭilo ca kuṭilā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1047_0: Atha vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca manāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatananti vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatanañca
anya-e0104n:1047_1: chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatanañca manāyatanañca manāyatananti vā ekasesaṃ katvā cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ “saḷāyatana”nti
anya-e0104n:1047_3: nāmarūpapaccayassa ca manāyatanassa vasena kataṃ atthato dassento āha “chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesassā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1047_4: Yathāvuttopi hi ekaseso atthato chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañcāti evaṃ kato nāma hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1047_5: Sabbattha ca ekasese kate ekavacananiddeso katekasesānaṃ saḷāyatanādisaddavacanīyatāsāmaññavasena katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1048_1: rūpassa ca abhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ na hotīti byatirekaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n:1050_1: Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsoti ettha sattadhā paccayabhāvato ukkaṃso aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1050_4: Avakaṃso pana dasadhā paccayabhāvato navadhā paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1050_7: na pana sattadhā paccayabhāvato eva dvepi ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā yojetabbā,
anya-e0104n:1052_0: “Hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā”ti etena arūpe viya asahāyaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1052_1: hadayavatthu ca nāmena saha chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hotīti ettakameva dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1052_2: na pana yathā hadayavatthu paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1052_4: Vatthu hi nāmassa vippayuttapaccayo hoti, na nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1052_7: Pavatte arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa ṭhitippattasseva paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n:1052_8: na uppajjamānassāti vippayuttaatthiavigatā ca pacchājātavippayuttādayo eva cakkhādīnaṃ yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1053_0: “Tatthevā”ti iminā “pavatte”ti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha “tattheva hi pavatte”ti.
anya-e0104n:1053_2: Pavattiyaṃ cakkhāyatanādikassa nāmaṃ vipākapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1054_1: Yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjatīti paṭisandhiyaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ pañcasu āyatanesu kāyāyatanameva uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:1055_0: Avasesamanāyatanassāti ettha “pañcakkhandhabhave panā”ti etassa anuvattamānattā pañcavokārabhave eva
anya-e0104n:1055_1: pavattamānaṃ pañcaviññāṇehi avasesaṃ manāyatanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1055_4: “Rūpapaccayā pañcāyatanānī”ti ayampi nayo labbhati nirodhasamāpannānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0104n:1055_5: so pana apacurabhāvato yebhuyyena ca paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayabhūtasseva nāmarūpassa pavattiyaṃ paccayabhāvo vibhāvitoti na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1057_0: 642. Bāvīsatiyā lokiyavipākaviññāṇehi sampayuttā bāvīsatilokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā. Tato eva bāvīsati.
anya-e0104n:1058_3: Tañhi sasantatipariyāpannakammanibbattaṃ tādisassa phassassa paccayo hoti. Rūpādīni,
anya-e0104n:1058_4: pana bahiddhā anupādinnāni ca phassassa ārammaṇaṃ honti,
anya-e0104n:1058_5: na tāni cakkhādīni viya sasantatipariyāpannakammakilesanimittappavattibhāvena phassassa paccayā hontīti paṭhamācariyavāde na gahitāni,
anya-e0104n:1058_6: dutiyācariyavāde pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāve sati na sakkā vajjetunti gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:1059_1: Ye tāva ācariyā mahāvihāravāsinova yathā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1059_6: “Chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti abhidhammabhājanīyapāḷi āruppaṃ sandhāya vuttāti “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1060_3: athāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n:1060_4: tathāpi sabbāyatanehi sabbaphassasambhavato āyatanabhedena phassabhedo natthīti tadabhedavasena ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya,
anya-e0104n:1060_5: tathā pana asambhavato na yuttanti codeti “na sabbāyatanehī”tiādinā.
anya-e0104n:1060_6: Aññassāpi vā asambhavantassa vidhānassa bodhanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ “nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1060_7: “Na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhotī”ti idameva pana ekaphassavacanassāyuttattadīpakaṃ kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1060_9: Nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhonti,
anya-e0104n:1060_10: evaṃ na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti.
anya-e0104n:1060_12: Parihāraṃ pana anekāyatanehi ekaphassassa sambhavatoti dassento “tatridaṃ vissajjana”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1062_2: bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ārammaṇādinā yathāsambhavaṃ paccayatte vibhāvayeti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1063_2: “Mano ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1063_3: Tathā cāti paccuppannāni rūpādīni paccuppannañca dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ rūparūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1065_1: Dvārato saḷevāti pabhavasāmaññato ekavidhāpi uppattidvārato cha eva hontīti chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1066_0: Cittabhedena ekūnanavutividhāpi idhādhippetā eva dassetuṃ “vedanāsu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1066_1: “Sesāna”nti ettha sampaṭicchanasampayuttāya cakkhusamphassādayo pañca yadipi anantarādīhi paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n:1066_2: anantarādīnaṃ pana upanissaye antogadhattā santīraṇatadārammaṇānañca sādhāraṇassa tassa vasena “ekadhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1066_3: Ekekasmiṃ dvāre hi cakkhudvārādīsu uppannacakkhuviññāṇādīhi sahajātā phassā sakasakavīthīsu sampaṭicchanādīhi sampayuttavedanānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1066_4: manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva pavattānaṃ tebhūmakavipākavedanānampi sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto so phasso aṭṭhadhā paccayo hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1067_2: Tāsampi hi sahajātamanosamphasso aṭṭhadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1067_3: Paccayaṃ anupādinnampi keci icchantīti “yā panā”tiādinā manodvārāvajjanasampayuttaphassassa paccayabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n:1067_6: anānantarassa ca phassassa tassā tassā vipākavedanāya upanissayatā yojetabbāti.
anya-e0104n:1069_2: imasmiṃ vā sāsane cha taṇhā dīpitā.
anya-e0104n:1070_1: ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya ca taṇhāya tadabhinandanānuguṇo rūpādīsu pavattiākāro,
anya-e0104n:1070_2: kevalaṃ kāmassādavasena pavattiyā visiṭṭhākārattā vuttappavattiākārato taṇhāya tividhatā.
anya-e0104n:1071_4: khīrādidāyikā dhāti viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo cha.
anya-e0104n:1072_1: na upanissayo viya uppādakoti uppādakassa upanissayasseva vasena “ekadhāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1072_3: Tena ca ārammaṇabhāvena taṃsabhāgo aññopi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dīpito hotīti upanissayavaseneva paccayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1073_1: tissopi pana vedanā vipākā visesena taṇhāya upanissayapaccayo,
anya-e0104n:1073_4: sukhamicceva bhāsitāti tasmā sāpi bhiyyo icchanavasena taṇhāya upanissayoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1073_5: Upekkhā pana akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhattā dukkhe avarodhetabbā,
anya-e0104n:1073_6: itarā iṭṭhattā sukheti sā dukkhaṃ viya,
anya-e0104n:1073_7: sukhaṃ viya ca upanissayapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:1073_8: “Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti vacanena sabbassa vedanāvato paccayassa atthitāya taṇhuppattippasaṅge tannivāraṇatthamāha “vedanāpaccayā cāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1074_0: Nanu “anusayasahāyā vedanā taṇhāya paccayo”ti vacanassa abhāvā atippasaṅganivattiṃ na sakkā kātunti? Na,
anya-e0104n:1074_2: Vaṭṭassa ca anusayavirahe abhāvato anusayasahitāva paccayoti atthato vuttamevetaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1074_3: Atha vā “avijjāpaccayā”ti anuvattamānattā anusayasahitāva paccayoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:1074_4: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhāti cettha vedanāpaccayā eva taṇhā,
anya-e0104n:1074_5: na vedanāya vināti ayaṃ niyamo icchito,
anya-e0104n:1077_6: kāmo ca soti ettha kattusādhano kilesakāmassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n:1077_12: Purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti purimadiṭṭhiṃ sassatabhāvena gaṇhantī upādiyati,
anya-e0104n:1077_13: purimadiṭṭhiākārena vā uttaradiṭṭhi uppajjamānā teneva purimadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ karontī taṃ upādiyatīti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1077_14: Atha vā purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti “sassato attā”ti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1077_15: Yathā hi esā daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati,
anya-e0104n:1077_17: Attaggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti na idaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1077_18: Loko cāti vā attaggahaṇavinimuttaṃ gahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1078_10: taṃ sīlabbataṃ asuddhimaggaṃ “suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto tathā abhinivisanto upādiyati,
anya-e0104n:1078_12: Sīlabbatasahacaritaṃ parāmāsaṃ sīlabbatanti gahetvā āha “sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1078_21: “Attā”ti hi abhinivisantā vacanamattameva daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇhantīti atthoti.
anya-e0104n:1079_2: vitthārato panā”ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ saṅkhepaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1079_11: evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena kāmanandī,
anya-e0104n:1080_1: taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n:1080_9: phalaṃ vipākoti nissandādiphalañceva nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1080_12: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1080_14: parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti gantabbato,
anya-e0104n:1080_15: āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhātīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1080_16: Na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke ṭhitasseva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1080_17: Natthi paralokoti idhaloke ṭhito paralokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1080_21: paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.
anya-e0104n:1081_3: Te pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1081_5: pavedentīti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n:1081_7: parañca lokaṃ attanā eva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā pavedanasamatthā sabbaññubuddhā nāma natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1081_8: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n:1082_1: sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato,
anya-e0104n:1082_2: ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1082_3: Svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1082_5: Yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā,
anya-e0104n:1082_6: so pana bhavarāgo taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.
anya-e0104n:1083_0: Taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā kāmupādānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1083_1: karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā kāmupādānanti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1084_10: anattani dhammamatte “attā”ti micchābhinivesassa sukhumataradhammupādānatāya sukhumatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1084_11: Upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.
anya-e0104n:1086_6: vibhāgato ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1086_7: Yaṃ yassa paccayoti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa yassa bhavassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1087_1: Upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1087_3: Dutiyo pana kammabhavo sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti bhavo.
anya-e0104n:1088_10: attano pavattikāle bhavābhimukhaṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho,
anya-e0104n:1088_15: Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanāti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi gahaṇaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1088_16: “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettha pana “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1089_0: “Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā”ti etena ācayagāmitāya tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā
anya-e0104n:1089_3: Vuttañhi “kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto,
anya-e0104n:1089_4: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
anya-e0104n:1089_9: pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1089_15: kāmapaccayaṭṭhānatāya “sukho saggo”ti viya kāmāti avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:1090_1: tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:1090_4: so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena “kāmo”ti vattabbo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1090_10: Tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā “saññabhavo”tipi pāṭho.
anya-e0104n:1090_15: so ekasseva khandhassa vasena pavattattā “eko vokāro”ti vutto,
anya-e0104n:1091_1: Kiñcāpi bhavaniddese “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti iminā cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1091_2: Puññābhisaṅkhārādayovāti pana avadhāraṇaṃ paccayadhammavisesepi atthappabhedena saṅkhārabhavaggahaṇesu attheva visesoti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1091_4: Saṅkhārabhavānaṃ dhammabhedato na saṅkhārā eva puna vuttāti “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana”nti etaṃ ayuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n:1091_6: Parena vā dhammavisesaṃ aggahetvā punavacanaṃ coditanti codakābhilāsavasena “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1092_1: Kāmabhavādinibbattakassa kammassa kāmabhavādibhāvo phalavohārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n:1092_2: Sahajātaviññāṇassapi paccayabhūtaṃ avijjāhetukaṃ saṅkhāraggahaṇena yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1092_3: idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato bhavassa nibbattakaṃ upādānahetukaṃ vipaccanāya katokāsameva bhavoti adhippeto.
anya-e0104n:1092_7: tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavoti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū”ti atidisati.
anya-e0104n:1092_12: Antogadhe hi visuṃ aggahetvā abbhantaragate eva katvā kāmabhavādike kammūpapattibhavavasena duguṇe katvā āha “cha bhavā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1093_1: Upādānabhedākaraṇeneva ca dvādasappabhedassa saṅgahavasena saṅgahato “cha bhavā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1094_2: kukkurānañca sahabyatā vuttāti “sīlabbatupādānavato jhānabhāvanā na ijjhatī”ti maññamānā tena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1094_3: Vakkhamānena pana pakārena paccayabhāvato “taṃ na gahetabba”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:1094_4: Asuddhimagge ca suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ sīlabbatupādānanti suddhimaggaparāmasanena rūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ nibbattanaṃ na na yujjatīti.
anya-e0104n:1095_2: evaṃ devaloke ito samiddhatarāti diṭṭhānusārena vā.
anya-e0104n:1095_6: Kāyaduccaritādīnipīti attano adhippetānaṃ kāmānaṃ anupāyabhūtānipi kāyaduccaritādīni karoti,
anya-e0104n:1095_10: sucaritanibbatte ca kāmabhave antogadhā evāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1095_11: Antogadhāti ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1095_12: Na hi te niravasesā kāmabhave antogadhāti.
anya-e0104n:1097_2: arūpabhave sesaucchedavādavasena ayamattā suucchinno hotīti tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karotīti āha “ayaṃ attā nāmā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1098_2: Tattha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānavaseneva upari cattāro diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā āgatā,
anya-e0104n:1098_3: diṭṭhigatiko pana yaṃ kiñci gahetvā yathā tathā abhinivisatīti arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1099_0: Suddhimaggaparāmasanavasena pavattitaṃ yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1099_1: jhānañca sīlabbatamicceva idhādhippetanti āha “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1099_2: Kamena avatvā sīlabbatupādānassa ante bhavapaccayatāvacanaṃ attavādupādānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ asamudācārato,
anya-e0104n:1100_3: tasmā tāni sahajātādīsu hetupaccayaṃ apanīya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhā paccayā hontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n:1100_7: taṃ pana upanissayapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ “vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1102_2: saddena “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavantī”ti sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1102_5: Jāyamānassa pana jāti jātīti upapattibhavopi asati abhāvā jātiyā paccayoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:1103_7: Bhinnasantānikassa visesakāraṇassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato “ajjhattasantāne”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1103_8: Aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti attasantānagatato aññassa visesakāraṇassa anupalabbhamānattā,
anya-e0104n:1103_9: sati ca tasmiṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ abhāvatoti pasaṅgassa dunnivāraṇato kāraṇe avisiṭṭhe phalavisesassa ayujjamānakattā.
anya-e0104n:1104_0: Tena tenāti ñātibyasanādinā jarāmaraṇato aññena dukkhadhammena.
anya-e0104n:1104_5: Yo hi paṭṭhāne anāgato sati bhāvā,
anya-e0104n:1106_1: Na kevalaṃ sokādīnaṃyeva jāti paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1106_2: sokādīnaṃ pana paccayattā avijjāyapi paccayo evāti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1107_0: Tesūti sokādīsu. Siddhesūti labbhamānesu. Siddhā hoti avijjā avinābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1110_4: devo devāsane nābhiramatī”ti vuttāni pañca maraṇapubbanimittānīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1110_5: Tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave bhavacchandabalena devānaṃ balavasoko uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n:1112_0: Āsave sādhentīti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1113_0: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ bhavacakkassa aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati.
anya-e0104n:1113_8: pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti ādimattāya avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1113_9: “Avijjā padhānā”ti vatvā tassā padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “avijjāggahaṇenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1114_4: taṃ taṃ hitāhitaṃ pavattāti attho. Vedeti,
anya-e0104n:1114_11: Brahmādinā vā attanā vāti vā- saddo ca-
anya-e0104n:1115_0: Dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ suññasabhāvānaṃ suññatāya suññaṃ dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1115_1: dhuvabhāvādisuññatāya vā catubbidhampi suññataṃ ekaṃ katvā dvādasaṅgagatattā dvādasavidhāti tāya dvādasasuññatāya suññanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1116_4: Vedanā vā taṇhāsahāyāya avijjāya paccayo hotīti vedanāto avijjā,
anya-e0104n:1116_5: avijjāto saṅkhārāti sambajjhanato vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1116_9: sokādayo ca gahitāti evampi vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttamevetaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1116_12: Avijjā dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viparītābhinivesaṃ kārentī diṭṭhicarite saṃsāre nayati,
anya-e0104n:1116_13: tesaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ saṅkhārādipavattiṃ nayati pavattetīti saṃsāranāyikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1117_4: adiṭṭhānaṃ purimabhave attano hetūnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ phalaṃ anuppādetvā anupacchijjanaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0104n:1117_6: Atha vā purimabhavacakkaṃ dutiyena sambandhaṃ vuttanti vedanāsaṅkhātassa phalassa uppattiyā taṇhādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ anupacchedaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0104n:1117_7: tasmā phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya paṭhamassa bhavacakkassa hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanatoti attho.
anya-e0104n:1117_8: Saṅkhārādīnameva vā phalānaṃ uppattiyā avijjādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ phalaṃ ajanetvā anupacchedameva,
anya-e0104n:1117_9: viññāṇādihetūnaṃ vā saṅkhārādīnaṃ anuppabandhameva pakāseti paṭhamaṃ bhavacakkaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1117_10: na dutiyaṃ viya pariyosānampīti “phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1117_12: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”ntiādinā dhammānaṃ anupubbato pavattiyā dīpanato.
anya-e0104n:1117_13: “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti hi ettha aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ kalalarūpaṃ vatvā tato uddhaṃ “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti saḷāyatanappavatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1117_15: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti vā upapattikkhandhānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppattiyā dīpanato.
anya-e0104n:1117_16: Na hi ettha paṭhame viya bhavacakke āyatanānaṃ kamena uppatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1118_3: Hetuphalahetuphalavasena catuppabhedo aṅgānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti catubhedasaṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1118_4: Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā.
anya-e0104n:1118_6: Kilesakammavipākā vipākakilesakammehi sambandhā hutvā punappunaṃ parivattantīti tesu vaṭṭanāmaṃ āropetvā “tivaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1120_0: Paritassatīti taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pariggahakaraṇavasena tassati,
anya-e0104n:1121_0: Tassa ca sabbhāvo kariyamānatā evāti āha “kammabhave kariyamāneti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n:1121_1: Dukkhādīsu mohoti dukkhādīnaṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādako appahīno moho.
anya-e0104n:1121_7: sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā”ti idaṃ yathādassitāya dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇabhājanīye vuttāya paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1121_12: Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādinā hi saṅkhārānaṃ cetanābhāvo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n:1121_13: Tattha paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ “cetanāsampayuttā vipākadhammattā savipākena āyūhanasaṅkhātena saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1121_14: Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti bhavassa paccayabhāvena bhavagāmibhāvato,
anya-e0104n:1121_15: kammasaṃsaṭṭhasahāyatāya kammabhāvato ca upapattibhavaṃ bhāventīti “bhavo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1121_16: Upapattibhavabhāvanākiccaṃ pana cetanāya sātisayanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā cetanā “bhavo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1121_17: Bhavābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ cetanāya sātisayanti vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “kusalā cetanā”tiādinā cetanā “saṅkhārā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1121_18: Tasmā tena tena pariyāyena ubhayaṃ ubhayattha vattuṃ yuttanti natthettha virodho.
anya-e0104n:1121_19: Tassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanāti “tassa sutaṃ hoti ‘cātumahārājikā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā’ti”ādisutānusārena
anya-e0104n:1121_23: Āyūhanāvasāneti tīsupi atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne.
anya-e0104n:1122_1: Bhavantarassa atītabhavassa iminā paccuppannabhavena paṭisandhānaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1123_0: Dvīsu atthavikappesu vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre “tassa pubbabhāgā”ti āha,
anya-e0104n:1123_3: Daharassa cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā na hotīti “idha paṭipakkattā āyatanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1123_4: “Kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito”ti etena kammassa paccayabhūtaṃ sammohaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1124_3: anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1124_9: kammabhavo ca vipākabhavo ca kammavaṭṭañca vipākavaṭṭañca,
anya-e0104n:1133_0: Satte ca nupalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassata”nti. ;
anya-e0104n:1134_0: Tattha kammāneva vipākaṃ sambharanti vaḍḍhentīti kammasambhārā,
anya-e0104n:1134_5: avijjādayo ca kammasambhārāti kammañca kammasambhārā ca kammasambhārāti ekasesavasena kammasambhāraggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1134_6: Dasa dhammā kammanti avijjādayopi kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā,
anya-e0104n:1135_2: tisandhiādivasena vā samuppannaṃ idaṃ bhavacakkanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1135_6: vikārāpattidīpakena calasaddena ca adīpitaṃ kālantaraṭṭhāyitābhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n:1135_9: “Ṭhānaso hetuso”ti ettha evaṃ vuttaṃ vā ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1135_10: aññampi tassa tassa sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambhāro,
anya-e0104n:1135_13: hetunirodhā ca vaṭṭacchede dhamme ca taṃnirodhāya desite satīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1135_14: Brahmacariyaṃ idha brahmacariyidha satte cāti ettha ca-
anya-e0104n:1135_19: ucchedo vā siyāti nupalabbhante tasmiṃ neva ucchedo na sassatanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1136_0: 655. Saccappabhavatoti saccato, saccānaṃ vā pabhavato ca.
anya-e0104n:1137_0: Kusalākusalaṃ kammanti vaṭṭakathāya vattamānattā sāsavanti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:1137_2: sabbampi taṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1137_4: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā”ti hi cetanācetanāsampayuttavisesaṃ akatvā vuttanti,
anya-e0104n:1137_5: ariyasaccavisesaṃ vā akatvā samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1137_6: Saccavibhaṅge hi sabbepi kilesā sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ “samudayasacca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1138_3: Sammohetīti dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adentī tassa paṭicchādanavasena sammoheti.
anya-e0104n:1138_5: Aññamaññañca upatthambheti aññamaññasannissayena vinā ṭhātuṃ asakkontā dve naḷakalāpā viya.
anya-e0104n:1138_7: Jāyamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānā jāti te janentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “khandhe ca janetī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1138_9: Pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhatīti etthāpi “khandhe janetī”ti ettha vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1138_17: tehi siddhāya avijjāya sahitehi saṅkhārehi paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1138_18: Cuticittaṃ vā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hotīti “paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1138_19: Taṃ pana cuticittaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārarahitaṃ bhavantarassa paccayo na hotīti sasahāyattadassanatthamāha “sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1139_1: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhārānaṃ paccayuppannatādassanena “ko nu kho abhisaṅkharotīti esa no kallo pañho”ti dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1139_3: Attā bhavato bhavantaraṃ saṅkamatīti dassanaṃ attasaṅkantidassanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1139_5: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ abhedato eko attāti gahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā,
anya-e0104n:1139_6: taṃ yamakatālakandaṃ bhindantena viya “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamattameta”nti vacanena nivāritaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1139_8: Sokādayopi hi paccayāyattā avasavattinoti “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ soka…pe…
anya-e0104n:1140_1: “Salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasenā”ti etena sabbappakārena dhammānaṃ yāthāvato adassanamāha tadubhayavinimuttassa
anya-e0104n:1140_7: Gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viyāti bhedanatthaṃ paccamāne gaṇḍe tassa upari jāyamānā khuddakapīḷakā viya,
anya-e0104n:1140_10: Ghaṭṭanadukkhaṃ viyāti ghaṭṭanato jātaṃ dukkhaṃ viya tividhadukkhatāvasena tissannampi vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1140_17: Sarasato gaṇḍassa bhijjanaṃ pākena vinā na hotīti bhedaggahaṇenevassa pākopi gahitoti katvā āha “gaṇḍabhedo viya jarāmaraṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:1141_0: Upamāhi bhavacakkaṃ viññāpentena ekādhiṭṭhānehi upamāvisesehi taṃ viññāpetvā idāni nānādhiṭṭhānehi viññāpetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1141_3: evaṃ avijjābhibhūto dukkhādīni na paṭipajjati na passati,
anya-e0104n:1141_4: micchā vā paṭipajjatīti paṭalaṃ viya avijjā.
anya-e0104n:1141_6: vaṭṭassa attano eva paribbhamanakāraṇattā ca kosappadesā viya saṅkhārā.
anya-e0104n:1141_7: Saṅkhārapariggahaṃ vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pariṇāyakapariggahaṃ vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamāno
anya-e0104n:1141_8: rājakumāro viyāti pariggahena vinā patiṭṭhālābho ettha upamopameyyasāmaññaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1141_20: Tadassupādānanti taṃ abhilāsakaraṇaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanaṃ assa taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa,
anya-e0104n:1141_22: Byasanāvahatāya ajānanato bhavupādānaṃ macchassa baḷisupādānaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:1141_23: Ettha ca saṅkhārādīnaṃ kosappadesapariṇāyakādīhi dvīhi dvīhi sadisatāya dve dve upamā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1142_1: Koci agambhīro eva gambhīro viya khāyati purāṇatiṇapaṇṇādibharito pabbatasaṅkhepe jalāsayo viya,
anya-e0104n:1142_3: Ayaṃ pana gambhīrova hutvā obhāsati pakāsati dissatīti gambhīrāvabhāso.
anya-e0104n:1143_1: hoti evāti avadhāraṇe siddhe “siyā nu kho jarāmaraṇaṃ jātito,
anya-e0104n:1143_2: aññatopī”ti āsaṅkāyaṃ tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1143_5: Tenassa nāññaṃ jātiyā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ nivattitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1143_9: Jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭhoti jātipaccayasambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1143_11: Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho.
anya-e0104n:1143_13: na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī”ti hi jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho vutto.
anya-e0104n:1143_15: yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1144_0: Tattha “na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī”ti iminā jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayatāya avitathataṃ dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1144_1: “na jātiṃ vinā aññato jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”ti iminā anaññathattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1144_3: Tena ca yathā paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannānaṃ paccayabhāve,
anya-e0104n:1144_7: “Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena atthassa hetuphalabhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti?
anya-e0104n:1144_8: “Atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetuphale ñāṇa”nti vuttattā.
anya-e0104n:1144_9: “Atthe paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “atthe”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetuphale”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1144_12: ñāṇapaṭisambhidā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvo.
anya-e0104n:1145_1: Sabhāvadhammā hi paccayavisesasiddhena pavattiākārena visiṭṭhākārā honti.
anya-e0104n:1145_2: Tenāha “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1145_4: Avatthāvisesavanto hi dhammā tena tena avatthāvisesena taṃ taṃ atthakiccaṃ sādhetuṃ samatthā honti.
anya-e0104n:1145_6: avatthāviseso ca avijjāyapi anupacitakusalasambhārehi duravabodhato eva ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho cāti āha “tassa…pe…
anya-e0104n:1145_10: Hetumhi ñāṇanti ettha hetuno dhammapariyāyatā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1146_1: Tena tena kāraṇenāti tena tena veneyyānaṃ bujjhanānuguṇatāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena.
anya-e0104n:1146_9: “Ime cattāro āhārā kiṃnidānā”tiādikāya vemajjhato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanāya,
anya-e0104n:1147_1: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo paṭivedho”ti.
