anya-e0104n:1147_4: Yena panesā dukkhādīnaṃ yāthāvasarasaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
anya-e0104n:1147_9: Rāgassa vā apaṭipakkhabhāvato rāgapavaḍḍhako apuññābhisaṅkhāro sabbopi sarāgo,
anya-e0104n:1147_13: assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n:1147_15: eso me attā”ti attaparāmāsassa viññāṇaṃ visesato vatthu vuttanti viññāṇassa suññataṭṭho gambhīro.
anya-e0104n:1147_16: Attā vijānāti saṃsaratīti sabyāpāratāsaṅkanti abhinivesabalavatāya abyāpāraṭṭhaasaṅkantipaṭisandhipātubhāvaṭṭhā ca gambhīrā.
anya-e0104n:1147_24: Ekuppādekanirodhe hi avinibbhoge adhippete so rūpassa ca ekakalāpavuttino labbhati.
anya-e0104n:1147_25: Atha vā ekacatuvokārabhavesu nāmarūpānaṃ asahavattanato aññamaññavinibbhogo,
anya-e0104n:1148_1: “Lokopeso dvārāpesā khettampeta”nti vuttā lokādiatthā cakkhādīsu pañcasu yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1148_3: manosamphassādīnaṃ dvārakhettabhāvato ca ete atthā sambhavanti eva.
anya-e0104n:1148_4: Āpāthagatānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ pakāsanayogyatālakkhaṇaṃ obhāsanaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visayibhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1148_13: Sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāvā yathākkamaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ sabhāvavasena vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1148_14: Attā vedayatīti abhinivesassa balavatāya nijjīvaṭṭho vedanāya gambhīro.
anya-e0104n:1148_28: Jarāmaraṇaṅgaṃ maraṇappadhānanti maraṇaṭṭhā eva khayādayo gambhīrāti dassitā.
anya-e0104n:1149_2: avijjādiatthehi ekattādī sakena bhāvena nayanti gamentīti ekattādayo,
anya-e0104n:1149_5: Atthā eva vā ekattādibhāvena nīyamānā ñāyamānā atthanayāti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1150_1: santānānupacchedena bījaṃ rukkhabhāvaṃ pattaṃ rukkhabhāvena pavattaṃ tañca ekattena vuccatīti santānānupacchedo
anya-e0104n:1150_3: evaṃ idhāpi avijjāsaṅkhārādihetuhetusamuppannānaṃ santānānupacchedo ekasantatipatitatā ekattanayoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1150_5: Satipi hi hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato bhede hetubhāvena,
anya-e0104n:1150_11: phalañca abhinnaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ ekabhāvassa abhedassa gahaṇena.
anya-e0104n:1151_2: Bhinnasantānassevāti sambandharahitassa nānattassa gahaṇato añño mato,
anya-e0104n:1152_6: “Kassaci kattuno abhāvā na kāci kiriyā phalapabandhinī”ti akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
anya-e0104n:1153_3: na vālikato”ti sabbato sabbasambhavābhāvadassanena ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ hetuanurūpameva phalaṃ passanto akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:1153_4: Yato kutocīti yadi aññasmā aññassa uppatti siyā,
anya-e0104n:1153_6: ucchuto khīrassa kasmā uppatti na siyā,
anya-e0104n:1153_7: tasmā na koci kassaci hetu atthīti ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ,
anya-e0104n:1153_8: avijjamānepi hetumhi niyatatāya tilagāvīsukkasoṇitādīhi telakhīrasarīrādīni pavattantīti niyativādañca upādiyatīti viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1154_1: Yasmā idañhi bhavacakkaṃ apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto na koci supinantarepi atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1155_0: Ñāṇāsinā apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto natthīti etassa sādhakasuttaṃ dassento “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1155_7: pabbajā viya ca bhūtā jātā muñjapabbajabhūtā.
anya-e0104n:1155_8: Tadubhayaṃ kira tiṇaṃ ākulaṃ jaṭitaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhati.
anya-e0104n:1155_12: catubbidhaṃ apāyaṃ “khandhānañca paṭipāṭī”tiādinā vuttaṃ saṃsārañca nātivattati.
anya-e0104n:1155_13: Saṃsāro eva vā sabbo idha vaḍḍhiapagamādiatthehi apāyādināmako vutto kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1160_2: Imesu yathāvicāritesu khandhādīsu vipassanāya bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu.
anya-e0104n:1160_6: tadubhayavasena yasmā tatthapi ñāṇaṃ svāsevitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1160_10: tasmā tattha vitthāritanayānusārena sīlavisuddhi sampādetabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1160_11: Upacārasamādhipi appanāsamādhi viya vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato cittavisuddhiyevāti āha “saupacārā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1160_13: Evañhi tā paccakkhato viditā nāma honti,
anya-e0104n:1160_16: Na hi kevalena jānanamattena cittavisuddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1160_17: na ca tattha apatiṭṭhāya uparivisuddhiṃ sampādetuṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0104n:1161_2: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ tebhūmakānaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1161_3: na “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti ettha viya viññāṇaṃ vinā,
anya-e0104n:1161_4: nāpi “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti ettha viya sanibbānehi lokuttarakkhandhehi saddhinti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1162_4: jhānūpacāre vā patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassetaṃ nāmaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1162_6: “Ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti idaṃ bhavaggadhammānaṃ ādikammikassa duppariggahatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1162_8: pariggahavidhi pana khandhaniddese vuttā evāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1162_12: Vedanādayo hi arūpadhammā sabbadāpi ca phassādināmakattā pathavīādayo viya kesakumbhādināmantarānāpajjanato
anya-e0104n:1162_14: Atha vā adhivacanasamphasso viya adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ antarena anupacitasambhārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ na gacchantīti
anya-e0104n:1162_16: rūpaṃ pana vināpi nāmasavanaṃ attano ruppanasabhāveneva gahaṇaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0104n:1162_19: rūpena ca amissitaṃ katvā citte ṭhapetabbanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1163_0: Nāmarūpapariggaho ca nāma yāvadeva tassa paṭinissajjanatthanti tadanurūpameva nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1163_1: Ruppanatoti ettha ruppanaṭṭho “sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppattī”tiādinā khandhaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0104n:1163_3: rūpapariggahañca dassetvā idāni ekajjhaṃ nāmarūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ “tato namanalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1164_1: Iti arūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpamukhena taṃ dassento “suddhavipassanāyāniko panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1164_5: Ayameva vā samathayānikoti yathāvutto samathayāniko eva vā.
anya-e0104n:1164_9: ayaṃ pathavīdhātū”tiādinā saṅkhepamanasikārādivasena vuttesu terasasu dhātupariggahamukhesu.
anya-e0104n:1164_12: Kāyappasādassa viya bhāvassāpi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya “bhāvassa atthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1164_15: imāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni catuvīsati rūpānīti sabbānipi catucattālīsa,
anya-e0104n:1164_18: Na hi sabbakālaṃ utucittato rūpaṃ uppajjantaṃ sasaddameva uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n:1164_21: Catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesūti dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu vakkhamāne aṭṭha koṭṭhāse apanetvā catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu.
anya-e0104n:1164_23: cittavikārena ca uppajjanato te utucittasamuṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1165_0: Dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsagatesu rūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu tadaññānipi pākaṭāni hontīti tānipi dassetuṃ “apare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1165_1: Tattha apare dasa ākārāti tejovāyokoṭṭhāsavasena apare dasa ākārā.
anya-e0104n:1165_3: na visesanaṃ asitādiparipācakassa tejassa akammajassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1165_4: Tathā cittajeti ca ekantacittasamuṭṭhānattā assāsapassāsānanti keci, taṃ na,
anya-e0104n:1165_10: Sesesūti santappanādivasena ceva uddhaṅgamādivasena ca pavattesu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu.
anya-e0104n:1166_0: Cakkhudasakādīsu padhānarūpaṃ cakkhādayoti tesu labbhamānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ avayavakiccaṃ samudāye
anya-e0104n:1166_5: Koṭṭhāsāvayavānaṃ pana tadavayavakalāpānañca bhede gayhamāne ativiya tato bahutaro rūpabhedo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1166_6: so pana bhedo idha ādikammikassa duppariggahoti na gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1167_1: dvāravasena pana pariggaho anākuloti katvā vuttaṃ “dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā hontī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1167_3: lābhino eva pana mahaggatacittāni supākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0104n:1167_5: Phassādayo hi satta cetasikā cakkhuviññāṇādīhipi uppajjanato sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā.
anya-e0104n:1167_8: Ārammaṇādivibhāgena pana cittuppādabhede gayhamāne tato bahutaro eva hoti,
anya-e0104n:1168_1: Assa cakkhupasādassa nissayabhūtā pana catasso dhātuyoti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1168_6: Sesānīti paṭhamaṃ cakkhuno vuttattā tato sesāni,
anya-e0104n:1168_7: tena pana saddhiṃ catupaññāsa rūpāni honti.
anya-e0104n:1168_8: Cakkhudasakādīsu ekassapi aggahetabbato “avasesāni tecattālīsa rūpānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1168_9: Saddassa aniyatattā taṃ aggahetvā “tecattālīsa rūpānī”ti vatvā puna utucittasamuṭṭhāne dve sadde gahetvā “pañcacattālīsā”ti kecivādo dassito.
anya-e0104n:1169_0: Avasesarūpānīti “dasa dhātuyo”ti vutte dvādasa rūpadhamme ṭhapetvā avasesāni cha nipphannarūpāni.
anya-e0104n:1169_4: cittabhāvasāmaññena ca kusalākusalavipākatāya duvidhampi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cittantveva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1169_7: Manoviññāṇadhātūti etthapi “ekā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “ekā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti.
anya-e0104n:1171_1: Idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ sarīreti ajjhattaṃ vipassanābhinivesadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1171_2: Teneva hi ekasseva bhāvassa gahitattā “sattarasa rūpāni sammasanupagānī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1172_1: Evaṃ dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena vitthārato rūpapariggahaṃ tadanusārena vitthārato eva nāmapariggahaṃ
anya-e0104n:1172_5: pañcakkhandhavasena ca rūpārūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā atisaṃkhittanayenāpi dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1173_16: pacchimāni dve paccekaṃ nāmañca rūpañcāti evaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayānusārena indriyasaccapaccayākāravasenapi nāmarūpapariggaho kātabbo.
anya-e0104n:1173_17: Evaṃ pana nāmarūpapariggahassa vibhāgena kathane payojanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n:1174_1: Kāmaṃ vedanādīsu arūpadhammesu na uttaruttarā viya purimapurimā sukhumā,
anya-e0104n:1174_2: tathāpi saṅghaṭṭanena vikāraāpajjanake rūpadhamme upādāya sabbepi te sukhumā evāti āha “sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1174_9: Ādikammikassa hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantassa yāva dhammā suparibyattaṃ na upatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:1174_10: tāva te tappaṭicchādakasammohabalena abhibhūtā avisuddhā nāma honti,
anya-e0104n:1174_12: Yadā pana sammasanādividhinā taṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1174_16: Ādikammikassa arūpadhammā yebhuyyena rūpadhamme ārabbha pavattanākārena gahaṇaṃ gacchantīti katvā vuttaṃ “tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1174_17: Teneva hi heṭṭhā “tassevaṃ pariggahitarūpassa dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1175_1: upatthambho cāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāhi pakāsetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1175_9: tadā mukhanimittassa apaññāyanaṃ viya rūpapariggahassa avisuddhatāya arūpadhammānaṃ anupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1175_10: ādāsassa punappunaṃ parimajjanaṃ viya rūpapariggahassa punappunaṃ visodhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1175_11: suparimajjite ādāse subyattaṃ mukhanimittassa paññāyanaṃ viya suvikkhālite nijjaṭe rūpapariggahe arūpadhammānaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0104n:1175_12: Iminā nayena telatthikopamādīsupi yathārahaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1176_0: Tappaccanīkakilesāti tassa arūpadhammapariggāhakañāṇassa vibandhabhāvena paṭipakkhabhūtā sammohādikilesā.
anya-e0104n:1176_2: yathā ucchurasaṃ gahetukāmo ucchūni ucchuyante pakkhipitvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ yantakkamanamattena ucchurase
anya-e0104n:1176_4: yathā vā core gahetvā tehi katakammaṃ jānitukāmo dvattippahāramattena tesu tamatthaṃ akathentesu na te muñcati,
anya-e0104n:1176_5: yathā vā pana godammako goṇaṃ dametukāmo dhure taṃ yojetvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ tasmiṃ pathena agacchante na vissajjeti,
anya-e0104n:1176_6: yathā ca dadhiṃ manthetvā navanītaṃ gahetukāmo dadhikalasiyaṃ manthaṃ pakkhipitvā sakiṃ,
anya-e0104n:1176_7: dvikkhattuṃ vā manthassa bhamanamattena navanīte anuppajjante na dadhiṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0104n:1176_8: yathā vā pana macche pacitvā khāditukāmo ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ aggidānamattena macchesu apaccantesu na te chaḍḍeti.
anya-e0104n:1176_9: “Atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ parimajjatī”ti ettha vuttanayānusārena “atha kho naṃ ucchuyante punappunaṃ uppīḷetī”tiādinā sabbattha upamattho yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1178_2: arūpadhammānaṃ upaṭṭhānassa mukhabhūtā phusanānubhavanavijānanappakārāti āha “arūpadhammā tīhi ākārehi upaṭṭhahantī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1178_3: Ārammaṇe pavattamānesu cittacetasikesu asatipi pubbāpariye phusanalakkhaṇo phasso,
anya-e0104n:1178_4: tattha sabbapaṭhamaṃ abhinipatanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamābhinipāto phasso”ti.
anya-e0104n:1178_6: Phasse pana upaṭṭhite yasmiṃ ārammaṇe so phasso,
anya-e0104n:1178_10: paṭivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇanti imepi pākaṭā hontīti āha “taṃsampayuttā vedanā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1178_11: Evaṃ salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato catudhātuvavatthānavasena phassamukhena arūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato
anya-e0104n:1178_13: Tattha kese pathavīdhātūti kesasaṅkhāte pathavīkoṭṭhāse pathavīdhātu.
anya-e0104n:1179_0: Punapi dvinnaṃ dhātuvavatthānānaṃ vasena vedanāmukhena arūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ “ekassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1179_1: Tattha tassa rasānubhavanakavedanāti thaddhabhāvasaṅkhātassa phoṭṭhabbasabhāvassa anubhavanavasena pavattavedanā.
anya-e0104n:1181_1: salakkhaṇavibhattito ca dhātuvavatthānavasena rūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā tattha ṭhitassa phassādimukhena arūpapariggaṇhanupāyo dassito,
anya-e0104n:1181_5: saddena na kevalaṃ “paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātū”tiādinā lakkhaṇavisesena saddhiṃ dhātvantarāniyeva,
anya-e0104n:1181_8: Sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvāti yvāyaṃ dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito vavatthāpanavasena
anya-e0104n:1181_11: cakkhudhātuādīsu rūpapariggahamukhesu arūpapariggahadassanavasena yojanā kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1182_1: Yathā nāma heṭṭhimajhānaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitameva uparijhānassa pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1182_3: evaṃ rūpapariggaho suvisuddho nijjaṭo niggumbo eva arūpapariggahassa pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1182_5: tasmā rūpārūpassa ekadesepi anupaṭṭhite so avisuddho eva nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1182_6: pageva bahūsu anupaṭṭhitesūti dassento āha “sace hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1182_7: Pabbateyyā gāvī viya bālā abyattā akhettaññū.
anya-e0104n:1183_2: Apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa avibhattaṃ viya upaṭṭhahantampi nāmarūpaṃ vibhattasabhāvameva,
anya-e0104n:1183_3: tassa ca vibhāgo kammaṭṭhānapariggahesu pākaṭo hotīti ca dassanatthaṃ samuggavivaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1183_7: Sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapetīti ettha kiñcāpi sabba-
anya-e0104n:1183_9: nāmarūpabhāvo pana aññamaññavidhuroti na tadubhayaṃ samudāyavasena parisamāpayetabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1183_13: taṃ rūpa”nti evaṃ dvedhā vavatthapetīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1183_14: Evaṃ vavatthapentoyeva ca tadubhayavinimuttassa tebhūmakadhammesu kassaci dhammassa abhāvato “sabbepi
anya-e0104n:1183_15: tebhūmakadhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapetī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1183_16: “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti eteneva tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe “dvedhā vavatthapetī”ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1183_18: “Sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme”ti pana sabbaggahaṇañcettha sammasamanupagassa dhammassa anavasesetabbatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1184_2: anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
anya-e0104n:1184_5: abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1185_5: Ummattakavipallāsasadise asammāsambuddhapavedite kā tattha aññā paṭipatti aññatra ajjhupekkhanato.
anya-e0104n:1185_6: Atha vā tepi nāmarūpantogadhabhāvābhāvavasena nicchitā evāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Pakati, mahā, ahaṃkāro,
anya-e0104n:1185_10: Tattha samabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sattarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ sukhadukkhamohānaṃ samudāyo pakati,
anya-e0104n:1185_16: Saddaphassarūparasagandhā tammattāni aññamaññavisiṭṭhānaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ ekuttaratādassanato ekuttarāni
anya-e0104n:1185_17: tammattānīti vijjhavāsiekalakkhaṇehi tammattehi ekalakkhaṇā visesā sajiyanti,
anya-e0104n:1185_18: sukhumabhāvena pana nesaṃ sampavesanato ekuttaratāti keci.
anya-e0104n:1185_24: cetanāsabhāvo purisoti evaṃ pakatiādīni sarūpato veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n:1186_0: Tattha hi pakati tāva sukhadukkhamohamattatāya nāmaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1186_3: Mahāpi “tasmā aliṅgato liṅgavisesāmatto mahā uppajjatī”ti vacanato,
anya-e0104n:1186_6: “Tasmā mahato cha visesā sajiyantī”ti sakkate vacanato “asmī”ti gahaṇanimittabhāvānujānanena ahaṃkāro abhimānoti katvā nāmaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1186_10: Te hi soḷasa visesā pañca bhūtāni,
anya-e0104n:1186_11: ekādasindriyāni bhūtehi bhūtavisesānīti gandhāditammattehi tannissayāni pathavīāpotejovāyoākāsasaṅkhātāni bhūtāni icchitāni.
anya-e0104n:1186_12: “Tabbisesā ca nānājātikā ahaṃkārato ca indriyānī”ti vacanato sotakāyacakkhujivhāghānavācāpāṇipādapāyūpatthāni ceva mano cāti ekādasindriyāni.
anya-e0104n:1187_3: Imesaṃ pana dhammino dhammassa anaññatthassa icchitattā siddhāva aniccatā pariṇāmapakkhe,
anya-e0104n:1187_4: abhibyattipakkhepi yadi tabbisayañāṇuppādena abhibyañjanaṃ siddhāva aniccatā,
anya-e0104n:1187_8: Tattha pathavī āpo tejo vāyu ākāso kālo disā attā manoti nava drabyāni.
anya-e0104n:1187_9: Sadda rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhā parimāṇāni puthūtva saṃyoga viyoga paratvā paratva buddhi sukha
anya-e0104n:1187_10: dukkha icchā dosa payatta gurutva dravatva sneha vegā saṅkhārā diṭṭhā ceti evamete tevīsati guṇā.
anya-e0104n:1187_11: Ukkhepanaṃ avakkhepanamākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamanamiti pañca kammāni.
anya-e0104n:1187_13: iti yato drabyaguṇakammesu sā atthi evāti etaṃ mahāsāmaññaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1187_15: taṃ yathā drabyatva guṇatva kammatva ghaṭatvādi,
anya-e0104n:1187_18: kapālesu ghaṭoti iheti yato hetuhetuphalānaṃ sambandho samavāyoti vutto,
anya-e0104n:1188_0: Tattha pathavī āpa teja vāyū bhūtarūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1188_9: Saṅkhā ekādikā taṃ taṃ upādāya paññattimattaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1188_15: Samānadisādesagatānaṃ rūpānaṃ mahadabbantarānaṃ vasena paramaparanti paññattimattaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1188_17: Gurutva dravatva snehavegā rūpadhammānaṃ pavattivisesato gahetabbākārā.
anya-e0104n:1188_20: Ukkhepanaṃ avakkhepanaṃ ākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamananti rūpadhammānaṃ pavattimattaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1189_9: “Kammapuggalānamāsavo”ti vacanato puññāpuññasambhave āsavasamaññāti tato avisiṭṭho āsavo.
anya-e0104n:1189_11: “Kammaphalappavattiyā pakatiyā appavatti nijjaro”ti vacanato vipākanirodhanimittaṃ nijjaro.
anya-e0104n:1189_13: Tattha kammapuggalānaṃ saddādilakkhaṇatāya rūpamattatā puññāpuññamattatāya arūpatā.
anya-e0104n:1189_15: Bhāvamokkho pana jīvassa rāgādibhāvāpariṇāmo rāgādayo nāmamevāti jīvādayopi nāmarūpantogadhā eva.
anya-e0104n:1190_4: kāyoti anatthantara”nti vacanato kāyato aññaṃ kiñci natthi.
anya-e0104n:1190_5: “Pavattisaññā kiriyāsaṃyogavibhāgesū”ti vacanato gatiādippakārena pavattā pathavīādayo eva pavatti upacāro.
anya-e0104n:1190_6: “Tasmiṃ anatthantara”nti vacanato kāyato anaññā suramanujapetatiracchānanarakūpapattiyo gatiyo.
anya-e0104n:1190_7: Tāsu purimāpurimāvisiṭṭho gatīsu jātassa nicchayopi pavattimattanti tato anaññā kaṇhanīlarattapītasukkaatisukkasaṅkhātā jātiyo.
anya-e0104n:1190_10: “Dosesu bandhasamaññā”ti vacanato aññāṇādilakkhaṇassa bandhassa jīvato anaññatā.
anya-e0104n:1191_0: Yopi tattha tattha “puriso attā jīvo”tiādipariyāyehi vutto attapadattho,
anya-e0104n:1193_4: Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā etamatthaṃ saṃsandetvā vavatthapetīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1193_8: santānādighanabhedassa ca akatattā abhinivesena vinā samūhekattaggahaṇavasena “satto”ti pavatto sammoho sattasammoho.
anya-e0104n:1193_13: nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti evamādinā sambahulānaṃ suttantānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n:1194_0: Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārahetu. Tannimittaṃ taṃ amuñcitvā sati eva tasmiṃ “satto”ti vohāro.
anya-e0104n:1195_0: Agārantvevāti yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca upādāya tesaṃ nāmaṃ vissajjetvā agāramicceva saṅkhaṃ samaññaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0104n:1195_1: evaṃ aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca upādāya tesaṃ nāmaṃ vissajjetvā rūpaṃ sarīramicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1196_0: Dukkhameva sambhotīti dukkhadukkhatādibhedaṃ tividhaṃ dukkhameva sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:1196_2: tadeva dukkhaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitipabandhaṭṭhitivasena tiṭṭhati ceva khaṇanirodhaāyukkhayanirodhādivasena nirujjhati cāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1196_3: Idāni dukkhamevāti evakārena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “nāññatrā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1196_5: yathāvuttaṃ dukkhaṃ ṭhapetvā tato aññaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ na sambhavati,
anya-e0104n:1196_7: sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvā kuto tassa nirodhoti.
anya-e0104n:1198_1: Ekenākārena saṇṭhitesūti yena pakārena akkhādīsu sanniviṭṭhesu rathasamaññā,
anya-e0104n:1198_2: tena ekena ākārena samavaṭṭhitesu ekajjhaṃ rāsikatesu.
anya-e0104n:1198_3: Evamevanti sannivesavisiṭṭhe avayavasamudāye santānavasena pavattamāne yathā “ratho gehaṃ muṭṭhi vīṇā senā nagaraṃ rukkho”ti vohāramattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1198_4: paramatthato pana rathādi nāma kiñci natthi, evamevaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1198_5: Upādānakkhandhesūti upādānakkhandhasaññitesu rūpārūpadhammesu samuditesu santānavasena pavattamānesu “satto jīvo”ti vohāramattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1198_6: paramatthato pana satto vā jīvo vā natthīti yāthāvato jānanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1199_9: Avināsaṃ anujānantoti buddhiādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vināsaṃ icchantopi “dhammī nicco kūṭaṭṭho”ti attano vināsābhāvaṃ anujānanto.
anya-e0104n:1199_14: Tadanvayassāti tassa attano anvayabhūtassa aññassa kassaci abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1199_15: Olīyati nāmāti “sassato attā”ti abhinivesena bhavābhirato hutvā bhavanirodhato saṅkocanaṃ āpajjanto bhaveyeva nilīyati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1199_16: Atidhāvati nāmāti tattha tattheva hi bhave attā ucchijjatīti ucchedavādī “ucchijjati attā”ti gaṇhanto
anya-e0104n:1199_17: paraṃ maraṇā santaṃ bhavaṃ “natthī”ti atikkamanto atidhāvati nāmāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1199_18: Kilesanirodhe pana kammassa avipaccanato bhavanirodhe icchitabbe tathā aggahetvā “taṃ taṃ bhavavisesaṃ
anya-e0104n:1199_19: āgamma attā ucchijjatīti evaṃ bhavanirodho hotī”ti gaṇhanto taṃ atidhāvati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1200_0: Pariyuṭṭhitāti abhibhūtā. Cakkhumantoti yathābhūtadassanasaṅkhātena ñāṇacakkhunā cakkhumanto.
anya-e0104n:1201_0: Kāmabhavādibhedo bhavo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etesanti bhavārāmā.
anya-e0104n:1201_4: Cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti bhavassādagadhitattā eva bhavanirodhāvahe dhamme cittaṃ na anuppavisati.
anya-e0104n:1204_2: yathābhūtadassanato nibbidādiguṇe ca suttavaseneva dassetvā idāni nāmarūpamattepi gamanādiattakiccasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1204_3: Tattha tasmāti yasmā “asmī”ti vā “aha”nti vā gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi,
anya-e0104n:1204_7: “Khāyatī”ti etena yathā nijjīve dārumayayante abbhantare vattamānassa jīvassa vasena saīhassa sabyāpārassa viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ paccayavisesato,
anya-e0104n:1204_8: evaṃ nijjīve nāmarūpamatte paccayavisesato gamanādiattakiccasiddhīti saīhassa sabyāpārassa viya upaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1205_2: Suññaṃ jīvena yantamiva abhisaṅkhataṃ paccayavasena pavattīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1205_3: Dukkhassa puñjo niccāturatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasadiso attasuññatāyāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1206_1: So ca kho yamakabhāvo aññamaññasannissitabhāvenāti āha “ubho aññoññanissitā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1206_2: Tato eva ca ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjanti.
anya-e0104n:1206_3: Na hi kadāci pañcavokārabhave rūpe nirujjhante arūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1206_4: arūpe vā nirujjhante rūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n:1206_8: aññamaññassa paccayā hontāpi ubho bhijjantiyevāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1207_6: Adissamānarūpatāya saddaṃ nāmaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā “evameva”ntiādinā upamāsaṃsandanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1208_0: Na cakkhuto jāyareti na cakkhāyatanato niggacchanavasena jāyanti.
anya-e0104n:1208_1: Na hi cakkhāyatanassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato pubbe phassapañcamakā labbhanti,
anya-e0104n:1208_6: “No ca ubhinnamantarā”ti idaṃ pana tesaṃ arūpadhammattā appadesatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1208_8: tadā uppajjanamattamevāti āha “hetuṃ paṭicca pabhavanti saṅkhatā”ti,
anya-e0104n:1208_9: cakkhurūpālokamanasikārādibhedaṃ dhammajātaṃ nissāya paccayabhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā tehi samecca sambhūya
anya-e0104n:1208_10: katattā saṅkhatā phassādayo dhammā uppajjantīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1208_11: Tassā pana dhammānaṃ uppattiyā pākaṭaṃ rūpadhammapavattiṃ dassento “yathāpi saddo pahaṭāya bheriyā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1209_1: Tannissayānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ bahubhedattā sāmaññavohārena te dassetuṃ “saṅkhatā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1210_4: Na hi aññathā saddahanussahanādīsu nāmaṃ “nitteja”nti sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0104n:1210_6: Teneva hi “rūpaṃ nitteja”nti vatvā “na hi tassa khāditukāmatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1210_8: Aññamaññasannissayena hi nāmarūpassa attakiccasiddhipi paccekaṃ asamatthatāvibhāvanameva.
anya-e0104n:1211_0: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthānaṃ samuditabhāve samatthatā hoti?
anya-e0104n:1211_2: Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontānaṃ andhānaṃ satampi sahassampi samuditaṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imassa panatthassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1211_3: Imaṃ upamaṃ udāharanti aṭṭhakathācariyā upamāyapi asiddhassa atthassa sādhetabbato.
anya-e0104n:1211_5: upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1211_6: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhoti yadipāhaṃ cakkhukaraṇīyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkomi,
anya-e0104n:1211_9: tasmā amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ sahitānañca vasena icchitadesasampatti sijjhatīti tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho.
anya-e0104n:1211_11: Dhammānaṃ attalābho parapaṭibaddhoti vattabbameva natthi tato pubbe avijjamānattā,
anya-e0104n:1211_12: paṭiladdhattalābhassāpi parapaṭibaddhameva atthakiccanti dassetuṃ “na sakena tejena uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1211_13: na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1211_14: Tesaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na ca na hotīti jaccandhapīṭhasappiupamāya
anya-e0104n:1211_15: sādhitamatthaṃ nigamento “asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnaṃ sāmaggiyampi ahetukabhāvāpattito”ti yathāvuttassa hetuno
anya-e0104n:1212_0: Paradhammavasānuvattinoti paresaṃ attato aññesaṃ hetupaccayasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena anuvattanasīlā.
anya-e0104n:1212_10: Purimatthena hi vuttamevatthaṃ pacchimatthena pākaṭaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1213_0: Nāvāyantikūpamāyapi nāmarūpānaṃ avasavattitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathāpī”tiādinā tisso gāthā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1213_4: Na hi tesaṃ araṇaggahaṇalaṅkārasaṇṭhāpanaudakussiñcanādikiriyāya vinā nāvā icchitadesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0104n:1214_4: idha vuttānaṃ avuttānañca indriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppannānaṃ vasena samavīsati rūpapariggahamukhāni,
anya-e0104n:1214_5: tāni paccekaṃ “phasso vedanā citta”nti imesaṃ sammukhabhāvena upaṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni samasaṭṭhi,
anya-e0104n:1214_9: Sattasaññaṃ abhibhavitvāti anādikālabhāvitaṃ khandhapañcake attagāhaṃ vikkhambhetvā.
anya-e0104n:1214_15: na ito bhiyyo”ti ca tesaṃ lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇamukhena dhammamattabhāvadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1219_3: Ajjhattaṃ vā hi vipassanābhiniveso hotu bahiddhā vā,
anya-e0104n:1219_4: ajjhattasiddhiyaṃ pana lakkhaṇato sabbampi nāmarūpaṃ anavasesato pariggahitameva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1219_7: karaṇe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ paccayapariggahassa sādhakatamabhāvato kaṅkhāvitaraṇakiriyāya.
anya-e0104n:1219_8: Yadā hissa suparisuddho nijjaṭo niggumbo paccayapariggaho sijjhati,
anya-e0104n:1219_12: Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ tathādhigataṃ vasībhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ viya yogino santāne pabandhavasena pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “ṭhitaṃ ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:1220_2: Yāthāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tividhadukkhatāyogato rogo viya.
anya-e0104n:1220_3: Paccayā cassa rogasamuṭṭhānaṃ viya upaṭṭhahantīti imamatthaṃ dassento “yathā nāma…pe…
anya-e0104n:1220_5: Saṃsāradukkhanimuggassa santānassa tato vimocetukāmatāvasena anukampitabbatā labbhatīti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1220_6: Evameva ṭhite yadeke vadanti “anukampetabbakumārakadassanena tassa mātāpituāvajjanaṃ idha anudāharaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n:1220_10: aññathā veneyyapuggalasantāne satthu mahākaruṇāpavatti eva vicāretabbā siyā.
anya-e0104n:1220_12: Vuḍḍhataropi koci mandabuddhi hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kumāra”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1220_13: Yo koci paṭhamavaye vattamāno “kumāro”ti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “dahara”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1220_14: Evampi yo ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicāraṇako taruṇadārako,
anya-e0104n:1221_2: Tattha byatirekamukhena attho sādhito sammadeva sādhito hotīti ahetukabhāvaṃ tāva paṭikkhipanto “na tāvidaṃ
anya-e0104n:1221_4: Hetumantarena sati sambhave sabbadhammānaṃ hetuabhāvo samānoti sabbasamānatā siyā,
anya-e0104n:1221_8: paribhedato uddhañca hetuabhāvoti sabbadā ca andhādīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1221_10: hetuabhāvā visesato tañca natthīti āha “sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito”ti.
anya-e0104n:1221_15: saddena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ katamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1221_16: Tasmā ahetukabhāve visiṭṭhatāya asambhavo evāti sabbattha ekasadisabhāvāpattito,
anya-e0104n:1221_19: Evaṃ ahetubhāve paṭisiddhe visamahetuvādī vadeyya “na idaṃ ahetukaṃ kiñcarahi sahetukaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1222_3: Na nāmarūpaṃ issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpato aññassa anupalabbhamānattā issarapakatiādinameva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1222_4: Yadi pana asato issarādito nāmarūpassa uppatti,
anya-e0104n:1222_5: evaṃ sati sā eva sabbattha sabbadā sabbesaṃ ekasadisatā āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:1222_8: hutvā ca vinassantaṃ dissatīti issarādīhipi tādisehi bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1222_9: Tathā ca tadapi sappaccayaṃ saṅkhatamevāti tassāpi paccayapariggaho kātabbo.
anya-e0104n:1223_3: Yadi hi evaṃ niccaṃ issarādisaññitaṃ kammakilesindriyārammaṇādinirapekkhakāraṇampi siyā,
anya-e0104n:1223_7: Yadi pana tassa icchāvasena tassa uppattiṃ parikappeyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n:1223_8: tāsañca icchānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppattiyaṃ ko vibandho.
anya-e0104n:1223_9: Atha aññampi kiñci kammakilesindriyārammaṇādiapekkhitabbaṃ atthīti ce?
anya-e0104n:1223_12: Diṭṭhañhi kammādīnaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ tadaññapaccayasannidhānepi tadabhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1223_13: Yathā hi rūpālokamanasikārasannidhānepi cakkhuno abhāve cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1223_14: bhāve ca bhāvaṃ disvā cakkhuno cakkhuviññāṇuppādanasamatthatā atthīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:1223_15: Yathā ca yvāyaṃ yamakānampi samānānaṃ janakajananīsukkasoṇitādibāhirapaccayasamabhāvepi sattānaṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati,
anya-e0104n:1223_16: so ca sasantāne tādisassa aññassa hetuno abhāvā kammakilesahetukoti tassa tattha samatthatā atthīti viññāyati,
anya-e0104n:1223_18: Kāraṇassa hi bhāvābhāve phalassa bhāvābhāvehi kāraṇassa samatthatā viññāyeyya.
anya-e0104n:1223_19: Na ca sannihite tadakāraṇassa nāmarūpassa issarādivekallena katthaci anuppatti diṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n:1224_2: Na hi sannihitakāraṇassa phalassa anuppatti yuttā.
anya-e0104n:1224_3: Nicce ca sati aññanirapekkhakāraṇe saggassa ādiyeva na yutto,
anya-e0104n:1224_10: Yadi paro vadeyya “idha buddhipubbo bhāvānaṃ racanāviseso diṭṭho,
anya-e0104n:1224_16: tasmā tena nāmarūpasaññitassa lokassa kāraṇena bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0104n:1224_19: Uppannassa hi sannivesavasena tathā tathā paṭṭhapanaṃ “racanā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1224_23: Yadi panāyamissarādiko gavassajagadrabhādīnaṃ karīsāvatte paṭimahutaṃ raceyya,
anya-e0104n:1224_25: Kiñcāyaṃ lokaṃ sajjento attatthaṃ vā sajjeyya lokatthaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n:1225_0: Tattha ca yadi purimo makkho katakicco na siyā lokena sādhetabbassa atthibhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1225_6: Vinā kīḷāya ratiṃ ajānantānaṃ ratiatthañca kīḷamārabhanto ratiyaṃ issaro anissaro siyā.
anya-e0104n:1225_9: tassa cāyaṃ sajanasamatthatā ahetukā vā siyā sahetukā vā.
anya-e0104n:1225_15: so cassa hetu parato vā sambhūto siyā attato vā.
anya-e0104n:1225_19: Atha attato taduppattito pubbe ayaṃ kīdiso loko cāti sabbamidaṃ ālunavisiṇaṃ ākulabyākulaṃ goyūthena
anya-e0104n:1225_23: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetukaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1226_2: supākaṭattā ca rūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti “imassa tāva rūpakāyassā”tiādinā paṭhamaṃ tassa paccayapariggahavidhiṃ ārabhati.
anya-e0104n:1226_3: Tattha yathā nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho ahetuvisamahetuvādanivattiyā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1226_4: evaṃ nibbidāvirāgāvahabhāvena tattha abhiratinivattiyāpi icchitabboti taṃ gabbhaseyyakavasena dassento
anya-e0104n:1226_6: Tattha uppalādīni asuciṭṭhāne nibbattānipi sayaṃ sucisammatānevāti taṃdassanatthaṃ abbhantaraggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1229_0: “Nibbattatī”ti idaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu rūpakāyassa nibbattanasāmaññato gahetvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1229_6: purato ca karaṇaṃ kiṃ siyā paṭisandhikāletiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1229_8: “Nibbattakattā”ti iminā bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa avijjādayo rūpakāyassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya hetūti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1229_9: “Upatthambhakattā”ti iminā pana aṅkurassa pathavīsalilapārisiādayo viya āhāro sādhāraṇakāraṇatāya paccayoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1230_0: Pañca dhammā hetupaccayāti avijjādayo pañca dhammā yathārahaṃ hetu ca paccayo cāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1230_1: Bhavesu vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanapatthanā daḷhaggāhabhāvena saṅkhārabhavānaṃ hetubhūtā janakasahāyatāya
anya-e0104n:1230_3: apassayabhūtā cāti “mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1230_4: Yathā pitu janitasukke puttassa uppattīti pitā janako,
anya-e0104n:1230_5: evaṃ kammaṃ sattassa uppādakattā janakaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1230_6: Yathā dhāti jātassa dārakassa posanavasena sandhārikā,
anya-e0104n:1230_7: evaṃ āhāro uppannassa kāyassāti sandhārako vutto.
anya-e0104n:1231_1: pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1231_4: Tena cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1231_6: saddena yathā bahulaṃ bāhirarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo,
anya-e0104n:1231_12: Vacanabhede pana kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:1231_13: saddena ca phassādīnaṃ viya sahapaccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādipāṭhassa
anya-e0104n:1231_15: Evaṃ sammasanupagaṃ sabbaṃ nāmaṃ sahapaccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1232_1: Evanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva paccāmaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1232_2: atha kho yādisehi paccayehi etarahi pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1232_3: tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva atītepi pavattitthāti paccayasadisatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1233_7: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgūpapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
anya-e0104n:1233_8: brāhmaṇādīsu gahaṭṭhādīsu devādīsu aññataro nu kho”ti kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_9: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ,
anya-e0104n:1233_11: Issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya “kena nu kho pakārena ahosi”nti nibbattākārato kaṅkhatīti ca vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1233_12: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādiṃ nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:1233_13: devo hutvā nu kho manusso ahosi”nti attano aparāparuppattiṃ kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_19: Etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ addhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1233_20: Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hotīti attano khandhesu vicikicchā hoti.
anya-e0104n:1233_21: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_25: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_26: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_29: Kevalañhettha “abbhantare jīvo nāma atthī”ti gahetvā tassa dīghādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhanto “kathaṃ nu khosmi”nti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1233_30: Paccuppannaṃ pana attano sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
anya-e0104n:1233_32: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
anya-e0104n:1233_33: Sā sabbāpi pahīyatīti sā yathāvuttā soḷasavidhāpi vicikicchā vikkhambhanavasena pahīyati.
anya-e0104n:1234_2: tato pavattito manasikārādiko kusalādibhedato sabbappakārassāpi nāmassa asādhāraṇo paccayoti ca yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1234_6: tampi chadvāraggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ yathā chaṭṭhārammaṇaṃ chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇenātipi vuttaṃ “sabbappakārassāpī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1234_19: utusabhāgo ca āhāro taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ sādhāraṇo paccayo,
anya-e0104n:1234_22: Paccayapariggaho nāma anadhigatārahattena kātabboti tadapekkhāya “yonisomanasikārasaddhammassavanādiko kusalassevā”ti vuttaṃ. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:1234_25: Viparīto akusalassāti vacanato yathā yonisomanasikārādiviparīto akusalasseva paccayo,
anya-e0104n:1234_26: tathā yonisomanasikārādi kusalasseva paccayo hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1234_32: saddena avijjādayo viya gatikālādayopi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:1235_9: na vattamānatoti vuttaṃ “kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo”ti.
anya-e0104n:1235_10: Yadi hi paccuppannato kammato phalaṃ uppajjeyya,
anya-e0104n:1235_13: Na hi loke kudācanaṃ kariyamānameva kammaṃ phalaṃ dentaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1235_19: idaṃ pana arūpaṃ pabandhopi atthīti upamā na saṃsandati.
anya-e0104n:1235_20: Kammato hi atītato eva kammassa katattā,
anya-e0104n:1235_22: Vuttañhetaṃ “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1235_23: Yasmā anantarādipaccayalābhato uppādakkhaṇe eva cittassa balavatā,
anya-e0104n:1235_24: tasmā taṃ uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ janetīti āha “cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa uppajjamāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:1235_26: Yasmā pana rūpassa ṭhitikkhaṇe balavatā pacchājātādipaccayalābhato,
anya-e0104n:1235_29: āhārañca paccayaṃ labhitvā attano ṭhitikkhaṇe utuāhārā rūpaṃ janentīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1237_3: Jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma jātiyā satītiādi phaladassanānupubbiyā hetudassanakkamena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti katvā dassito.
anya-e0104n:1238_1: Pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavasenāti pariyosānato paṭṭhāya paṭilomanayena ādipāpanavasena
anya-e0104n:1238_3: “Asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā hi paṭilomavasena dassite paccayākāre “yassa abhāvā yassa abhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1240_9: paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvaṃ pattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
anya-e0104n:1240_10: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma.
anya-e0104n:1240_11: Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārāpakāravasappavattiyā,
anya-e0104n:1240_12: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca paṭhamajavanacetanā itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1240_13: okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ phalaṃ deti.
anya-e0104n:1240_14: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhipayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1240_18: purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā ca samānā anantarattabhāve vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n:1240_19: “Sati saṃsārappavattiyā”ti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
anya-e0104n:1241_3: Yaṃ bahulanti yaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ samāsevitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1241_4: Maraṇakāle anussaritanti paribyattabhāvena maraṇassa āsannakāle anussaritaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1241_5: Āsannakāle kate vattabbameva natthīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1242_4: tasmimpi asati “kaṭattā vā panā”ti vuttaṃ purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccati.
anya-e0104n:1242_9: bahulīkatato ca mahato ca pubbakatādi, appañca.
anya-e0104n:1242_10: Bahulānussaraṇena vippaṭisārādijananato paṭipakkhassa aparipuṇṇatāya āraddhavipākassa kammassa,
anya-e0104n:1242_11: kammasesassa vā aparāpariyāye vedanīyassa aparikkhīṇatāya santatiyā pariṇāmavisesatoti tehi tehi kāraṇehi āhitabalaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccati.
anya-e0104n:1243_2: micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1243_3: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1243_4: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1243_5: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā,
anya-e0104n:1243_6: tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1243_7: Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti…pe…
anya-e0104n:1243_9: tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n:1244_2: micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1244_3: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1244_4: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1244_5: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā,
anya-e0104n:1244_6: tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1244_7: Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti…pe…
anya-e0104n:1244_9: tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n:1245_2: sammādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1245_3: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1245_4: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1245_5: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā,
anya-e0104n:1245_6: tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n:1245_7: Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato…pe…
anya-e0104n:1245_9: tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n:1246_4: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1246_5: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1246_6: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā,
anya-e0104n:1246_7: tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ …pe…
anya-e0104n:1246_9: Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti…pe…
anya-e0104n:1246_11: tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye”ti.
anya-e0104n:1247_0: Kiṃ bahunā yaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1247_2: yadidaṃ tassa tassa kammassa tena tena kāraṇena pubbāparavipākatā sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1248_7: Upapīḷakaṃ sukhadukkhappabandhe pavattamāne saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ taṃ hāpeti.
anya-e0104n:1248_11: Kammassa upacchindanaṃ nāma tassa vipākapaṭibāhanamevāti āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1248_12: Tañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1248_13: Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1248_16: Upaghātakaṃ pana dubbalaṃ kammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n:1248_19: Kammaṃ upaghātetvā attano vipākassa okāsakaraṇena vipaccane sati janakameva siyā,
anya-e0104n:1248_21: na kammaṃ patīti vipākasseva upaghātakatā yuttā viya dissati,
anya-e0104n:1249_7: Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā,
anya-e0104n:1249_10: Janakena nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ vā akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātusamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati,
anya-e0104n:1249_12: Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati,
anya-e0104n:1249_14: Tattha keci dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ itthannāmagatassa appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena,
anya-e0104n:1249_18: ito anupadinnena yāpanakapetānañca narakādīsu akusalavipākupatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātakāni na na santīti catunnampi akusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n:1249_19: Buddhāveṇikatāya asādhāraṇasseva ñāṇassa gocarabhāvato kammantarādi “asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1249_20: Ekadesato jānitabbaṃ anavasesato jānituṃ na sakkā avisayattā.
anya-e0104n:1249_21: Sabbena sabbaṃ ajānane paccayapariggaho na paripūratīti.
anya-e0104n:1250_1: Yathāvuttaṃ kammaṃ vattamānavipākappabandhanimittameva adhippetanti kammekadesatāya “dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1250_3: Yādisato paccayato paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti,
anya-e0104n:1250_4: tādisato eva itarasmimpi addhadvayeti yathā atītānāgate nayaṃ neti,
anya-e0104n:1250_6: Tattha anāgatepi kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenevāti ettha vuttaṃ eva-
anya-e0104n:1250_7: saddaṃ “etarahi atītepī”ti etthāpi ānetvā vattabbaṃ addhattayepi kiriyākiriyaphalamattatādassanaparattā codanāya.
anya-e0104n:1251_0: Kammāti kammato. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, kammaṃ sambhavo etassāti kammasambhavo, vipāko.
anya-e0104n:1252_0: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya vattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha “neva kāraṇato uddhaṃ kārakaṃ passatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1252_3: Kāmaṃ bālāpi “kārako paṭisaṃvedako”ti vadantā atthato paññattimattameva vadanti,
anya-e0104n:1252_4: te pana viparītābhinivesavasenāpi vadantīti taṃ appamāṇanti āha “samaññāmattena paṇḍitā voharantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1253_5: rukkhato puna bījanti anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa pubbakoṭi natthi,
anya-e0104n:1253_7: vipākapaccayā kammanti anādikālikattā kammavipākasantānassa pubbakoṭi na paññāyati. Ādi-
anya-e0104n:1253_12: evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne “khandhānañca paṭipāṭī”tiādinā vutte saṃsāre sati kammavipākānaṃ appavattaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0104n:1256_0: Paccayasuññaṃ phalanti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1257_0: Yadi ca hetu ca phalañca aññamaññarahitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1257_1: kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1257_3: sabbampi dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”ti gāthā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1258_1: Cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayapariggahassa katattā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1258_2: Vuttanayena pana sappaccayanāmarūpassa dassanena tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa addhattayapariyāpannā
anya-e0104n:1258_3: dhammā atītapaccuppannānāgatabhavesu ca cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti,
anya-e0104n:1258_10: ettako paccayo”tiādinā ca paricchedavasena ñātavatī paññāti katvā ñātapariññā.
anya-e0104n:1259_0: Idāni yena kāraṇena addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti,
anya-e0104n:1259_2: Tena dhammānaṃ bhavantarasaṅkamo nāma na kadācipi atthi,
anya-e0104n:1259_4: Sajjhāya mantodakapāna mukhamaṇḍana padīpasīkhūpamāhi tameva dhammānaṃ saṅkamābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “apica kho”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1260_1: Na ceva āgatanti kiriyamanodhātuto na ceva āgataṃ kiriyamanodhātuyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1260_2: Nāpi na nibbattaṃ anantaranti kiriyamanodhātuto anāgacchantampi paccayasāmaggilābhena tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1260_6: cuticittato anāgacchantampi paṭisandhicittaṃ tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattati,
anya-e0104n:1260_15: Yattha hi cuticittato dūrepi kālantarepi uppajjamānaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ anantarameva jāyatīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1260_16: Tasmā tesaṃ antarikā natthi tesaṃ cutipaṭisandhicittānaṃ byavadhāyakaṃ kiñci natthi.
anya-e0104n:1260_17: Vīci tesaṃ na vijjatīti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1260_18: Itoti cuticittato anantaraṃ na ca gacchati kiñci cittaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1260_20: Paṭisandhi cāti paṭisandhiviññāṇañca aññameva yathāpaccayaṃ jāyati nibbattatīti punapi saṅkamābhāvameva
anya-e0104n:1261_2: tassa ca paccayadhammaggahaṇena aggahitassa tebhūmakadhammassa abhāvato “viditasabbadhammassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1261_8: sikkhā”ti ca kaṅkhāya gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā.
anya-e0104n:1261_9: Na hi lokuttaradhamme ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0104n:1261_15: paṭiccasamuppannadhammaggahaṇena ca gahito aṭṭhamo kaṅkhāvisayo nāmarūpamattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1261_17: tasmā soḷasavatthukāya kaṅkhāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti āha “na kevalañca…pe…
anya-e0104n:1262_0: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya yathā diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva samucchijjati,
anya-e0104n:1262_1: evaṃ vicikicchā vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyatīti āha “dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vikkhambhantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1262_2: Attābhinivesūpanissayā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādi nayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā,
anya-e0104n:1262_12: dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo dhammaṭṭhiti,
anya-e0104n:1262_14: Saṅkhārānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ bhūtaṃ aniccatādi yathābhūtaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1263_0: Avijjā paccayoti avijjā hetuādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo.
anya-e0104n:1263_3: tasmā avijjā saṅkhārāti ubhayepi ete dhammā paccayasamuppannā.
anya-e0104n:1263_5: Paccayapariggahe paññāti paccayānaṃ paricchijja gahaṇavasena pavattā paññā.
anya-e0104n:1264_5: Tattha niccatāya lesassāpi abhāvato aniccato passanto yathābhūtaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0104n:1264_7: Taṃsamaṅginā ca paccuppannesu viya atītānāgatesupi nayaṃ nentena te suparividitā honti.
anya-e0104n:1265_1: uppādo ca paccayavasenāti aniccatā sijjhamānā saṅkhārānaṃ sappaccayataṃ sādhentī yathāvuttakaṅkhappahānāya
anya-e0104n:1265_8: Tañhi kilesābhisaṅkhārehi pavattitattā sātisayaṃ dukkhabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:1265_9: Pavattanti ṭhānanisajjādivasena dukkhadukkhatādivasena ca saṅkhārappavattanti apare.
anya-e0104n:1265_11: pavatta”nti ca vutte ajjhattabahiddhāsantānasaññite sabbasmiṃ sappaccaye nāmarūpe yāthāvato pavattā ekāva
anya-e0104n:1265_13: Yathā “rukkho pādapo tarū”ti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “yañca yathābhūtañāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:1266_2: ayaṃ pana anadhigatamaggaphalopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhassāso viya,
anya-e0104n:1266_3: laddhapatiṭṭho viya ca hotīti vuttaṃ “laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho”ti.
anya-e0104n:1266_4: Aparihīnakaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiko vipassako lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāsampadāhi samannāgatattā uttari
anya-e0104n:1267_1: Nāmarūpaparicchedena hi khandhādike sabhāvasarasato sallakkhetvā sāsane dhammupasaṃhitapāmojjappaṭilābhena laddhassāso hoti.
anya-e0104n:1267_3: Sappaccayanāmarūpadassanena hi parimadditadiṭṭhikaṇṭako viniddhataahetuvisamahetuvādo yathāsakaṃ paccayeheva
anya-e0104n:1267_4: dhammamattaṃ jānitvā sāsane patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhapatiṭṭho nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n:1267_7: tasseva aparabhāgena aniccato manasikārādividhinā maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā
anya-e0104n:1267_8: appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā apāyesu
anya-e0104n:1268_0: Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ mahānisaṃsametaṃ yathābhūtañāṇaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0104n:1273_1: Evaṃ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇanti ayaṃ upakkilesavinimuttā vīthipaṭipannā vipassanāpaññā ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgamaggo,
anya-e0104n:1273_2: ayaṃ obhāsādibhedo dasavidho upakkileso na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca yāthāvato vavatthapetvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1274_0: Atītādivasena anekabhedabhinne dhamme kalāpato saṅkhipitvā sammasanaṃ kalāpasammasanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1274_2: “Yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā nayena hi dhammānaṃ vipassanā nayavipassanā,
anya-e0104n:1274_7: Bahubhāvato hi tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāya yogārambhaṃ anusāsati “nayavipassanāya tāva yogo karaṇīyo”ti.
anya-e0104n:1274_11: atha kasmā “nayavipassanāya ādito yogo kātabbo”ti vuttanti.
anya-e0104n:1274_16: tasmā tassa āditova ārambhassa sambhavo natthīti vipassanā paṭhamaṃ āraddhabbā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1274_17: Evampi paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāva kasmā āraddhabbāti āha “vipassanāya ca kalāpasammasanaṃ ādī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1274_18: Tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena pavattanato ādikammikassa sukaraṃ sammasananti ādibhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1275_6: asampatte eva ca udayabbayañāṇe maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ hotīti āha “tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1275_7: Kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabboti etthāpi tasseva paṭhamārambhe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1275_8: Yasmā kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1275_9: ekacce ca taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0104n:1275_12: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ ādikammikānaṃ manasikārasukaratāya vipassanāya ādibhāvena ṭhapitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1275_14: tasmā “taṃ sampādetukāmenā”tiādinā ayaṃ vicāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1276_5: Lokuttarāpi purimasmiṃ saccadvaye maggasampayuttā tividhāpi pariññā kiccavasena labbhatīti “lokiyapariññā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1276_14: Yathā pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇāni tīsupi khaṇesu sallakkhitabbāni paṭiniyatarūpatāya sabhāvasiddhāneva hutvā gayhanti,
anya-e0104n:1276_16: Tāni pana bhaṅgudayabbayapīḷāvasavattanākāramukhena gahetabbato samāropitarūpāni viya gayhantīti vuttaṃ “sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1277_2: Keci pana “khandhādīnaṃ vipassanāya bhūmibhāvato sabbopi khandhādivicāro saṅkhāraparicchedo”ti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1277_5: ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpa”nti arūparūpānaṃ sādhāraṇākārasallakkhaṇavasena pavattiyā ekenākārena tīraṇapariyāyo,
anya-e0104n:1277_6: diṭṭhikaṅkhāvikkhambhanena pahānapariyāyo labbhatīti siyā tīraṇapahānesupi ādhipaccanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1277_9: Evaṃ hi tissopi pariññā vavatthitā honti,
anya-e0104n:1277_15: tassa pana athāmagatattā na sātisayaṃ pahānanti vuttaṃ “bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1277_16: Aniccato anupassantoti aniccākārato saṅkhāre anupassanto sammasanto.
anya-e0104n:1277_20: Nibbindantoti aniccānupassanādisambhūtāya nibbidānupassanāya saṅkhāre nibbijjanavasena passanto.
anya-e0104n:1277_22: Virajjantoti virāgānupassanāya virajjanavasena yathā saṅkhāresu rāgo nuppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1277_28: Tathābhūto hi saṅkhārānaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati nāma anuppattidhammatāpādanato.
anya-e0104n:1277_29: Paṭinissajjantoti paṭinissaggānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā na puna ādiyanti,
anya-e0104n:1277_35: Evaṃ pariññā niddisitvā pariññākkamavasenapi kaṅkhāvitaraṇānantaraṃ “kalāpasammasane yogo kātabbo”ti yvāyamattho vutto,
anya-e0104n:1278_4: Tattha saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññāti atītādibhedabhinne dhamme ekato saṅgahetvā aniccādivasena vinicchaye sādhetabbe taṃsādhanīyā paññā.
anya-e0104n:1278_8: Yaṃ kiñci rūpantiādīni padāni heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva.
anya-e0104n:1278_9: Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavatthapetītiādīni pana yasmā parato vaṇṇiyissanti,
anya-e0104n:1279_1: ettha hi ādikammikānaṃ vipassanāmanasikārasukhatthaṃ “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ tāva pañcakkhandhā atītādivibhāgamukhena gahitā,
anya-e0104n:1279_2: te pana khandhā yasmā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammavasena vibhāgaṃ labbhanti,
anya-e0104n:1279_3: tasmā tadanantaraṃ dvārachakkādivasena dasa chakkā gahitā.
anya-e0104n:1279_5: tasmā tassa vibhāvanāya cha dhātuyo gahitā.
anya-e0104n:1279_6: Tato yesu kasiṇesu ito bāhirakānaṃ attābhiniveso,
anya-e0104n:1279_7: tāni imesaṃ jhānānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena upaṭṭhānākāramattānīti dassanatthaṃ dasa kasiṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:1279_8: Tato dukkhānupassanāya parivārabhāvena paṭikkūlākāravasena dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā gahitā.
anya-e0104n:1279_9: Pubbe khandhavasena saṅkhepato gahitā dhammā nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena,
anya-e0104n:1279_10: vitthāranayena ca manasi kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ dvādasāyatanāni,
anya-e0104n:1279_12: Tesu ime dhammā satipi suññanirīhaabyāpārabhāve dhammasabhāvato ādhipaccavasena pavattantīti anattalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthaṃ indriyāni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:1279_13: Evaṃ anekabhedabhinnāpime dhammā bhūmittayapariyāpannatāya tividhāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ tisso dhātuyo gahitā.
anya-e0104n:1280_0: Ettāvatā nimittaṃ dassetvā pavattaṃ dassetuṃ kāmabhavādayo nava bhavā gahitā.
anya-e0104n:1280_1: Ettake abhiññeyyavisese pavattamanasikārakosallena saṇhasukhumesu nibbattitamahaggatadhammesu manasikāro
anya-e0104n:1280_4: Paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgato ime dhammā bhinditvā manasi kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n:1280_8: Evamete sammasanīyabhāvena gahitā khandhādivasena koṭṭhāsato pañcavīsatividhā.
anya-e0104n:1280_9: Pabhedato pana atītādibhedaṃ anāmasitvāva gayhamānā dvīhi ūnāni dvesatāni honti.
anya-e0104n:1281_1: Aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādiko dutiyo hetuvāro lakkhaṇānaṃ hetukittanato.
anya-e0104n:1281_3: Khayaṭṭhenāti hi khayasabhāvato yasmā rūpaṃ khayasabhāvaṃ uppajjitvā khayaṃ vayaṃ bhedaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0104n:1281_5: Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhāyitabbabhāvato yasmā rūpaṃ pabhaṅguratāya bhayānakaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1281_11: Tatiyavāre pana “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vatvā tassa hetuṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “saṅkhata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1281_17: Na hi paccayanibbattaṃ anirujjhanakaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0104n:1281_18: Tenāha bhagavā “yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1281_19: taṃ vata mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1281_20: Etena aniccā pathavīdhātu paccayanibbattattā tadaññaṃ paccayanibbattaṃ viyāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1282_1: byatirekato ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “jātipaccayā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1282_2: Aniccalakkhaṇasseva cettha patiṭṭhāpanaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpite sesalakkhaṇadvayassapi patiṭṭhāpanasiddhito.
anya-e0104n:1283_0: Iminā peyyālena ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1283_4: abhiññeyya”ntiādinā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavatte dhamme dassetvā tesaṃ pañcahi khandhehi saṅgahitataṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:1283_6: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ pana “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ pañcakkhandhe dassetvā “cakkhu”ntiādinā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā dassitā.
anya-e0104n:1284_0: Kasmā panettha ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti pāḷiyaṃ vitthārato āgatattāti dassento “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1284_5: “Viññāṇaṃ mano dhammā”tiādinā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse ye lokuttaradhammā āgatā.
anya-e0104n:1284_8: Sammasanupagā eva hi dhammā paṭisambhidāyaṃ gahitā sammasanavārassa adhippetattā,
anya-e0104n:1284_9: na abhiññeyyaniddese viya sabbeva abhiññeyyā dhammā.
anya-e0104n:1284_12: Tesu tena sammasanaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ yathāpākaṭaṃ vipassanābhinivesoti katvā.
anya-e0104n:1284_13: Pacchā pana anupaṭṭhahantepi upāyena upaṭṭhahāpetvā anavasesatova sammasitabbā.
anya-e0104n:1285_1: “Atītaṃ rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā aniccato sammasanassa atītādivibhāgā pavattiṭṭhānabhūtāti āha “ekādasahi okāsehī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1286_0: Kathanti sammasanākāro pucchitoti taṃ parato idheva pāḷiyaṃ dutiyavāre vuttanayenevāti saṅkhepeneva vissajjeti.
anya-e0104n:1286_4: Yasmā “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1286_5: tasmā iminā vuttanayena aniccanti sammasatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1288_4: tampi tattheva khīyatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1289_0: Idaṃ sabbampīti idaṃ atītādibhedassa rūpassa sammasanato sabbaṃ ekādasavidhampi sammasanaṃ ekaṃ sammasanaṃ aniccato sammasananti katvā.
anya-e0104n:1290_3: mama santakaṃ vinassatī”ti cintentassa bhayajanakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1290_4: Sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viyāti sīhopamasutte desiyamāne devānaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:1291_11: devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā,
anya-e0104n:1291_12: tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti ‘aniccāva kira bho mayaṃ samānā niccamhāti amaññimha,
anya-e0104n:1291_14: asassatāva kira bho mayaṃ samānā sassatamhāti amaññimha,
anya-e0104n:1291_15: mayampi kira bho aniccā addhuvā asassatā sakkāyapariyāpannā”’ti –
anya-e0104n:1293_7: taṃ dukkha”nti ca adhippetāti vuttaṃ “aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1293_8: Attā abhavissāti “kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃbhūto attā abhavissāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1293_9: Evañhi sati rūpassa ābādhāya saṃvattanaṃ ayujjamānakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:1293_13: Tena khandhavasena tāva bhedato pañcasaṭṭhiadhikā sataṃ sammasanavārā dassitā honti.
anya-e0104n:1293_14: Iminā nayena dvārachakkādīsupi yathārahaṃ sammasanabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1294_1: Niyamato saṅkhatādibhedaṃ hotīti ekaṃsena saṅkhatatādivisesavantaṃ hoti asaṅkhatādisabhāve aniccatāya asambhavato.
anya-e0104n:1294_6: Na hi tadeva tassa pariyāyo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1294_9: Teneva hi sabbesaṃ padānaṃ pariyāyatābhāvato “nānākārehi vā”ti vikappantaraṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1296_3: Thirabhāvatthāyāti daḷhabhāvatthāya aniccādiākārassa punappunaṃ manasikāro viya bahulīkārabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1296_4: Yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā etassa vibhaṅge aniccādisammasanaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1296_7: Ñāṇañhi visayasabhāvaṃ ogāhetvā vavatthāne khamati sahatīti khantīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1296_9: So hi sammādiṭṭhiādisammattañceva anivattidhammatāya niyāmo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1296_10: “Ādinā nayenā”ti iminā “pañcakkhandhe dukkhato passanto anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati,
anya-e0104n:1296_11: khandhānaṃ nirodho sukhaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti evamādiko pāṭhaseso rogādipaṭipakkhayojanāvasena vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0104n:1296_12: “Khandhānaṃ nirodho niccaṃ nibbāna”nti vacanena saṅkhārānaṃ dukkharogatādipaṭipakkho nibbānassa sukhārogyādibhāvo
anya-e0104n:1296_14: Avaseso sabbo pāṭho pakāsito eva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1297_0: Kāmañcetaṃ cattārīsāya ākārehi sammasanaṃ anulomañāṇe bhāvetabbavidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1297_3: ito paṭṭhāya pana kataparicayasseva kiccāvahaṃ hotīti idhāpi vuttantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1298_2: bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
anya-e0104n:1298_3: anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
anya-e0104n:1298_5: arahattaṃ vā sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. So vata,
anya-e0104n:1300_1: Ekekaṃ khandhaṃ aniccādisammasanassa vasena sammasatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1300_2: Tassa pana sammasanassa pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ sādhāraṇatāya “ekekaṃ khandha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1301_2: khaṇikatāya asadābhāvitāya vā na iccaṃ na upagantabbanti aniccaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1301_4: vayena ca pati pati khaṇe khaṇe taṃsamaṅgino vibādhanasabhāvattā,
anya-e0104n:1301_6: Udayabbayavanto hi dhammā abhiṇhaṃ tehi paṭipīḷitā eva honti,
anya-e0104n:1302_1: Dukkhavedanādayo viya hi ime saṅkhārā attabhāvassa abbhantaragatā eva udayabbayavasena tudanti.
anya-e0104n:1302_2: Ariyamaggasaṇḍāsena vinā nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dunnīharaṇīyatā taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesadaḷhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1302_8: Yathā gilāno aññehi saṃvesanavuṭṭhāpanādinā parapaṭibaddhasarīravuttiko aserī,
anya-e0104n:1302_11: Yathā parosatanto puriso parassa vasaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0104n:1303_12: So atthakāmena muhuttampi na ajjhupekkhitabbo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1304_4: Sabbāvatthanipātitāyāti rukkhaphalaṃ viya atitaruṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsu avatthāsu nipatanasīlatāya.
anya-e0104n:1304_5: Anipatassapi sabbena sabbaṃ asāratāya thirabhāvassa abhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n:1304_7: Tāyituṃ rakkhituṃ asamatthatāya na tāyanoti atāyano,
anya-e0104n:1304_17: Sā eva ca tucchatāti āha “rittatāyeva tucchato”ti.
anya-e0104n:1304_20: Dhuvasārābhāvādīhi saddhiṃ attasārābhāvaṃ rittapadena vatvā nibbattitamattasārābhāvameva suññapadena dassetuṃ “sāmi…pe…
anya-e0104n:1304_22: Yathā kenaci sāmiādilakkhaṇena attanā suññā ete,
anya-e0104n:1305_1: Bhavapavatti ca pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ aniccādiākārena pavattanameva,
anya-e0104n:1305_18: Ime pana supadhaṃsiyā evāti āha “pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya cā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1305_23: khandhesu hi “etaṃ mamā”ti gāhavasena sattā byasanaṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0104n:1306_4: pitusadisassa vā sabhāvahetuno vibhavato vināsato sambhūtatāya.
anya-e0104n:1306_14: Devaputtamārassa pana “mameta”nti adhimānavasena āmisabhāvoti khandhādimārānampi imesaṃ yathārahaṃ āmisabhūtatā vattabbā.
anya-e0104n:1306_18: Saṃkilesattayaggahaṇena tadekaṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ kilesavatthūnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1306_19: Tadārammaṇāpi hi dhammā tadanativattanato saṃkilesikā eva.
anya-e0104n:1307_0: Cattārīsāpi sammasanāni tīsu anupassanāsu antogadhānevāti tadantogadhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1308_0: Ettāvatā kalāpato dhamme saṅgahetvā nayato sammasanamattaṃ dassitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1310_1: Ekaccassa tikkhindriyassa mahāpaññassa nayavipassanāvaseneva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1310_5: Udayabbayañāṇuppatti hi idha nayavipassanāya sampajjananti adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1310_7: antarā ca abbosānenā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā sappāyāni sevamānena sammasitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1311_6: Khayamevāti paṭhamaṃ uppādaṃ disvā taṃ muñcitvā khayameva bhaṅgameva passati.
anya-e0104n:1311_7: Tassa tathākhayadassanapasutassa vipassanāpaññā tikkhā sūrā vahati,
anya-e0104n:1311_18: tassa ākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena samathanimittaggahaṇena sampādetīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1311_19: Anupavattanatāyāti anurūpato pavattanena bhāvanācittassa līnabhāve pītivīriyadhammavicayasambojjhaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0104n:1311_21: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatanti attano kāye asucibhāvena bāhirakaaviññāṇakakuṇape viya jīvite ahitāvahapaccatthike viya nirapekkhacittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti.
anya-e0104n:1311_22: Tattha ca abhibhuyya nekkhammenāti tasmiṃ kāyacitte anapekkhabhāvena indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena uppannaṃ
anya-e0104n:1311_23: uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ vīriyena abhibhavitvā bhāvanaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0104n:1312_0: Evaṃ vuttānanti evaṃ “navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1312_1: Ettha ca yathā nāma sukhumānaṃ muttāpavāḷādīnaṃ vijjhane sukhumatarena vedhanena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1312_3: paccayassa ca pariggaṇhane tikkhena ñāṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1312_5: Tikkhataratā cassa nisānasilāyaṃ saṇhamaṭṭhatāya karaṇena viya pharasudhārāya nisitabhāvāpādanena indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena sādhetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1312_7: tesu khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanākāradassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khayameva passatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1312_8: Asati ñāṇassa tikkhatarabhāve tadabhāvato sesindriyatikkhatā tassa sambhārabhāvato vuttā,
anya-e0104n:1312_11: Asappāyāni bhojanādīni anupayujjanādivasena vajjetvā sappāyāni mattaso sevamānena.
anya-e0104n:1312_13: tathā sammasanassa ca idha anadhippetattā “kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1312_15: Tatthāpi ca rūpassa oḷārikatāya suviññeyyattā paṭhamaṃ sammasitabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1312_16: Nibbatti passitabbāti paṭhamaṃ tāva āgamānusārato anumānavasena daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:1312_17: Tato paraṃ anukkamena balappatte bhāvanāñāṇe paccakkhatopi dissatīti.
anya-e0104n:1315_0: Dandhaṃ mandaṃ cirena nirodho etassāti dandhanirodhaṃ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukattā.
anya-e0104n:1315_5: āyusaṅkhārā khīyantī”ti vacanato rūpadhammāpi ittarakālā eva,
anya-e0104n:1315_11: Sabbesampi hi saṅkhārānaṃ uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇesu visadisatā natthi,
anya-e0104n:1315_15: Vatthurūpaṃ ekassa cittassa nissayo hutvā aññassa na hoti ṭhapetvā maraṇāsannaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1316_0: Evaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuticittassa uppatti,
anya-e0104n:1316_1: taṃ dassetvā idāni nirodhaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭisandhicittassā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1316_3: Yāva pavatti nāma atthīti yāva saṃsārappavatti nāma atthi,
anya-e0104n:1316_4: yāva vā cittassa pavatti nāma atthi.
anya-e0104n:1317_2: Nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhūtaṃyeva idha kammanti adhippetanti āha “kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1317_4: Taṃ vā cakkhudasakādi viya sukhapariggahaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1317_17: Ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti āhārānugate sarīreti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1318_1: Catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetīti sadisasantativasena catasso vā pañca vā rūpakalāpappavattiyo santāneti.
anya-e0104n:1318_2: Bāhirapaccayavisesena pana visadisā bahūpi pavattiyo ghaṭetīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1318_4: evaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānepīti taṃ dassetuṃ “kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1318_5: Ettha ca yathā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse paramparappavattiṃ dassentena akammajā dutiyādipavattiyo asambhedena dassitā,
anya-e0104n:1318_9: Tattha kammajato pavattaāhārā visesapaccayalābhe sati yathāvuttaparimāṇāhi pavattīhi uddhampi pavattiyo na ghaṭentīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n:1318_10: Tathā hi “dasa dvādasa vāre pavattiṃ ghaṭetī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1318_11: “evaṃ dīghampi addhānaṃ anupādinnapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattati evā”ti ca vakkhati.
anya-e0104n:1319_4: Iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya pathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi,
anya-e0104n:1319_16: Vipākavajjānīti ettha vipākābhiññādvayavajjānīti vattabbaṃ tadaññesaṃyeva sesaggahaṇena gahetabbattā.
anya-e0104n:1319_17: Na vā vattabbaṃ sesaggahaṇeneva abhiññācittānampi nivattetabbato.
anya-e0104n:1319_18: Na viññattiṃ janayanti mahaggatakusalādīnaṃ santabhāvena avipphārikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1319_20: iriyāpathūpatthambhakāni pana honti satipi santabhāve jhānavegena saussāhattā,
anya-e0104n:1319_26: Tathā hi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti paviṭṭhāni viya honti.
anya-e0104n:1319_27: “Dvattiṃsā”ti pana ādinā vuttesu jāgaraṇacittesu vattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattantīti.
anya-e0104n:1320_0: “Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati,
anya-e0104n:1320_2: ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
anya-e0104n:1321_0: Pana vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n:1321_1: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi,
anya-e0104n:1321_2: na ca yuttaṃ cuto ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcassa pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1321_5: pana visesanaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhantassa tesaṃ cuticittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ pākaṭanti katvā katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1321_6: Soḷasa cittānīti paricchijja gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ rūpajanane ekaṃsato niyametabbattā,
anya-e0104n:1321_7: aññāni pana bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na janentiyeva.
anya-e0104n:1322_1: evaṃ vedanādayopīti vuttaṃ “cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā,
anya-e0104n:1322_6: Tattha kāyaviññattiādīnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatā pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā tesaṃ anipphannattā.
anya-e0104n:1322_7: “Evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti iminā ataṃsamuṭṭhānasseva cittajarūpassa cittapaccayatā dassitā.
anya-e0104n:1322_11: Cittasamuṭṭhānacittapaccaye pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ pacchājātapaccayavaseneva cittapaccayaṃ uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1322_12: Cittasamuṭṭhānautuāhārehi kammasamuṭṭhānautuāhārā balavanto hontīti tesaṃ vasena catupañcapavattighaṭanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1323_1: “Upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā”ti etena bahiddhā anupādinnaojā rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ na karotīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1323_3: Tattha kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānādirūpassapi kammamūlakattā siyā kammajapariyāyoti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “upādinna”nti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1323_6: “Dasa dvādasa vāre”ti vatvā kathaṃ imasseva dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “ekadivasaṃ paribhuttāhāro”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1323_7: Dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvāti nābhimūlānugatāhi rasaharaṇīhi pharitvā,
anya-e0104n:1323_8: aññathā jalābuantarike kāye makkhanāvasena na sammāviniyogo āhārassa sambhavatīti.
anya-e0104n:1324_0: Upādinnako anupādinnakoti duvidhe āhāre pubbe anupādinnako āhārapaccayaāhāro dassitoti itaraṃ dassetuṃ “kammajāhāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1324_2: Tenāha “catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1324_3: Āhārapaccayautunopi utupaccayāhārassa viya dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1324_7: tisantatirūpānañca upatthambhakavasena attanā uppāditassa janako hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1324_8: Evaṃ āhārapaccayo hontoyeva atthiavigatavasenāpi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n:1324_10: Āhārapaccayā pavattamānāni rūpāni āhāranissayāni nāma hontīti suttantanayena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1325_1: Kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidhāyapi tejodhātuyā rūpuppādane samatthabhāvato “utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1325_2: Esa duvidho hotīti esa utu tejodhātubhāvāvisesepi tikkhamandatāvisesena uṇho,
anya-e0104n:1325_6: Yadipi utu upādinnakena vināpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0104n:1325_7: indriyabaddhe pana tena vinā tassa rūpuppādanaṃ natthīti āha “upādinnakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1325_9: Utusamuṭṭhānoyeva hi utu upādinnakena vinā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0104n:1325_14: Yasmā visabhāgo utu himādi viya padumādīnaṃ visadisarūpuppattihetubhūtaṃ purimarūpaṃ vināsentaṃ viya hoti,
anya-e0104n:1325_16: visabhāgañca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1326_0: Dīghampi addhānanti “dasa dvādasa vāre”ti aññassa vuttaparicchedato dīghampi kālaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1326_1: Utu hi sabhāgasantativasena laddhapaccayaṃ ciratarampi kālaṃ sadisākāraṃ rūpappavattiṃ santāneti upādinnakasannissayena vinā,
anya-e0104n:1326_5: Rūpassa nibbattiyā diṭṭhāya tassa bhaṅgopi diṭṭhoyeva hoti ittarakālattā dhammappavattiyāti āha “nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1326_6: Na hi nibbattimattadassanaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1329_1: Tadeva ekūnavīsatippabhedaṃ cittaṃ bhavaṅgavasena nibbattatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1330_0: So pana paṭisandhicittānaṃyeva pavattiyaṃ pavattanākāroti suddhappavatticittānaṃ uppattiṃ dassento “pavatte panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1330_2: “Asambhinnattā cakkhussā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “cakkhupasādassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1330_3: “Ṭhitippattamevā”ti iminā yathā nirujjhamānaṃ rūpaṃ kassaci paccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1330_8: satta vā javanāni hutvā uppajjatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1331_0: Anukkamenāti udayabbayañāṇādhigamānukkamena paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti arahattaṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0104n:1334_6: Ayalohādibhūmipāsāṇādibhedaṃ vividhavaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ kammānapekkhaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ dhammatārūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1334_8: Vipassatīti taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati sammasati.
anya-e0104n:1335_0: “Bhārādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke”ti vacanato khandhabhārassa ādito gahaṇanti katvā “ādānanti paṭisandhī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1335_2: bhūtā loke samussaya”nti pana vacanato khandhabhāranikkhepoti katvā “nikkhepananti cutī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1335_4: so vassasata”nti vacanato tato ūnādhikabhāvo appamāṇanti vuttaṃ “ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1335_5: Etthantare sabbe saṅkhārāti etasmiṃ ādānanikkhepantare pavattā sabbe bhūtupādāyarūpappabhedā saṅkhārā.
anya-e0104n:1335_12: Taṃ vassasataparicchinne rūpe idaṃ sammasananti adhippāyeneva vuttaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n:1335_15: Na hi uppādāvatthā eva bhaṅgāvatthāti yuttā.
anya-e0104n:1335_16: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1335_20: Aniccadhammā hi teneva attano sabhāvena jānantānaṃ niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma.
anya-e0104n:1335_23: na tadavatthā ṭhitikkhaṇeti avatthantarappattiyā ñāyati tesaṃ kilamanākāroti āha “ṭhitiyaṃ jarāya kilamantī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1335_25: Ye pana saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhitiṃ na sampaṭicchanti,
anya-e0104n:1335_27: Dhammānaṃ sabhāvo nāma duratikkamo jarānantaraṃ bhaṅgoti āha “jaraṃ patvā avassaṃ bhijjantī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1336_11: Na hi lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ kenaci kātuṃ sakkā.
anya-e0104n:1336_13: Suññā saṅkhārā tena tīsu ṭhānesu vasavattanākārena.
anya-e0104n:1336_22: iminā pana ataṃsabhāvato attā na hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1337_3: “suññato”tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi anattāti rūpadhamme niruḷhaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ pubbe attanā asallakkhitaṃ
anya-e0104n:1337_4: sallakkhetvā sammasanto taṃ tattha āropetīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1337_5: Tathā panānena ādānanikkhepanavasena sammasitattā āha “rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1338_2: Aniccalakkhaṇañcettha rūpabhedena dassiyamānaṃ yathoḷārikato dīpetabbanti taṃ vassasataparicchedena paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n:1338_3: dassentena vassasataṃ ṭhitassa “dasa vā vīsati vā”tiādinā vibhajitvā anukkamena yāvauddharaṇādikoṭṭhāsavasena
anya-e0104n:1338_4: rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tato “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato sammasananti
anya-e0104n:1338_5: dassetuṃ “tameva vassasata”ntiādinā vayavasena rūpassa sammasanavidhi āraddho.
anya-e0104n:1338_6: Tattha yasmā oḷārikavasenevāyaṃ ādito rūpabhedo gayhati,
anya-e0104n:1338_8: majjhimāvatthāya vā tathārūpattā majjhimavaye ekaṃ vassaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1339_0: 708. Mandatābāhullena pavattaṃ vassānaṃ dasakaṃ mandadasakaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0104n:1340_4: Na hesa navamadasake viya momūhabhāvena mando,
anya-e0104n:1340_7: Tatiye dasake maṃsapāripūriyā yathārahaṃ chavivaṇṇo vippasīdatīti āha “vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1340_9: nhārūnañca thirabhāvappattiyā balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0104n:1340_10: Pañcame dasake yobbanamadassa dūrībhāvena yebhuyyena kilesatanutāya paññā yathārahaṃ suvisadā hoti.
anya-e0104n:1340_12: Kapallikādinissayavisesena padīpassa suddhatādi viya nissayavisesena pañcamachaṭṭhadasakesu paññāya buddhihāniyo veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1340_13: Purato pabbhāro hoti kaṭisandhigīvāsandhīnaṃ vasena rassassāpi,
anya-e0104n:1340_17: Sayanabahulova hoti ṭhānādivasena sarīrabhāraṃ vahituṃ asakkonto.
anya-e0104n:1343_9: Cha koṭṭhāse katvāti dasadasanāṭikāvasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā.
anya-e0104n:1344_4: Vividhaṃ ito cito ca lokanaṃ vilokanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1345_6: tathā pavattacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ekaṃsato tejovāyodhātūnaṃ adhimattatā icchitabbā sallahukasabhāvatāya tāsaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1345_7: Tato eva ca itarāsaṃ omattatā garusabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n:1345_8: Taṃsambandhattā pana sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ taggatikameva hoti.
anya-e0104n:1345_9: Kāyavacīviññattipavattiyaṃ vāyopathavīadhimattatā imassa atthassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1345_11: pacchato haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sallahukasabhāvarūpappavattīti tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ adhimattatā
anya-e0104n:1345_13: Yathā uddharaṇādīsu sallahukasabhāvattā pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1345_15: evaṃ vossajjanādīsu tīsu garusabhāvattā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1347_3: “Kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī”ti adhippāyenāha “kimettha manāpa”nti.
anya-e0104n:1347_4: Idampīti yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi.
anya-e0104n:1347_5: Aṅgulaṅgulantareti aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho.
anya-e0104n:1347_6: Tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ paramasukhumabhāvappattaṃ aṃsuṃ sandhāyāha “aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1348_1: Tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo natthi,
anya-e0104n:1348_2: ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1348_3: Upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n:1349_2: idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena bhinditvā dassento “tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1350_1: Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpanti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n:1351_5: Tassa nissayabhāvato hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena “manodvāre”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1353_0: Ayamatthoti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atiittarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0104n:1354_2: Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1354_7: Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
anya-e0104n:1355_4: Dvīhi cittehi samohitāti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0104n:1355_6: tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:1355_7: ekena cittena saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.
anya-e0104n:1356_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā.
anya-e0104n:1356_1: Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā.
anya-e0104n:1356_2: Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhikā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā.
anya-e0104n:1357_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggāti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā.
anya-e0104n:1357_1: Ye ca bhaggā anāgateti ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti.
anya-e0104n:1357_2: Tadantarā niruddhānanti tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1357_3: Vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇeti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.
anya-e0104n:1358_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1358_2: Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n:1358_3: Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato
anya-e0104n:1358_5: Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati,
anya-e0104n:1358_6: phusso jīvatī”ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti,
anya-e0104n:1359_3: Puñjo natthi anāgate yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1359_6: Yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:1360_0: Bhaṅgo nesaṃ purakkhatoti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato,
anya-e0104n:1361_3: Bhaggā gacchantudassananti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti.
anya-e0104n:1362_1: “Vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpa”nti iminā sayameva uppajjanakadhammatāya “dhammatārūpa”nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1362_3: Lohaṃ nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1362_4: Tattha ayo rajataṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni.
anya-e0104n:1362_8: Tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha “loha”nti gahitanti.
anya-e0104n:1362_13: Maṇīti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo maṇiviseso.
anya-e0104n:1364_3: Iminā nayenāti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena.
anya-e0104n:1364_7: Tattha sītabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0104n:1367_0: Yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā,
anya-e0104n:1367_2: tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento “kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1367_3: Ye ime sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0104n:1368_0: Pavattaṃ cittanti sattasu ṭhānesu sammasanavasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ.
