anya-e0104n:1368_2: Taṃ yuttataranti taṃ ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ yuttataraṃ āsannabhāvena vibhūtataraṃ rūpasattake sammasanaṃ saha gahetvā sammasanassa vuttattā.
anya-e0104n:1368_3: Apica rūpasattake sammasanassa rūpadhammesu sātisayaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā pavattattā tabbisayaṃ arūpasammasanaṃ
anya-e0104n:1368_5: na pana apubbakesādisammasanaṃ katvā tabbisayaṃ pavattitaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1368_6: Tathā sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ navaṃ navaṃ eva siyā,
anya-e0104n:1368_7: pubbe gahitaṃ sammasanavisayaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññassa sammasanavisayassa gaṇhanato.
anya-e0104n:1369_4: Yamakato sammasati nāma nāmarūpadhamme ārabbha yugaḷavasena sammasanassa pavattanato.
anya-e0104n:1369_5: Ayañhi pubbe rūpasattakavasena sammasitvā ṭhitopi idāni ādānanikkhepādivasena sammasitvāva taṃ sammasati.
anya-e0104n:1370_4: Sammasitasammasitacittasammasanena tesaṃ khaṇikabhāvassa vibhāvanato idaṃ sammasanaṃ “khaṇikato sammasana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1371_1: Idameva ca sammasanaṃ diguṇitaṃ anekasammasanapaṭipāṭisambhavato “paṭipāṭito sammasana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1371_3: Tathā sati paṭipāṭisammasanapasutā eva bhāvanā siyā,
anya-e0104n:1371_7: arūpadhammesu ca aniccādilakkhaṇāni suṭṭhu vibhūtāni honti,
anya-e0104n:1371_10: Ṭhapetabbanti ca na ekādasamaṃ dvādasamena sammasitabbanti paṭipāṭito sammasanassa paricchedadassanaparaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1371_12: tasmā punapi rūpaṃ pariggahetvā yāva dasamacittasammasanā bhāvanamanuyuñjateva.
anya-e0104n:1372_1: Visuṃ sammasananayo nāma natthīti aniccādimanasikāravinimutto añño vipassanāmanasikāro natthi.
anya-e0104n:1372_2: Vipassanāya ca diṭṭhiādivikkhambhanā idha diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayoti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n:1372_3: Vipassanāya eva hi pavattivisesena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayo ijjhantīti dassento “yaṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1372_6: Sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittenāti sattasaññāya vikkhambhanavasena pavattacittena diṭṭhi nuppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1372_9: so diṭṭhiyā vikkhambhitāya vikkhambhito eva hoti,
anya-e0104n:1372_15: Taṇhāti idha sukhumā nikanti adhippetāti āha “taṇhāya…pe…
anya-e0104n:1374_0: Mama vipassanāti imassāpi attaniyasaññitāya vipassanāya sāmibhūto attā parāmasīyatīti diṭṭhigāhatāti
anya-e0104n:1374_1: tathā “gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1374_3: maggena pana asamugghāṭitattā anoḷārikāya ca diṭṭhiyā vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1376_0: Vipassituṃ sakkomīti tattha samatthatāpadesena guṇavisesayogato vipassanāya assādetabbatā dassīyati,
anya-e0104n:1376_2: Tasmā vipassanto eva kālaṃ vītināmessāmīti vipassanaṃ assādentassāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1377_0: Yasmā diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāmettha visesato anattānupassanāya hoti,
anya-e0104n:1377_1: tasmā taṃ dassentena “sace saṅkhārā”tiādinā anattānupassanāvidhiṃ vatvā yasmā pana anattato anupassantena
anya-e0104n:1377_2: saṅkhārā aniccatopi dukkhatopi anupassitabbā eva tadupabrūhanato,
anya-e0104n:1378_1: Khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanake saṅkhāre passantassa kuto mānassa avasaro.
anya-e0104n:1379_2: dukkhavatthuto ca dukkhabhūte saṅkhāre passantassa tattha īsakampi abhirato hoti.
anya-e0104n:1379_6: vuttanayena paṭipāṭito sammasanaṃ pasutassa yogino yadā anattānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1380_0: Yadā pana aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1381_0: Yadā pana dukkhānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1381_5: Evaṃ tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ kiccavisesavasena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādīni honti.
anya-e0104n:1381_6: Tena vuttaṃ “iti ayaṃ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1381_8: tasmā visuṃ sammasananayo natthīti na vattabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1382_1: Sabbākāratoti idha viya ekadesena avatvā sabbākārato sarūpato,
anya-e0104n:1382_6: Tappaṭipakkhe dhammeti yā anupassanā idha sambhavanti,
anya-e0104n:1382_7: tāsaṃ paṭipakkhe dhamme niccasaññādike pajahati vikkhambheti.
anya-e0104n:1383_4: Yāya paññāya ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti passati,
anya-e0104n:1383_6: Bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya tassā pāripūrīti ghanasaññāya pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n:1383_7: tato pubbe aparipuṇṇatāya taṃ na hoti.
anya-e0104n:1383_10: anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ disvā tattheva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā vayānupassanā,
anya-e0104n:1383_14: tasmiṃ pavatte taṇhāya cassa cittaṃ na namatīti.
anya-e0104n:1383_17: rūpasattakādivasena vā pariggahitassa taṃtaṃparicchedato paraṃ aññabhāvadassanaṃ vipariṇāmānupassanā,
anya-e0104n:1384_3: niccabhāvena ca saṅkhārānaṃ sakiccaparicchedatāya saviggahaṃ viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1384_8: Etesañhi nimittādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena aniccānupassanādayo animittādināmehi vuttāti aniccānupassanādīhi
anya-e0104n:1384_9: pahātabbā niccasaññādayo viya nimittaggāhādayova paṭipakkhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:1384_10: Rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā saṅkhārā eva bhijjanti,
anya-e0104n:1384_12: na añño koci atthīti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca sā dhammesu ca vipassanāti adhipaññādhammavipassanā,
anya-e0104n:1384_13: tāya niccasārādiādānavasena pavattaṃ abhinivesaṃ sataṇhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:1384_18: tāya kassacipi ālayanissayaadassanato ālayābhinivesaṃ tathāpavattaṃ taṇhaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:1384_20: tāya aniccādīsu appaṭisaṅkhātattā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ avijjaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n:1384_23: Tassā hi vasena tassa padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasaṅkhārehi cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati,
anya-e0104n:1384_25: Aniccānupassanādayo satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthato vibhattāti,
anya-e0104n:1384_26: parato ca saṃvaṇṇīyantīti idha na vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1386_6: “Kiñci paṭividdhaṃ kiñci appaṭividdha”nti iminā tesaṃ ekadesapaṭivedhamāha.
anya-e0104n:1386_10: vipariṇāmānupassanā ca ekadesena siddhā nāma honti,
anya-e0104n:1388_3: kāḷakāpagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesavigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhīti āha “niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo”ti.
anya-e0104n:1388_4: Anekākāravokārasaṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇasammasanassa katattā vuttaṃ “sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1388_6: Tasseva hi thirabhāvāya itare sammasanavisesāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1388_10: Vitthārato bhāvanāvidhānaṃ parato vattukāmo “saṅkhepato tāva ārabhatī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1389_7: Udayadassanañcettha yāvadeva vayadassanatthanti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane
anya-e0104n:1389_8: paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti āha “udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:1390_1: Ayaṃ hi jātasaddo khaṇattayasamaṅgitaṃ sandhāya vutto “ye dhammā jātā bhūtā”tiādīsu viya, na atītaṃ
anya-e0104n:1391_0: “Ye te jātā na te santi, ye na jātā tattheva te;
anya-e0104n:1392_0: Laddhattabhāvā no bhaggā, teva santi sabhāvato”ti. –
anya-e0104n:1393_1: nāpi jātatāmattaṃ “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n:1393_4: Taṃ pana ādito duppariggahanti santatipaccuppannavasena vipassanābhiniveso kātabbo.
anya-e0104n:1393_6: Paccayalakkhaṇapapañcaṃ anāmasitvā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayoti nibbattanasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ udayo uppādo.
anya-e0104n:1393_7: Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayoti vipariṇāmasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ vayo vināso.
anya-e0104n:1393_11: Kiñcāpi kalāpasammasanādīsu jātijarāmaraṇasīsena jātijarāmaraṇavanto dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0104n:1393_15: nipphannatā ca anuññātā viya hotīti taṃ pariharituṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu bhavapariyosānāva desanā katā.
anya-e0104n:1394_1: Iminā pāḷinayenāti imāya “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”ntiādinā dassitāya pāḷigatiyā.
anya-e0104n:1394_5: Svāyaṃ vikāro yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ abhinavāvaṭṭhānajarā viya navabhāvāpagamoti āha “abhinavākāra”nti.
anya-e0104n:1394_7: Anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā.
anya-e0104n:1394_10: Yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n:1394_11: evaṃ atītepi addhanīti dassento “nirujjhamānassāpī”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo,
anya-e0104n:1394_12: uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1394_13: Tattha rāsitoti rāsibhāvena samussito puñjo rāsi.
anya-e0104n:1395_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato dassetuṃ “puna yānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1395_5: Tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1395_8: Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1396_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1396_1: Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
anya-e0104n:1396_4: Asati ca avijjupanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavo evāti.
anya-e0104n:1396_12: Tattha addhānavasena pageva udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
anya-e0104n:1396_13: Pañca lakkhaṇānīti avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhātalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n:1396_14: Tesaṃ atthitā hi rūpassa udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:1397_0: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1397_7: Tasmā taṃ addhāvasena pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
anya-e0104n:1397_8: Pañca lakkhaṇānīti idha avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho,
anya-e0104n:1397_9: rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n:1397_11: rūpassa accantanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n:1398_9: ca vacanato phasso vedanā saññā saṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
anya-e0104n:1398_12: abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo,
anya-e0104n:1399_0: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativaseneva,
anya-e0104n:1399_2: Tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā.
anya-e0104n:1399_3: Apare panāhu “paccayato udayabbayadassane atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā vedanāsambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati,
anya-e0104n:1399_5: Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati,
anya-e0104n:1399_11: vayato ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā khaṇato udayabbayā upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0104n:1399_12: Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante
anya-e0104n:1399_13: khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.
anya-e0104n:1400_0: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1400_4: Tattha evampi rūpassa udayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayāpi. Taṇhā…pe… kamma…pe…
anya-e0104n:1400_6: Evampi rūpassa vayoti evaṃ vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhāpi taṇhā…pe…
anya-e0104n:1400_7: āhāranirodhāpi rūpassa vayo anuppādoti paccayato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1400_8: Evampi rūpaṃ udetīti evaṃ vuttanayena nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nippajjatīti.
anya-e0104n:1400_9: Evaṃ vuttanayeneva vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passanto kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi
anya-e0104n:1400_10: veti nirujjhatīti khaṇato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1401_1: Evaṃ manasi karoto na yāva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1401_2: tāva udayabbayā suṭṭhu pākaṭā na hontīti katvā vuttaṃ “iti kirime dhammā…pe…
anya-e0104n:1401_5: Paṭhamañhi paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ disvā atha atītānāgate nayaṃ neti.
anya-e0104n:1401_11: tesampi attano phalaṃ pati paṭicca samuppādabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1402_5: khandhānaṃ nirodhaṃ passatīti ettha yadetaṃ dassananti attho.
anya-e0104n:1402_7: Ettha ca yathā avijjādisamudayanirodhato khandhānaṃ samudayanirodhassa aññattā “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādivacanabhedo kato,
anya-e0104n:1402_8: na evaṃ nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇehi khandhānaṃ udayabbayassa bhedo atthi abhinnādhikaraṇattāti “nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0104n:1402_9: passanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passatī”ti vacanabhedaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1402_14: tasmā tāni passanto khaṇato khandhānaṃ udayabbaye passati nāmāti “yaṃ panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1403_12: Dukkhasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti ekadesadassanena pabbatasamuddādidassanakānaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:1403_14: “Paccayānuppādenā”ti etena paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho idha paccayanirodhoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1403_16: Yañcassa udayabbayadassananti yaṃ assa yogino paccayato,
anya-e0104n:1403_19: tappadhāno vā vitakkādidhammapuñjo maggo vāyaṃ lokikoti niyyānānulomato lokiko maggo evāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1403_20: Iti tasmā maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti sabhāvāvabodhato.
anya-e0104n:1403_23: Atha vā yathāvutto sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto maggo ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto asammohasabhāvo attānampi pakāseti padīpo viyāti maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1404_2: “Avijjāsamudayā”tiādinā avijjādīsu santesūti ayamattho vuttoti āha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti avabodhato”ti.
anya-e0104n:1404_7: Paṭiccasamuppannassa ca pākaṭatā paccayākārapākaṭatāya eva “imassetaṃ phala”nti avabodhato.
anya-e0104n:1405_1: Purimapurimānaṃ nirodho uttaruttarānaṃ uppādānubandhoti ayamattho paccayato udayadassanena sijjhamāno ekattanayādhigamāya hoti.
anya-e0104n:1405_5: Saṅkhārā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantīti ayamattho khaṇato udayadassanena sijjhamāno nānattanayādhigamāya hoti.
anya-e0104n:1405_9: Paccayato udayabbayadassanena paccaye sati phalassa bhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1405_10: asati abhāvoti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthitāmatteneva te dhammā kāraṇanti abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1405_15: Paccayato udayadassanena tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1405_16: uppajjamānā ca paccayānurūpameva uppajjantīti hetuphalassa hetuanurūpato siddhiyā akiriyadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatāvāti āha “paccayato panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1406_1: Paccayato udayaṃ passato paccaye sati sabhāve sati phalassa sambhavoti atthitāmattena upakārakatāti saṅkhatānaṃ nirīhatā,
anya-e0104n:1406_2: asati ca abhāvoti paccayādhīnavuttitā ca viññāyamānā attasuññataṃ vibhāvetīti āha “paccayato cassa…pe…
anya-e0104n:1406_4: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti khaṇato udayabbayadassanena saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayato paricchinnatāya viññāyamānattā.
anya-e0104n:1406_12: Uppajjitvā bhijjantā saṅkhārā uppādato uddhaṃ jarābhaṅgāvatthantaruppattiyā nirantaraṃ vibādhīyanteva.
anya-e0104n:1406_13: Sā ca nesaṃ vibādhiyamānatā sammā udayabbayadassanena vibhūtā hotīti āha “dukkha…pe…
anya-e0104n:1407_1: atha kho pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādisaññitaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇampi pākabhāvaviddhaṃ sabhāvāvacchinnaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1407_5: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇassa tāvakālikattampīti uppādādisaṅkhatalakkhaṇassa uppādakkhaṇādiparittakālikatāpi khaṇantarānavaṭṭhānato tassa.
anya-e0104n:1408_4: Tattha udake daṇḍena katalekhā udake daṇḍarāji.
anya-e0104n:1408_5: Ussāvabinduādayo pañca kiccāpi uttaruttari atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvadassanatthaṃ nidassitā,
anya-e0104n:1408_8: Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca bandhakhuradhārā
anya-e0104n:1408_15: Māyādayo hi maṇiādivasena dissamānā ataṃsabhāvatāya asārā.
anya-e0104n:1408_20: Gandhabbadevaputtānaṃ kīḷanicchāvasena nagaraṃ viya ākāse upaṭṭhānamattaṃ gandhabbanagaraṃ.
anya-e0104n:1409_1: “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādipāḷinayānusārena vā yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhā bhāvanāvidhi āraddho, ettāvatā.
anya-e0104n:1409_7: tampi attano dhammatāya eva vinassati ahetukattā vināsassa.
anya-e0104n:1409_12: “uppannañca idaṃ vayaṃ upetī”ti vayassa ca iminā yathāvuttena paccakkhakaraṇākārena.
anya-e0104n:1409_15: Kalāpasammasanādivasena pavattaṃ sammasanaṃ na nippariyāyena vipassanāsamaññaṃ labhati,
anya-e0104n:1409_16: udayabbayānupassanādivasena pavattameva labhatīti āha “yassādhigamā āraddhavipassakoti saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1411_11: Tassa pana paṭipattiyā garahitabbataṃ dassento “vippaṭipannakassā”ti āha. Ca-
anya-e0104n:1411_13: Nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassāti vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassa.
anya-e0104n:1411_15: Atha vā vippaṭipannakassāti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena vigarahitapaṭipattikassa.
anya-e0104n:1411_21: Sā pana yuttappayuttatā samathavasenāpi hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakassā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1411_22: Uppajjantiyeva na nuppajjanti aññathā maggāmaggañāṇasseva asambhavato.
anya-e0104n:1412_1: tena dhammuddhaccena vipassanāvīthito ukkamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ pavattitaṃ mānasaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1412_3: īdisaṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento mama ariyamaggoti attho.
anya-e0104n:1412_5: Nibbānanti gaṇhanto tattha pavattadhamme maggaphalabhāvena gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n:1412_7: Tato vikkhepo uddhaccanti tato obhāsahetu yo vikkhepo,
anya-e0104n:1413_1: nappajānāti “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti saññāya aniccatādivasena manasikārasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1414_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti,
anya-e0104n:1414_6: tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
anya-e0104n:1414_7: so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
anya-e0104n:1416_1: bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti, hoti so, āvuso,
anya-e0104n:1416_2: samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati,
anya-e0104n:1417_5: sā vipassanābhiratiākārena upaṭṭhahantī adhimānikena “dhammo”ti gayhatīti āha “nikanti ‘dhammo’ti nikantiṃ āvajjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1418_3: Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:1418_4: itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati,
anya-e0104n:1418_9: Dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vuttaṃ viya dissatīti.
anya-e0104n:1418_11: Ukkantā nāma hoti yoginā “maggappattomhī”ti adhimānena vissaṭṭhattā,
anya-e0104n:1418_12: tassa vā yogino vipassanā tato eva vīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n:1419_3: Tassa kira abbhantarepi ekā bhitti hoti bahipi,
anya-e0104n:1419_6: visadañāṇassa obhāsena pharitaṭṭhāne rūpagatañca dibbacakkhuno viya paññāyanti.
anya-e0104n:1420_0: Evaṃ obhāsassa vemattatāya vatthuṃ dassetvā cirakālavippalambane vatthuṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1420_1: Tattha ayaṃ pana vipassanupakkilesoti vakkhamānappakāraṃ sandhāyāha,
anya-e0104n:1422_0: Pacchā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ viññāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojessāmīti cintitattā vuttaṃ “avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato”ti,
anya-e0104n:1422_1: tassa ca padhānattā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1422_2: Ayaṃ dhammoti ayaṃ ariyamaggānugato paṭisambhidādhammoti therassa ajjhāsayavasena vadati.
anya-e0104n:1422_7: Dosacaritassa hi sūrassāpi sahasā bhayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:1422_8: Tenassa khīṇāsavatthero ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “iminā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti hatthinimmāpanādimakāsi.
anya-e0104n:1423_10: Ativisadanti nisitabhāvena ativiya paṭutaraṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:1424_2: Yasmā udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena pañca pītiyo uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1424_5: Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti.
anya-e0104n:1425_0: Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷakāni aññamaññāviyoginīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannā eva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena
anya-e0104n:1425_12: tādisehi manussavisesehi anubhavitabbatānativattanato dibbā ratipi saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n:1426_8: Vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya saṅkhepattho.
anya-e0104n:1426_10: Tattha yato yatoti rūpato vā arūpato vā.
anya-e0104n:1427_1: Yasmā taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītarūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo,
anya-e0104n:1428_4: atha kho kilesakālussiyāpagamena sampayuttānaṃ ativiya pasannabhāvahetubhūtā.
anya-e0104n:1429_0: Purimuppannabhāvanābalasaṃsiddhaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhato kosajjato paggaṇhanato paggaho.
anya-e0104n:1430_1: Supatiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhavigamena tena acalanīyatāya suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā.
anya-e0104n:1430_3: Acalabhāveneva pabbatarājasadisāti tīhipi padehi supatiṭṭhitameva dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1430_5: Yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānanti yaṃ yaṃ attano upatiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n:1430_8: Dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa upaṭṭhahante paralokasaññite satte sandhāyāha
anya-e0104n:1430_13: Yadaggena hi sati ārammaṇaṃ okkhanditvā upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n:1431_0: Vicinitavisayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā.
anya-e0104n:1431_2: Manodvārāvajjanacittasampayuttā cetanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā “āvajjanupekkhā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1431_3: Udayabbayānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato tadanupassanāyaṃ majjhattabhūtā idha vipassanupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0104n:1431_4: Te pana udayabbayā sabbasaṅkhārānanti āha “sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1431_6: sūratikkhabhāvo ca sabbaññutaññāṇapurecarā viya tadanucarañāṇassa tathābhāvena daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n:1432_1: Obhāsādayo vipassanāya vijambhanabhūtā tassā alaṅkāro viya hontīti āha “obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1433_3: Na vāpi hi upakkilesā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1433_5: “Na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā nikanti uppannapubbā”ti idaṃ dhammasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1433_7: Na hi so tadā taṃ “nikantī”ti jānāti,
anya-e0104n:1433_9: Tasmā evamassa siyā “na vata me evarūpā bhāvanābhirati uppannapubbā,
anya-e0104n:1434_1: Upakkilesavatthutāyāti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthutāya uppattiṭṭhānatāya.
anya-e0104n:1434_4: evaṃ nikantipi diṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “upakkilesavatthu cā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1434_6: Attavādī hi “ahaṃbuddhinibandhano”ti parikappito attā obhāsassa sāmibhūto “mamā”ti sāmivacanassa visayabhāvena
anya-e0104n:1434_7: gahitoti āha “mama obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho”ti.
anya-e0104n:1434_8: Obhāsassa manāpaggahaṇamukhena tena attānaṃ seyyādito dahatīti vuttaṃ “manāpo vata obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato mānagāho”ti.
anya-e0104n:1434_13: sā ca obhāsādīsu taṇhādigāhoti dassento “obhāsādīsu kampati…pe…
anya-e0104n:1435_1: Obhāse vā visayabhūte upakkilesehi cittaṃ vikampatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1437_5: Ayaṃ kho soti yo so ācariyena kammaṭṭhānadānakāle udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye uppajjatīti vutto,
anya-e0104n:1437_6: ayaṃ kho so obhāso uppannoti upakkilesavatthubhāvavavatthānaṃ dassetvā idānissa vipassanāya visayabhāvūpanayanavidhiṃ dassento “so kho panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1437_8: tasmiṃ siddhe itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0104n:1437_9: Dutiyanaye pana obhāsādike nissāya uppajjanakadiṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ugghāṭanasamugghāṭanapariyādānavasena manasikāravidhiṃ
anya-e0104n:1437_11: Arūpasattake “sace saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyu”ntiādi sabbasaṅkhārasaṅgaṇhanavasena sāmaññato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1437_13: Seso manasikāravidhi tattha vuttanayovāti āha “sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabba”nti.
anya-e0104n:1438_0: Obhāsaṃ “netaṃ mamā”ti samanupassanto taṇhāgāhato cittaṃ visodheti,
anya-e0104n:1439_0: Imāni dasa ṭhānānīti imāni yathāvuttāni obhāsādīni dasa upakkilesakāraṇāni.
anya-e0104n:1439_1: Paññā yassa pariccitāti yassa yogino paññā obhāsādīsu aniccatādiggahaṇavasena paricitavatī pariggahetvā upaparikkhitvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0104n:1441_1: diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇena vā diṭṭhiyā visodhane dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti dukkhasaccapariyāpannassa nāmarūpassa vavatthānato.
anya-e0104n:1446_2: Sikhāppatti panassa udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ attaṭṭhamānaṃvasena jātāti āha “aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1446_4: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭhannanti cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1446_6: tadanusārena itaralakkhaṇāni ca vibhāventīyeva udayabbayānupassanā pavattatīti katvā “vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n:1446_8: Tayidaṃ tassa sabbaso tīraṇapariññābhāvameva maññamānehi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1446_14: sā eva ariyamaggo paṭipajjati etāyāti paṭipadā cāti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1446_15: Taṃ pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1446_17: Yato tadavigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatā eva honti.
anya-e0104n:1446_18: Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhapahānaṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0104n:1446_19: Asati ca paṭipakkhapahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā,
anya-e0104n:1446_33: Tasmāti yasmā upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇādinavavidhañāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, tasmā.
anya-e0104n:1447_1: “Upakkilesavimutta”nti visesanena vibhāvitamatthaṃ anavabujjhanto codako “puna udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyo”ti pucchati.
anya-e0104n:1447_3: pageva nibbattitattā pakkassa pacanaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1447_4: Atha vā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇādihetupaṭipāṭiggahaṇavasena tamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo ācariyova kathetukamyatāvasena “kimatthiyo”ti pucchati.
anya-e0104n:1447_7: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayameva passati,
anya-e0104n:1447_10: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “udayabbayañāṇaṃ lakkhaṇattayavisayaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1447_11: Udayabbaye pana paṭividdhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:1447_18: avasavattanākāro ca vibhūtataro hotīti kāraṇabhāvena udayabbayañāṇe yogassa lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇatthatā veditabbā,
anya-e0104n:1447_21: Tañhi obhāsādiuppattihetutāya tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattampi diṭṭhiādīhi upakkiliṭṭhattā kuṇṭhaṃ avisadameva jātaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1448_2: “Kissa amanasikārā”ti hi idaṃ “kena paṭicchannattā”ti pucchitassa paṭicchādakassa hetupucchā.
anya-e0104n:1448_3: Santatiyā hissa paṭicchannattā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n:1448_4: sā ca santati udayabbayāmanasikārena paṭicchādikā jātā.
anya-e0104n:1448_6: te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātā.
anya-e0104n:1448_8: te ca ghanā nānādhātuvinibbhogāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātāti.
anya-e0104n:1448_9: Udayabbayaṃ passato na udayāvatthā vayāvatthaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n:1448_12: aññova vayakkhaṇoti ekopi dhammo khaṇavasena bhedato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n:1448_15: Tattha santatiyā vikopitāyāti pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññoññabhāvasallakkhaṇena santatiyā ugghāṭitāya.
anya-e0104n:1448_16: Na hi sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa dhammā sambandhabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0104n:1448_17: atha kho ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1449_0: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasi katvāti yathāpariggahitaudayabbayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ paṭipīḷiyamānataṃ vibādhiyamānataṃ manasi karitvā.
anya-e0104n:1449_2: Ekasmiñhi iriyāpathe uppannassa dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya hoti,
anya-e0104n:1449_3: evaṃ sesāpīti iriyāpathānaṃ taṃtaṃdukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve yāthāvato ñāte tesaṃ dukkhapaṭicchādakabhāvo
anya-e0104n:1449_4: ugghāṭito nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya pākaṭabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1449_10: aññā vedanā”tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n:1449_13: Yā hesā aññamaññūpatthaddhesu samuditesu rūpārūpadhammesu ekattābhinivesavasena aparimadditasaṅkhārehi gayhamānā samūhaghanatā,
anya-e0104n:1449_14: tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato gayhamānā kiccaghanatā,
anya-e0104n:1449_15: tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato gayhamānā ārammaṇaghanatā ca,
anya-e0104n:1449_16: tā dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānā hatthena parimajjiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilayaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0104n:1449_17: “yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā ete dhammā dhammamattā”ti anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1450_3: Yathāha “rūpaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ, vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
anya-e0104n:1450_11: Ettha ca purimena jātijarāmaraṇasabbhāvato aniccanti dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1450_20: Hutvā abhāvo hi pākabhāvato bhinno viddhaṃsābhāvattā tattha ca aniccalakkhaṇaṃ niruḷhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1450_21: Aniccākāro hi dukkhānattākārehi viya uppādākārato ca visiṭṭho.
anya-e0104n:1450_22: Tathā hi saddassa viddhaṃsābhāvo saṅkhatabhāvenapi sādhīyati.
anya-e0104n:1451_3: Apica yathā niccapaṭikkhepato aniccanti niccākārapaṭikkhepato yathāvutto abhāvākārasaṅkhāto aniccākāro aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1451_4: evaṃ sukhapaṭikkhepato dukkhanti sukhākārapaṭikkhepato abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanākārasaṅkhāto dukkhākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1451_5: tathā attapaṭikkhepato anattāti attākārapaṭikkhepato avasavattanākārasaṅkhāto anattākāro anattalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1451_6: Te yime tayopi ākārā asabhāvadhammattā khandhapariyāpannā na honti.
anya-e0104n:1451_7: Khandhehi vinā anupalabbhanīyato khandhavinimuttāpi na honti.
anya-e0104n:1451_8: Khandhe pana upādāya vohāravasena labbhamānā tadādīnavavibhāvanāya visesakāraṇabhūtā tajjāpaññattivisesāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1452_1: “Udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkhetī”ti idaṃ tadatthe tabbohāravasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1455_3: Paguṇā ca bhāvanā vikkhepābhāvato ārammaṇe appitā viya pavattatīti ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ lahuupaṭṭhānatā dassitā.
anya-e0104n:1455_4: Saṅkhāresu pana udayabbayavasena lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu udayadassanañca “uppādavato vināso”ti yāvadeva
anya-e0104n:1455_5: vayadassanatthaṃ tassa nibbidāvahattāti vaye evassa ābhogasamannāhāro manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1455_6: tena uppādādiṃ muñcitvā vayamevārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:1455_16: Keci pana “pavattaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ avicchedena pavattanaṃ uppādova,
anya-e0104n:1455_23: Na hi asati bhede vikappo yutto.
anya-e0104n:1455_27: Tattha nirodhasaddo anuppādepi dissatīti bhedasaddena visesitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1455_32: Etasmiṃ ṭhāneti upakkilesavinimuttassa udayabbayañāṇassa tikkhabhāvāpattiyaṃ vuttanayena udayampi muñcitvā vayasseva manasikārakāle.
anya-e0104n:1456_2: Yathāvuttassa vā ārammaṇassa khayavayabhedavasena paṭisaṅkhā ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā.
anya-e0104n:1457_1: Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇanti rūpaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇanti vipassitabbabhāvena gahitaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhāragatamāha.
anya-e0104n:1457_3: tañca bhaṅgānupassanāya adhippetattā bhaṅgato dassanamevāti āha “jānitvā khayato vayato disvāti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n:1458_0: Rūpārammaṇameva rūpārammaṇatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpārammaṇaṃ citta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1458_1: Rūpārammaṇatāti vā bhummatthe paccattavacananti dassento “atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1458_2: Aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti vipassanāvisayaṃ bhaṅgānupassanamāha.
anya-e0104n:1458_7: Ubhopi vipassatīti tadubhayampi khayato vayato vipassatīti.
anya-e0104n:1458_9: rūpassa yāva jarāmaraṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhātaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1458_10: dassanakañāṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāya bhaṅgassa anupassananti ubhayattha paññā.
anya-e0104n:1458_11: Purimaṃ vā tadabhāve abhāvato pacchimāyaṃ pakkhipitvā pacchimā eva paññā vipassane ñāṇanti.
anya-e0104n:1459_2: Anekehi ākārehīti aniccato anupassanādīhi anekehi ākārehi. Anu-
anya-e0104n:1460_5: tathāpi jātijarāsu diṭṭhāsu na tathā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti yathā vayakkhaṇeti āha “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1460_8: maraṇadhammameva ca jāyatīti jāti aniccatāya ādi koṭi,
anya-e0104n:1460_10: maraṇadhammameva ca jīratīti jarā majjhimā koṭi,
anya-e0104n:1460_12: jarādhammameva ca bhijjatīti bhaṅgo paramā koṭīti.
anya-e0104n:1460_13: Aniccato anupassatīti na kalāpato sammasanto viya “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti anumānavasena,
anya-e0104n:1460_15: atha kho udayabbayañāṇānubhāvena paccakkhato upaṭṭhitesu udayavayesu vuttanayena udayaṃ muñcitvā bhaṅgadassanavaseneva aniccato anupassati,
anya-e0104n:1460_16: evaṃ anupassato panassa niccagāhassa lesopi natthīti āha “no niccato”ti.
anya-e0104n:1460_19: kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1460_20: Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā, eva-
anya-e0104n:1461_0: Aniccato tāva anupassanā bhaṅgānupassakassa yuttā “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1461_5: Tasmā upari nibbattetabbato ñāṇaparikammatthañca itarāsampi channaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena anupassatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1461_10: tato pana pubbabhāge anekākāravokārā anupassanā icchitabbāva.
anya-e0104n:1461_12: “anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatī”ti āgatā tassā aṭṭhakathā ca virodhitā siyā.
anya-e0104n:1462_0: Na taṃ abhinanditabbanti taṃ saṅkhāragataṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanavasena “etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n:1462_2: Na tattha rañjitabbanti tattha saṅkhāragate rañjanavasena na pavattitabbaṃ, kāmarāgo,
anya-e0104n:1462_7: Sati ca vikkhambhane kathaṃ samudayoti āha “no samudeti,
anya-e0104n:1463_1: Yathā diṭṭhaṃ sampati upaṭṭhitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ nirodheti nirodhaṃ manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n:1463_2: adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ anvayañāṇavasena yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0104n:1463_3: evaṃ itarepīti anuminanto nirodheti manasikatassāpi nirodhaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1464_0: Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ vuttappakārena aniccānupassanādivasena paṭipanno.
anya-e0104n:1464_4: tato nibbattanake khandhe ca pajahati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1464_14: Nibbattento hi kilese ādiyatīti te anibbattento kilese na ādiyati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1464_17: Anādīnavadassitāya hi saṅkhāre ādiyatīti ādīnavadassitāya te na ādiyati na gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1466_1: “Vatthusaṅkamanā”ti ettha vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato rūpādiārammaṇaṃ “vatthū”ti adhippetanti dassento “rūpassā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1468_3: Tadanvayaṃ netīti tassa paccuppannasaṅkhārabhaṅgadassino ñāṇassa anvayaṃ anugatabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavatteti.
anya-e0104n:1469_2: Esāti yā ārammaṇanvayena ubho diṭṭhādiṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya ekabhāvena vavatthāpanā,
anya-e0104n:1469_3: esā vayalakkhaṇe vipariṇāmalakkhaṇe vipassanā bhaṅgānupassanāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1470_1: Ārammaṇañca paṭisaṅkhātiādi bhaṅgānupassanāya duppaṭivijjhattā vuttassevatthassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1470_2: Tayidaṃ bhaṅgadassanaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattanāvabodhanena anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhāyāti taṃ dassento “suññato ca upaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
anya-e0104n:1470_3: Ārammaṇassa hi bhaṅgārammaṇacittassa ca bhaṅgamanupassato visesato saṅkhārā suññā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n:1471_0: Na catthi aññoti ettha imasmiṃ loke añño khandhavinimutto attā nāma koci natthi.
anya-e0104n:1471_1: Tesaṃ khayaṃ passatīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe upaṭṭhahantaṃ bhaṅgaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n:1471_4: Maṇiṃva vijjhaṃ vajirena yoniso yathā nāma kusalo puriso upāyena maṇiṃ vijjhanto maṇissa chiddameva passati manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n:1471_6: evameva saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva yoniso manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n:1471_8: Yathā vā vajirena maṇiṃ vijjhantassa viddhaṭṭhānaṃ na puna ruhati,
anya-e0104n:1471_9: evaṃ vajirasadisena bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇena bhaṅge diṭṭhe na puna niccagāho ruhati,
anya-e0104n:1472_0: Yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti “rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati,
anya-e0104n:1472_1: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā”ti evamāgatā yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā,
anya-e0104n:1472_2: “tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī”ti evaṃ vuttā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā,
anya-e0104n:1472_5: na añño koci atthī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1472_6: ayaṃ evaṃ tidhā vuttāpi adhipaññāvipassanā nāmāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1474_1: Dubbalabhājanassa viyāti tintaāmamattikābhājanassa viya bhedameva passatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1474_6: Evamevāti yathā udakabubbuḷakāni udakatalādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannāni na ciraṭṭhitikāni sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjanti,
anya-e0104n:1474_7: evameva sabbe rūpārūpadhammā kammādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannā khaṇaṭṭhitikā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjantīti bhedameva passati.
anya-e0104n:1475_1: nissayapabandhavasena pana ciratarupaṭṭhānanti “yathā passe marīcika”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1476_2: Na hi nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva passato sassatadiṭṭhiyā avasaro atthi.
anya-e0104n:1476_11: kāmaguṇesu ratiyā ca sahanato abhibhavanato aratiratisahanatā.
anya-e0104n:1480_8: amaritukāmassāpi sūrassa bhāyitabbampi na bhayato upaṭṭhātīti “sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1480_10: tathā yogino bhaṅgato dissamānā saṅkhārāti āha “sīha…pe…
anya-e0104n:1481_0: Yathā itthiyā puttānaṃ sīsassa chinnatā chijjamānatā gayhamānā bhayāvahā,
anya-e0104n:1481_1: evaṃ yogino tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā gayhamānāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ekissā kira itthiyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1482_0: Yathā pūtibhūtaṃ odanādi na sabhāvena tiṭṭhati vinassati,
anya-e0104n:1482_1: evaṃ yassā itthiyā vijātavijātā puttā na jīvanti maranti eva,
anya-e0104n:1482_4: Atītapaccuppannasaṅkhāranirodho hissa supākaṭo evāti na so upamāya sādhetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1482_5: Antimabhavikassa ca yogino sattakkhattuṃ paramādibhāvino atīte dukkhabahutāya,
anya-e0104n:1482_6: anāgatadukkhaparittatāya ca dassanatthaṃ bahupajāva itthī nidassitā.
anya-e0104n:1483_0: Tattha yathā tassā nava puttā matā,
anya-e0104n:1483_7: Evamavaṭṭhite yadeke dasaputtamātaraṃ aggahetvā navaputtamātuggahaṇaṃ sātthakanti vadanti,
anya-e0104n:1483_10: Gabbhagato appaccakkhatāya bhāvīpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti adhippāyena kucchigato anāgatasaṅkhāraṭṭhāniyo vutto.
anya-e0104n:1483_11: Etasmiṃ khaṇeti bhaṅgadassanamukhena saṅkhārānaṃ bhayānakabhāvena upaṭṭhānakkhaṇe.
anya-e0104n:1484_3: ñāṇaṃ pana bhāyitabbavatthuṃ bhāyitabbanti yāthāvato jānāti.
anya-e0104n:1484_7: Kāmabhavādīnañhi tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ nidassanabhāvena tāsaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1485_1: sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāna”nti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0104n:1485_2: Saṅkhārānaṃ pana tathā upaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāravinimuttaṃ na hotīti āha “atītā…pe…
anya-e0104n:1485_6: Khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgameva passato hi nimittasaññitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccatāya vuttanayena sappaṭibhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:1485_8: matthakappattāya pana bhaṅgānupassanāya sabbabhavesu abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n:1485_9: santasukhābhimatāpi bhavā dukkhasabhāvatāya bhayato upaṭṭhahantīti dassanatthaṃ “pavattanti rūpārūpabhavapavattī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1485_12: Dvayampi hi taṃ attasuññameva hutvā upaṭṭhahatīti.
anya-e0104n:1488_10: Taṇhāgāhābhāveneva cettha “esohamasmī”ti mānagāhābhāvopi vuttoyeva hoti, vā-
anya-e0104n:1489_0: Idāni patthanādīnamabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo bhavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1489_1: Tattha tayo bhavā aṅgārakāsuyo viya jātiādidukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvena mahābhitāpatāya.
anya-e0104n:1489_2: Cattāro mahābhūtā kaṭṭhamukhapūtimukhaaggimukhasatthamukhasaṅkhātā ghoravisaāsīvisā viya kāyassa thaddhatāvissandanadāhacchedadukkhavidhānato visesato,
anya-e0104n:1489_20: Cha ajjhattikāyatanāni attattaniyabhāvena gahitānipi tato rittabhāvato suññagāmo viya bhojanādigayhupagamettha atthīti paviṭṭhasuññagāmo viya.
anya-e0104n:1491_1: Cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya sabbathāpi ghātakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1492_3: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehī”ti –
anya-e0104n:1493_4: Sabbattha yathā heṭṭhā nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti sambandho,
anya-e0104n:1493_5: evaṃ uparipi “savāḷakamiva vanagahana”ntiādīsu taṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1494_4: Tathā hissa yogino sabbesu bhavādīsu sabbepi saṅkhārā nissaggato nirantaraṃ sappaṭibhayāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n:1495_1: Idaṃ vuttanti idaṃ dasavatthukaṃ dvādasavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena tasseva padabhājanaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1496_0: Uppādo bhayanti saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo akhemaṭṭhena bhayavatthutāya bhayaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1496_4: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārānaṃ āyatiṃ uppādoti anuppādo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1496_5: Tañca sabbaso bhayābhāvato paramassāsabhūtattā nibbhayaṭṭhena khemanti.
anya-e0104n:1496_8: Pavattiyaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā tadanantarameva nivattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanavasena sīghaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentānaṃ vasena “uppādo bhayaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1496_12: bhayaṃ visesitabbaṃ sāmaññabhāvatoti satipi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāve liṅgabhedo gahito.
anya-e0104n:1497_0: Uppādo saṅkhārāti ettha pana sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā saṅkhārā bhedato vihitā sabbatthakameva
anya-e0104n:1498_1: Ñāṇaṃ ādīnave idanti ādīnave visayabhūte idaṃ pañcavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1498_2: Ñāṇaṃ santipadeti santipade ninnādibhāvena ṭhitaṃ idaṃ ñāṇanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1499_1: Kammapaccayā paccuppannabhave uppajjamānānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo pākaṭataro hutvā upaṭṭhātīti āha “purimakammapaccayā idha uppattī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1499_2: Pavattaṃ nāma idha pavattiyaṃ dhammappavattīti āha “uppannassa pavattī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1499_5: Ettha ca uppādapavattaāyūhanaggahaṇena paccuppannaddhapariyāpannā saṅkhārā gahitā,
anya-e0104n:1499_9: Yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti sā nirayādibhedā gati sucaritaduccaritavasena gantabbattā,
anya-e0104n:1499_16: atha kasmā sesā vuttāti āha “sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1499_17: Tena vipassakānaṃ ñāṇavipphārassa visayasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ desanā vaḍḍhitāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1500_0: Anvayato dassitassa ādīnavañāṇassa byatirekato dassanatthaṃ paṭipakkhañāṇadassanaṃ “yattha uppādo natthi,
anya-e0104n:1500_3: anubuddhānañca āciṇṇametaṃ yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ dassetvā nirodhasaccadesanāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1500_4: Yathā loke kassaci ādīnavadassanaṃ niratthakampi hoti,
anya-e0104n:1500_6: idaṃ pana sātthakamevāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1500_7: Tappaṭipakkhaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti dāhābhibhūtassa sītaninnatā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhādīnavato ekaṃsena muñcitukamyatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1501_1: “Niyamato dukkha”nti etenassa dukkhabhāvena bhāyitabbatāti bhāyitabbatā dukkhabhāvaṃ na byabhicaratīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1501_10: Na hi tattha sāmisatālesopi atthīti. Matta-
anya-e0104n:1501_17: Kasmā sabbāni gahitānīti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1501_18: Yathā tesu eva saṅkhāresu aniccato dukkhato anattato pavattivasena ākāranānattato anupassanānānattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1502_0: Yasmā ādīnavañāṇassa visayabhāvena vuttā pannarasāpi atthā uppādādīsu pañcasveva antogadhā,
anya-e0104n:1502_1: tattha ca ñāṇaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena pavattanato dasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1502_4: attanipi asammūḷhamevāti attānampi pajānantaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1502_6: Dvinnanti dvīsu kusalasaddayogena hi bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā “kusalā naccagītassā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1502_8: Dvinnanti vā dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasenāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1502_9: Pavattiyā yāthāvato diṭṭhatāya tappaṭipakkhato santipadaṃ suvinicchitameva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:1505_4: anabhiramanto ca nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1506_2: pañcasu himavato mahāsikharesu pacchimo cittakūṭapabbato nāma.
anya-e0104n:1510_3: Yasmā bhayato dissamānā eva saṅkhārā mahādīnavā,
anya-e0104n:1510_5: tasmā ekampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ tathābhāvanābalappattiyā avatthāvisesayuttaṃ tividhakiccasāmatthiyavantaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “atthato eka”nti.
anya-e0104n:1513_2: Muñcitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti anādikālikassa khandhassa pariññāyamānattā.
anya-e0104n:1513_3: Muñcitukāmatā tato attānaṃ nibbedhetukāmatā nissaritukāmatā apagantukāmatā.
anya-e0104n:1516_2: muñcitukāmo”ti vatvā puna sabbasmā saṅkhāragatāti sabbaggahaṇaṃ sātisayamuttidassanatthaṃ adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti.
anya-e0104n:1516_5: Taṃ pana vuccamānāya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ “puna te evaṃ saṅkhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1516_6: Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhārapariggaṇhanaṃ pubbepi katanti punaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1516_10: Saṅkhārānaṃ pariggaṇhanaṃ nāma paripuṇṇalakkhaṇavaseneva hotīti “tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1519_5: amaṇḍanena sakkā etesaṃ subhabhāvaṃ hantunti attho.
anya-e0104n:1519_6: Amaṇḍanena vā tesaṃ asubhatā pākaṭā hotīti amaṇḍanahatā.
anya-e0104n:1519_7: Maṇḍanena vā na hantabbasabhāvā “asūriyapassā”ti viya amaṇḍanahatā.
anya-e0104n:1519_10: Paṭighasaṃyojanavatthutāya passante attani bandhatīti bībhacchaṃ ativiya virūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1519_12: Ajaññajigucchanīyatā hi gūthaṃ viya pariccajitabbaṃ vā bībhacchaṃ. Idha ādi-
anya-e0104n:1521_3: Upāyasampādanatthanti aniccādivasena suṭṭhu pariggaṇhanaṃ parimaddanā upāyo,
anya-e0104n:1522_0: Macchagahaṇatthaṃ udake tattha tattha khipanti etanti khippaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1522_6: Hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvāti sappena attano bhogena veṭhitaṃ hatthapadesaṃ nibbeṭhetvā mocetvā.
anya-e0104n:1523_2: Ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samūhādighanaggahaṇaṃ bhinditvā.
anya-e0104n:1523_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ niccādiākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ asamatthatā aniccasaññādibhedāya vipassanāya sātisayaṃ balavabhāvappattiyā,
anya-e0104n:1523_5: sā ca saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādiākārassa suṭṭhutaraṃ sallakkhaṇenāti āha “tilakkhaṇāropanena…pe…
anya-e0104n:1523_7: Yathā hi nibbuddhakaraṇe balavatarena paṭimallena tattha tattha muṭṭhippahārādinā vimathito itaro tena yujjhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpito hoti.
anya-e0104n:1523_9: atha kho maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n:1523_10: evametepi saṅkhārā evaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ pāpitā upariñāṇānubhāvena nibbisevanataṃ,
anya-e0104n:1524_1: Ettāvatāti evaṃ “anaccantikato”tiādinā parocattālīsāya ākārehi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādibhāvasallakkhaṇavasappavattena paṭisaṅkhānena.
anya-e0104n:1525_0: Aniccato manasikarototiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n:1526_1: “paṭisaṅkhā”ti padassa “jānitvā”ti atthaṃ vatvā paṭisaṅkhānuppajjanakiriyānaṃ samānakhaṇattā asatipi
anya-e0104n:1526_3: Tena “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0104n:1526_5: uggatoyaṃ divākaro”ti ca evamādīsu viya samānakālavasenāyaṃ saddapayogoti.
anya-e0104n:1526_6: Tathā manañca dhamme ca paṭhamaṃ paṭicca pacchā na manoviññāṇassa uppatti,
anya-e0104n:1526_8: Ediso saddapayogo yebhuyyena loke pubbakālavaseneva dissatīti pubbakālavaseneva idhāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “ekattanayena vā…pe…
anya-e0104n:1526_11: aparāparaṃ uppannesu ñāṇesu purimassa vasena paṭisaṅkhānakiriyā,
anya-e0104n:1526_13: na ca tāni bhedato apekkhitabbāni ekasantānapatitatāya ekattanayavasena gahitattāti.
anya-e0104n:1529_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ aniccadukkhākārādipariggaṇhanavasena pavattampi paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ visesato anattākārapariggaṇhanapadhānanti
anya-e0104n:1529_3: Tasmiñhi sati saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na asati.
anya-e0104n:1529_4: Tadabhāvato hi aniccadukkhalakkhaṇapaññāpakampi sarabhaṅgasatthārādīnaṃ sāsanaṃ aniyyānikameva jātaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1529_5: Atha vā tesaṃ niccasārādīhi rittakaṃ sandhāya “sabbe saṅkhārā suññāti pariggahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1529_8: Saṅkhārānaṃ attasuññatāya duviññeyyabhāvato anekavāraṃ paṭividdhāyapi suññatānupassanāya daḷhībhāvāpādanatthaṃ “puna suññamida”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1529_11: Sati hi attani attaniyena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1529_16: saṅkhāraṃ vā parikkhārabhāve attano sukhadukkhasādhanabhāve ṭhitaṃ na disvāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1530_6: seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā parehi parikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1530_9: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-
anya-e0104n:1530_14: tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ sijjhatīti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano
anya-e0104n:1530_15: kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “na ca kvacanī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1530_16: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano abhāvaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n:1530_17: Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati.
anya-e0104n:1530_18: Na ca mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1530_20: Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n:1530_21: Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā na catthīti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
anya-e0104n:1530_23: bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti.
anya-e0104n:1531_1: “Chahākārehī”tiādinā niddesādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatānupassanāya paribrūhanaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1531_4: Niccenāti “nicco”ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenaci.
anya-e0104n:1531_12: Yāva jarāmaraṇāti peyyālaṃ akatvā pariyosānapadameva dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1532_5: Keci panettha “niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā”ti pāḷīti adhippāyena “asāraṃ
anya-e0104n:1532_9: Apare pana “subhasārasārenātipi pāḷiyaṃ atthīti ‘asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata’nti idaṃ padattayaṃ ‘niccasārasārenā’tiādīsu
anya-e0104n:1533_7: kenaci issariyaṃ kāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca anissariyato.
anya-e0104n:1533_8: Pheṇapiṇḍena bhājanādiṃ kātukāmassa viya rūpassa niccatādiṃ kātukāmassa taṃ na sijjhati,
anya-e0104n:1533_9: sakaicchāvasena vā kāci kiriyā natthīti akāmakāriyato.
anya-e0104n:1533_13: nāpi aññaṃ attano vase vattetīti avasavattakato.
anya-e0104n:1533_14: Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ tassa paro viya avidheyyatāya parato.
anya-e0104n:1534_1: Rūpaṃ na sattotiādīsu yo lokavohārena satto,
anya-e0104n:1534_2: rūpaṃ so na hotīti ayamattho idha nādhippeto tassāvuttasiddhattā.
anya-e0104n:1534_5: So hi tehi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresaṃ sañjāpanaṭṭhena “satto”ti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:1534_11: “Ahamasmī”ti mānuppattiṭṭhānatāya māno ettha vāti pavattatīti mānavo.
anya-e0104n:1534_15: Paccattaṃ tassa tassa ahaṃkāravatthutāya “aha”nti ca diṭṭhigatikehi attā vuccati,
anya-e0104n:1534_16: rūpaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti suññatāpariggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ na satto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1534_17: Tasmā aṭṭhahipi padehi rūpassa attasuññatāva dassitā.
anya-e0104n:1534_19: Tattha na mamāti mayhaṃ attano santakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1534_20: tathā aññassa attano santakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1534_21: kassacipi attano santakaṃ na hoti attanoyeva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1534_22: “Na attaniya”nti padena pakāsito evattho pariyāyantarehi tīhipi padehi pakāsito.
anya-e0104n:1535_1: Heṭṭhā kalāpasammasanassa daḷhabhāvāya vuttasammasananayāpi suññatānupassanāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattantīti dassento “tīraṇapariññāvasenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1535_7: “Samudayato atthaṅgamato”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathā aniccato dassanaṃ panāḷikāya,
anya-e0104n:1535_10: Tathā “yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1535_11: ayaṃ rūpassa assādo”ti dassanaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāvanena suññatāvibhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1535_13: ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo”ti ca dassanaṃ niccatādisuññatābhāvanato.
anya-e0104n:1535_18: pubbe vatvāpi puna vacanaṃ assādapaṭikkhepato dassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1536_0: Vuttampi ca niddese etaṃ suññatāpariggaṇhanakathāsandassanaṃ “asukāya pāḷiyā ayaṃ niddeso”ti dassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1537_1: Evaṃ tīraṇapariññāvasena paccekaṃ khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvāpi tividhānupassanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n:1537_4: Bhayañca nandiñca vippahāyāti ajjhupekkhakatāya saṅkhārānaṃ vipattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayañceva tesaṃ
anya-e0104n:1537_6: Atha vā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppajjanakañāṇabhayañca sammasanavasena uppajjanakapītisaṅkhātaṃ nandiñca pahāya.
anya-e0104n:1537_7: Na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhayanandīnaṃ avasaro atthi,
anya-e0104n:1537_11: tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhātī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1537_12: Idānissa udāsīnatāya upamaṃ dassento “vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1538_0: Tattha anudāsīnatāpubbikā udāsīnatā vuccamānā idha opammatthaṃ pharatīti dassetuṃ “iṭṭhā kantā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1538_1: Ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya itthīnaṃ sāṭheyyakūṭeyyavaṅkeyyādīnaṃ ajānanato.
anya-e0104n:1538_5: Muñcitukāmatāya uddhaṃ yāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1538_6: tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhānupassanā evāti āha “paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto”ti.
anya-e0104n:1539_0: Patilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:1541_1: Tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne taṃ panetaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anekavāraṃ
anya-e0104n:1541_2: pavattamānaṃ paripākagamanena anulomañāṇassa paccayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1541_3: Tathābhūtañca sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0104n:1541_4: Tayidaṃ idha ñāṇaṃ anulomagotrabhuñāṇehi saddhiṃ ekattaṃ netvā vuttaṃ ekattanayavasena.
anya-e0104n:1541_5: No ce nibbānaṃ santato passatīti tāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa aparipakkatamevāha.
anya-e0104n:1541_9: lakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ yo koci tādiso sakunto veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1542_1: Piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viyāti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṃ saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n:1542_5: Yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā,
anya-e0104n:1542_8: Saṅkhāravicinaneti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya saṅkhāresu viya tesaṃ vicinanepi udāsīnaṃ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena
anya-e0104n:1542_10: “Sattadhā aṭṭhārasadhā”tiādinā vibhattāpi hi anupassanāpakārā aniccānupassanādīsveva tīsu antogadhāti
anya-e0104n:1542_11: matthakappattā vipassanā tāsaṃ eva vasena tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n:1543_8: anattānupassanābahulassa paññindriyanti tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena balavatarabhāvaṃ pattāni imāni
anya-e0104n:1543_11: Tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvanti ettha ke pana tayo vimokkhā,
anya-e0104n:1543_12: kāni vā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti antolīne anuyoge vimokkhamukhādhīnattā vimokkhādhigamassa vimokkhamukhāni tāva dassento “tisso hi…pe…
anya-e0104n:1543_13: vuccantī”ti vatvā ayañca attho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1544_2: Paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
anya-e0104n:1544_3: Samanupassanatāyāti sammadeva anu anu passanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1544_7: Animittāya ca dhātuyāti sabbasaṅkhāranimittavirahato “animittā”ti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā.
anya-e0104n:1544_8: Cittasampakkhandanatāyāti paricchinditvā anulomañāṇādibhāvena sammadeva adhicittassa anupavisanatthāya.
anya-e0104n:1545_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanena saṃvejiyamānaṃ cittaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ samuttejitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1545_2: Mamaṃkārena attaniyasaññitassa vatthuno sāmibhūto attā paṭhamaṃ parāmasīyati,
anya-e0104n:1545_8: “sabbasaṅkhāre”tiādīni pana tīṇi vākyāni tīṇi padānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n:1545_9: Tenevāti aniccānupassanādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ vuttattā eva.
anya-e0104n:1545_10: Pañhavissajjaneti “aniccato manasi karoto kathaṃ saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti pañhassa vissajjane.
anya-e0104n:1546_1: Evaṃ vimokkhamukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetuṃ “katame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1546_4: Yassa visesato aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1546_6: “Aniccā saṅkhārā”ti hi ādito saddhāmattakena paṭipajjitvā vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya tarupallavādīsu viya
anya-e0104n:1546_7: maṇikanakādīsupi tesaṃ aniccataṃ sātisayaṃ paccakkhato passato “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti satthari
anya-e0104n:1546_10: Tassa aniccānupassanābahulatāya aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti so “animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1546_12: tappaṭipakkhato sukho nirodho”ti ca manasikāravasena nibbānassa santapaṇītasukhabhāvaṃ adhimuccanto abhiṇhaṃ
anya-e0104n:1546_14: Tato ca adhimattasamādhindriyapaṭilābhena rāgapaṇidhiyā dūrībhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti vuttaṃ “dukkhato…pe…
anya-e0104n:1546_16: Vedabahuloti anattānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto attasuññatāya nipuṇañāṇavisayattā ñāṇabahulo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1546_17: Tato ca adhimattapaññindriyapaṭilābhena mohassa dūrībhāvato suññatavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti āha “anattato…pe…
anya-e0104n:1547_0: Yo aniccānupassanāya nimittavasena saṅkhāre pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto yattha idaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ sabbaso natthi,
anya-e0104n:1547_1: taṃ “animittaṃ nibbāna”nti animittākārena adhimuccanto vuṭṭhānagāminimaggena ghaṭeti.
anya-e0104n:1547_2: Tassa maggo animittato nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti vuccatīti āha “animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo”ti.
anya-e0104n:1547_3: Svāyaṃ nibbānassa animittākāro neva maggena kato,
anya-e0104n:1547_6: Tadārammaṇatāya ca maggo animittoti vuccatīti dassento āha “animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto”ti.
anya-e0104n:1547_7: Yo dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena appaṇihitaṃ adhimuccanto,
anya-e0104n:1547_8: yo anattānupassanāvasena attūpaladdhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena suññataṃ adhimuccantoti ca ādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1548_2: atha kasmā abhidhamme vimokkhadvayameva āgatanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1548_4: Nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāyāti ujukameva vipassanato maggassa nāmāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:1548_5: Animittavipassanā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:1548_8: sā pana niccanimittadhuvanimittaattanimittāni ugghāṭentīpi sayaṃ nimittadhammesu eva caratīti sanimittāva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1548_14: amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:1549_1: suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotīti tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0104n:1549_3: Ye pana vadanti “animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1549_7: Maggo hi dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasato ca paccanīkato cāti,
anya-e0104n:1549_10: suññatamaggo rāgādīhi suñño evāti te sarasato nāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0104n:1549_12: suññatamaggo attābhinivesassa evāti te paccanīkato nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e0104n:1549_14: niccanimittādīnaṃ vā abhāvena sarasato eva nāmaṃ labhati,
anya-e0104n:1549_16: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho,
anya-e0104n:1549_17: sā panassa anulomabhāve ṭhitāti sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n:1550_1: Vuṭṭhānagāminī hi vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasantī vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0104n:1550_2: tassa tassa vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti,
anya-e0104n:1550_3: tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto hoti,
anya-e0104n:1550_6: tasmā suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā esāti katvā idha tayopi vimokkhā uddhaṭā.
anya-e0104n:1550_7: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge abhinivesanimittapaṇidhimuñcanaṃ upādāya tissannampi anupassanānaṃ tadāgamanavasena
anya-e0104n:1550_9: tassa pariyāyabhāve vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ “vipassanāñāṇaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1551_1: Niccato abhinivesaṃ muñcatīti “te niccā”ti niccākārato pavattamicchābhinivesaviddhaṃsanavasena,
anya-e0104n:1553_1: Tesaṃ vibhāgāyāti tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ saddhānusāriādibhāvena vibhattasabhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n:1554_1: Saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhatīti saddhānusāribhāvitākāraṇabhūtaṃ adhimattaṃ saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati.
anya-e0104n:1554_5: aniccākārasallakkhaṇassa saddhābhibuddhiyā upanissayabhāvato tadanvaye magge saddhā tikkhatarā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1554_7: Sesesu sattasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā sattasu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0104n:1555_5: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya diṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0104n:1555_6: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
anya-e0104n:1556_4: dve sīsānī”ti vacanato natthi arahato saddhāvimuttatāti?
anya-e0104n:1556_12: so aggaphalakkhaṇepi tadanvayatāya saddhāvimuttoti paṭisambhidāmagge pariyāyena vuttoti idhāpi tatheva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1556_15: Yathā saddhāvimuttassa sekkhassa kilesakkhayo kuṇṭhena asinā kadalicchedasadiso “no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato,
anya-e0104n:1556_17: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesapahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
anya-e0104n:1556_18: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
anya-e0104n:1556_20: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appakasirena akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n:1556_24: Evañca katvā paṭhamamaggādīsu satipi indriyasamatte saddhādīnaṃ tikkhatāvacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1557_3: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dve dhurānī”ti niyamitattā paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā siyā,
anya-e0104n:1558_1: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
anya-e0104n:1558_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
anya-e0104n:1559_5: Upacārarūpajjhānasamādhito hi sātisayaṃ arūpasamādhisamphassaṃ laddhā nibbattīti ekaccāsavaparikkhayaṃ
anya-e0104n:1559_7: apekkhitvā kāyasakkhī viya kāyasakkhīti arahā paṭisambhidāmagge vuttoti idhāpi tameva nayaṃ gahetvā arahatopi
anya-e0104n:1559_10: Nippariyāyena pana paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1559_15: Passaddhibahuloti ca passaddhisīsena samādhi vuttoti sātisayasamādhilābhī samathayānikova adhippeto,
anya-e0104n:1559_18: Tattha pana ekampi laddhā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto eva hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “arūpajjhāna”micceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1559_23: Dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n:1560_2: gambhīrā ca atthā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti anattato manasi karoto vedabahulatā,
anya-e0104n:1560_5: Paññā hi idha “dhammo”ti adhippetā “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n:1561_1: Yassā pāḷiyā vasena idha ariyapuggalassa saddhāvimuttādibhāvo vutto,
anya-e0104n:1562_1: “Saddhindriyassa adhimattattā saddhāvimutto”ti evamādiatthassa sādhakaṃ aparampi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1562_2: “Saddahanto vimutto”ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n:1563_3: phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikaraṇūpāyena sacchikātabbaṃ sacchākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1563_7: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
anya-e0104n:1563_9: nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikatova hoti.
anya-e0104n:1563_10: Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchākāsīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:1563_11: na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
anya-e0104n:1563_12: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1563_13: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
anya-e0104n:1563_16: Ime ca saddhāvimuttādayo tayo paramatthato apariyositañāṇakiccāti taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ “saddahanto vimuccatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1564_8: Iti diṭṭhippattassa maggaphalañāṇabyāpāradassanāni imāni padānīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1565_2: Saddhaṃ anusaratīti āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ saddhaṃ anugacchati.
anya-e0104n:1565_5: Saddhāya vā anusaratīti saddhāya kāraṇabhūtāya saccapaṭivedhassa anurūpaṃ sarati gacchati,
anya-e0104n:1565_9: Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimutto,
anya-e0104n:1565_12: Arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyekadesato ca vimutto,
anya-e0104n:1565_13: ariyamaggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n:1565_14: Pajānanto vimuttoti paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri ariyasaccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto
anya-e0104n:1565_15: tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto.
anya-e0104n:1566_2: so adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1566_6: tassa passaddhibahulatāya samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti dukkhupanisāya saddhāyapi tibbatarattā,
anya-e0104n:1566_12: so vedabahulo paññindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī eva hoti,
anya-e0104n:1566_16: aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā dhammānusārī vā siyā.
anya-e0104n:1568_1: Yaṃ taṃ vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya ca paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1568_8: hontīti vuttaṃ “idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1569_7: tāva vicinanepi udāsīnatāya ñāṇassa santānavasena pavattiṃ sandhāyāha “ajjhupekkhanaṃ santiṭṭhanā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1569_8: Evanti ajjhupekkhanākārasāmaññato “muñcitukamyatā ca sā santiṭṭhanā cā”ti vuttākārena.
anya-e0104n:1571_3: Kiccavasena pavattiṭṭhānavasenapi lokiyañāṇānaṃ upari ṭhitattā vuttaṃ “uttamabhāvaṃ pattattā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1571_6: Tañhi vipassanāya gocarakaraṇasaṅkhātena abhinivesena abhiniviṭṭhavatthunti pavuccati.
anya-e0104n:1571_7: Taṃ panetaṃ sasantatipariyāpannampi parato diṭṭhitāya “bahiddhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1571_8: Tadeva hi “bahiddhā sabbanimittānī”ti tattha tattha vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1571_12: tannimittaṃ asati maggabhāvanāya uppajjanakaupādinnakkhandhapavattabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1572_3: Ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvāti sasantatipariyāpannesu khandhesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0104n:1572_4: “Ajjhattā vuṭṭhātī”ti idaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ajjhattadhammārammaṇattā pariyāyato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1572_8: taṃ pana ajjhattādivibhāgaṃ akatvā “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1572_9: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti avibhāgena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pavattivasena veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1572_10: tayidaṃ satthu sammukhā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesentassa ñāṇuttarassa sambhavatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1573_1: Suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ na hoti mamaṃkāravatthunopi pariññeyyattā maggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1574_1: Rāsiṃ katvāti bhūtupādāyavasena duvidhaṃ antarabhedavasena anekabhedampi “ruppanaṭṭhena rūpa”nti piṇḍato gahetvā.
anya-e0104n:1574_3: evaṃ arūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa hoti.
anya-e0104n:1574_4: Abhinivesoti ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge kattabbanāmarūpaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1575_2: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti kāmaṃ udayabbayapariggaṇhanaṃ abhinivesoti dassitaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1575_4: tesañca paccaye pariggahetvā saṅkhepeneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ cārento ñāṇuttaro yathānisinnova ñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0104n:1575_5: khippameva saccāni paṭivijjhanto ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0104n:1575_6: Aññathā ekeneva lokiyacittena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariggahaparijānanādīnaṃ asambhavato.
anya-e0104n:1575_7: Na hi sanidassanasappaṭighādiṃ ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkā.
anya-e0104n:1576_1: Ettha ca abhiniveso akāraṇaṃ vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1576_2: tasmā heṭṭhā vuttavimokkhaariyapuggalavibhāgāpi vuṭṭhānavasena sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “ettha ca yopī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1576_3: Tattha tayopi janāti vuṭṭhānavasena bhede asatipi abhinivesavaseneva laddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1577_1: Saddhiṃ purimapacchimañāṇehīti bhayatupaṭṭhānādipurimañāṇehi ceva gotrabhuādipacchimañāṇehi ca saha.
anya-e0104n:1578_4: sabbaṃ vā ñāṇakiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti vemajjhe ṭhatvā vibhāviyamānattā.
anya-e0104n:1580_1: Cittassa vaṅkabhāvakarānaṃ māyādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhanena anulomassa ujukasākhāsadisatā.
anya-e0104n:1580_3: Appatiṭṭhe nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā maggañāṇassa ākāse uppatanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n:1581_1: Sappavissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vissajjitvā nibbānassa ālambanato.
anya-e0104n:1581_2: Āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena attanopi dassanato.
anya-e0104n:1582_5: Magge diṭṭhe maggapaṭipatti viya anulome siddhe maggo siddho evāti anulomassa maggadassanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n:1582_6: Saṅkhāranimittato nikkhantattā ādittagharato nikkhamanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1582_7: Vegena gamanaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ vissajjetabbagahetabbapadesesu sādhanakiccavisesayogato.
anya-e0104n:1583_1: Parato na mamāyitabbato ca passitabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1584_3: Susānavijahanaṃ viya saṅkhārasusānaṃ vijahitvā nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattaṃ gotrabhu.
anya-e0104n:1586_3: na purimāsu viya bhayatupaṭṭhānādīsu ṭhitassa bhāyanādiākāradassanatthanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1586_8: Sā panettha maggasampayuttā sammāsati kāyānupassanādikiccasādhanavasena amatarasaparibhogatāya ca “amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojana”nti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1588_0: Kapaṇāseribhāvādikaraṇena taṇhāsinehassa sītasadisatā. Maggatejanti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ indaggiṃ.
anya-e0104n:1589_0: Rāgaggiādayo ekādasaggī vūpasamanti etthāti ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1590_0: Andhakāraparetoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena kiñci attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhūto.
anya-e0104n:1591_2: Heṭṭhā attanā vuttameva saṅkhārupekkhābyāpāraṃ nigamanavasena dassento “tena vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1592_1: Nirālayatāya taṇhāvasena bhavādīsu avisaṭajjhāsayo hutvā tato saṅkucitacitto patilīnabhāvena carati pavattatīti patilīnacaro,
anya-e0104n:1592_3: Saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanatāya bhikkhuno kāyacittavivekasiddhiyā vivittamāsanaṃ bhajamānassa.
anya-e0104n:1592_7: So hi idha bhavanaṭṭhena bhavanti vutto.
anya-e0104n:1592_9: Tassa taṃ adassanaṃ sāmaggiyanti buddhādayo ariyā āhūti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1593_6: Visesanti chasattabhāvo sattaṭṭhabhāvo pañcādibhāvoti imaṃ yathākkamaṃ bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ariyamagge labbhamānabhedaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1593_7: Pādakajjhānanti maggassa āsannavuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1593_8: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtāti maggāsannāya eva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya gocarabhūtā vipassitā.
anya-e0104n:1593_9: Puggalajjhāsayoti ubhinnaṃ bhede sati vipassakassa ajjhāsayo.
anya-e0104n:1593_10: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ kecīti vutto tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero.
anya-e0104n:1594_0: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevāti veditabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n:1594_1: Vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamattheravādepi apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti,
anya-e0104n:1594_2: itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato
anya-e0104n:1594_5: Yathā hi maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca hoti,
anya-e0104n:1594_6: tato ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ visesoti tesaṃ niyamane āsannakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1594_9: Yasmā pana pādakajjhānena vinā vipassanāva imaṃ yathāvuttavisesaṃ niyametuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0104n:1594_13: Yathā hi pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
anya-e0104n:1594_14: adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1594_15: evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtasammasitajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ jigucchanākāravirāgabhāvanābhūtā sammasitajjhānena āhitavisesā,
anya-e0104n:1594_16: ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena tato aññatarena āhitavisesā ca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ niyametīti.
anya-e0104n:1595_3: So hi jhānasinehena vipassanāya asiniddhabhāvato sukkhā lūkhā vipassanā etassāti sukkhavipassakoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1595_5: Tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1595_8: Na hi vuṭṭhānagāminiṃ vinā kevalaṃ pādakajjhānādayo niyamahetū diṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n:1595_9: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvepi sukkhavipassakādīnaṃ maggassa paṭhamajjhānikabhāvahetu,
anya-e0104n:1595_11: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “tesaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1595_14: atha kho pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca.
anya-e0104n:1595_15: Tesampīti pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggānampi.
anya-e0104n:1595_16: “Āsannapadese”ti iminā vipassakena antarantarā paviṭṭhasamāpattiyā vasena ayaṃ viseso natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1596_4: upekkhāsahagatā ca hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1597_2: Svāyamattho pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānupanissayehi vinā ajjhāsayamattena asijjhanaṃ upanissayena vinā
anya-e0104n:1597_4: Tattha hi yathā sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappataṃ vadantena bhagavatā “yassa yassa upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n:1597_9: evamidhāpi yassa yassa dutiyādijhānikassa maggassa yathāvutto upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n:1597_12: Imasmiṃ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hoti taṃtaṃphalūpanissayasabbhāve
anya-e0104n:1597_16: Tasmā “tatrāpi hi vipassanā”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tadattho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1598_1: Evaṃ vipassanāya bojjhaṅgādiniyāmikataṃ dassetvā idāni paṭipadādiniyāmikataṃ dassento “sace panāya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1598_3: Sāpi hi kāmaṃ “imaṃ vāraṃ rocesu”nti ettha kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya pavattamānāya
anya-e0104n:1598_4: uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṃ dukkhāpaṭipadāti rocesunti vadanti,
anya-e0104n:1598_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ vipassanānikantiṃ dukkhena kasirena
anya-e0104n:1598_6: kilamanto pariyādiyatī”ti vuttattā pubbabhāge muñcitukamyatādibhāvena pavattamānā saṅkhārupekkhā attano
anya-e0104n:1598_7: paṭipakkhe kicchena kasirena vikkhambhentī dukkhāpaṭipadāpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0104n:1598_10: tena saddhiṃ idaṃ ñāṇaṃ ekattanayavasena ekaṃ katvā ‘ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1598_15: Maggasaññitaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ anugantvā parivasati vippavasati etthāti parivāso,
anya-e0104n:1598_18: taṃ pana sīghaṃ kurumānā khippābhiññā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “saṇika”nti.
anya-e0104n:1598_23: Maggassa pabhavaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā nāmaṃ detīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1598_25: añño eva maggoti āha “attano attano maggassā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1598_26: Tena āgamanato laddhanāmena “dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā”tiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0104n:1598_27: Na hi maggassa sarasato edisaṃ nāmaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n:1599_2: Ekassa bhikkhuno catūsupi maggesu ekāva hotīti niyamo natthi calanato.
anya-e0104n:1599_4: amhākaṃ bhagavantaṃ sandhāya hontīti pana vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1599_5: Sabbesampi hi sammāsambuddhānaṃ cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva hontīti.
anya-e0104n:1599_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhārānurūpañhi maggo paccekaṃ chandādhipateyyo vā hoti vīriyādīsu aññatarādhipateyyo vā,
anya-e0104n:1600_1: Pubbe vuttappakārato sātisayaṃ katvā anavasesato maggassa nāmalābhe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1601_3: tathāpi sarasādayo paccekaṃ nāmalābhassa kāraṇamevāti dassetuṃ “sarasena vā”tiādinā sabbattha aniyamattho vā-
anya-e0104n:1601_5: Te ca asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1601_10: maggakattukāya vuṭṭhānakiriyāya ekantikahetubhūtā saṅkhārupekkhā phalūpacārena “vuṭṭhātī”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1601_11: Yasmā vā saṅkhārupekkhāti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā etaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1601_18: Idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ nimittādivirahato animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ suññatanti tividhampi maggassa sabhāvato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n:1602_1: So ca kho pubbabhāgamaggena saddhiṃ ekaṃ katvā vutto ekattanayena.
anya-e0104n:1602_2: Idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ niccanimittādīnaṃ paṇidhiyā,
anya-e0104n:1602_3: attasaññāya ca pahānavasena laddhaṃ maggassa animittādināmattayaṃ paṭipakkhato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n:1603_5: Idamassa saguṇato nāmanti idaṃ rāgādivivittattā rūpanimittādipaṇidhiādiabhāvavasena assa maggassa saguṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1604_5: Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmanti yathā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ “sukha”nti vuccati,
anya-e0104n:1604_6: evaṃ suññatādināmassa nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato idaṃ assa maggassa suññatādibhedaṃ ārammaṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1605_1: Anattānupassanā attasuññatāya diṭṭhattā sarasato suññatā nāma.
anya-e0104n:1605_4: Idaṃ pana maggassa animittanāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati.
anya-e0104n:1605_9: saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṃ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0104n:1605_10: Tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhipi kāraṇehi animittanāmalābhe paccanīkatova nāmavavatthānakaraṇaṃ gayhatīti tadabhāvā na labbhati.
anya-e0104n:1605_11: Atha vā na labbhatīti aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi na labbhati.
anya-e0104n:1605_14: Paccanīkañhi vavatthānakaraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa nāmahetubhāvo abhidhamme natthi,
anya-e0104n:1605_16: Tasmā attābhinivesapaṇidhipaṭipakkhavipassanānulomā maggā satipi sarasantare paccanīkasahitena sarasena nāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0104n:1605_17: Animittamaggassa pana vipassanā nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti,
anya-e0104n:1605_18: sayaṃ nimittaggahaṇato nimittaggahaṇānivāraṇāti tadanulomo maggopi na nimittassa paṭipakkho.
anya-e0104n:1605_21: tasmā vijjamānopi saraso vavatthānakarapaccanīkābhāvā abhidhamme animittanāmadāyako na gayhatīti.
anya-e0104n:1605_23: aniccānupassanānulomo maggo abhidhamme asaṅgahito siyāti? Na,
anya-e0104n:1605_26: Suttante pana pariyāyadesanattā saguṇārammaṇamattenapi nāmaṃ gayhatīti āha “suttantapariyāyena labbhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1605_29: Āgamanavasenapi maggassa animittanāmaṃ labbhatiyevāti dassetuṃ “tatrā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1608_2: Tasmā tathābhūtā bhāvanāvisesena kiccato adhimattatāya balavatarā nibbattati.
anya-e0104n:1608_5: Sūpaṭṭhitāti tikkhataratāya ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā sati hoti.
anya-e0104n:1608_6: Susamāhitanti passaddhisukhānaṃ sātisayatāya suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ ārammaṇe sammadeva ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:1608_7: Tikkhatarāti anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthabhāvena sātisayaṃ tikkhā sūrā.
anya-e0104n:1608_10: sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti aniccādīsu ekenākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṃ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ
anya-e0104n:1608_11: otiṇṇā nāma hoti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgassa vāroti katvā.
anya-e0104n:1608_15: Āvaṭṭetvāti nivattetvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena vattituṃ adatvā.
anya-e0104n:1608_18: Kiriyamanodhātuyā hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriyamayacittapavattivipākacittuppattiyā savīcikā santarā,
anya-e0104n:1608_19: na evaṃ manodvārāvajjanenāti vuttaṃ “avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamāna”nti.
anya-e0104n:1608_20: Tathevāti yathā atītāsu dvattiṃsajavanavīthīsu saṅkhārupekkhā “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇamakāsi, tatheva.
anya-e0104n:1609_0: Ayañca nayo kāmaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ paṭhamajavanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n:1609_2: tatiyassa heṭṭhimuparimānaṃ anulomaṭṭho ca yuttoti vutto,
anya-e0104n:1609_3: tathāpi sabbesampi imā samaññā sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1609_12: Idāni anulomañāṇassa tadubhayakiccānulomaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1609_13: Tattha anulomañāṇaṃ saccapaṭicchādakamohakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ vidhamanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapariyantagataṃ,
anya-e0104n:1609_14: tato eva heṭṭhā nibbattitaudayabbayañāṇādīnampi kiccaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena atthato sādhentameva hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1609_15: tathāpavattamānañca tesaṃ kiccaṃ anulomentaṃ viya hotīti āha “udayabbayavantānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:1609_17: Tattha “bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti imināpi ārammaṇasīsena ñāṇabyāpārameva vadati sappaṭibhayānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanadīpanato.
anya-e0104n:1609_18: Sesesu pana sattasupi ṭhānesu ñāṇabyāpārova dassito.
anya-e0104n:1609_19: Yasmā etaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ aniccādīsu aññataralakkhaṇavaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1609_21: Tāya paṭipattiyāti yā sā anulomañāṇassa thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṃkilesavikkhambhanapaṭipatti, tāya.
anya-e0104n:1609_22: Na hi anulomañāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n:1610_0: Vuttamatthaṃ opammena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1610_1: Tattha aṭṭhannaṃ vohārikamahāmattānaṃ agatigamanaṃ pahāya taṃtaṃvinicchayakaraṇaṃ viya aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n:1610_3: rañño majjhattabhāvo viya anulomañāṇassa purimapacchimadhammakoṭṭhāsassa anukūlatā.
anya-e0104n:1613_1: Kiñci asaṅkhatārammaṇampi ñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ekasaṅgahanti katvā “saṅkhārārammaṇāyā”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1613_2: Tañhi visesato vuṭṭhānaṃ ariyamaggaṃ gacchati upetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vattabbataṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n:1613_4: Asammohatthanti tattha tattha sutte pariyāyantarehi āgatāya sammohābhāvatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1613_5: Suttasaṃsandanāti suttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ suttapadānaṃ anusandānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1614_0: Ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anulomapariyosānā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1614_1: taṃsannissitā tappaṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma,
anya-e0104n:1614_29: sā pana taṃtaṃjhānasahagatavedanupekkhā ca tadārammaṇavipassanupekkhā cāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1615_0: Nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminī. Tattha hi sutte virajjatīti maggakiccamāha, vimuccatīti phalakiccaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1616_1: Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminīti vuttā dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ paṭiccasamuppāde asammuyhanavasena pavattanato.
anya-e0104n:1617_2: pubbe pana “saññaggaṃ phusatī”ti vuttattā āha “saññagganti vuttā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1618_1: Samudāyesu hi pavattā vohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti.
anya-e0104n:1625_1: Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1625_2: taṃ tāva dassento “ito paraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n:1625_5: Neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati aniccādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ aggahaṇato.
anya-e0104n:1625_6: Na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati satipi nibbānārammaṇatte kilesānaṃ akhepanato.
anya-e0104n:1625_7: Tato evetaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ visayaṃ uddesantaṃ dassanakiccaṃ karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1625_17: sotaṃ vā ariyaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti sotāpatti,
anya-e0104n:1625_20: Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī,
anya-e0104n:1625_28: Catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
