anya-e0104n:1626_0: Tehi tīhipīti heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ anulomañāṇānaṃ vuttattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1626_8: Atha vā balānurūpenāti heṭṭhā saṅkhārupekkhāya āhitabalānurūpena.
anya-e0104n:1626_9: Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena hi anulomañāṇassāpi maggañāṇassa viya saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ pavattiākārasiddho attheva mudutikkhatāviseso.
anya-e0104n:1626_11: “Āsevanante”ti iminā dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇuppatti,
anya-e0104n:1626_13: Na hi aladdhāsevanaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:1627_0: Bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭaneti asaṅkhatadhātuyā bahibhāvato bahiddhāsaññitā saṅkhāragatā vuṭṭhānabhūte vivaṭṭane nipphajjamāne paññā.
anya-e0104n:1628_1: Ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti na taṃnisedhanāya ekavīthiggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1628_2: atha kho nānārammaṇānampi ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1629_0: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehi anukkamena āhitavisesaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa ñāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ
anya-e0104n:1629_2: Rūpaṃ anekasantatisambandhatāya anekavaṭṭaracitā rajju viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūparajjuṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1629_3: Attabhāvassa rukkhaṭṭhāniyatāya vuttattā taṃsambandhadaṇḍaṭṭhāniyatā vedanādīsu ekasseva yuttā,
anya-e0104n:1629_8: “Paṭhamena anulomacittena ullaṅghitvā”ti idaṃ sakkāyatīrassa tassa atikkamanārambhatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1629_9: “Dutiyena nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso”ti idaṃ tassa sabbasaṅkhārato sātisayaṃ alaggaṃ hutvā visaṅkhāre allīnabhāvato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1632_0: Evaṃ nibbattāhīti anulomañāṇāni viya saṅkhāre anālambitvā ahaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇe vattāhīti maggassa gotrabhunā dinnasaññāmuñcanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1633_1: Tatrāti tasmiṃ gotrabhunā dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvā viya tena gahitārammaṇeyeva vattitvā maggassa lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhane.
anya-e0104n:1633_5: Tañca kho dūre pātino majjhimapurisassa vasena catuhatthāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsatiyaṭṭhi usabhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1633_6: tena aṭṭhausabhamatte padese hatthavasena cattārīsādhikachasatahatthe padese.
anya-e0104n:1633_11: Phalakasatavinivijjhanassa paccayabhūtā daṇḍakasaññā viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhanassa maggañāṇassa paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1634_2: Saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhananti imesaṃ sattannaṃ ariyadhanānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1634_6: Samudāye pavatto sotāpattimaggasaddo tadekadesepi pavattatīti āha “sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n:1637_6: Samādhimānantarikaññamāhūti yaṃ attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalappadānato ānantarikasamādhīti āhūti attho.
anya-e0104n:1637_9: taṃ vā payojanaṃ etassāti ānantariko, maggo.
anya-e0104n:1638_5: tasmā cattāri phalacittāni hontīti vadeyyāti āha “sattacittaparamā ca ekāvajjanavīthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1639_0: Taṃ pana na sārato paccetabbanti yojanā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n:1640_2: Bhusaṃ pamattopīti devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi.
anya-e0104n:1640_3: Yesaṃ yathāvuttaāvajjanajavanacittānaṃ uppattiyā esa sotāpanno paccavekkhati nāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1641_0: Eteneva pasaṅgena sesānaṃ ariyānaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1644_4: Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1644_6: Tathā uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā na uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1644_7: dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandamandā tanukākārā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n:1644_12: Tasmā vuttanayeneva dvīhi kāraṇehi tesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1644_16: Tañhi sampayuttānaṃ nissayabhāvato te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi.
anya-e0104n:1644_17: Yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1644_21: “Navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī”tiādinā vuttanayeneva yadaggena indriyānaṃ tikkhataṃ sampādeti,
anya-e0104n:1644_23: bojjhaṅgāni ca paṭutarabhāvaṃ āpādento indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā lakkhaṇattayatīraṇavasena ñāṇena parimaddati.
anya-e0104n:1644_32: pana accantavisuddhiyā ārammaṇakaraṇato ca vodānanti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1644_34: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge uppādādiabhibhavanatthaṃ upādāya “aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1644_35: dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu gotrabhunāmenevetaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n:1647_2: “Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
anya-e0104n:1647_3: Ekacco idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva loke parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1647_8: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1648_0: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukatānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya.
anya-e0104n:1651_4: Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo,
anya-e0104n:1652_0: Rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṃ anavasesappahānāyāti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ nissesappajahanatthāya.
anya-e0104n:1655_10: attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā sakatthoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1659_3: Tassa bujjhanakiriyāya anuguṇabhāvato pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā.
anya-e0104n:1660_6: Kāyādīsu asubhākārādiggahaṇaṃ pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānavasena subhasaññādipahānakiccasādhanaṃ maggasatipaṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1660_7: Tattha hi ekāva sati catukiccasādhanavasena pavattati.
anya-e0104n:1662_4: yena vā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā honti,
anya-e0104n:1662_10: Tassā eva phalabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā chandādayo pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena pādo.
anya-e0104n:1662_12: Ime lokuttarāvāti ime yathāvuttā chandādayo uttaracūḷabhājanīye āgatanayena lokuttarā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1662_13: Chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi phassādayo iddhipādā hontīti attho.
anya-e0104n:1662_15: adhipati vā no iddhipādo nāma natthi,
anya-e0104n:1662_16: yathā pana ekasmiṃ rajje rajjārahesu catūsu rājakumāresu ekasmiṃ kāle ekova rajjamanusāsati, na sabbe,
anya-e0104n:1663_5: Abhibhavanasaṅkhātena adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti assaddhiyādīnaṃ abhibhavanato abhibhavananti vattabbena adhimokkhapaggahaupaṭṭhānaavikkhepapajānanassa
anya-e0104n:1663_9: tasmā akampiyaṭṭhena ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balanti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1664_2: Yo heso lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya satiādidhammasāmaggiyā karaṇabhūtāya bujjhati kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati,
anya-e0104n:1664_4: nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti bodhīti vuccati ariyasāvako,
anya-e0104n:1665_7: “Sukhaṃ vedana”ntiādināti vā “sāmisa”ntiādināti vā “nirāmisa”ntiādināti vā evaṃ navavidhena.
anya-e0104n:1665_12: Parassa uppannaṃ akusalaṃ disvā tannimittañca vadhabandhārahādīnīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1665_14: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1665_16: Jhānavipassanā ito aññasmiṃ attabhāve uppannapubbāpi siyunti vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannapubba”nti,
anya-e0104n:1665_18: Tesu vuttesu sesiddhipādasesaviratiyo atthato vuttāva hontīti lakkhaṇahāravasena ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n:1665_19: Evaṃ nānācittesu labbhanti pubbabhāge ete satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādā.
anya-e0104n:1665_22: tathāpi sātisayo sammappadhānabyāpāro maggakkhaṇeti vuttaṃ “phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne”ti.
anya-e0104n:1667_1: Idāni sabbesu eva yathārahaṃ labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1667_3: Chaddhāti ekadhā dvedhā catudhā pañcadhā aṭṭhadhā navadhāti evaṃ chappakārena te bhavanti.
anya-e0104n:1668_3: saṅkappādayo maggavasenevāti evaṃ nava ekavidhāva honti.
anya-e0104n:1669_0: Cuddaseva asambhinnāti sati vīriyaṃ chando cittaṃ paññā saddhā samādhi pīti passaddhi upekkhā sammāsaṅkappo
anya-e0104n:1669_1: sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvoti ime asambhinnā padantarasambhedena vinā aggahitaggahaṇena gayhamānā
anya-e0104n:1669_8: avakaṃsato pana vuttanayena ekasmiṃ khaṇe chattiṃsa,
anya-e0104n:1669_10: catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppajjanato ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva iddhipādassa sambhavoti dvattiṃsa ca hontīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1670_2: Sarūpena ca vuttitoti abhedassa cittiddhipādādikassa sarūpeneva pavattanato ca.
anya-e0104n:1671_1: Kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito,
anya-e0104n:1671_4: tato eva na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “bodhipakkhiyesu jhānaṃ na gahita”nti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇassa jhānassa maggaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
anya-e0104n:1671_5: Tañhi sandhāya “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1671_8: kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito,
anya-e0104n:1671_10: na ca taṃ paṭipadā viya ekantapubbabhāgiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1671_15: yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n:1671_16: tattha na ariyamaggasampayogamattena jhānassa bodhipakkhiyatā labbhati atippasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n:1671_18: Etena maggacittuppādapariyāpannatā bodhipakkhiyabhāvassa akāraṇanti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1672_13: vedanā ca kassaci saṃkilesadhammassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti.
anya-e0104n:1672_17: Na hi sukhaṃ sayaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa paṭipakkho,
anya-e0104n:1672_22: Tathā pītipi na byāpādassa adoso viya ujupaṭipakkho,
anya-e0104n:1672_25: Vitakkasamādhayo eva pana jhānadhammesu ujukaṃ paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanasamatthāti paṭipakkhaviddhaṃsanasamatthassa
anya-e0104n:1672_26: paripuṇṇassa jhānakoṭṭhāsassa abhāvato na cassa bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgaho kato.
anya-e0104n:1672_29: tasmā te sandhāya taṃsampayuttatāya vā itarepi gahetvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānika”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:1674_4: Pariññābhisamayādivasena dukkhādīsu visesadassanaṭṭhena maggapaññāpi vipassanāti vuccatīti “lokiyavipassanā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1674_9: Tattha nimittato vuṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ nissajjitvā nibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1674_10: Pavattato vuṭṭhānaṃ hetunirodhena āyatiṃ vipākappavattassa anuppavattidhammatāpādanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1675_5: Tadanuvattakakilesehīti apāyagamanīyatāya tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā anuvattakehi vicikicchādikilesehi.
anya-e0104n:1675_8: Micchāsaṅkappātiādīsupi tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n:1675_9: Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhātīti pāḷi saṃkhittā.
anya-e0104n:1675_16: micchāmaggato panettha vuṭṭhānaṃ anuddharitvā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhasaṃyojanānusayeheva vuṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1676_0: Aṇusahagatāti aṇubhāvaṃ gatā pattā, tanubhūtāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1677_1: Evaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni balasamāyogaṃ dassetuṃ “lokiyānañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1677_4: Samānabhāvena yuge naddhā baddhā viya hontīti yuganaddhā.
anya-e0104n:1678_2: Avikkhepo samādhīti samucchindanena vikkhepassa ujupaṭipakkhabhūto samādhi.
anya-e0104n:1680_18: appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sentīti anusayā,
anya-e0104n:1680_24: akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādoti akusalasaddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1681_1: Yāvañhi teti te rūparāgādayo yāva pavattanti na samucchijjanti,
anya-e0104n:1682_0: Kilissanti, kilesenti cāti duvidhampi atthaṃ dassento “sayaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhattā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1683_1: Abhinivisanādivasena micchā viparītaṃ na sammā pavattanato micchāñāṇaṃ mohova.
anya-e0104n:1685_0: Āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1686_0: Tayoti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
anya-e0104n:1687_0: Ganthakaraṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ ganthananti taṃ rūpakāyepi labbhatīti āha “nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa cā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1687_1: Tattha byāpādassāpi abhisajjanupanayhavasena pavattanato ganthanaṭṭho veditabbo,
anya-e0104n:1689_0: Savanāti pavattanato. Savanatoti kilesāsucibhāvena vissandanato. Puna savanatoti pasavanato.
anya-e0104n:1690_1: duruttaraṇaṭṭhena cāti etena oghā viya oghāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1690_3: dukkhena ca viyogassa appadānasaṅkhātena yojanaṭṭhena yogāti dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1690_6: Te hi sotavasena vattamānā soto viya sotapatite satte apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti,
anya-e0104n:1690_7: saṃsārasamuddato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti,
anya-e0104n:1690_9: yādisañca pāpaṃ katvā dukkhappatte punapi tādisena yojenti.
anya-e0104n:1692_0: Tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvanti kāyādikassa tassa tassa dhammassa asubhādisabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1693_1: Thāmagatanti ca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃ sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1695_5: Tattha “niyamaṃ na karissāmā”ti etena niyame akate heṭṭhimamaggavajjhatāpi anuññātā eva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1699_3: taṃ sandhāya “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1699_7: Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1699_11: nīvaraṇapaṭirūpakaṃ pana “kappati na kappatī”ti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma,
anya-e0104n:1702_1: Aphalo vāyāmoti ettha atītānaṃ tāva pajahane aphalo hotu vāyāmo niruddhattā,
anya-e0104n:1702_2: anāgatānaṃ pana kathanti tesampi vakkhamānaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānanto natthitāmattaṃ gahetvā codeti,
anya-e0104n:1702_3: tathāpi “aphalo”ti pubbe pahātabbānaṃ natthitāya codanā katā,
anya-e0104n:1702_11: Pahātabbesu santesu pahānassa asambhavato tadupago vāyāmo aphalo ālokatamānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhāne sati ālokassa aphalatā viya.
anya-e0104n:1702_13: Saṃkilesikā ca maggabhāvanā āpajjati pahātabbapahāyakānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0104n:1702_14: Vippayuttatā vā kilesānaṃ cittavippayuttasaṅkhāravādīnaṃ vippayuttasaṅkhārānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1702_15: Taṃ pana nesaṃ vādīnaṃ yathā matimattaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1702_16: evamidhāpīti dassento āha “na ca paccuppannakileso cittavippayutto nāma atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1702_17: Arūpadhammā hi ekavatthukādibhāvena vattamānā khaṇattayapariyāpannā paccuppannā,
anya-e0104n:1702_18: te kathaṃ cittena vippayuttā nāma siyuṃ,
anya-e0104n:1703_3: Tena hi natthi maggabhāvanāti yasmā tīsupi kālesu kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ na yujjati,
anya-e0104n:1703_7: “Na hi natthi maggabhāvanā”tiādinā catukkhattuṃ vuttassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhepo.
anya-e0104n:1704_0: Evamevāti yathā ajātaphale taruṇarukkhe mūle chinne asati chedane āyatiṃ uppajjanārahāni chedanapaccayā anuppajjamānāni vinaṭṭhāni nāma honti,
anya-e0104n:1704_1: evameva maggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahā kilesā maggabhāvanāya anuppajjamānā “pahīnā”ti vuccantīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1704_5: tasmā pahīnā nāma hontīti “natthi kilesappahāna”nti paravādinā kato paṭikkhepo “na hī”ti paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0104n:1704_8: na ca uppannāti “atīte kilese pajahatī”tiādi na vattabbanti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1705_2: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmipavattiṭṭhānaṃ laddhavanto bhūmiladdhā yathā “aggiāhito”ti,
anya-e0104n:1705_4: Vattamānādiuppannavidhuratāya bhūmiladdhuppannā eva nāma teti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1706_5: Anubhūtasaddo ca kammavacanicchāya abhāvato anubhāvakavācako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n:1706_12: Ettha ca purimanaye kusalākusalameva vattuṃ adhippāyavasena “bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1706_13: Yaṃ “uppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti ettha “uppanna”nti gahetvā taṃsadisānaṃ pahānaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1706_16: saddena kusalākusalañca ākaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ vuttaṃ bhutvāpagatabhāvābhidhānādhippāyena.
anya-e0104n:1706_17: Vipaccituṃ okāsakaraṇavasena uppattitaṃ atītaṃ kammañca tato uppajjituṃ āraddho vipāko ca anāgato okāsakatuppannoti vutto okāso kato etena,
anya-e0104n:1706_19: yaṃ uppannasaddena vināpi viññāyamānaṃ uppannaṃ sandhāya “nāhaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1707_1: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ santāne anuppattidhammataṃ anāpāditatāya asamūhataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1708_2: ko vā bhūmiladdho”ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1708_5: Apariññātā hi khandhā kilesānaṃ bhūmīti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n:1708_11: Tato aññasmiṃ santāne ārammaṇakaraṇamattena bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma yadi siyāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1708_13: Appaheyyato parasantatipatitattā na koci bhavamūlaṃ pajaheyya.
anya-e0104n:1708_19: Uppādato pabhutīti tesaṃ khandhānaṃ uppajjanato paṭṭhāya.
anya-e0104n:1708_20: Kilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvaṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvato tesu khandhesu kilesajātaṃ anuseti,
anya-e0104n:1709_1: Tattha ca bhūmibhūtesu khandhesu na sabbe sabbesaṃ vatthū honti,
anya-e0104n:1709_2: atha kho viseso atthīti taṃ dassento āha “yassa yesū”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1709_4: Yesūti satipi ajjhattabhāvasāmaññe yesu atītādikāmāvacarādibhedabhinnesu khandhesu.
anya-e0104n:1709_6: Kiṃ panete kilesā ārammaṇaṃ karontā viya paricchijja paricchijja anusentīti?
anya-e0104n:1709_7: Yato te eva khandhā tesaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthūti vuttā,
anya-e0104n:1709_8: na heva kho anusayānaṃ vatthuṃ paricchijja pavatti atthi.
anya-e0104n:1709_9: Atītādikāmāvacarādivasena pana yathāparicchinne vatthusmiṃ yo kilesānaṃ appahīnaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n:1709_10: so paricchijja pavatto viya hotīti “atītakkhandhesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1709_11: Tena vatthuvasena bhūmiladdhaṃ hotīti vatthubhedena siyā tassa bhedoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1709_12: Tathāvavatthitabhāvato eva hi “aññataro lolajātiko taṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyī”tiādivacanaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhesu
anya-e0104n:1709_13: anusayitānaṃ rasataṇhādīnaṃ rūpārūpāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā puna kāmāvacarakkhandhavatthukataṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n:1709_16: evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā pavatti hotīti āha “esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresū”ti.
anya-e0104n:1710_0: Pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena ca kilesānaṃ anusayanaṭṭho anumīyati tadabhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1710_2: tesaṃ vatthu tena samatikkantaṃ pariññātattāti kuto nesaṃ bhūmisamaññāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sotāpannādīsu panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1710_11: Te panete anusayā atītādikāmāvacarādivasena yathāparicchinne tattha tattha vatthusmiṃ anusayantāpi te
anya-e0104n:1710_12: te pañcupādānakkhandhe avibhāgeneva vatthuṃ katvā anusentīti dassento “tassetaṃ vaṭṭamūla”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1711_1: Idāni tamatthaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “pathavīrasādi viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1713_1: Idha samudācāro nāma laddhattalābhatāti khaṇattayasamaṅgisamudācāruppannanti āha “vattamānuppannameva samudācāruppanna”nti.
anya-e0104n:1713_2: Pubbabhāge anuppajjamānampīti tasmiṃ āpāthagate ārammaṇe ādito pavattajavanavāresu anuppajjamānampi.
anya-e0104n:1713_7: Ekantena uppattitoti paccayasamavāye sati tathā ayonisomanasikārassa tattha nibbattattā niyamena uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n:1713_9: Rohaṇe kira abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya so gāmo tathā vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1713_11: “Uppattinivārakassa hetuno abhāvā”ti etena paccaye sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahatāya avikkhambhitassa uppannatāpariyāyoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1713_12: Nanu ca asamūhatuppannampi paccaye sati uppajjanārahameva?
anya-e0104n:1713_16: evaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahituppannampīti tividhassāpi bhūmiladdhena ekasaṅgahatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1714_6: Taṃ uppannabhāvaṃ vināsayamānanti anuppattidhammatāpādanena uppajjanārahataṃ vināsentaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1714_7: Paṭhamaṃ lokiyañāṇena yathābalaṃ pahīnameva lokuttarañāṇaṃ pajahatīti lokiyaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1716_6: “Jānitabbānī”ti vatvā tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ upamāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttanayena dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1717_0: Tattha yathā padīpotiādi ekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni kathaṃ sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n:1717_1: Na hi tādisaṃ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi,
anya-e0104n:1717_2: na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti antolīnacodanaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “pariññābhisamayenā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1717_3: Anavasesato paricchijja jānanasaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisameti asammohavasena paṭivijjhati.
anya-e0104n:1717_5: Maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayenāti maggañāṇaṃ sammāsaṅkappādisesamaggaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāvasena bhāvanābhisamayena.
anya-e0104n:1717_6: Abhisameti pubbabhāgabhāvanāsambhūtena ariyamaggabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisameti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhati.
anya-e0104n:1717_7: Maggañāṇañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva.
anya-e0104n:1718_1: paṭivijjhatī”ti etena nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n:1718_2: paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1718_4: so dukkhampi passatī”tiādinā āgataṃ samudayaṃ saccādimūlakaṃ yojanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n:1719_6: paṭipadampi so passatī”ti ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino aññasaccadassanasamaṅgibhāvavicāraṇāya tamatthaṃ sādhetuṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1719_8: Aññathā kamābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādiṃ passato dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n:1719_9: vuccamāne ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo eva siyāti.
anya-e0104n:1720_3: tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā,
anya-e0104n:1720_4: tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1723_0: 842. Pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ assāti pavattañāṇo, maggo. Assa maggassa.
anya-e0104n:1725_6: Maggañāṇañhi nirodhameva ārammaṇaṃ karontampi yo so dukkhādīsu tacchāvipallāsabhūtabhāvasaṅkhāto saccaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n:1725_7: tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanena taṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhantaṃ paccakkhaṃ karontameva pavattati.
anya-e0104n:1725_8: Yato aparabhāge pīḷanādayo soḷasapi saccaṭṭhā ariyassa hatthāmalakaṃ viya yāthāvato upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n:1726_1: Atthāti ñāṇena araṇīyato atthāti laddhasamaññā ākārā.
anya-e0104n:1726_9: Ayamattho idhādhippetoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha “tattha katamaṃ dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n:1726_11: yasmā pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ kiccanibbattivasenapi,
anya-e0104n:1727_0: Kiccanibbattivasena dassanaṃ āvibhāvato dassanasadisanti taṃ anāmasitvā itarameva dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1727_7: Anekameva hi paccayuppannaṃ ekajjhaṃ nibbattamānaṃ attano paccayehi rāsikataṃ viya hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1727_13: Santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati uḷāradassanena tadaññassa anuḷārabhāvo viyāti dassento āha “āyasmato”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1727_14: Avipariṇāmadhammassa niccasabhāvassa vattabbameva natthi paṭipakkhato āvibhavanākārassa sukhasiddhito.
anya-e0104n:1729_2: Sabbasaṅkhāravivittatā asaṅkhatabhāvoti evaṃ acchariyabbhutasabhāvopi ariyamaggo saṅkhato eva,
anya-e0104n:1729_3: ayameva ca eko asaṅkhatoti nirodhassa asaṅkhatabhāvo supākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0104n:1729_4: Dukkhaṃ visaṃ maraṇadhammato tassa agadabhūtaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1730_0: “Maggo”ti sambhāvetabbataṃ patto sukhumasantabhāvena upaṭṭhito nikantibhūtopi nāyaṃ samudayo hetu nibbānassa pattiyā.
anya-e0104n:1730_1: Ayaṃ ariyamaggo hetūti maggāmaggañāṇadassane vuttanayena maggassa hetuṭṭho āvibhavati.
anya-e0104n:1730_2: Nirodhadassanenāti ativiya nipuṇassa paramagambhīrassa nirodhasaccassa dassanena.
anya-e0104n:1730_4: Dukkhadassanenāti ativiya ādīnavappattiyā vipulatarādīnavassa dukkhasaccassa dassanena.
anya-e0104n:1731_5: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ nānākkhaṇe nānāñāṇena paṭivijjhananti attho.
anya-e0104n:1731_6: Yadi hi maggañāṇassa catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayo siyā,
anya-e0104n:1731_7: dukkhadassanādīhi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesappahānaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:1731_9: Taṃtaṃdassanānantarañca taṃtaṃphalena bhavitabbanti taṃtaṃpaheyyakilesapaṭippassaddhibhūtānaṃ phalānaṃ maggānaṃ viya catukkatā siyā.
anya-e0104n:1731_21: Tattha paṭhamo tāva pakkho na yujjati attani pavattiyā asambhavato.
anya-e0104n:1731_22: Na hi teneva aṅgulaggena tameva parāmasituṃ sakkā.
anya-e0104n:1731_29: samucchinditabbañca saccadvayaṃ ārabbha pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa paricchindanasamucchindanāni na sambhavanti tato anissaraṇato.
anya-e0104n:1731_30: Na hi dukkhapariññāsamudayappahānāni dukkhasamudayasaccārammaṇena ñāṇena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāni.
anya-e0104n:1731_32: itaradvaye ca sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentena sakkā kātunti ekābhisamayo eva yutto.
anya-e0104n:1731_33: Ayaṃ pana attho pāḷiyaṃ āgato evāti “tesaṃ uttaraṃ abhidhamme kathāvatthusmiṃ vuttamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1733_4: ekaccabhāvanāmayāya ca abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya ñātā abhiññātā.
anya-e0104n:1734_2: pageva paṭisaṅkhānupassanādayoti āha “yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1734_4: tattha pana yathā tīraṇapariññā sātisayaṃ kiccakārī,
anya-e0104n:1735_1: Nippariyāyena pahānapariññā nāma maggañāṇanti “yāva maggañāṇā bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1735_2: Ayaṃ idha adhippetāti idha abhisamayakāle kiccavicāre ayaṃ pahānapariññā adhippetā tadatthattā sesapariññānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1736_4: Niyamato ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti ñātatīritabhāvehi vinā pahānābhāvato,
anya-e0104n:1736_6: Maggañāṇañhi dukkhe pariññābhisamayavasena pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ viya sāmaññalakkhaṇampi
anya-e0104n:1737_3: Kāmacchandādayo yathā na cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n:1737_7: “Na sahasā cittaṃ ajjhottharantī”ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1737_8: subhāvite pana paguṇajjhāne yāva carimakacittampi na ajjhottharanteva.
anya-e0104n:1737_9: Atha vā jhānassa pubbabhāgepīti jhānādhigamatthāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā.
anya-e0104n:1737_13: tato tato vuṭṭhitamattassa pana pavattanti parittacittavaseneva vuṭṭhahanato.
anya-e0104n:1738_1: “Padīpena andhakārassa viyā”ti idaṃ paṭipakkhena pahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1738_5: Tena asatipi ujuvipaccanīkatāya dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vikkhambhanassa taṃ nidassanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.
anya-e0104n:1738_11: sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0104n:1738_15: Samūhagāhassāti “attā attaniya”nti evaṃ pavattasamūhagahaṇassa pahānaṃ kalāpasammasanena ekādasasu okāsesu
anya-e0104n:1738_22: anādīnave ca sādīnavasaññitā saccapaṭilomagāhoti ca vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1739_0: Evaṃ visuddhikkamena tadaṅgappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasamahāvipassanāvasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1739_1: Tattha yaṃ vā pana pahānanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1741_0: Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ghanaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ghanasaññāya.
anya-e0104n:1742_1: tāyāti tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhameva disvā tattha adhimuccanavasena pavattapaññā, tāya.
anya-e0104n:1743_0: Taṃ taṃ paricchedanti ādānanikkhepādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1746_0: Yathā cittaṃ saṅkhāre muñcitvā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandati,
anya-e0104n:1746_1: tathā pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhā ca anulomañca “vivaṭṭānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1747_4: sabbesampi vā saṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti khayagāmī,
anya-e0104n:1747_9: Tena vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānaṃ maggasambhāratamāha tehi vinā asijjhanato.
anya-e0104n:1747_14: Yampi tato pubbe katanti yaṃ tatorajjappattito pubbe kataṃ paccantasādhanaduggaviddhaṃsanādi.
anya-e0104n:1747_16: evaṃ lokiyañāṇena sādhitānipi vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānāni samucchedappahānavasena pavattassa maggassa kiccabhāvena vuccanti,
anya-e0104n:1749_0: Jhānamaggaphalāni viya attano santāne anuppādetvāpi tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanavasena tathāviddhaṃsanapavattañāṇaṃ aparappaccayañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1750_0: Passanto paccakkhato jānanto. Amatogadhanti amatapariyāpannaṃ, amatasaṅkhātanti attho.
anya-e0104n:1751_2: Kiñcāpi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ tato paṭhamataraṃ nibbānaṃ passati,
anya-e0104n:1751_3: ālambanakaraṇato disvā kattabbakiccākaraṇato pana na dassananti vuccati.
anya-e0104n:1751_4: Sā duvidhāpīti sā dassanabhāvanāvasena duvidhāpi sacchikiriyā.
anya-e0104n:1752_11: Tāsu lokiyalokuttarabhāvanāsu idha ñāṇadassanavisuddhikathāyaṃ lokuttarabhāvanā adhippetā,
anya-e0104n:1752_13: Catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇanti etaṃ catubbidhampi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ lokuttarāni sammāvācādibhedāni sīlādīni uppādeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0104n:1752_22: Sīlādīnīti vā phalasīlādīnampi gahaṇanti paññāyapi gahaṇaṃ yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0104n:1752_25: Tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetīti tehi samucchindanapaṭipassambhanavasena pavattehi lokuttarehi sīlādīhi ariyapuggalo attano santānaṃ paribhāveti.
anya-e0104n:1752_27: Yathā pariññattayampi pahānattayampi maggañāṇassa kiccanti vuttaṃ pariyāyena,
anya-e0104n:1752_29: Idha pana lokuttarabhāvanāva assa maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1752_30: Na hettha bhāvanāya pariyāyo labbhatīti avadhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1753_0: Evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāyāti “cittaṃ bhāvaya”nti samādhi viya cittasīsena anāgantvā “paññaṃ bhāvaya”nti evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāya paññāya.
anya-e0104n:1758_3: ayampī”ti anupadadassanavasena vitthārato pakāsetuṃ na sukaraṃ atibahubhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1758_5: Nānākilesaviddhaṃsananti sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchādivasena nānāvidhānaṃ kilesadhammānaṃ tadaṅgādivasena pajahanaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1760_3: Siddhe hi samucchedappahāne paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ siddhameva hotīti.
anya-e0104n:1761_0: Bhīmavegānupatitāti sakalaṃ lokaṃ bhindantena viya bhīmena bhayānakena vegena sahasā patitā.
anya-e0104n:1764_1: Saṃyojanesu pahīnesu sabbepi kilesā pahīnāyeva hontīti saṃyojanānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1764_3: na aññaṃ kiñci atthantaraṃ vipākabhūtanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1764_4: Tenāha “phalaṃ nāma na koci añño dhammo atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1764_9: mohakkhayo”ti suttapadassa atthaṃ aññathā gahetvā nippariyāyato “arahattaṃ nāma kiñci natthi,
anya-e0104n:1764_10: kilesappahānameva tathā voharīyatī”ti vadantā sesaphalepi paṭikkhipanti.
anya-e0104n:1764_15: Yā pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā labbhamānāpi yassā vipākapaññāya nippajjamānāya nippajjati,
anya-e0104n:1764_16: sā paṭippassaddhiyaṃ nipphādetabbāyaṃ paññāti paṭippassaddhipaññāti vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1764_17: Sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhātīti sammādiṭṭhiyā ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena vatvā tadaññatopi vuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n:1764_23: tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttakkhandhehi ceva tappaccayā āyatiṃ uppajjanakkhandhehi cāti attho.
anya-e0104n:1764_24: Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehīti yathāvuttakilesakkhandhehi bahiddhābhūtehi vipassanāya gocarabhūtehi sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi.
anya-e0104n:1765_0: Evaṃ maggakiccaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa vasena phalaṃ dassetuṃ “tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1765_1: Tattha tampayogapaṭippassaddhattāti tassa ajjhattabahiddhā vuṭṭhānādipayogassa paṭippassaddhattā.
anya-e0104n:1765_3: pavattato ca vuṭṭhahanto kilese pajahatīti attano khaṇe taṃ payogaṃ karoti nāma,
anya-e0104n:1765_4: phalakkhaṇe panassa so payogo paṭippassaddho vūpasanto nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n:1765_6: Uppajjatīti maggānantaraṃ dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā uppajjati.
anya-e0104n:1765_10: Maggassetaṃ phalanti yathāvuttā vipākā sammādiṭṭhi nāma,
anya-e0104n:1766_1: ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇāti appamāṇārammaṇatāya maggehi nibbisesatāya.
anya-e0104n:1766_2: Tathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṅkhāto mahaggato dhammo nirodhato vuṭṭhānavelāyaṃ appamāṇassa dhammassa
anya-e0104n:1766_3: anantarapaccayena paccayoti ariyaphalassa anantarapaccayatāya ca dīpanāti evamādīnipi ettha ariyaphalassa
anya-e0104n:1768_1: Ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanāti ariyassa phalajhānassa nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte appanākārena pavatti.
anya-e0104n:1769_1: Sabbepi puthujjanāti jhānasamāpattilābhinopi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti,
anya-e0104n:1769_3: Ariyā sabbepi phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti kāmaṃ sāmaññajotanā,
anya-e0104n:1769_6: Uparimānampi heṭṭhimāya lokiyasamāpattiyā viya samāpajjanaṃ sādhentaṃ viya ṭhitanti taṃ nivattento “uparimā panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1769_12: Etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati attanā adhigatattā,
anya-e0104n:1769_15: Na hi lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma atthi visesābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1769_16: Idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa,
anya-e0104n:1769_18: Yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūpari maggadhammehi nivattitā paṭipakkhehi viya abhibhūtā appavattidhammataṃyeva āpannā.
anya-e0104n:1770_2: anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti.
anya-e0104n:1770_6: tena tena jhānena gahitapaṭisandhiko viyāti tassa tassa ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisanti na
anya-e0104n:1770_9: Heṭṭhimā ca uparimanti heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo ariyā uparimaṃ sakadāgāmiphalādiṃ na samāpajjantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1771_0: “Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṃ samāpajjantī”ti iminā sabbepi ariyā attano attano phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti
anya-e0104n:1771_1: atthe āpanne tattha kesañci matibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “keci panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1771_2: Ete hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārinoti yasmā hi te “uparimā dve”ti vuttā anāgāmino,
anya-e0104n:1771_6: Na hi samādhipāripūriyā vinā samāpattivaḷañjanaṃ sambhavatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1771_12: sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati,
anya-e0104n:1771_14: tasmā tesaṃ samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritā attano phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpajjanassa akāraṇanti.
anya-e0104n:1771_16: ayaṃ panattho pāḷiāruḷhoti kāraṇāpadese anādarakaraṇamukhena pāḷiṃ dassento “kiñcetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1772_0: Ettha ca “suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā sarūpato uddhaṭattā tato
anya-e0104n:1772_3: aniccānupassanāmukhena ca pavattānaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ purecarā gotrabhudhammā navadasabhāvena vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n:1772_4: “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā pana catūsupi phalesu ekasadisaṃ desanāya āgatattā sotāpannasakadāgāminopi
anya-e0104n:1772_6: Maggānantaraphalavasena taṃ vuttanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ vipassanāvasena dasannaṃ gotrabhudhammānaṃ dassanavasena desanāya āraddhattā,
anya-e0104n:1772_8: Na ca maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ “phalasamāpattī”ti vuccati visuṃ parikammābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1773_1: Payojanampi tadatthāya paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti tannimittaṃ paṭipajjanatoti “kasmā samāpajjantī”ti kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n:1773_5: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthanti diṭṭheva dhamme kilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena santena sukhavihārena viharaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1773_6: Satipi vipākabhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phalasamāpattidhammānaṃ tassa tassa ariyassa rucivaseneva pavatti,
anya-e0104n:1774_2: Yathā hi lokiyajjhānānaṃ samadhigamo sampayogasamaṅgibhāvena sijjhamāno pahānaṅgasamatikkamamukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabbattā,
anya-e0104n:1774_3: evaṃ phalasamāpattipi nibbānamanasikārena sijjhamānā tadaññārammaṇāmanasikāramukhena vuccati sabbasaṅkhārato vinivaṭṭitamānasatāvasena samijjhanato.
anya-e0104n:1774_5: Udayabbayañāṇādiñāṇaparamparavasena hi sabbaphalacittaṃ saṅkhārato sabbaso nibbinnavirattacittassa tato vinissaṭanibbānārammaṇaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n:1774_6: Evaṃ pavattamānañca taṃ nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā,
anya-e0104n:1775_4: Amanasikāroti ādīnavato disvā vissaṭṭhatāya anāvajjanaṃ asamannāhāro.
anya-e0104n:1775_5: Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittāya.
anya-e0104n:1775_6: Kehici paccayehi na saṅkhatattā ca asaṅkhatāti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phalasamāpattisahajātena manasikārena manasikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1776_1: Udayabbayādivasenāti udayabbayabhaṅgabhayatupaṭṭhānādivasena pavattanakānaṃ navannampi ñāṇānaṃ byāpāraṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n:1776_4: Kasmā panettha gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti?
anya-e0104n:1776_9: Tasmā ekantena niyyānikasabhāvassa ubhatovuṭṭhānabhāvena pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa anantarapaccayabhūtena
anya-e0104n:1776_10: ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā,
anya-e0104n:1776_11: na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā
anya-e0104n:1776_12: avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ phalañāṇānaṃ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n:1776_14: Ariyamaggavīthiyañhi anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena
anya-e0104n:1776_16: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tattha kilesavikkhambhane
anya-e0104n:1776_17: nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti
anya-e0104n:1776_19: yato nesaṃ pariyosānañāṇaṃ saṅkhāranimittavuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n:1777_0: Evañca katvā “sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbiyā phalameva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n:1777_1: na maggo”ti idañca aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1777_4: Nibbānārammaṇe appanajjhānavasena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ nirantaraṃ phalacittasseva pavattanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n:1777_7: tena nīhārena sekkhassa uparimaggenāpi bhavitabbanti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “phalasamāpattininnatāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n:1777_14: Arahā paccekabuddho bhavissati yadi itaratthāpi vipassanā tadatthāya saṃvatteyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1777_15: Pāḷivaseneva ca paṭikkhittanti “dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti maggatthā phalatthā
anya-e0104n:1777_16: vipassanā visuṃ katvā pavattapāḷivaseneva tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhittantipi na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1777_20: Jhānato sarikkhatādassaneneva cettha bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgavasenāpi sarikkhatā dassitāyevāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1778_3: “Cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālāvadhiggahaṇavasena samāpajjanaṃ cittassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhisaṅkhāro.
anya-e0104n:1779_1: Sabbānevetānīti rūpanimittādisabbāneva etāni ekato kāmaṃ na manasi karoti asambhavato.
anya-e0104n:1779_4: avayavabyatirekena ca samudāyo na labbhatīti avayavagatampi kiccaṃ samudāyavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1779_6: Yasmā bhavaṅgacitte uppanne phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1779_9: Manasi karototi bhavaṅgasahagatena manasikārena manasi karoto,
anya-e0104n:1780_1: Phalassa phalameva vā anantaraṃ hoti purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1780_5: “Yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ phaluppattiyā nirodhā vuṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1780_6: Tanti nirodhāvuṭṭhānabhāvena vuttaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā aggaphalaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n:1780_8: kiriyassa vā anantaraṃ satipi sattāhātikkame vijātiyena antarikattā.
anya-e0104n:1781_3: Taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ lokāmisaṃ vantaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ etenāti vantalokāmisaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1781_6: Yena dhammena yogato samaṇo nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n:1783_0: Tassa ariyassa phalassa rasabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ paññaṃ bhāvetvā yasmā paṇḍito vindati paṭilabhatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1786_1: Anupubbanirodhavasenāti vipassanānugatā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantena taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhanirodhamukhena tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ anupubbato nirodhavasena.
anya-e0104n:1786_5: ke na samāpajjantīti kāmaṃ samāpajjanasamatthā padhānatāya paṭhamaṃ pucchitā,
anya-e0104n:1786_6: tabbissajjanaṃ pana garubhāvato pacchā vissajjetuṃ asamāpajjanake tāva dassento “sabbepi…pe…
anya-e0104n:1786_10: Te hi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhinopi alābhino viya samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritāya nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0104n:1786_15: sukkhavipassakā ca arahantoti sukkhavipassakasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n:1786_16: Ubhayepi cete satipi vipassanābale samādhibalassa abhāvato nirodhaṃ na samāpajjanti.
anya-e0104n:1786_18: Purimakā pana tayo satipi samādhibale vipassanābalassa abhāvato,
anya-e0104n:1786_20: Aparipuṇṇatā cassa saṅkhārānaṃ na sammā parimadditattā.
anya-e0104n:1786_22: samāpajjantī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “dvīhi balehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1786_23: Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti ettha tayoti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1786_27: Ayañca sampadāti ayaṃ baladvayasamannāgamādikā yathāvuttanirodhasamāpattiāvahā sampatti.
anya-e0104n:1787_6: alobhapadhānassa vā tathāpavattakusalacittuppādassa vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo,
anya-e0104n:1787_10: Thinamiddhavikkhambhikāya vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasaññāya vasena.
anya-e0104n:1787_12: Sakalamicchāvitakkavikkhambhanassa sikhāpattaānāpānassatisiddhapaṭinissaggānupassiassāsapassāsānaṃ vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo,
anya-e0104n:1788_0: Evaṃ upacārassa jhānassa vasena samathabalaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0104n:1788_6: Tathā hi kenaṭṭhena samathabalanti balaṭṭho pucchito.
anya-e0104n:1788_18: Tenetaṃ aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1788_19: Idaṃ samathabalanti yāyaṃ nekkhammādivasena laddhāya cittekaggatāya nīvaraṇādīhi akampanīyatā,
anya-e0104n:1789_0: Idāni vipassanābalaṃ niddisanto yasmā vipassanā saṅkhepato sattahi anupassanāhi saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n:1789_1: tasmā tato tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tāsaṃ vasena anupassanā kātabbā,
anya-e0104n:1789_2: tattakeneva cettha anupassanākiccaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti “aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:1789_3: paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābala”nti sarūpato dassetvā puna tā heṭṭhā vuttanayena visayavibhāgena dassetuṃ “rūpe aniccānupassanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1789_4: Idhāpi paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāva balaṭṭhoti dassetuṃ “kenaṭṭhena vipassanābala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1789_9: Tenetaṃ sattannampi anupassanānaṃ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1789_10: Idaṃ vipassanābalanti yāyaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena laddhassa vipassanāñāṇassa niccasaññādinimittaṃ akampanīyatā,
anya-e0104n:1790_0: Vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā vācaṃ saṅkharonti pavattentīti katvā.
anya-e0104n:1790_5: Te pana dutiyajjhāne vūpasantā hontīti āha “dutiyajjhānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n:1790_13: Te pana yasmā catutthajjhāne vūpasantā honti,
anya-e0104n:1790_18: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā,
anya-e0104n:1790_19: tasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n:1790_20: Te pana yasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa vūpasamanti,
anya-e0104n:1791_0: Ñāṇacariyāsu vivaṭṭānupassanāggahaṇeneva tassa ādibhūtā sesānupassanāpi gahitāva honti tadavinābhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1791_2: phalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyāti maggaphalasamāpattīnaṃ ñāṇacariyābhāvavacanaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ ñāṇapadhānattā,
anya-e0104n:1791_3: ñāṇena vā indriyādhipatihetumaggapaccayādivasena sātisayapaccayabhūtena sesā maggaphaladhammā caritā pavattitāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1791_6: aṭṭhannañca maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena imāhi soḷasahi ñāṇapavattīhi.
anya-e0104n:1792_0: Navahi samādhicariyāhīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā,
anya-e0104n:1792_1: tāsaṃ upacārasamādhi upacārasamādhibhāvanāsāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṃ navahi samādhicariyāhi.
anya-e0104n:1792_3: Paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya vitakko cātiādi nānāvajjanupacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1792_5: Na hi ekāvajjane catutthajjhānādiupacāre pītiādayo sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n:1792_6: Ettha ca “paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāyā”tiādivacanena upacārasamādhissāpi pāripūrī icchitabbāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1792_9: Yathā samathabalepi “nekkhammavasenā”tiādinā upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu appanāsamādhiyeva vutto,
anya-e0104n:1792_13: vivaṭṭānupassanā pana purecarañāṇādivipassanābale avuttā eva ñāṇacariyāsu vuttā.
anya-e0104n:1793_0: Vasībhāvatā paññāti ettha vaso etassa atthīti vasī,
anya-e0104n:1793_3: “Vasiyo”ti pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuttattā tāyo dassetuṃ “vasīti pañca vasiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1793_4: Tattha jhānaṃ āvajjantassa nirantaraṃ jhānaṅgesu cittappavattanasamatthatā āvajjanavasī.
anya-e0104n:1793_6: Accharāmattaṃ vā katipayaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī.
anya-e0104n:1793_13: Ñāṇacariyāsu pana lokuttarānaṃ ñāṇacariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0104n:1794_3: Yadi evanti yadi ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1794_5: evaṃ sante kiṃ na hoti nirodhasamāpajjananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1794_6: Pañca kāmaguṇā vatthubhūtā etassa santīti pañcakāmaguṇiko, kāmarāgo.
anya-e0104n:1794_8: Na hi kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānamattaṃ nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:1794_10: Etena kāmaṃ maggaphalañāṇacariyā lokiyañāṇasamādhicariyā viya nirodhasamāpajjane sarūpena na viniyujjanti tadā appavattanato,
anya-e0104n:1794_11: tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena balacariyānaṃ visesapaccayatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1794_13: Idañhi “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”tiādivacanaṃ anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusala”nti vacanato,
anya-e0104n:1795_2: nanu catuvokārabhavepi arūpajjhānavasena yathārahaṃ anupubbasamāpatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n:1795_5: Aṭṭhasamāpattivaseneva ca “anupubbasamāpattī”ti vuccatīti dassento āha “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppatti natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n:1795_10: aññassa ca kassaci abhāvato apaññattikova bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutasadiso.
anya-e0104n:1796_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhedeti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppajjane,
anya-e0104n:1796_3: tesaṃ vā kusalādibhedabhinne yathārahaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi upaddute pavattivibhāge.
anya-e0104n:1796_4: Cittacetasikavigamehi rūpadhammesu labbhamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā abbohārikataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0104n:1797_1: Samathavipassanāvasenāti yuganaddhānaṃ viya aññamaññūpakāritāya sahitānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n:1797_5: Aññassa kassacipi cittassa anuppajjanena evamassā nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1797_7: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati taduddhaṃ suddhasamathavipassanāya abhāvato.
anya-e0104n:1797_8: Yo vipassanāvaseneva ussakkati sace ariyo phalasamāpattatthiko,
anya-e0104n:1797_11: sekho vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggaṃ patvā phale ṭhito,
anya-e0104n:1798_1: Yena phaladvayasamannāgamādinā nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ samattho hoti,
anya-e0104n:1798_2: so vidhi pageva vibhāvitoti samāpajjanākārameva dassento “katabhattakicco”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n:1799_1: kīdisī panettha vipassanā icchitabbāti taṃ niddhāraṇatthaṃ “vipassanā panesā”tiādinā tameva vipassanaṃ tidhā bhinditvā dasseti.
anya-e0104n:1799_6: Lakkhaṇappattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayo hotiyevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “saṅkhāra…pe…
anya-e0104n:1799_8: Tikkhāva vaṭṭati saṅkhārārammaṇepi sati sabbasaṅkhārehi vivaṭṭanākāreneva pavattanato,
anya-e0104n:1799_9: maggo viya visaṅkhāragatassa phalassa paccayabhāvato ca.
anya-e0104n:1799_11: Yasmā atimandā samathādikā saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhane asamatthā samathaniṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1799_12: atitikkhā ñāṇādikā sātisayaṃ saṅkhāresu dosadassane phalasamāpattiniṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0104n:1800_2: “Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassatī”ti vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1800_3: heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pana taṃ avatvā “catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti”cceva vuttanti keci,
anya-e0104n:1800_7: Tathā hi paratopi “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā”tiādiṃ vakkhati,
anya-e0104n:1801_0: 875. Adhiṭṭhātabbanti cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Tathā cittuppādanameva hettha adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1802_1: pacchājātapaccayādiupatthambhābhāvato ca sattāhameva tathā sarīraṃ pavattati,
anya-e0104n:1802_2: tato paraṃ kilamatīti sattāhameva paricchinditvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjantīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1803_1: Naṃ aggiādiantarāyaṃ rakkhati samāpannako adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1804_3: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamanasamaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0104n:1805_0: Evaṃ garukāti aggiādīhipi anabhibhavanīyaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāpanato evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma,
anya-e0104n:1805_1: tasmā attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena jīvitahetupi saṅghassa āṇā na atikkamitabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n:1806_0: 877. Na pakkosati “satthā taṃ, āvuso, āmantetī”ti. “Vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti āvajjitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1808_1: Kiñcāpi “ekaṃ vā dve vā”ti aniyametvā viya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1808_2: dve vāre eva pana niyamato vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1808_8: ñāṇasamādhicariyāvasībhāvo cettha aññamaññānativattanavaseneva icchitabboti āha “dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā”ti.
anya-e0104n:1808_11: Idaṃ vuttanayena aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṃ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā samāpajjanassa.
anya-e0104n:1808_12: Tasmā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n:1809_0: Parato acittako bhavituṃ na sakkotīti sakalaṃ yathāparicchinnakālaṃ acittako bhavituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n:1809_3: Tassa hi akaraṇena kadāci kevalaṃ tādisassa parikkhārassa avināso na siyā,
anya-e0104n:1809_6: Evaṃ sante tīhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āpajjati,
anya-e0104n:1809_8: Paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva patiṭṭhātīti iminā samāpattiyā vibandhe jāte evaṃ hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0104n:1809_9: avibandheneva pana yathāparicchinnakālavītikkamane phalacittuppattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n:1809_10: Evañca katvā gambhīrakandaroruḷhatattapāsāṇakkantapurisanidassanampi samatthitaṃ hotīti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n:1809_11: Apare pana “pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannamattova ‘paṭinivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatane
anya-e0104n:1809_19: “Ākiñcaññāyatane patiṭṭhātī”ti ca idaṃ puna ākiñcaññāyatanassa samāpajjitabbattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1813_2: avasesacetasikaviññāṇābhāvena rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya ca matanirodhasamāpannānaṃ avisesaṃ gahetvā pucchā “matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n:1813_4: rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya pana āyuusmāindriyānaṃ apagamānapagamanaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “yvāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1814_3: Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ saṅkhatādibhāvena vattabbataṃ labhati,
anya-e0104n:1814_5: Samāpajjantassa vasenāti yasmā samāpajjantassa ariyapuggalassa samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā
anya-e0104n:1814_6: aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantassa anukkamena saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassambhanapayoganibbattiyā nirodhasamāpatti
anya-e0104n:1814_8: tasmā taṃ payoganibbattiṃ upādāya “nipphannā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0104n:1815_3: Tissannampi dukkhatānaṃ nibbutabhāvato nibbānamiti saṅkhaṃ upāgataṃ.
anya-e0104n:1817_12: Anuttaraṃ uttamaṃ sattānaṃ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānanti anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0104n:1818_1: Mandāya vipassanāya āgatoti atikkhāya vipassanāya vasena paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ bhāvetvā sotāpannabhāvaṃ āgato.
anya-e0104n:1818_2: Saddhādīnaṃ mudūnaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena mudindriyopi samāno.
anya-e0104n:1818_4: tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
anya-e0104n:1818_6: Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ pariyosānaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n:1818_8: kālena manussalokassāti missakassa bhavassa vasena “sattasugatibhave saṃsaritvā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n:1818_10: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule upapatti nāma natthi,
anya-e0104n:1818_12: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave.
anya-e0104n:1818_16: Attabhāvaggahaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ etassa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0104n:1818_21: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0104n:1819_3: “Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
anya-e0104n:1819_4: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1819_9: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1820_3: Pañcadhā idha vihāya niṭṭho hotīti so anāgāmī antarāparinibbāyiādibhāvena pañcapakārena imaṃ lokaṃ pajahitvā parinibbāyanako hoti.
anya-e0104n:1820_6: Appayogenāti adhimattapayogena vinā appakasireneva tikkhindriyatāya sukheneva.
anya-e0104n:1820_8: Uddhaṃ vā hi bhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1820_10: Uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto.
anya-e0104n:1821_1: Imesaṃ pana anāgāmīnaṃ pabhedajānanatthaṃ uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmicatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ –
anya-e0104n:1821_2: yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1821_4: Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1821_8: Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n:1821_10: Ete pana avihesu upapannasamanantarā āyuvemajjhaṃ appatvā,
anya-e0104n:1824_10: Lokiyavijjābhiññāhi vināpi ubhatobhāgavimuttatā hotīti ubhatobhāgavimutto visuṃ gahito.
anya-e0104n:1824_11: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yaṃ catutthamaggapaññābhāvanaṃ sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepato gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n:1824_12: taṃ pana vuttākāraṃ nigamanavasena dassetuṃ “maggakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n:1824_13: Kāmaṃ catūsupi maggakkhaṇesu taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma,
anya-e0104n:1824_17: Tenettha heṭṭhā heṭṭhimamaggapaññābhāvanānisaṃsassa vuttattāva catutthamaggapaññābhāvanāvasena attho vutto.
anya-e0104n:1825_0: Ratinti abhiratiṃ, abhirucinti attho. Tatthāti ariyāya paññābhāvanāya.
anya-e0104n:1826_2: Gāthā hi attano atthabhūtassa visuddhimaggassa ādhārabhāvena vuttā,
anya-e0104n:1830_1: Imissā dāni gāthāyātiādīnaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
anya-e0104n:1830_2: Svāyaṃ “visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa”nti evaṃ paṭiññāto visuddhimaggo ettāvatā bhāsito hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n:1831_2: tesaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tigāthāyaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlādippabhedānaṃ atthānaṃ pañcannampi mahānikāyānaṃ aṭṭhakathānaye
anya-e0104n:1831_3: aṭṭhakathātantiyaṃ tattha tattha vutto yo vinicchayo,
anya-e0104n:1831_4: yebhuyyena taṃ sabbaṃ samāharitvā samānetvā nikāyantarassa nikāyagatavādadosasaṅkarehi mutto so nicchayo yasmā pakāsito,
anya-e0104n:1831_5: tasmā visuddhikāmehi yogīhi etasmiṃ visuddhimagge ādaro karaṇīyoyevāti.
anya-e0104n:1842_0: Sā esā paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0104n:1846_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
anya-e0104n:1851_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
anya-e0104n:1852_0: Sammā vassatu kālena, devo rājā mahīpati;
